title: Duolingo: Language Lessons
description:
Learn a new language with the world‚Äôs most-downloaded education app! Duolingo is the fun, free app for learning 40+ languages through quick, bite-sized lessons. Practice speaking, reading, listening, and writing to build your vocabulary and grammar skills.

Designed by learning experts and loved by hundreds of millions of learners worldwide, Duolingo helps you prepare for real conversations in Spanish, French, Chinese, Italian, German, English, and more.

And now, you can learn Math, Music, and Chess the Duolingo way!

‚Ä¢ Build real-world math skills ‚Äì from calculating tips to identifying patterns ‚Äì and sharpen your mental math in our Math course. Learn foundational topics like multiplication, fractions, geometry and more, and keep your brain sharp with more challenging exercises, games, and word problems.

‚Ä¢ Learn how to read music and play popular songs on your device in our Music course ‚Äì no piano or instrument required! Using an on-screen keyboard, you‚Äôll learn bit-by-bit, from finding notes on the keyboard to playing your first song.

‚Ä¢ Master moves, level up your game, and play real matches in our brand new Chess course. Checkmate!

Whether you‚Äôre learning for travel, school, career, family and friends, or your brain health, you‚Äôll love learning with Duolingo.

Why Duolingo?

‚Ä¢ Duolingo is fun and effective. Game-like lessons and fun characters help you build solid speaking, reading, listening, and writing skills.

‚Ä¢ Duolingo works. Designed by learning experts, Duolingo has a science-based teaching methodology proven to foster long-term knowledge retention.

‚Ä¢ Track your progress. Work toward your learning goals with playful rewards and achievements when you make practicing a daily habit!

‚Ä¢ Join millions of learners. Stay motivated with competitive Leaderboards as you learn alongside our global community.

‚Ä¢ Every language course is free. Learn Spanish, French, German, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Turkish, Dutch, Irish, Danish, Swedish, Ukrainian, Esperanto, Polish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Hebrew, Welsh, Arabic, Latin, Hawaiian, Scottish Gaelic, Vietnamese, Korean, Japanese, English, and even High Valyrian! And now, learn Math, Music, and Chess with our newest courses!

What the world is saying about Duolingo‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è:

Editor's Choice and "Best of the Best‚Äù ‚Äî Google Play

‚ÄúFar and away the best language-learning app.‚Äù ‚Äî The Wall Street Journal

‚ÄúThis free app and website is among the most effective language-learning methods I‚Äôve tried‚Ä¶ lessons come in the form of brief challenges ‚Äî speaking, translating, answering multiple-choice questions ‚Äî that keep me coming back for more.‚Äù ‚Äî The New York Times

‚ÄúDuolingo may hold the secret to the future of education.‚Äù ‚Äî TIME Magazine

‚Äú...Duolingo is cheerful, lighthearted and fun‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚Äî Forbes

If you like Duolingo, try Super Duolingo for 14 days free! Learn a language fast with no ads, and get fun perks like Unlimited Hearts and Monthly Streak Repair.

Send any feedback to android@duolingo.com

Use Duolingo on the Web at https://www.duolingo.com

Privacy Policy: https://www.duolingo.com/privacy

title: Speak: Language Learning
description:
Get ready to take your language skills to the next level with Speak, the ultimate language learning app focusing on improving your speaking abilities. Powered by cutting-edge AI technology, Speak ensures that you gain fluency by engaging in real-life conversations and receiving instant feedback. Whether you are learning Spanish, English, French, Italian, Japanese or Korean, Speak's AI-powered lessons will have you learning a new language fast.

With Speak, you'll feel like you have a personal language tutor right in your pocket. Our app provides immersive speaking practice sessions that simulate real-life scenarios, allowing you to become confident in your conversational Spanish, English, French, Italian, Japanese and Korean skills. The advanced AI function analyzes your speech, providing valuable assessment on pronunciation, intonation, and fluency. Say goodbye to those language barriers as you receive real-time feedback, enabling you to make necessary adjustments and improve your speaking skills on the spot.

Our comprehensive language learning curriculum is available for Spanish, English, French, Italian, Japanese and Korean learners, ensuring that you become fluent. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, Speak caters to your individual needs and helps you progress at your own pace. You'll love the personalized progress tracking, which helps you identify areas that need improvement, allowing you to focus your efforts effectively.

Speak's method is simple:
STEP 1: Do a real language learning lesson!
Learn real-life, essential phrases with your dedicated local teacher.

STEP 2: Practice speaking the language!
Repeat the learned phrases until you can speak without thinking twice!

STEP 3: AI Tutor provides personalized language feedback!
With the latest AI technology, you can practice anywhere and anytime! Get real-time feedback on pronunciations, grammar, and much more.

STEP 4: Real conversations in your chosen language!
Now put what you've learned into real-life situations and speak with confidence!

No more boring textbooks or one-sided conversations! With Speak, you'll experience interactive and engaging language practice that feels like a real-life conversation. Break free from traditional language learning and download Speak now! Gain fluency, receive real-time feedback, and become a confident speaker in Spanish, English, French, Italian, Japanese or Korean.

There are plenty of other language apps out there, but Speak's key difference comes down to getting you speaking Spanish, English, French, Italian, Japanese or Korean out loud on day 1.

SPEAK MEMBERSHIP

Speak offers both monthly and annual auto-renewing subscriptions. Become a Speak Member to gain unlimited access to all courses, singles, review material, and other content within Speak.

The subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your Google Play Account settings at least 24 hours before the current period ends. You can go to your Google Play Account settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your Google Play Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. If you subscribe before your free trial ends, the rest of your free trial period will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed.

Terms of Service: https://speak.com/tos
Privacy Policy: https://speak.com/privacy

title: Lingo Legend Language Learning
description:
Learn a language while playing language learning games! Master Spanish, French, Mandarin, Korean, Japanese, Italian, German, Portuguese, Dutch, or Russian with our innovative language learning games. Dive into a fantasy world where learning languages is an adventure. Now featuring two exciting game modes!

*Farm Mode*
- Practice your language skills in a cozy, relaxing environment within the enchanting world of Lingo Legend.
- Plant and harvest crops, unlocking infrastructure to expand your farm.
- Customize your dream farm with tons of unique decorations.
- Breed and care for adorable farm animals, the naala.
- Meet new villagers and build lasting friendships.

*Adventure Mode*
- Test your language learning skills in strategic monster battles.
- Draw ability cards from a personalized deck and answer language flashcards to use them.
- Collect cards, choose your strategy, and build your deck.
- Embark on perilous journeys, meet captivating characters, and complete quests.
- Explore a dynamic, mysterious world filled with beautiful landscapes.
- Find recipes, gather materials, and craft gear to gain experience and style.
- Play as a customizable avatar with unique gear to collect and equip.
- Personalize your camp with tons of unlockable content.

Developed by language learning experts, Lingo Legend offers over 200 categories of grammar, vocabulary, and common phrases. It's the perfect app to complement or kick-start your language learning journey. Lingo Legend isn't just another language learning app‚Äîit's a real game!

*Supported Languages*
- French (France & Canadian)
- Spanish
- Japanese
- Korean
- Mandarin Chinese
- German
- Italian
- Portuguese (Brazilian & European)
- Dutch
- Russian

*Educational Features*
- Developed by language learning experts passionate about keeping you engaged.
- Learn words and phrases relevant to everyday life with themes like Ordering Food and Meeting New People.
- Ensure long-term retention with our spaced-repetition algorithm.
- Define your learning path and practice what you want, when you want.

Download Lingo Legend now and revolutionize your language learning with fun and interactive language games!

Have questions? Want to connect with us?
Contact support - support@lingolegend.com
Join Discord - https://discord.gg/TzWJSfzf4R
Follow on Twitter - https://twitter.com/LingoLegend

Privacy Policy - https://www.lingolegend.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Use - https://www.lingolegend.com/terms-of-use

title: Falou - Fast language learning

Want to travel the world but need to learn Spanish? Study abroad but need to learn French? Or maybe get a better job and need to learn English? Falou will help you reach all your goals much faster.

Even if you already have language lessons or use other language apps like Duolingo, Babbel, or Rosetta Stone, don't worry. Falou is the best complement to your language studies and will help you learn Spanish, French, German and many other languages much faster!

Download Falou now and start speaking a new language today!

title: Airlearn - Language Learning
description:
Airlearn: Learn Spanish, German, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Hindi, English, Turkish, and Russian in one intuitive app. Enjoy short lessons, cultural insights, and fun practice slides that make language learning stress-free and engaging.

OUR APPROACH
‚Ä¢ Learn First, Practice Next: We teach key grammar, vocabulary, and cultural context before you dive into quizzes. Gain real understanding instead of guessing.  
‚Ä¢ Rich Cultural Insights: Explore history, customs, and local expressions. Language is more than words‚ÄîAirlearn helps you appreciate its cultural essence.  
‚Ä¢ Clean & Minimalist: No overblown gamification or cluttered screens. Lessons stay focused, so you can learn at your own pace without distractions.  
‚Ä¢ Weekly Leagues & XP: Motivate yourself by competing with others studying the same language. Earn XP from each lesson and climb the leaderboard for extra fun.

WHY AIRLEARN
‚Ä¢ Concise Lessons: Each module covers grammar rules, vocabulary, and examples in bite-sized slides.  
‚Ä¢ Practical Dialogues: From casual greetings to deeper conversations, practice relevant situations.  
‚Ä¢ Spaced Repetition: Lock new words into long-term memory with our smart revision approach.  
‚Ä¢ Track Progress: Daily goals, streaks, and achievements keep your momentum alive.  
‚Ä¢ Community Feel: Join like-minded learners, share study tips, and celebrate mutual achievements.

DIVE INTO 12 LANGUAGES
1. Spanish: Vibrant dialogues for travel, work, or fun.  
2. German: Master precise grammar for Europe‚Äôs economic hub.  
3. French: Absorb its romantic flair and cultural legacy.  
4. Italian: Savor the melodic flow and culinary charm.  
5. Dutch: Expand career options in a globalized world.  
6. Portuguese: Explore Brazil‚Äôs rich diversity or Portugal‚Äôs historic roots.  
7. Japanese: Conquer kanji, hiragana, and katakana with confidence.  
8. Korean: Learn Hangeul, K-pop phrases, and daily expressions.  
9. Chinese: Build listening and reading skills in one of the world‚Äôs most spoken tongues.  
10. Hindi: Unlock India‚Äôs cultural treasure, cinema, and business potential.  
11. English: Hone global communication for travel, work, or personal growth.  
12. Russian: Tackle Cyrillic and immerse in a language of literary tradition.

HOW IT WORKS  
1. Install Airlearn: Begin with the basics or jump into advanced modules anytime.  
2. Learn: Study essential grammar and vocabulary in short, clear lessons.  
3. Practice: Tackle engaging quizzes and drills to reinforce your knowledge.  
4. Compete: Earn XP and measure your progress in our fun Weekly League.  
5. Flourish: Speak, read, and write with newfound fluency and cultural understanding.

WHAT SETS US APART
‚Ä¢ Genuine Learning: We prioritize understanding over memorization.  
‚Ä¢ All Levels Welcome: From novices to pros, our modules adapt to you.  
‚Ä¢ Regular Updates: New lessons and features keep it fresh.  
‚Ä¢ Lifestyle Friendly: Learn anytime‚Äîduring breaks, commutes, or weekends.

GET STARTED FOR FREE
Airlearn transforms language study into an immersive experience. Whether you‚Äôre planning a trip, boosting your r√©sum√©, or simply curious about global cultures, we‚Äôll guide you step by step. Enjoy short lessons that fit smoothly into your day, gather XP, and watch your language skills skyrocket.

Join thousands of motivated learners worldwide. Download Airlearn now for Spanish, German, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Hindi, English, or Russian. Experience the spark of real progress, gain cultural know-how, and feel the thrill of community-powered learning. Go beyond translations‚Äîmaster languages in a way that truly sticks. With Airlearn, you‚Äôll open doors to new friendships, opportunities, and an expanded worldview. Welcome to your next adventure in language mastery!

title: Mango Languages Learning
description:
Ready to have real conversations? Mango Languages prioritizes real language, real culture, and real progress. Our comprehensive learning platform offers conversational language lessons in 70+ languages, teaching vocabulary, pronunciation, grammar, and culture simultaneously.

From preparing for vacation or working abroad, to personal development and academic growth, our language courses are designed to take you wherever you wish to go.

HOW DOES MANGO WORK?

Learn languages from native speakers with courses that feature thousands of real recordings.
Enhance comprehension with interactive listening and reading activities and bolster your learning with personalized daily reviews.
Refine speaking skills with phonetic spellings, natural and slow pronunciations, and our pronunciation comparison tool.
Sync progress across all platforms and NO ADS, so you can learn anywhere, at any time, with no distractions.

WHY CHOOSE MANGO?

Practical, Authentic Content: The outcome of using Mango is the ability to speak and communicate in real conversations.

Linguist-Approved Language Courses: Each course is designed by expert linguists to provide high-quality instruction that produces real results.

Placement Tests: Not sure where to start? Use our placement tests in select languages to identify the best starting point.

Individualized Review: Our intelligent review system helps you retain knowledge through spaced repetition and adapts to your progress.

Practice with Flashcards: Supercharge your vocabulary with built-in flashcards or take it a step further and create your own lists!

On-The-Go Learning: Download lessons to your phone for offline access and take advantage of our hands-free audio feature!

HOW CAN I START?

When you sign up, you can find free access through a subscribing organization, like a public library, or you can subscribe with a 14-day free trial. Cancel at any time.

Serious about language learning? Our paid subscriptions include: 
Individual Plan: Access to all of our languages in one learning profile.
Family Plan: Access to all of our languages for you and up to five additional family members.

For questions or feedback, please contact support@mangolanguages.com

title: Drops: Language Learning Games
description:
Drops is a fun, visual language learning app where bite-size lessons feel like play. Build vocabulary fast with language learning games, word games, and vocabulary games that make every minute count. Perfect for beginners and busy learners who want to learn a new language or improve vocabulary ‚Äî whether you‚Äôre looking to learn Spanish, learn English, or explore different languages.

Why choose Drops?
‚Ä¢ Game-based learning: quick sessions use matching, swipes, and quiz games to make language learning feel effortless.
‚Ä¢ Smart review system: practice words at the right time to remember them longer ‚Äî a true vocabulary builder that helps you expand vocabulary every day.
‚Ä¢ Clear audio by native speakers: ideal if you want to learn pronunciation or speak confidently in English, Spanish, Japanese, or Korean.
‚Ä¢ Personalised goals and streaks: stay motivated and keep your study habit strong.
‚Ä¢ Beautiful visuals: icons and animations help you memorise faster, even for complex languages like Japanese, Korean, or Arabic.

What you‚Äôll learn
‚Ä¢ Core vocabulary and phrases for travel, work, and daily life.
‚Ä¢ Essential topics: food, numbers, directions, time, shopping, and more ‚Äî perfect for learning Spanish for beginners or anyone wondering how to learn Spanish or how to study Korean.
‚Ä¢ Practice reading and listening with fun word games and learning games that make studying feel like a challenge, not a chore.

Popular language packs
Learn English, Learn Spanish (including Mexican Spanish), Learn Japanese (Hiragana & Katakana), Learn French, Learn Korean (Hangul), Learn German, Learn Italian, Learn Chinese (Mandarin), Learn Arabic, and Learn Portuguese (Brazilian Portuguese).
You can also learn Dutch, learn Turkish, learn Vietnamese, learn Polish, learn Greek, learn Hebrew, and many more ‚Äî making Drops the perfect app for mastering new languages.

Perfect for quick daily study
Set a daily goal and study for 5‚Äì10 minutes. Daily play with language learning games helps you build vocabulary, improve pronunciation, and expand your English vocabulary or Spanish vocabulary naturally. The more you play, the more you learn.

Key features at a glance
‚Ä¢ Language learning games that turn study into play.
‚Ä¢ Word games and quiz games to learn new words fast.
‚Ä¢ Audio pronunciation practice to perfect your accent in English, Spanish, French, and more.
‚Ä¢ Offline practice available for subscribed users.
‚Ä¢ Built-in vocabulary builder that helps you remember words through repetition and visual association.

Who is Drops for?
‚Ä¢ Beginners starting a new language ‚Äî from learn Spanish for free to learn Arabic for beginners.
‚Ä¢ Learners returning to refresh vocabulary ‚Äî try English grammar practice or irregular verbs through play.
‚Ä¢ Travellers who want key phrases before a trip ‚Äî perfect for learning Japanese, learning Korean, or learning Spanish vocabulary.
‚Ä¢ Students and professionals using a study app or language learning app for beginners to boost their skills in English for working adults or English for technology.

Why it works
‚Ä¢ Focus on vocabulary: you learn the most useful words for real-life conversations.
‚Ä¢ Micro-learning: short, frequent sessions that fit your schedule and boost memory.

descriptionHTML:
Drops is a fun, visual language learning app where bite-size lessons feel like play. Build vocabulary fast with language learning games, word games, and vocabulary games that make every minute count. Perfect for beginners and busy learners who want to learn a new language or improve vocabulary ‚Äî whether you‚Äôre looking to learn Spanish, learn English, or explore different languages.

Why choose Drops?
‚Ä¢ Game-based learning: quick sessions use matching, swipes, and quiz games to make language learning feel effortless.
‚Ä¢ Smart review system: practice words at the right time to remember them longer ‚Äî a true vocabulary builder that helps you expand vocabulary every day.
‚Ä¢ Clear audio by native speakers: ideal if you want to learn pronunciation or speak confidently in English, Spanish, Japanese, or Korean.
‚Ä¢ Personalised goals and streaks: stay motivated and keep your study habit strong.
‚Ä¢ Beautiful visuals: icons and animations help you memorise faster, even for complex languages like Japanese, Korean, or Arabic.

What you‚Äôll learn
‚Ä¢ Core vocabulary and phrases for travel, work, and daily life.
‚Ä¢ Essential topics: food, numbers, directions, time, shopping, and more ‚Äî perfect for learning Spanish for beginners or anyone wondering how to learn Spanish or how to study Korean.
‚Ä¢ Practice reading and listening with fun word games and learning games that make studying feel like a challenge, not a chore.

Popular language packs
Learn English, Learn Spanish (including Mexican Spanish), Learn Japanese (Hiragana & Katakana), Learn French, Learn Korean (Hangul), Learn German, Learn Italian, Learn Chinese (Mandarin), Learn Arabic, and Learn Portuguese (Brazilian Portuguese).
You can also learn Dutch, learn Turkish, learn Vietnamese, learn Polish, learn Greek, learn Hebrew, and many more ‚Äî making Drops the perfect app for mastering new languages.

Perfect for quick daily study
Set a daily goal and study for 5‚Äì10 minutes. Daily play with language learning games helps you build vocabulary, improve pronunciation, and expand your English vocabulary or Spanish vocabulary naturally. The more you play, the more you learn.

Key features at a glance
‚Ä¢ Language learning games that turn study into play.
‚Ä¢ Word games and quiz games to learn new words fast.
‚Ä¢ Audio pronunciation practice to perfect your accent in English, Spanish, French, and more.
‚Ä¢ Offline practice available for subscribed users.
‚Ä¢ Built-in vocabulary builder that helps you remember words through repetition and visual association.

Who is Drops for?
‚Ä¢ Beginners starting a new language ‚Äî from learn Spanish for free to learn Arabic for beginners.
‚Ä¢ Learners returning to refresh vocabulary ‚Äî try English grammar practice or irregular verbs through play.
‚Ä¢ Travellers who want key phrases before a trip ‚Äî perfect for learning Japanese, learning Korean, or learning Spanish vocabulary.
‚Ä¢ Students and professionals using a study app or language learning app for beginners to boost their skills in English for working adults or English for technology.

Why it works
‚Ä¢ Focus on vocabulary: you learn the most useful words for real-life conversations.
‚Ä¢ Micro-learning: short, frequent sessions that fit your schedule and boost memory.
‚Ä¢ Visual learning: icons and illustrations make it easy to connect meaning to words ‚Äî ideal for Japanese vocabulary, French vocabulary, and English learning.

Get started today

Download Drops now and start learning languages through games. Build confidence as you learn Spanish, learn English, learn Japanese, learn Korean, learn French, learn German, learn Italian, learn Chinese, learn Arabic, and practice Portuguese ‚Äî then explore even more at your own pace.
Drops makes language learning simple, effective, and genuinely fun.

Privacy Policy & Terms: http://languagedrops.com/privacypolicy.html

title: Rosetta Stone: Learn Languages
description: Why the Rosetta Stone app? Because the best way to learn a new language is to surround yourself with it, and our language learning app does just that. Rosetta Stone‚Äôs Dynamic Immersion¬Æ method uses interactive and contextual language lessons blended with Extended Learning features. Everything you need is literally at your fingertips‚Äìany time, anywhere, any device; online or off and completely ad-free. RECENT AWARDS ‚Ä¢ 2019 PCMag Editors‚Äô Choice ‚Ä¢ 2019 Tabby Awards Winner ‚Ä¢ 2019 Best Mobile App Awards: Best Designed App and Best Overall App For the first time, we‚Äôre offering every one of our languages under one subscription. Flip between languages as often as you‚Äôd like and enjoy the freedom to get seriously curious. To access all languages, simply select Unlimited Languages when you subscribe. Practice and learn to speak Spanish, French, German, Italian, English, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Arabic, Portuguese, Russian, Dutch, Filipino, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Irish, Persian, Polish, Swedish, Turkish, Vietnamese, and more! Rosetta Stone helps you speak confidently. With a variety of speaking-focused lessons and features, instantaneous pronunciation feedback with TruAccent, a track record of getting people speaking any language confidently and a near-five star rating in the app store, the award-winning Rosetta Stone mobile app is the best way to learn and speak new languages. What you want to learn, first. Let us know why you're learning a new language and we'll create a game plan with curated content and helpful lesson reminders to help you stay on track in your learning journey**. Fits any schedule. Take a 10-minute lesson anywhere, study online or off. Never leaves your side. Practice languages here, there, and everywhere. Learn to speak English, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese or any language you want. Don‚Äôt get lost in translation. Touch and hold anything from your Core Lessons to reveal its translation*. Speak confidently. TruAccent¬Æ technology provides real-time pronunciation feedback and helps you speak confidently. Go beyond memorization. Learn in context using our Dynamic Immersion¬Æ method. Extended Language Learning Features Say it like a local. Improve pronunciation and practice speaking by reading aloud while listening to native speakers with stories and useful conversations. Always know what to say. Get easy-to-understand greetings, phrases, expressions, daily conversations and more with Phrasebook*. Train your ear. Take a break from the screen by listening to Audio Companion¬Æ lessons. Select a language learning subscription: Choose from 3 and 12-month subscriptions‚Äîas well as a Lifetime option. No translators, grammar books or dictionary needed! Available Languages: Spanish (Latin American or Spain) French German Italian English (American or British) Japanese Korean Chinese (Mandarin) Arabic Portuguese (Brazil) Russian Dutch Filipino (Tagalog) Greek Hebrew Hindi Irish Persian (Farsi) Polish Swedish Turkish Vietnamese Enterprise and Education Learners Unlimited use of Rosetta Stone's mobile app is available for existing Enterprise and Education Learners. Features may vary for Enterprise and Education Learners. *Available with select languages on the Rosetta Stone: Learn Languages app. **Your Plan languages offered for Android are English, French, Italian, German, and Spanish.

title: LingoDeer - Learn Languages
description:
Want to learn a new language, such as Japanese, French, Spanish or Korean on your own? Give LingoDeer a try!

Available courses for English speakers:
Korean, Japanese, Mandarin Chinese, Arabic, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Malay, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese, Russian, Spanish (Latin American or European), Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese.

What can LingoDeer do for you?
‚Äª Learn to read and write a language with a unique alphabet system, such as Korean or Japanese 
‚Äª Learn to form sentences in your own words by following a structured course
‚Äª Learn the essential vocabulary and grammar from beginner to intermediate levels (A1-B1)
‚Äª Improve listening and improve pronunciation with HD recordings by native speakers 
‚Äª Reinforce learning with various review activities: flashcards, quizzes, target trainings and more
‚Äª Track your progress and statistics
‚Äª Download lessons to learn offline

What makes LingoDeer different? Its teaching power. 

Instead of relying on users to figure things out, LingoDeer offers a structured, clear and motivating path toward fluency. 

By providing the best structured curricula among apps and clear explanations on grammar, LingoDeer enables users to form sentences in their own words, not just memorize and repeat after a phrasebook.

As a result, users gain a clear sense of progression through following this path and are able to maintain long-term motivation. 

What‚Äôs more, the variety of activities supported in LingoDeer gives users the flexibility to personalize their study. From speaking exercises about food allergies, to drilling words with flashcards or 5-min pop quizzes during lunch breaks, let LingoDeer surprise you with every session.

If you don‚Äôt know where to start with learning a new language, start with LingoDeer. 

PLEASE NOTE:¬†
You will need a LingoDeer membership in order to access all courses and features.¬†

Support: 
Found a bug? Let us know and help us make LingoDeer better!
Email: hi@lingodeer.com 
https://m.me/lingodeer

title: HelloTalk - Learn Languages
description: Practice languages with native speakers on HelloTalk! We recently introduced HelloTalk Live and Voiceroom - interactive language and culture events to help you master languages through the content you love! HelloTalk, the original language exchange app, connects you with native speakers to practice languages (English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, Mandarin Chinese, Portuguese, German, Italian, Russian, Arabic, Turkish, Hindi, Indonesian, Thai, Vietnamese and 260+ more) for FREE! HelloTalk equips you with learning tools such as translation and instant captions so you can learn by chatting with native speakers. Learn languages from locals around the world through livestreams and Voicerooms. Connect with expert hosts to discuss interesting topics with language partners in the learning community! Why HelloTalk? ‚ñ∫ Real language learning atmosphere Whether you're focused on a widely spoken language or a less common one, HelloTalk caters to your needs. The system smartly matches you based on your native language and proficiency, while allowing you to filter ideal language partners according to various criteria such as age, location, and gender. Plus, with built-in translation and transliteration tools, you can communicate confidently without any language barriers. ‚ñ∫ A powerful tool for sharpening your language skills Acquiring new words through conversations with native speakers is more effective than rigid memorization. Whether you're a student preparing for exams like the CET, GRE, TOEFL, IELTS, planning to study abroad, or a professional seeking career advancement through language skills, HelloTalk offers native speakers who match your proficiency level for engaging interactions and valuable learning experiences. ‚ñ∫ Immersive multi-person language chat rooms If you choose to learn Spanish, for example, every Voiceroom you enter on HelloTalk gathers Spanish learners and Spanish native speakers from around the world to discuss interesting topics. Here, only your voice needs to be heard, creating a comfortable, introvert-friendly atmosphere. Here, sharing mutual interests allows everyone to freely express themselves and share personal experiences, fostering both language intuition and authentic expression skills. It's incredibly addictive! ‚ñ∫ Diverse global Livestreams HelloTalk features handpicked foreign language hosts who offer online video lessons, share language insights, and provide glimpses into their lives abroad. You can even join them on stage for one-on-one video conversations with fellow language learners. Whether you're grappling with pronunciation, speaking speed, or shyness, these hosts will assist you in refining your language skills and guiding the conversation. For rapid improvement in spoken language, there's no substitute for direct communication with native speakers! ‚ñ∫ International Moments HelloTalk's Moments offers real-time posts covering learning, lifestyle, and cultural insights from around the world. It's your ticket to discovering fresh perspectives and gaining deeper insights into diverse cultural customs, all from the comfort of your home. Don't forget to engage with posts that catch your interest! What the world is saying about HelloTalk ‚ù§Ô∏è ‚ù§Ô∏è ‚ù§Ô∏èüåüüåüüåü Editor's Choice - Google Play ‚ÄúOne of the best apps to help you learn a new language.‚Äù - 9to5Mac "When you're ready to experiment with a foreign language, HelloTalk provides an excellent opportunity for interaction with other speakers." ‚ÄìPCMag "HelloTalk, which connects native speakers with an apprentice, also offers language exchanges to its 20 million users in more than 150 languages." -Forbes START PRACTICING LANGUAGES RIGHT AWAY!!! Learn more about the HelloTalk app: - Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Hellotalk/ - Twitter: https://twitter.com/hellotalkapp Send any feedback to support@hellotalk.com - Privacy Policy: https://www.hellotalk.com/privacy-policy - Terms of Use: https://www.hellotalk.com/terms-of-service

title: Language Learning: Pingo AI
description:
Join 1,500,000+ language learners who use Pingo AI to learn a language. Pingo AI Language Learning uses results-driven AI for you to learn a language and speak fluently through real-life conversations. 

üèÜWinner of Google Play's Best of 2025 awardüèÜ

üëã Speak to Pingo AI as you would a friend
Talk about your day, ask questions, and explore languages together. Pingo, your speaking companion, gives you instant feedback to dramatically improve your language learning skills. Practice speaking from 25+ languages to refine your vocabulary, grammar, and fluency, as well as speak confidently in real conversation exchange.

üéØ Why use Pingo AI to learn languages
‚úì Learn to speak a language fluently through real-life conversations.
‚úì Get personalized language lessons.
‚úì Learn exactly what to improve, including vocabulary, grammar, relevancy and fluency.
‚úì Learn words and phrases you‚Äôll actually use.
‚úì Become fluent in a foreign language.
‚úì Proven effectiveness for beginners, advanced learners, and everyone in between.

üí¨ Choose language lessons from these languages:
Learn to speak fluent languages, including English, Spanish, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Italian, Chinese (Mandarin), Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, Dutch, Turkish, Polish, Vietnamese, Hindi, Thai, Hebrew, Greek, Indonesian, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Persian (Farsi), and Ukrainian. 

‚ú® How to use Pingo AI* to learn a language:
1) Create or choose from engaging, real-life conversation scenarios.

2) Talk with an ultra-realistic AI that feels like a native speaker, adapting to your pace and skill level.

3) Receive actionable feedback and tips for improvement on vocabulary, grammar, fluency, engagement, and relevance for every language conversation.

4) Use Language Learning Tutor Mode for guided practice and review useful words to reinforce learning. It's your personal speaking tutor.

5) Get fluent faster and build lasting language confidence.

üó£Ô∏è Consistently speaking and conversing in the foreign language is essential to confidently speak, become fluent, and learn a language. Pingo AI Language Learning transforms self-guided practice into a goal-oriented, interactive learning experience that‚Äôs far more effective than simply repeating basic phrases aloud or struggling to find opportunities for real-life conversation exchange. Pingo AI helps you become fluent to learn a language today! 

‚ö°Ô∏è Ditch static, repetitive modules and boring lessons. At Pingo AI, we‚Äôre building the most dynamic and immersive AI language learning experience ever to help you reach your language goals as fast as possible.

üöÄ Learn a language today! Whether you want to learn English, Spanish, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Italian, Chinese (Mandarin), Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, Dutch, Turkish, Polish, Vietnamese, Hindi, Thai, Hebrew, Greek, Indonesian, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Persian (Farsi), or Ukrainian, Pingo AI Language Learning is your learning language app to achieve fluency.

If you have any ideas or questions, please email us at support@mypingoai.com.

*Note: All conversations require a subscription
Terms: https://mypingoai.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://mypingoai.com/privacy

Join Ling's biggest sale of the year this Black Friday. Half the price for a whole new you.

Unlock a free language learning experience with Ling, the top language app for learning hard languages like Thai, Tagalog, Serbian, Khmer, Cantonese, and more.

Learn Thai, learn Serbian, learn Tagalog, learn Albanian, learn Khmer, learn Korean, learn Afrikaans, learn Armenian, learn Bengali, learn Bosnian, learn Bulgarian, learn Burmese, learn Cantonese, learn Chinese, learn Croatian, learn Czech, learn Estonian, learn Farsi (Persian), learn Georgian, learn Hindi, learn Hungarian, learn Indonesian, learn Japanese, learn Kannada, learn Lao, learn Latvian, learn Lithuanian, learn Malayalam, learn Malay, learn Marathi, learn Mongolian, learn Nepali, learn Polish, learn Punjabi, learn Romanian, learn Russian, learn Slovak, learn Slovenian, learn Swahili, learn Tamil, learn Telugu, learn Turkish, learn Ukrainian, learn Urdu, learn Icelandic, learn Cebuano, learn Somali, learn Sinhala, and learn Vietnamese!

Unlock a free language learning experience with Ling, the top language app for learning hard languages like Thai, Tagalog, Serbian, Khmer, Cantonese, and more.

LANGUAGE COURSES

Say hello to 4 new languages! Learn Somali, Cebuano, Icelandic, and Sinhala only on Ling!

Learn Thai, learn Serbian, learn Tagalog, learn Albanian, learn Khmer, learn Korean, learn Afrikaans, learn Armenian, learn Bengali, learn Bosnian, learn Bulgarian, learn Burmese, learn Cantonese, learn Chinese, learn Croatian, learn Czech, learn Estonian, learn Farsi (Persian), learn Georgian, learn Hindi, learn Hungarian, learn Indonesian, learn Japanese, learn Kannada, learn Lao, learn Latvian, learn Lithuanian, learn Malayalam, learn Malay, learn Marathi, learn Mongolian, learn Nepali, learn Polish, learn Punjabi, learn Romanian, learn Russian, learn Slovak, learn Slovenian, learn Swahili, learn Tamil, learn Telugu, learn Turkish, learn Ukrainian, learn Urdu, learn Icelandic, learn Cebuano, learn Somali, learn Sinhala, and learn Vietnamese!

WHY LING

- Learn languages easy with short, interactive lessons that build vocabulary, grammar, speaking, listening, reading, & writing
- Designed for language learners of all levels, from beginner to advanced
- Built-in gamification (points, streaks, leaderboards) to keep you motivated
- Languages you can‚Äôt find anywhere else

IMMERSIVE LANGUAGE LEARNING

- Native speaker audio ensures correct pronunciation, especially for tonal languages
- Culture notes offer essential cultural context to deepen your understanding

HARD LANGUAGES

- Use Ling to learn hard languages with non-Latin alphabets
- Practical vocabulary and phrases
- Optional transcription
- Writing practice

BEST FOR

- Anyone wanting to learn languages on the go
- Those looking for a language app that offers less common languages

Download Ling to start learning languages!

PRICING

- Monthly: $14.99
- Half-yearly: $59.99

Please note: Subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto-renew is disabled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. If not, you will be charged the subscription amount through your Play Store account. Manage current subscriptions and disable auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase.

title: WordJet: Language Learning
description:
WordJet is the camera-first language app that turns your world into a classroom. Just snap a photo and get instant lessons built from real life, not boring textbooks. Learn faster, remember longer, and actually enjoy the process of picking up a new language.

SNAP & LEARN
Turn any photo into an instant language lesson. Snap your favorite foods, landmarks, or everyday moments, and WordJet transforms them into vocabulary you‚Äôll actually use.

4X FASTER THAN OTHER APPS
Designed by top academics, WordJet is built for speed. Our lessons cut out the fluff and help you master new words and sentences faster than other language learning apps.

LEARN WHAT INTERESTS YOU
Choose from Guided Lesson plans on travel, dining, shopping, and more. Each one is carefully curated to give you practical words and sentences you‚Äôll actually use.

SHARE LESSONS WITH FRIENDS
Learning a new language is more fun when it‚Äôs shared. Send your custom lessons to friends, compare progress, and compete in friendly challenges to see who can level up faster.

CUSTOM QUIZZES
No more boring repeats. WordJet builds quizzes around the words you‚Äôve captured, keeping every session fresh and personalized.

YOUR PATH TO FLUENCY
Follow four simple steps:
1. Learn: Snap a photo to unlock vocabulary
2. Memorize: Review with visual flashcards
3. Quiz: Test yourself with personalized challenges
4. Repeat: Keep practicing until fluency sticks

THE SMARTER WAY TO LEARN
Whether you‚Äôre studying with friends, snapping photos on the go, or grinding through quizzes, WordJet makes language learning fast, fun, and built for real life.

JOIN TODAY
Get started for $9.99/month or save big with the annual plan at $39.99/year‚Äîthat‚Äôs over 60% off, plus a 3-day free trial to see if WordJet is right for you.

title: Lingokids - Play and Learn
description:
THE INTERACTIVE APP FOR KIDS
Lingokids is the fun, safe, educational kids learning app that toddlers and children aged 2‚Äì8 love‚Äîand parents trust! Packed with over 3000 shows, songs, coloring games, cooking games, and interactive activities, it lets your child play, learn, and grow at their own pace. This is screen time for girls and boys you can feel good about.

LINGOKIDS NOW HAS DISNEY ACTIVITIES!
Your kid can now play brand-new Disney Mickey & Friends, Disney Moana and Disney Frozen-themed activities. All fun, all edutaining‚Äîand all on the Playlearning‚Ñ¢ app kids love! 
From math to literacy to creativity, help your kid practice at their own pace with activities featuring beloved Disney characters like Anna, Elsa and Olaf, Moana and Maui, and Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck and Goofy.
Because when activities are this edutaining, they become something your kid truly loves!

5 REASONS LINGOKIDS IS GUILT-FREE FOR FAMILIES
Made by parents & educators
Loved by toddlers, preschoolers, and elementary school kids
kidSAFE¬Æ certified & 100% ad-free
More than 30 global awards
Over 3000 fun kids games and activities to play!

INTERACTIVE ACTIVITIES
Your kids can explore over 3000 interactive games, coloring games, and toddler-friendly challenges covering 650+ learning objectives‚Äîall through play! Subjects include math, literacy, science, engineering, art, music, and more. Kids can move at their own pace through a curated curriculum using fun toddler games, books, videos, and songs. Perfect games for your 2,3,4,5,6,7,8 year olds!


PLAYLEARNING‚Ñ¢ METHOD
At Lingokids, we believe learning sticks when it‚Äôs wrapped in fun. Our Playlearning‚Ñ¢ method inspires toddlers and kids to discover the world naturally‚Äîthrough play, repetition, and curiosity. From coloring and games to movement, stories, and songs, every interaction builds real skills.

FEATURED BRANDS & CHARACTERS
Your kids can play with familiar favorites like Blippi and Pocoyo. Plus, brand-new activities featuring beloved Disney characters all available inside the Lingokids app. And discover activities created with trusted names like NASA and Oxford University Press.

Many families may already know Lingokids from our videos on YouTube and YouTube Kids, where over 3 million subscribers enjoy our playful, edutaining content. Now, those same kids can keep learning through fun toddler games and interactive activities inside the app.

SUBJECTS, THEMES & LEVELS THAT GROW WITH YOUR CHILD
Reading & Literacy: Build phonics, writing, and reading confidence.
Math & Engineering: Strengthen number sense, addition, subtraction, and logical thinking.
Science & Tech: Introduce biology, chemistry, coding, robotics and NASA-powered activities.
Music & Art: Play with rhythm, sound, and creativity in music + coloring games.
Social-Emotional Learning: Practice empathy, expression, and mindfulness.
History & Geography: Spark curiosity about the world and its stories.
Physical Activity: Fun stretches, yoga, and movement songs keep toddlers engaged!

WHY UPGRADE TO LINGOKIDS PLUS?
Unlimited access to 3000+ toddler games, coloring games, and activities
Covers 650+ learning goals across subjects and life skills
Expert-designed lessons for boys and girls aged 2‚Äì8
Lingokids activities featuring Disney, Blippi, Pocoyo, NASA and Oxford University Press content
Progress reports, parent community, and up to 4 child profiles
100% ad-free, with no in-app purchases
Play online or offline‚Äîanywhere, anytime!

Subscriptions automatically renew each month 24-hours before the end of the current period and your iTunes account will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renew any time from within the app. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

Help & Support: https://help.lingokids.com/
Privacy Policy: https://lingokids.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://www.lingokids.com/tos

title: Beelinguapp Language Learning
description:
Beelinguapp is the bilingual app that makes language learning fun and effective. Whether you want to learn English, practice Spanish language learning, discover ingles stories, or explore new languages like Japanese, French, or Dutch, Beelinguapp helps you improve reading, listening, and comprehension with side-by-side bilingual texts and audiobooks.

Learn Spanish, Explore Bilingual Stories, and Master Language Learning

Key Features: ‚Ä¢ Bilingual Stories for All Levels: From beginners to experts, find stories tailored to your skill level and interests. ‚Ä¢ Audiobooks Narrated by Native Speakers: Listen to authentic pronunciation and train your ears with our native narrators. ‚Ä¢ Karaoke-Style Scrolling Text: Follow along with synchronized text to enhance your reading and listening skills. ‚Ä¢ Wide Variety of Stories: Enjoy classics like Snow White and Sherlock Holmes, cultural guides, daily news articles, and children's books with illustrations. ‚Ä¢ Quizzes to Test Your Knowledge: Reinforce your learning with quizzes at the end of each story. Why Choose Beelinguapp? Beelinguapp makes language learning engaging with bilingual content designed for real improvement. You‚Äôll quickly notice progress whether your goal is to learn English, enjoy Spanish language learning, or practice with stories in French, Dutch, Japanese, Chinese and more. Learn English with stories: Improve vocabulary and comprehension while reading side-by-side bilingual texts. From classic novels to modern news, Beelinguapp is the perfect English learning app. Spanish language learning made simple: Practice Spanish with audiobooks and bilingual stories. Enjoy cultural narratives, children‚Äôs tales, and everyday articles narrated by native Spanish speakers. Explore other languages: Discover ingles, French, Japanese, Dutch, Chinese and many more with bilingual methods that make it easy to learn. Download Beelinguapp and explore a new way of learning languages. Read and listen to your favorite stories while improving your language skills for free! If you‚Äôre seeking an effective Spanish learning app, Beelinguapp is the perfect choice. Our innovative method allows you to read and listen to stories in Spanish while referencing your native language, making it easier to grasp and retain new vocabulary and phrases. Whether you're just beginning your Spanish learning journey or you're an advanced learner looking to polish your skills, Beelinguapp offers a wide array of captivating stories and audiobooks narrated by native speakers to fully immerse you in the Spanish language. From classic tales and cultural narratives to news articles and children's books, our Spanish learning app provides a dynamic and enjoyable way to learn. Looking for an efficient way to learn English? Beelinguapp simplifies the process. With our bilingual audiobooks, you can read and listen to stories in English while referencing your native language. This method helps you understand new vocabulary and phrases. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, Beelinguapp offers a diverse selection of stories and audiobooks narrated by native speakers to immerse you in English. From classic literature to children‚Äôs books and news articles, our English learning app ensures a fun and effective learning experience. You are looking for another language? ‚Ä¢ Learn Spanish ‚Ä¢ Learn French ‚Ä¢ Learn English ‚Ä¢ Learn Japanese ‚Ä¢ Learn German ‚Ä¢ Learn Korean ‚Ä¢ Learn Italian ‚Ä¢ Learn Russian ‚Ä¢ Learn Chinese ‚Ä¢ Learn Arabic ‚Ä¢ Learn Portuguese ‚Ä¢ Learn Swedish ‚Ä¢ Learn Turkish ‚Ä¢ Learn Hindi ‚Ä¢ Learn Polish ‚Ä¢ Learn Dutch ‚Ä¢ Learn Indonesian ‚Ä¢ Learn Greek ‚Ä¢ Learn Norwegian ‚Ä¢ Learn Finnish ‚Ä¢ Learn Ukrainian ‚Ä¢ Learn Vietnamese ‚Ä¢ Learn Filipino Privacy Policy & terms of use: https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/7910868 Terms and Conditions http://beelinguapp.com/t&c/

title: LingQ - Language Learning
descriptionHTML:
Experience Language Learning with LingQ ‚Äî the natural and effective way to learn a new language.

LingQ is a language learning app that lets you grow your vocabulary and improve comprehension through meaningful exposure to the language with real content.

Follow your interests and enjoy an immersive learning experience in over 50 languages. Learn Spanish, English, Japanese, Korean, Italian, German, Portuguese, French, Chinese, Arabic, and other languages.

Trusted by Learners Worldwide:
‚≠ê 4.7 star rating from over 45000 reviews.
‚≠ê Featured in CBC, Men‚Äôs Health, La Vanguardia, El Pa√≠s.

Designed for Real Language Learning

LingQ uses an input-based approach: you learn languages by reading and listening to real, interesting content at your level.

‚úÖ Massive Content Library: Thousands of lessons from podcasts, books, interviews, videos, articles, and more ‚Äî all with matching text for easy listening and reading.
‚úÖ Follow Topics You Enjoy: Choose content you love and progress naturally through immersion, not drills.
‚úÖ Import Your Favorite Content: Turn Netflix, YouTube, podcasts, books, and articles into personalized lessons.
‚úÖ Powerful Reader: An effective, optimized reader that tracks every word you encounter to boost your vocabulary.
‚úÖ Interactive Learning: Listen, read along, tap words for instant definitions, and learn naturally as you go.
‚úÖ Advanced Progress Tracking: Monitor your listening, reading, study time, and vocabulary growth.
‚úÖ Learn Anytime, Anywhere: Study offline and sync your progress automatically. Learn whenever you want.

‚ú® AI Language Learning Tools
‚Ä¢ AI Audio Transcription: Turn podcasts and audiobooks into interactive lessons.
‚Ä¢ AI Voices: Make your lessons, reviews, and chats more immersive with natural sounding text-to-speech voices.
‚Ä¢ Advanced Chatbot: Get detailed tutor responses and real-time web search with our advanced Lynx AI Chatbot.
‚Ä¢ AI-Simplified Lesson: Take advantage of more interesting content earlier on in your learning journey by generating simplified versions of lessons.

üéß Read and Listen with Interactive Tools
‚Ä¢ SRS vocabulary review for long-term retention;
‚Ä¢ Mini Stories that build a strong foundation at any level;
‚Ä¢ Grammar guides with clear, accessible explanations;
‚Ä¢ Audio playlists for hands-free listening;
‚Ä¢ Karaoke Mode to follow the text while listening;

üåç A Global Community to Support You
‚Ä¢ Writing Exchange for real corrections from native speakers;
‚Ä¢ Tutoring sessions tailored to your goals;
‚Ä¢ Community forum for questions, guidance, and motivation;
‚Ä¢ Challenges that help you stay consistent and build strong habits;

üìöBuilt by Language Learners
LingQ was co-founded by Steve Kaufmann, a polyglot who learned more than 20 languages using this same natural approach.

üåê Learn Multiple Languages
LingQ supports more than 50 languages, including Spanish, English, Japanese, Korean, Italian, German, Portuguese, French, Chinese, Arabic and more.

üöÄ Get LingQ Premium and Accelerate Your Learning
‚Ä¢ Unlimited vocabulary lookup and SRS review;
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive word tracking to boost your progress;
‚Ä¢ Unlimited content imports;
‚Ä¢ Access to AI features;

Start learning from real content.
Download LingQ and begin today.

Visit www.lingq.com and discover a smarter way to learn languages.
summary: Learn languages naturally - Learn Spanish, Japanese, French, English, German...

title: Praktika ‚Äì AI Language Tutor
description:
Ready to immerse yourself in a groundbreaking English, Spanish, Japanese, Korean, French, Portuguese, Portuguese (Brazilian), Italian and German learning experience?

Dive into Praktika and meet your ultra-realistic AI Avatars ‚Äî your personal language companions for mastering real-world conversation.

Praktika‚Äôs avatars aren‚Äôt just digital characters ‚Äî they‚Äôre designed with full backstories, cultural depth, and natural accents (American, British, Latin American, and more) to simulate truly human-like interaction. Every session with your avatar feels like speaking with a real person who listens, guides, and helps you grow.

What Makes Praktika Different?

Unlike other language apps that rely on memorization and repetition, Praktika makes language acquisition feel natural. You don‚Äôt just study ‚Äî you engage in conversation. You listen, speak, and respond like you would in real life. Our avatars give you space to practice without fear of judgment or awkward exchanges.

We‚Äôve also added Multimodality, a next-gen learning tool that lets you upload and interact with real content. Share photos, audio, videos, or documents to spark conversations or receive corrections. Use an image of your surroundings to practice vocabulary, or upload your resume to get instant pronunciation coaching on job interviews. It‚Äôs the closest thing to having a real tutor with you 24/7.

Simple Pricing

Praktika is free to download, and getting started is easy. Unlock powerful speaking tools, advanced feedback, and avatar-led lessons ‚Äî all for less than the cost of a single tutoring session.

What You‚Äôll Get:

AI Avatars ‚Äì Learn through human-like conversations with avatars that adapt to your tone, pace, and goals.

Courses for All Levels ‚Äì 1000+ lessons including academic prep (IELTS, TOEFL), lifestyle, travel, career paths, and slang.

Practical Conversation Topics ‚Äì Role-play as a sports commentator, startup founder, or tourist.

Multimodal Learning ‚Äì Upload photos, PDFs, and voice notes for personalized lessons.

Fluency Tracking ‚Äì See real progress with speaking metrics, streaks, and in-app challenges.

Localized Avatars ‚Äì Select coaches from different regions to match your cultural or accent goals.

Meet a Few of Our Avatars

Alisha ‚Äì Friendly U.S. English tutor, Stanford grad, inclusive and motivating.

Alejandro ‚Äì Spanish-English tutor from Barcelona, sporty and approachable.

Marco ‚Äì American news editor, great for professional tone and interview prep.

Charlie ‚Äì British culture lover, witty and sharp.

Valentina ‚Äì Mexican Spanish tutor, loves music, dance, and warm conversations.

Luc√≠a ‚Äì Soft-spoken Spain-based tutor, perfect for literary and academic tone.

Sample Topics

IELTS & TOEFL ‚Ä¢ Architecture ‚Ä¢ Art ‚Ä¢ Business ‚Ä¢ Car Brands ‚Ä¢ Cinema ‚Ä¢ Cuisine ‚Ä¢ Economic Growth ‚Ä¢ Education ‚Ä¢ Environmental Issues ‚Ä¢ Festivals ‚Ä¢ Film ‚Ä¢ Food ‚Ä¢ Football ‚Ä¢ Geography ‚Ä¢ Health ‚Ä¢ History ‚Ä¢ Immigration ‚Ä¢ Influencers ‚Ä¢ Literature ‚Ä¢ Music ‚Ä¢ Natural Wonders ‚Ä¢ Pop Culture ‚Ä¢ Relationships ‚Ä¢ Startups ‚Ä¢ Science ‚Ä¢ Shopping ‚Ä¢ Street Art ‚Ä¢ Technology ‚Ä¢ TV Shows ‚Ä¢ Tourism ‚Ä¢ UFC ‚Ä¢ Wildlife... and many more added monthly.

Languages Available

English

Korean

Japanese

Spanish

French

Portuguese

Portuguese (Brazilian)

Italian

German

Praktika is on a mission to break language barriers for the next billion learners. With the power of AI, personalization, and multimodal tools, we believe anyone can develop fluency through real-world conversation. It‚Äôs more than just learning ‚Äî it‚Äôs transformation.

Download Praktika today and start your journey to confident, fluent communication.

Support: support@praktika.ai

Terms: https://praktika.ai/terms

Privacy: https://praktika.ai/privacy

Praktika‚Äôs avatars aren‚Äôt just digital characters ‚Äî they‚Äôre designed with full backstories, cultural depth, and natural accents (American, British, Latin American, and more) to simulate truly human-like interaction. Every session with your avatar feels like speaking with a real person who listens, guides, and helps you grow.

What Makes Praktika Different?

Unlike other language apps that rely on memorization and repetition, Praktika makes language acquisition feel natural. You don‚Äôt just study ‚Äî you engage in conversation. You listen, speak, and respond like you would in real life. Our avatars give you space to practice without fear of judgment or awkward exchanges.

We‚Äôve also added Multimodality, a next-gen learning tool that lets you upload and interact with real content. Share photos, audio, videos, or documents to spark conversations or receive corrections. Use an image of your surroundings to practice vocabulary, or upload your resume to get instant pronunciation coaching on job interviews. It‚Äôs the closest thing to having a real tutor with you 24/7.

Simple Pricing

Praktika is free to download, and getting started is easy. Unlock powerful speaking tools, advanced feedback, and avatar-led lessons ‚Äî all for less than the cost of a single tutoring session.

What You‚Äôll Get:

AI Avatars ‚Äì Learn through human-like conversations with avatars that adapt to your tone, pace, and goals.

Courses for All Levels ‚Äì 1000+ lessons including academic prep (IELTS, TOEFL), lifestyle, travel, career paths, and slang.

Practical Conversation Topics ‚Äì Role-play as a sports commentator, startup founder, or tourist.

Multimodal Learning ‚Äì Upload photos, PDFs, and voice notes for personalized lessons.

Fluency Tracking ‚Äì See real progress with speaking metrics, streaks, and in-app challenges.

Localized Avatars ‚Äì Select coaches from different regions to match your cultural or accent goals.

Meet a Few of Our Avatars

Alisha ‚Äì Friendly U.S. English tutor, Stanford grad, inclusive and motivating.

Alejandro ‚Äì Spanish-English tutor from Barcelona, sporty and approachable.

Marco ‚Äì American news editor, great for professional tone and interview prep.

Charlie ‚Äì British culture lover, witty and sharp.

Valentina ‚Äì Mexican Spanish tutor, loves music, dance, and warm conversations.

Luc√≠a ‚Äì Soft-spoken Spain-based tutor, perfect for literary and academic tone.

Sample Topics

IELTS & TOEFL ‚Ä¢ Architecture ‚Ä¢ Art ‚Ä¢ Business ‚Ä¢ Car Brands ‚Ä¢ Cinema ‚Ä¢ Cuisine ‚Ä¢ Economic Growth ‚Ä¢ Education ‚Ä¢ Environmental Issues ‚Ä¢ Festivals ‚Ä¢ Film ‚Ä¢ Food ‚Ä¢ Football ‚Ä¢ Geography ‚Ä¢ Health ‚Ä¢ History ‚Ä¢ Immigration ‚Ä¢ Influencers ‚Ä¢ Literature ‚Ä¢ Music ‚Ä¢ Natural Wonders ‚Ä¢ Pop Culture ‚Ä¢ Relationships ‚Ä¢ Startups ‚Ä¢ Science ‚Ä¢ Shopping ‚Ä¢ Street Art ‚Ä¢ Technology ‚Ä¢ TV Shows ‚Ä¢ Tourism ‚Ä¢ UFC ‚Ä¢ Wildlife... and many more added monthly.

Languages Available

English

Korean

Japanese

Spanish

French

Portuguese

Portuguese (Brazilian)

Italian

German

Praktika is on a mission to break language barriers for the next billion learners. With the power of AI, personalization, and multimodal tools, we believe anyone can develop fluency through real-world conversation. It‚Äôs more than just learning ‚Äî it‚Äôs transformation.

Download Praktika today and start your journey to confident, fluent communication.

title: Tandem: Language exchange
description: Learning a language is made easier when it‚Äôs fun. Whether you‚Äôre aiming to learn a new language or improve fluency in one you already know, having engaging conversations with an exchange partner makes all the difference. You can even learn a language with international friends while expanding your skills and cultural understanding. Whatever your language goal is‚Äîlanguage learning for travel, business, or personal growth‚Äîyou can reach it while meeting new people and making friends around the globe. It‚Äôs easy: just choose a language you want to learn, find a Tandem member with similar interests, and you‚Äôre ready to go! Once you‚Äôre connected, the real fun begins! Learn from each other, practice speaking, and find fluency faster through conversation practice! Text, call, or even video chat‚Äîcommunication with your language exchange partner is as flexible as you need it to be. It‚Äôs the perfect way to meet people and improve your language skills at the same time. With Tandem, you can learn languages through 1-to-1 chats or with Parties, the ultimate group learning audio space. There are millions of Tandem members waiting for you, so find your people and start speaking their language today! Choose from over 300 languages: - Spanish üá™üá∏üá≤üáΩ - English üá¨üáßüá∫üá∏ - Japanese üáØüáµ - Korean üá∞üá∑ - German üá©üá™, - Italian üáÆüáπ - Portuguese üáµüáπüáßüá∑ - Russian üá∑üá∫ - Simplified and Traditional Chinese üá®üá≥üáπüáº - 12 different sign languages, including American Sign Language. DOWNLOAD TANDEM AND LEARN A LANGUAGE NOW! Tandem unites people across borders through language learning. Whether you‚Äôre looking to make international friends, talk to strangers, or connect with others who are passionate about languages, Tandem has it all. BETTER VOCAB Skip the tricky grammar tests and random phrases. Tandem allows you to focus on meaningful conversation practice, centered around topics you care about. PERFECT PRONUNCIATION Want to sound like a native speaker? One way to help is to practice a language with your exchange partner until you‚Äôve mastered every word and phrase. SOUND LIKE A LOCAL Practice a language with voice notes, audio, and video chats until you sound like a native speaker. No matter If you‚Äôre looking for tips on pronunciation or want to speak more casually in your fluency. MAKE INTERNATIONAL FRIENDS Tandem connects you with international friends who share your passion for language learning. You‚Äôll not only practice speaking, but also gain insights into various cultures. IMMERSIVE GROUP LEARNING Experience group learning like never before with Tandem‚Äôs interactive Parties! Use them to practice a language by listening in on group conversations or take the lead and start your own language Party. GRAMMAR TIPS & TRICKS Use translation features and text corrections to master grammar from the first try, whether you are perfecting everyday speech or understanding formal speech. App Access Permissions: Optional permissions: - Location information: Required to use the Nearby feature to see members near you, the Travel feature to show members around the world and to add an approximate location to your profile. - Microphone: Required for sending audio messages, making audio and video calls, and joining Language Parties. - Camera: Required for taking photos to upload to your profile or post in a Language Club, take and send a photo in a chat, video calling, and scanning QR codes. - Notifications: Used to send you notifications about acceptance into the community, new messages, new followers and their posts, new references and marketing communication. - Nearby devices: Bluetooth access is required to connect audio devices during a call or Language Party. You can still use Tandem without granting optional permissions, except features where their nature requires the respective permission, like a video call requiring camera permission. Got a question? Contact us on support@tandem.net
descriptionHTML:
Learning a language is made easier when it‚Äôs fun.

Whether you‚Äôre aiming to learn a new language or improve fluency in one you already know, having engaging conversations with an exchange partner makes all the difference. You can even learn a language with international friends while expanding your skills and cultural understanding.

Whatever your language goal is‚Äîlanguage learning for travel, business, or personal growth‚Äîyou can reach it while meeting new people and making friends around the globe. It‚Äôs easy: just choose a language you want to learn, find a Tandem member with similar interests, and you‚Äôre ready to go!

Once you‚Äôre connected, the real fun begins! Learn from each other, practice speaking, and find fluency faster through conversation practice! Text, call, or even video chat‚Äîcommunication with your language exchange partner is as flexible as you need it to be. It‚Äôs the perfect way to meet people and improve your language skills at the same time.

With Tandem, you can learn languages through 1-to-1 chats or with Parties, the ultimate group learning audio space. There are millions of Tandem members waiting for you, so find your people and start speaking their language today!

Choose from over 300 languages:
- Spanish üá™üá∏üá≤üáΩ
- English üá¨üáßüá∫üá∏
- Japanese üáØüáµ
- Korean üá∞üá∑
- German üá©üá™,
- Italian üáÆüáπ
- Portuguese üáµüáπüáßüá∑
- Russian üá∑üá∫
- Simplified and Traditional Chinese üá®üá≥üáπüáº
- 12 different sign languages, including American Sign Language.

DOWNLOAD TANDEM AND LEARN A LANGUAGE NOW!
Tandem unites people across borders through language learning. Whether you‚Äôre looking to make international friends, talk to strangers, or connect with others who are passionate about languages, Tandem has it all.

BETTER VOCAB
Skip the tricky grammar tests and random phrases. Tandem allows you to focus on meaningful conversation practice, centered around topics you care about.

PERFECT PRONUNCIATION
Want to sound like a native speaker? One way to help is to practice a language with your exchange partner until you‚Äôve mastered every word and phrase.

SOUND LIKE A LOCAL
Practice a language with voice notes, audio, and video chats until you sound like a native speaker. No matter If you‚Äôre looking for tips on pronunciation or want to speak more casually in your fluency.

MAKE INTERNATIONAL FRIENDS
Tandem connects you with international friends who share your passion for language learning. You‚Äôll not only practice speaking, but also gain insights into various cultures.

IMMERSIVE GROUP LEARNING
Experience group learning like never before with Tandem‚Äôs interactive Parties! Use them to practice a language by listening in on group conversations or take the lead and start your own language Party.

GRAMMAR TIPS & TRICKS
Use translation features and text corrections to master grammar from the first try, whether you are perfecting everyday speech or understanding formal speech.

App Access Permissions:

Optional permissions:

- Location information: Required to use the Nearby feature to see members near you, the Travel feature to show members around the world and to add an approximate location to your profile.
- Microphone: Required for sending audio messages, making audio and video calls, and joining Language Parties.
- Camera: Required for taking photos to upload to your profile or post in a Language Club, take and send a photo in a chat, video calling, and scanning QR codes.
- Notifications: Used to send you notifications about acceptance into the community, new messages, new followers and their posts, new references and marketing communication.
- Nearby devices: Bluetooth access is required to connect audio devices during a call or Language Party.

You can still use Tandem without granting optional permissions, except features where their nature requires the respective permission, like a video call requiring camera permission.

Got a question? Contact us on support@tandem.net
summary: Practice a language with native speakers and take it to the next level.

title: EWA: Learn English & Spanish
description:
Do you want to learn English with popular movies and TV shows? Or learn Spanish by reading books with bilingual translations and adapted audiobooks?

Improve your language skills while having fun with EWA‚Äôs unique language learning methodology, featuring:

‚óè bite-sized lessons adapted for every level,
‚óè 100% binge-worthy content,
‚óè bilingual books with audio,
‚óè interactive games and features,
‚óè progress tracking, spaced repetition learning, and more!

Take your language learning to the next level with a top-reviewed language learning app. EWA is available in 35 languages and counting, and EWA has empowered over 60 million people worldwide to learn English, Spanish, French, or Italian.

üë©‚Äçüè´ Master Speaking with Movies/TV Shows

Want to learn English with your favorite movie hero or chat in Spanish to your most hated TV series villain?

EWA uses snippets from your favorite shows and movies to teach you new words and phrases in action to improve your speaking skills.

Regardless of your level, you‚Äôll quickly gain the confidence you need to start speaking with content that‚Äôs fun and unforgettable.

Choose the topic and difficulty that best fits your goals and dive into one of our courses for language levels ranging from:
‚óè Rookie
‚óè Skilled
‚óè Advanced
‚óè Travel
‚óè Business
‚óè Grammar etc.

**We‚Äôre constantly expanding our library of courses to deliver you unique language learning options. Stay tuned for updates!**

üìö Improve Your Reading and Pronunciation with over 10,000 Books
Explore our extensive library in English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish! Expand & boost your vocabulary, master complex grammar, and perfect your pronunciation. 

Here‚Äôs how it works:

‚óè Pick your difficulty (Rookie to Advanced)
‚óè Choose a genre you love
‚óè Wow - You‚Äôre reading your first book in a new language!
‚óè Encountered a new word? Just tap on the word and EWA will display its translation. One more tap and you can add it to your ‚ÄúTo-Learn‚Äù list.

Enjoy a wide selection of audiobooks that will help you start sounding like a native in no time! We‚Äôve picked the most exciting, adventurous, spicy, hilarious titles - adapted for your level.

üó£ Oxford Topics Dialogues

Don't know what to say at passport control, how to ask for directions or order food at a caf√©? Read and listen to dialogues on everyday topics, developed in collaboration with Oxford Reading University, that will help you in every journey of yours. Thanks to the dialogues, you'll be able to easily improve your conversational English by applying the material you've learned in real life!

üèÜ Solidify Your Knowledge and Compete in Our Leaderboard

If you have trouble remembering what you just learned - EWA is the perfect app for you. With EWA, you can be certain that what you learn sticks! EWA also keeps you motivated by allowing you to track your progress and compete against language learners.

Challenge yourself with over 40,000 flashcards and amazing language games such as Wordcraft and Memento. Or challenge other learners to a language duel!

And here‚Äôs the best part:
EWA makes time work for you by testing your knowledge of new words right when they‚Äôre about to slip away from your memory.

The more you learn a new language, the better you get, and the higher you climb up EWA‚Äôs Leaderboard.Motivate yourself to stay on track with your learning, and you‚Äôll soon be hitting those top spots!

**PLEASE READ:**

EWA features a selection of free content, but an EWA subscription is required in order to access all courses and learning features. Please note: available courses may vary depending on your device‚Äôs language. Once purchased, subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled before the end of the current payment period. Subscriptions can be managed or canceled in your Google Play Store account.

If you have any concerns, recommendations, or complaints just drop us a line at support@appewa.com and we‚Äôll work towards making EWA better!

title: Talkin: Global Friends & Chat
description:
Talkin is a global multilingual community where voices from different countries and cultural backgrounds meet in real time.

Here, you can meet native speakers of English, Japanese, Korean, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Arabic, Thai, Vietnamese, Chinese, Portuguese, and 180+ other languages.
Through chat, voice calls, voice parties, global posts, and smart matching, Talkin helps you cross cultures and start making friends in the most natural way‚Äîtrue social experiences that connect real people.

Why choose Talkin?

‚Ä¢ Global Moments ‚Äì Discover Real Lives Worldwide
Explore real posts and short videos from people across the globe ‚Äî their food, travels, landscapes, daily life, and unique moments. You can like, comment, join discussions, or share your own stories.
Talkin‚Äôs Global Moments is a multilingual social plaza that lets you experience "global travel" and expand your international friendships from home.

‚Ä¢ Voice Party ‚Äì Real-time multi-person Voice Connection
Want to talk freely without pressure?
Talkin‚Äôs voice party lets you join lively global rooms anytime and interact with people from different cultures in real time‚Äîwhether you're chatting about daily life, discussing culture, singing, sharing stories, or simply getting to know a stranger who might become your next chat friend.
The voice-only space feels natural: no camera, no stress, just voices that create real connections. Real-time subtitles and free translation help everyone participate effortlessly, no matter your language.

‚Ä¢ Smart Matching System & Free AI Translation
Looking for someone to talk to or simply curious about different cultures?
Talkin‚Äôs smart matching pairs you with partners who share similar interests, personality traits, or social preferences, allowing you to instantly connect with people from all over the world for deep one-on-one conversations and helping you build more natural, deeper, and personalized global friendships.
Whether you‚Äôre finding people from the U.S., Japan, Korea, the Middle East, Europe, or Southeast Asia, Talkin makes every interaction smooth and meaningful‚Äîlike a digital handshake with the world.
Free built-in translation keeps communication seamless for everyone.

‚Ä¢ Global Cultural Exchange & Gift Interactions
Share your stories, explore different cultures, and send country-themed gifts that make every chat more expressive. With Talkin‚Äôs unique global gift system, cross-cultural exchange becomes fun, engaging, and full of emotional connection.


Join Talkin now to experience a new way of connecting across languages and cultures, and say Hello to the world. Here, there is no distance and no cultural walls, only real, relaxed, and diverse global social experiences.

Whether you are a student, an office worker, or someone who simply loves multilingual and cross-cultural communication, Talkin is your best choice. Meet real people worldwide, share cultures, and enjoy authentic conversations beyond language barriers.

Download now to start your global social journey and meet new friends from all over the world!

title: Learn English, Spanish: Learna
description: Welcome to Learna ‚Äì the AI-Powered Language Learning App to Learn English or Spanish! Looking to learn English or learn Spanish fast and effectively? Learna is your all-in-one AI language tutor app, designed to help you speak confidently from day one. Practice English or Spanish with interactive grammar lessons, real conversation practice, vocabulary builders, pronunciation tools, and fun reading exercises. Whether you're a beginner or brushing up your skills, Learna helps you master every aspect of the language‚Äîat your own pace. With Learna AI, you can speak English & Spanish confidently and effectively through interactive conversations. Our app takes your language learning journey beyond traditional methods. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, Learna AI is here to help you learn, speak English and Spanish in a fun, engaging, and personalized way. Language practices and pronunciation lessons are guided by our Learna AI Virtual Chat Character, offering tailored support as you learn more about speaking, pronunciation and accent training. You can speak with AI to improve both your speaking, pronunciation and listening skills. The app provides real-time feedback, helping you speak correctly and refine your vocabulary as you go. This makes learning English & Spanish more dynamic, interactive, and efficient, as you can practice speaking at your own pace. Learna AI also focuses on improving your grammar skills . You‚Äôll learn essential grammar rules and practice them through a variety of exercises that help reinforce your understanding. The grammar practices are designed to gradually improve your proficiency, allowing you to speak with accuracy and clarity. As you learn grammar, you will build a stronger foundation for your speaking and writing skills. Vocabulary plays a critical role in learning and speaking languages fluently. With Learna AI, you can improve your vocabulary by learning new words and phrases that are practical and useful in daily conversations. Each lesson focuses on building your vocabulary, ensuring you have a broad range of words at your disposal. The app features vocabulary practice that adapts to your level, helping you speak more naturally and confidently. Your pronunciation also gets a boost with Learna AI. As you speak, you‚Äôll receive valuable feedback to improve your pronunciation. The app includes pronunciation exercises specifically designed to help you master English and Spanish pronunciation, and therefore speak clearly. Pronunciation practices allow you to correct mistakes and sound more authentic and fluent when speaking languages like English and Spanish. Track your progress with detailed performance metrics and milestones. Set learning goals to monitor your achievements and celebrate your successes. With continuous practice, you‚Äôll see your speaking skills improve, and your vocabulary will expand. By setting specific goals, you ensure that each practice session is focused and effective. Learna AI Language Tutor Features - Language Conversation Practice with Learna AI - Get feedback from Learna AI for your mistakes - Learn English or Spanish Grammar with tailored lessons - Improve your English & Spanish Reading Skills - Enrich your Vocabulary with daily vocabulary practices & Learn new words - Spelling Check and vocabulary reinforcement - Perfect your Pronunciation through interactive pronunciation exercises - Enhance your Speaking Skills through practical speaking practice - Track your progress and set goals to continually improve Speak, practice, and learn languages today with Learna AI, your partner in mastering the English language, and Spanish language!
