title: Learn to Read - Duolingo ABC
description:
From the creators behind Duolingo, the world‚Äôs #1 education app, comes Duolingo ABC! Duolingo ABC is the fun, hands-on way for your child to learn to read and write in English! From preschool to first grade, engage your child with delightful stories for kids and bite-sized lessons teaching the alphabet, phonics, sight words, vocabulary, and more.

The Duolingo ABC kids reading app offers over 700 hands-on reading lessons designed to help kids learn and love to read. We make learning to read both fun and effective with lessons and educational games for kids that include multi-sensory activities, such as tracing, drag-and-drop prompts and more. Our educational learning app offers personalized lessons so your child can learn at their own pace.

Develop reading comprehension skills with educational lessons specially designed to support your child‚Äôs lifelong love of learning! Whether your child is in pre-K, preschool, kindergarten, or 1st grade, Duolingo ABC has delightful stories for kids filled with engaging pictures meant to inspire and support your child along their educational journey. 

Help your child learn to read new sight words with our toddler books and kids stories that let you highlight each word spoken. This helps build your child‚Äôs multi-sensory learning skills and can help them learn to read independently.

Duolingo ABC makes your child‚Äôs education a fun and engaging experience. Our learning app combines educational lessons with fun reading games perfect for kids and toddlers alike! Our rewards work in tandem with bite-sized reading lessons and fun school games for kids, keeping them motivated to learn while building their confidence.

Discover ad free kids educational games filled with exploration and curiosity on Duolingo ABC. Now your kids can have fun while they sound out words, practice reading and writing in English, and build reading comprehension and literacy skills for a lifetime!

DUOLINGO ABC FEATURES:

Kids Learn to Read
- Reading games: Our kids reading app provides hands on learning they will love
- New lessons are added often, so your child never runs out of educational content
- Reading and phonics for kids: Bite-sized lessons help kids learn phonics, sight words & vocabulary
- Every reading lesson is built to feel like a game, so kids can learn to read while having fun

Learning Activities For Kids
- Enjoy fun educational games like letter tracing and gamified stories, suitable for even the youngest learners
- Toddler, kindergarten or first grade, all kids can enjoy the Duolingo ABC learning app while having fun
- From toddler books to 1st grade learning games, Duolingo ABC has lessons for every child
- Designed by literacy & early-education experts to develop kids‚Äô skills in phonics, sight words, reading & more

Kid-Safe & Ad-Free
- Our educational learning app prioritizes a kid-friendly experience
- Rest easy, parents. There are no ads or in-app purchases to worry about
- Content is focused on preschool, kindergarten and first grade level lessons, so you can be safe knowing it is always age-appropriate

Offline Learning
- Your child‚Äôs educational journey has no limits with Duolingo ABC‚Äôs offline learning capabilities
- On a plane? At a restaurant? Duolingo ABC can be used anytime, anywhere
- Enjoy playing and learning offline - so kids can learn wherever you go

Duolingo ABC is an educational learning app that offers immersive lessons to teach preschool to first grade kids to learn and love to read. Download today and spark your child‚Äôs love for learning.

--

Privacy Policy: https://www.duolingo.com/privacy

title: Simpler: English learning app
description: Learning English is now easier than ever! Try Simpler now. SIMPLER APP is an effective and helpful tool for language learners of all levels. SIMPLER ENGLISH COURSE FEATURES ‚òÖ GRAMMAR in the form of short and simple topics ‚òÖ DETECTIVE STORIES: a fun new way to practice your English ‚òÖ Free daily access to TREASURE CHESTS with useful new words ‚òÖ Effective DRILLS for each grammar topic ‚òÖ ASSOCIATIVE word learning ‚òÖ Authentic LISTENING material Learn and master the English language FOR FREE with SIMPLER! Simpler English course includes grammar, vocabulary and speaking modules. HOW DID WE DEVELOP SUCH A SIMPLE AND EFFICIENT TOOL FOR LEARNING ENGLISH FROM SCRATCH? 1. We've developed an accessible and effective GRAMMAR COURSE for all-level learners. English grammar can be confusing and overwhelming. Good news: we've done all the hard work for you. We took the most essential and relevant grammar and broke it down into bite-sized topics complete with drills. Each topic is a simple rule or structure, which comes with an instant comprehension check. With this system you can learn English grammar from the basics, all by yourself. 2.We've created an improved FLASHCARD LIBRARY for more effective word learning. Each flashcard has a sentence which helps memorize the word using associations. The app uses spaced repetition to help you remember every word. Expand your vocabulary fast with Simpler. 3. At Simpler we know the importance of listening skills and learning the correct pronunciation from the very beginning. That's why every phrase in our exercises is voiced by a native speaker. And in our PRACTICE section you can put new grammar and vocabulary to use and role play one of the two speakers in a real-life dialogue. 4. DRILLS are one of the key elements of our course. These are grammar exercises, such as completing a sentence or typing in the translation of a phrase. The drills train you to formulate correct sentences and use new grammar without even thinking about it. Some of the previously learned grammar is regularly added to your drills to keep your memory strong. We use various types of exercises in our drills to maximize the efficiency and make them fun. 5. Practice makes perfect. You can select RAPID PACE and set your DAILY GOAL for extra motivation. Practice regularly and see the effects within a week! ¬† 7. A UNIQUE FEATURE: Enjoy thrilling detective stories adapted for English learners! Learn new words and phrases and start thinking in English as you solve crimes and mysteries. With Simpler you can learn English for free. üì≠ CONTACT US If you have suggestions or comments on Simpler App, please, send them to: help@simpler.link. We appreciate your feedback.

SIMPLER ENGLISH COURSE FEATURES
‚òÖ GRAMMAR in the form of short and simple topics
‚òÖ DETECTIVE STORIES: a fun new way to practice your English
‚òÖ Free daily access to TREASURE CHESTS with useful new words
‚òÖ Effective DRILLS for each grammar topic
‚òÖ ASSOCIATIVE word learning
‚òÖ Authentic LISTENING material

Learn and master the English language FOR FREE with SIMPLER!
Simpler English course includes grammar, vocabulary and speaking modules.

HOW DID WE DEVELOP SUCH A SIMPLE AND EFFICIENT TOOL FOR LEARNING ENGLISH FROM SCRATCH?

1. We've developed an accessible and effective GRAMMAR COURSE for all-level learners. English grammar can be confusing and overwhelming. Good news: we've done all the hard work for you. We took the most essential and relevant grammar and broke it down into bite-sized topics complete with drills. Each topic is a simple rule or structure, which comes with an instant comprehension check. With this system you can learn English grammar from the basics, all by yourself.

2.We've created an improved FLASHCARD LIBRARY for more effective word learning. Each flashcard has a sentence which helps memorize the word using associations. The app uses spaced repetition to help you remember every word. Expand your vocabulary fast with Simpler.

3. At Simpler we know the importance of listening skills and learning the correct pronunciation from the very beginning. That's why every phrase in our exercises is voiced by a native speaker. And in our PRACTICE section you can put new grammar and vocabulary to use and role play one of the two speakers in a real-life dialogue.

4. DRILLS are one of the key elements of our course. These are grammar exercises, such as completing a sentence or typing in the translation of a phrase. The drills train you to formulate correct sentences and use new grammar without even thinking about it. Some of the previously learned grammar is regularly added to your drills to keep your memory strong. We use various types of exercises in our drills to maximize the efficiency and make them fun.

5. Practice makes perfect. You can select RAPID PACE and set your DAILY GOAL for extra motivation. Practice regularly and see the effects within a week! ¬†

7. A UNIQUE FEATURE: Enjoy thrilling detective stories adapted for English learners! Learn new words and phrases and start thinking in English as you solve crimes and mysteries.

With Simpler you can learn English for free.

üì≠ CONTACT US
If you have suggestions or comments on Simpler App, please, send them to: help@simpler.link. We appreciate your feedback.
summary: Learning English is now easier than ever! Grammar & vocabulary. Try Simpler now

title: ELSA Speak: English Learning
description:
Meet ELSA Speak - Your personal AI-powered English tutor.

ELSA Speak is an AI-powered language coach designed to help professionals and learners speak English with confidence. Engage in real-time, speaking scenarios to practice job interviews, presentations, meetings, and more. Reinforce your skills with interactive AI-powered games that make learning engaging and effective. With 8,000+ lessons, you'll learn proper pronunciation, grammar, and vocabulary faster than ever.

Download the best AI-powered English learning app today and start your journey to confident English communication!

ELSA SPEAK FEATURES:

ENGLISH COMMUNICATION
- Career-Specific Focus - Learn vocabulary and communication styles tailored to your field - Confident Exam Preparation
- Prepare for IELTS, TOEFL, TOEIC, EIKEN, and more with targeted practice in our bilingual app to boost fluency.

HYPER-PERSONALIZED LEARNING PATHS
- Personalized language learning - Learn to succeed in workplace interviews, giving presentations, interacting in meetings, succeeding at client calls, and daily conversations.
- AI-Driven Conversations & Open-Ended Dialogues - Personalized language learning through practicing realistic conversations. 

REAL-LIFE CONVERSATION PRACTICE
- Grammar & Vocabulary - AI-driven conversation helps you build a solid foundation in English grammar and expand your vocabulary with everyday, practical words. The adaptive AI adjusts to your progress, ensuring you always learn exactly what you need.
- Conversation Practice - Improve fluency with role-plays, open-ended dialogues, and real-life scenarios. Learn to speak English confidently and with clarity. Leave language misunderstandings behind, whether in the workplace or the classroom.
- Pronunciation Training - Practice speaking English and conquer tricky sounds, learn nuanced English pronunciation.
- Personalized Study Sets ‚Äì Save words, phrases, or sentences from lessons or create your own, explore and share sets, and improve your pronunciation with real-time feedback.

INSTANT FEEDBACK & AI COACH FOR CONVERSATIONS
- Quantitative Progress Tracking - Monitor your improvement with data-driven insights.
- Pronunciation & Word Stress Guidance from our AI English Coach - Receive real-time corrections to sound more natural.

ACCENT TRAINING
- English learning accent choices: American, British, Australian, and more.
- Pick your preferred gender to help you feel confident while interacting with others from different cultures.

ENGLISH COMMUNICATION BENEFITS
- Enhanced Global Collaboration: Bridge language gaps and foster seamless teamwork with international colleagues or friends.
- Career Potential: Boost your career by impressing clients and colleagues with polished English communication
- Expand Your Network: Build meaningful relationships and confidently explore global opportunities.
- Beyond Pronunciation: Learn grammar, vocabulary, and communication techniques to succeed academically, personally, or professionally.
---

TRUSTED BY ENGLISH LEARNERS AND INDUSTRY EXPERTS
- Honorable Mention in the AI and Data category of Fast Company's 2020 World Changing Ideas Awards
- Top 100 Influencers in State of EdTech Report by EdTech Digest 2020
- Mentioned by TechCrunch, Forbes, Mashable, VentureBeat, Yahoo, Salma Hayek, and more
---

Reach out to us:
Whether it‚Äôs for feedback, questions, suggestions, or personal experiences, our inboxes are always open to hearing from you. Please write us an email at support@elsanow.io.

title: Learn English - 5,000 Phrases
description: Play, Learn and Speak ‚Äì discover common phrases for daily English conversation! ‚úî 5,000 useful phrases for conversation. ‚úî Learn English in your tongue (60 languages available). ‚úî Best FREE app for learning fast. Speak English Fluently in Real Conversations With Learn English application, you can now explore over 5,000 English phrases for short daily conversations while having absolutely pure fun! Whether you‚Äôre a tourist having a vacation in an English speaking country or someone who just wants to speak a foreign language, this application will help you learn English phrases in a fast, easy and enjoyable way. Why Our FREE App is Different ‚úî No internet connection required ‚Äì play where you want and when you want (offline). ‚úî 5,000 common phrases ‚Äì audio pronunciations and phonetic transcriptions to show you how native speaker from United Kingdom actually pronounce them. ‚úî 11 fun games ‚Äì a innovative approach to practice your listening, writing and speaking skills. ‚úî 4 levels for learning: beginner, intermediate, advanced and expert. ‚úî 20 topics divided into 145 subtopics ‚Äì so you‚Äôll know what and when to say each phrase. Topics for English conversation: Greetings, Conversations with friends, Basic sentences, Travel, Transportation, Hotel, Restaurant, Food, Shopping, Work, Business etc. More Features to Improve Your English Speaking Vocabulary ‚úî Search and bookmark your most common expressions from the phrasebook. ‚úî Earn points as your English skills progress. ‚úî ‚ÄúRandom Categories‚Äù feature to randomly select the topic, subtopic and game. ‚úî 60 languages ‚Äìso you could understand and speak each phrase easily regardless of which country you‚Äôre from. The dictionary of the apps has human voice pronunciation for each common phrase to improve your speaking skill. Speak English easily and fluently for travel, business or fun!

title: Learn English. Speak English
description: Learn English with free lessons daily. Let Mondly teach you the English language quickly and effectively. In just minutes you‚Äôll start memorizing core English words, form sentences, learn to speak English phrases and take part in conversations. Fun English lessons improve your vocabulary, grammar and pronunciation like no other language learning method. Beginner or advanced learner, traveler or business professional with a tight schedule? The app works great and dynamically adjusts to your needs. Explore language exercises for reading, listening, writing and speaking enhanced with a dictionary, verb conjugator and state-of-the-art speech recognition technology - you‚Äôll feel like having your own English language tutor in your pocket. Download the language learning pill today and enjoy the benefits of learning a new language for life. The secret path to language learning Remember the English language classes in school? You started with hundreds of basic words and expressions, continued with tons of English grammar lessons and at the end of a full semester‚Äôs language course you could barely translate a sentence or say ‚ÄúHello!‚Äù to a foreigner. That‚Äôs the traditional way to learn a language. Mondly has a different approach, that‚Äôs opposite to the average language course. This is how the future of language courses looks like The App gets you started with a basic conversation between two people. You quickly start memorizing core words, use them to build sentences and phrases, and at the end of a 45-minutes module you are able to reconstruct that conversation with your own voice. It‚Äôs an effective way to learn English phrases. State-of-the-art Natural Speech Recognition and Spaced Repetition Algorithms make the app effective for learning languages. Here are the key features that make Mondly a great tutor for you: Crystal-clear audio and professional voice actors. Learn the right English pronunciation from conversations between native speakers. State-of-the-art Speech Recognition. Mondly knows exactly how to listen to your English words and phrases. You will only get a positive feedback if you speak English clearly and correctly. This will improve your pronunciation. Useful phrases for real situations. Memorizing hundreds of isolated words is not the way to go when it comes to learning English. Mondly teaches you English vocabulary by offering you core words and phrases. The app breaks the learning process down into short lessons and puts them into themed packs. Learn conversational English. Conversation is the main reason to take this free course. It will help you build a core English vocabulary with widely-used nouns and verbs, and speak English clearly. Verb conjugations. If you want to learn more during this course, just tap the English verbs and get the full conjugation on the screen, including the translation. It‚Äôs faster and better than a dictionary. Advanced Statistics. The App uses intelligent reporting, so you can always follow your progress. Build your vocabulary step by step and become better daily. The Leaderboard. See how your friends are doing and compete with people from all over the world to become the best learner in the Mondly community family. Take the Weekly Quiz to become even better. Adaptive Learning. Learning English is different from person to person. So we taught the app to learn from your way of learning. After little time spent together, Mondly will understand what suits you best and it will become your own guide and customized teacher. Before you know it, at the end of these English lessons, you will master the most useful 5000 words and phrases and you will be on the fast lane to learning a new language.

Before you know it, at the end of these English lessons, you will master the most useful 5000 words and phrases and you will be on the fast lane to learning a new language.

title: Learn English - Beginners
description:
Want to learn English online for free? Join over 30 million people who have chosen to study with the BNR Languages apps!

English for beginners ‚Äî designed for anyone who wants to learn English from scratch and study at their own pace, in a simple and practical way.

With interactive activities and native audio to help with pronunciation and listening comprehension, you'll learn English quickly and intuitively.

Study on your own, in your own time, with no daily limits. Choose what you want to practice: reading, writing, listening, or vocabulary. Everything is easy to use and personalized for you.

Exercises use images to help you memorize words, and the review mode lets you practice and refresh everything you've already learned ‚Äî anytime you want.

Learning a new language has never been easier, more accessible, and 100% free!

Find out why our app is the ideal choice to study anytime, anywhere:

- Complete offline English course ‚Äî from beginner to advanced levels.

- Learn on your own! Study English independently, at your own pace, without needing teachers or tutors.

- 100% free! All content and features are available for free ‚Äî you don't need to pay to learn!

- Start from the very beginning, learning the alphabet!

- Set your own study time. Learn as much as you want ‚Äî no time limits! No daily activity limits! Practice and learn as many times as you like every day!

- Large selection of words to help expand your vocabulary.

- Interactive exercises with images that make it easier to memorize new words! Learn in a fun and easy way ‚Äî with a gamified interface that makes studying feel like playing a game.

- Review mode to practice and refresh everything you've already learned.

- Native audio recordings with adjustable playback speed.

- Different types of tests! Practice your reading, writing, and listening skills.

- Full translation available in many languages: Chinese, Spanish, English, Hindi, Arabic, Bengali, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese, Korean, French, Turkish, Vietnamese, Italian, Thai, Persian, Indonesian, Urdu, Polish, Ukrainian, Malay, Uzbek, Romanian, Dutch, Greek, Czech, Hungarian, Swedish, Belarusian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Danish, Norwegian, Slovak, Finnish, Hebrew, Irish, Catalan, Swahili.

- Choose what you want to study and customize your learning experience.

- Perfect for learning English quickly ‚Äî whether for travel, work, study, or to connect with family and friends.

- Simple, intuitive, and user-friendly interface for all ages.

- No internet connection needed to learn English! The app works completely offline.

- Earn medals, track your progress, and stay motivated.

- Join the weekly ranking and compete with other users!

- New words and vocabulary categories added regularly.

Download the BNR Languages app now and start your English course!

title: Learn English ‚Äì Studycat
description:
From the award-winning creators of Studycat for Schools, comes Learn English! The #1 way for kids to learn English!

From preschool and beyond, Learn English by Studycat inspires children's innate love of learning with interactive games and activities.

Our bite-sized lessons will keep your child motivated while they discover a new language and build bilingual skills for a lifetime!

WHY STUDYCAT?

‚Ä¢ Learn English, in English. All our activities focus on virtual language immersion, which means your child will only be hearing English. This might be confusing at first, but trust us, it's the best way to learn.

‚Ä¢ Everyday Language. Our lessons teach words and expressions that kids can apply in their everyday lives, so they can get a head start developing their bilingual abilities.

‚Ä¢ Get Talking Fast. With our interactive speaking challenges, kids will be encouraged to speak entire words and phrases on their own! The earlier kids start their language-learning journey, the more likely they are to reach proficiency quickly.

‚Ä¢ Vocal Variety. Our characters' voices use different tones, expressions, and accents so that kids can pick up on the subtleties of pronunciation from different speakers.

‚Ä¢ Designed by Experts. All our activities are designed by language and early-education experts. Thoughtfully developed lessons will build your child's confidence with every step.

‚Ä¢ Learner Profiles. Create up to four personalized profiles for different family members, allowing tailored learning paths and individual progress tracking.

‚Ä¢ Safe for Kids & Ad-Free. Parents can rest easy knowing that there are no pesky ads to distract children from their learning. All content is appropriate for ages 3 and up.

‚Ä¢ Offline Learning. On a plane, at a restaurant, or in a park? No problem! Learn English by Studycat is available for both online and offline use.

WHAT ARE PARENTS SAYING?

‚ÄúAs a parent trying to raise bilingual children at home, Studycat is a helpful app to start them off and create excitement about the language.‚Äù ‚Äî Fluent in 3 Months

‚ÄúEverything has been thought out carefully and the games and activities are really engaging.‚Äù ‚Äî Bilingual Kidspot

‚ÄúThe concept is so simple but extremely effective. I even found myself learning at the same time.‚Äù ‚Äî Bump, Baby & You

--

If you like Learn English by Studycat, try it out for 7 days free! Empower your child to learn like never before, and get extras like printable worksheets and animated stories.

If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Privacy Policy: https://studycat.com/about/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: https://studycat.com/about/terms-of-use/

title: Learn English with WSE
description:
LEARN ENGLISH ANYTIME, ANYWHERE WITH WALL STREET ENGLISH
Our English course is built around you. Beginner or advanced, you can learn at your own pace with teaching that fits around your schedule.

Wall Street English offers a proven English language learning method that guarantees results and makes learning English a more effective, supportive, and entertaining experience so you stay motivated to study and achieve your goals.

START STUDYING AT WALL STREET ENGLISH
The Learn English app is only available to people currently studying at Wall Street English. 

Not a student yet? Join us at wallstreetenglish.com

GET RESULTS WITH THE LEARN ENGLISH APP 
Our App features 20 levels of English learning aligned with CEFR standards: A1 to C1. It is a comprehensive and interactive course designed to study English on the go on your phone or tablet.

‚≠ê ‚ÄúMake it Big‚Äù English TV Show 
Immerse yourself in English with our own English TV series. You‚Äôll start learning the second you‚Äôll start watching! It‚Äôs a fun, fast and effective way to dive into the language.

‚≠ê Flexible Lessons

title: Wlingua - Learn English
description:
Learning English has never been so easy. It's perfect for you, whether you already have a beginner, basic, intermediate, or advanced level of English. Thanks to our online English courses, you‚Äôll notice your English improving very quickly. Millions of students have already tried our courses. Would you like to join them?

Our Online English Courses:

English Course In this course you will learn English from scratch. Guaranteed! Regardless of the level you start from, it is designed to help you learn English from day one. Advanced English Course In this course, you will continue to improve your English until you master it like a native. An advanced English course with detailed explanations written in English that will leave you speechless. Ideal for challenge lovers. B2 First Course This course is designed for people who are going to take the B2 First exam. You will find a multitude of practices for the sections of the test like, Use of English, Reading, and Listening. English Irregular Verbs Course In this course you will practice irregular English verbs. This is extra practice recommended for people who are already doing the General English course. British and American English Pronunciation Courses The English alphabet has 26 letters, but more than 40 different sounds! In the pronunciation courses you will be able to learn to distinguish them, see example words of each of them, and practice all of them using various exercises. English Phrasal Verbs Course In this course you will study the most used phrasal verbs in everyday life. You will learn the meaning of more than 290 phrasal verbs and will be provided with example sentences and extra practice exercises. Designed for people who are already in the last level of the General English course, and who can already get by with English. All explanations are in English. And much more‚Ä¶ You will also find additional courses to improve your English in the workplace. On the Phone Course Writing Course Speaking Course Logistics Course

Our Learning Method:

A learning process designed for you that is both easy and guided: You‚Äôll feel like you‚Äôre learning more and more English every day. Every sentence, exercise, review, and reading has been carefully selected for you. Audio clips in British English and American English: A wide variety of accents with clear, crisp pronunciation. Recorded by professional narrators. Linked concepts: Each word is linked to its use or precise meaning. When you click on the words in each sentence, exercise, or reading, their meaning or an explanation of their use will appear. Vocabulary: Learn the meaning, pronunciation, and use of words with activities adapted to your progress. Grammar exercises: Practice your grammar with exercises linked to explanations. Vocabulary topics: Words are grouped by topic categories. Spaced reviews: Review the vocabulary and grammar at increasingly long intervals. Search function: Find whatever you‚Äôre looking for, including vocabulary and grammar. Reading comprehension texts (readings): Learn and practice with conversations, news, emails, and interviews, among others. Certificates: Earn a certificate that proves your knowledge at the end of each level. Account types: ‚úî Basic: With a Basic account, the course is free, but has some limitations. ‚úî Premium: With a Premium account, you‚Äôll have access to all course content and activities. Download our app to learn English!

title: Speak English with Loora AI
description:
Loora is your personal AI English coach. 
It is always available for you to practice "as real as it gets" English conversations.
Loora makes speaking English easy with conversation based sessions, available 24-hours a day, every day.
The lessons are personalized with real-time feedback on grammar, pronunciation, and fluency. 

============================

Benefits of learning with Loora:
* Available 24/7, Loora never sleeps.
* Loora works on your schedule. Chat for just 5-minutes a day or an all-out midnight monolog.
* Non-judgmental and friendly environment is always guaranteed, because the biggest mistake you could ever make, is being afraid to make one.
* Real-time translation and speech recognition, to enhance your learning experience. Get immediate feedback on your pronunciation and grammar.
* Track your learning trends to top your daily English fluency score. Perfect your pronunciation and accent by beating your weekly goals.
* Personalized conversations at your speaking level, relevant topics that focus on your life.

============================

About the team:
We believe everyone deserves the opportunity to speak English fluently and today it is possible with the help of AI.
That's why we have gathered a team of leading conversational AI researchers and language-learning enthusiasts,  to worked together on creating Loora. Their goal was to bring you the most dynamic AI English-Coach.

=====================================

Have questions or need assistance? Reach out to us at support@loora.ai.

Read more about our terms and conditions here:

Terms of Use: https://loora.com/Terms-and-Conditions

Privacy Policy: https://loora.com/Privacy-Policy

==============================

Follow us on Social Media for English tips:

* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/loora.ai/?hl=en

* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LooraA.I/

===============================

Come meet the future of English Learning!

title: LetMeSpeak ‚Äì Learn English
description:
Sound like a native speaker and speak English without an accent in just 3 weeks! 40 grammar topics, 6,000 most common English words covering travel, work, and hobbies, and a fun story with 120 bite-sized episodes ‚Äì all in one app. Learn English words, improve your accent and practice English from the first minute with LetMeSpeak.

LEARN ENGLISH LANGUAGE IN A SMART WAY

You will start speaking English fluently on any topic through language immersion and improve English speaking.
Immersion is the most effective way to learn and practice English. You‚Äôll be speaking English in no time without having to memorize lists of words and out-of-context grammar rules. 

IMPROVE YOUR ENGLISH VOCABULARY

You‚Äôll learn 6,000 of the most common English words everyone needs to travel, work, and communicate in a foreign language. Each new word comes with a translation and a memorable illustration.
You‚Äôll learn new words and improve your English vocabulary every day. And with the spaced repetition, smart reminders, and clever associations, you won‚Äôt forget them. 

PERFECT YOUR ENGLISH GRAMMAR

Speak English correctly right from the start and improve English speaking.
You‚Äôll easily master the English grammar topics thanks to interactive exercises and easy-to-understand grammar explanations. Built-in games will challenge your skill and speed ‚Äì you can even compete with other users learning English around the world in real-time!

Questions? Send us message at help@letmespeak.org

Privacy Policy: https://www.letmespeak.org/privacy
Terms of Use: https://www.letmespeak.org/terms

title: BeeSpeaker Learn English
description:
üêù BzZzZz! Join our hive and start communicating smoothly in a foreign language. It has never been easier to learn English and Spanish!

BeeSpeaker is a true revolution and the first-ever app totally devoted to learning to actually SPEAK English and Spanish. The app gets you speaking from day 1. Within the first week, our users say up to 1000 words in the language they‚Äôre learning.

How? It‚Äôs a voice-controlled and AI-powered app, based on modern machine learning technology, in which your task is to listen to words and phrases and repeat or answer questions, speaking out loud in a foreign language. 

BeeSpeaker recognizes what you‚Äôre saying and gives you instant feedback. This way, you know where you‚Äôre making mistakes and where you need to improve.

Why BeeSpeaker?
üó£Ô∏è 3000+ English and Spanish video lessons with our teachers and native speakers designed to improve your speaking skills.
üìà All language lessons are tailored to your level - starting from A0 and ending at C1.
ü§ñ A powerful AI Tutor module that corrects your mistakes and lets you practice free conversations, any time, any place.
üéØ Focus on vocabulary, grammar, pronunciation, and listening skills.
üí¨ Real-time feedback shows you where you‚Äôre making mistakes.
üöÄ Progress tracking, points and streaks help you stay motivated and keep the learning part FUN!

Are you tired of English vocabulary apps? Are you feeling stuck when actually trying to communicate in English?

We focus on a natural method of learning a language. Instead of memorizing words, grammar rules, or reading flashcards, you learn by listening and repeating in English or Spanish and by practicing real-life conversations. Our interactive lessons help you listen, repeat, and correct mistakes instantly, building confidence every time you speak. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, we‚Äôve got lessons tailored for all levels!

‚òùÔ∏è How different people use BeeSpeaker?
‚û°Ô∏è Absolute beginners learn English or Spanish from scratch, with our video lessons tailored to A0 and A1 levels
‚û°Ô∏è Intermediate learners build vocabulary and progress to upper levels through our video course and by practicing speaking with BeeSpeaker‚Äôs AI Teacher
‚û°Ô∏è Advanced learners practice pronunciation and speaking with AI Tutor to prepare for popular English exams, like FCE, TOEFL, IELTS, or TOEIC
‚û°Ô∏è And for the most advanced learners, we‚Äôve just added a C1 English course so that you can master your English to perfection

üë©‚Äçüè´ Our instructors
‚û°Ô∏è Experienced teachers and native speakers from countries like Great Britain, the United States, and Australia.
‚û°Ô∏è Thanks to them you will learn different accents and ways of pronouncing particular words.

ü§ñ AI Tutor
‚û°Ô∏è BeeSpeaker‚Äôs AI Tutor is your personal English & Spanish language coach powered by artificial intelligence, available 24/7.
‚û°Ô∏è It lets you practice free conversations and adjusts responses to what you‚Äôre saying - just like in real life. But without judgement or stress.

The app offers a free 7-day trial during which you can test every feature inside. You can cancel your trial anytime. And when you‚Äôre ready, you can unlock all features with our PRO subscription.

Break free from speaking anxiety, gain confidence, and speak English and Spanish naturally! The more you practice with BeeSpeaker, the faster you'll improve. Ready to start speaking fluently? Let BeeSpeaker be your guide.

Download now and join the language revolution!

title: Cake - Learn English & Korean
description: An incredible English & Korean learning app used by 100 million people worldwide. Master your English & Korean using free videos and audio content updated daily! We currently only support English for learning Korean. But don't worry! More languages will be added soon! You can learn real English expressions selected by English experts. Practice your speaking and revise what you learned with quizzes. Practice and repetition will make memorizing the expressions simple! Continuous learning with Cake will definitely help improve your English & Korean skills. It's fun. - Learn with your favorite celebrity, artist, and vlogger videos. - It's also full of exciting original content made by us. You can learn real native English. - Learn real English used in vlogs, movies, and TV shows. - Become familiar with different accents and pronunciations. - You can learn how to express one sentence in many different ways. Cake will help you improve your speaking. - Watch videos with subtitles, and repeat after each line. - Get your pronunciation checked by our AI. - Practice speaking like in a real conversation. Learn step-by-step. - Select a topic of your choice and study step-by-step with our 'class' feature. - Study using the 'classes' created by English experts. - You can practice speaking and listening like in real conversations. Repeat and revise. - Review what you learned using fun quizzes. - Save the sentences you like, and test yourself. Just 10 minutes a day. - Achieve your daily study goals, and feel accomplished. - The more accomplished you feel, the more motivated you'll feel to keep learning! Cake's exclusive features - Daily expression clips: New expressions are added daily, and are organized by topic. - Original lectures: English & Korean lectures created by Cake - Classes: Enables you to study step-by-step by combining lectures, videos, and quizzes into several courses. - Quizzes: Listening, key expressions, reviews, and many more revision quizzes. - Speak: Practice listening and speaking with audio learning. - Today's conversation: Practice listening and speaking with a unique conversation every day. - Save sentences and words: Practice and repeat sentences and words of your choice. Improve your learning with Cake Plus. Get unlimited hearts and enjoy the app with no ads. Access exclusive Cake Plus content, and save as many words and sentences as you want. Real English expressions selected by English experts! Use Cake daily and watch your English improve!

title: Learn English Easily
description:
Vocabulary Flashcards: Learning Words and English app: learn to use English for travel, vacation, dating, study, school, and business. 

‚Ä¢ English app with flashcards and sentences with examples of using these words. More than 10,000 thousand words.

‚Ä¢ The simplest English learning app for mobile phone and tablet.

‚Ä¢ 100% free lessons: you can choose and start at the level that suits you best. You can start from scratch, or you can choose the advanced level and start learning the words of the B2-C1 level. Colorful photos, detailed explanation and simple learning using artificial intelligence. It‚Äôs suitable for both adults and children. With our English app, you will quickly learn the most frequent English words and travel phrases, right before your holidays. And your friends will be shocked when they see how easy you communicate with locals in English. Proven methodology for learning English without stress. More than 10,000 thousand words. High-quality photo and audio materials! Better than any other app!

Main characteristics and features of the application: 
‚ñ∫ 10,000 flashcards with English words and phrases and their translation in your native language
‚ñ∫ Accelerated learning method with repetition, based on artificial intelligence
‚ñ∫ Beautiful, easy to remember and high-quality photos
‚ñ∫ Only high-quality pronunciation. We have both, an American and a British pronunciation.
‚ñ∫ Can be used on a mobile phone and on a tablet
‚ñ∫ We have all levels. From zero to advanced


What if you compare our English learning app to others?
‚ñ∫ 100% Free: there are no restrictions that will force you to buy the paid version of the application. Everything is free.
‚ñ∫ Over 10,000 words and related phrases.  Have you learned a new word? Then have a glance on phrases samples how to use this new word. Plus, we made our dictionaries adapted for different needs, you will find words for travel and business and even for dating, if you decided to date someone.
‚ñ∫ Adaptive, fast and the easiest way of learning English language. We use a unique technique which will help you to learn new words and phrases without even a single effort from your side.
‚ñ∫ Spaced repetition based on the artificial intelligence. This means you can learn English faster.
‚ñ∫ Add your own word lists. Do you have your own words that you learn in a language course, university or school? You can add your words to the app from anywhere.
‚ñ∫ Track your progress using the app.  You can keep track of your progress and, we have word speed meter. That means, once you start, you will see your studying speed. No other app has word speed meter.

Vocabulary Flashcards: Learning Words and English is suitable for: 
- English learners at: beginner, intermediate and advanced levels;
- students who are preparing for TOIEC, IELTS. etc.;
- those who wish to improve their level.

Working on ‚ÄúVocabulary cards: learn words and English language‚Äù is still in progress, thus your comments and feedback are very important to us. Please comment so we can make the app better for you. We are a team that loves English and always tries to share our love with the community, so if you like this app, please take the time to rate it 5 stars to support us! You can also contact us by commenting or by clicking the "Feedback" button on the settings screen.

title: ABA English - Learn English
description:
Do you want to learn English with the help of the most complete and effective method? 

ABA English, the English digital academy, has a plan for you that includes everything you need to learn and speak English successfully: a complete course + live classes + guidance from native teachers. 

Download the app and start today. More than 30 million students around the world have already signed up.

HOW DO YOU LEARN ENGLISH WITH ABA ENGLISH?
Discover a unique and effective method based on immersion: you'll learn English just like you would if you were travelling to London or New York but without having to move a muscle and at your own pace.

LEARN WITH A COMPLETE ENGLISH COURSE
The ABA English course is video-based. It is comprised of 144 units in 6 official levels: from A1, Beginner, to C1 Business. What's more, it also includes live unit review classes.

‚òÖ ABA FILM
Start each unit with a short video that recreates everyday scenes and conversations, with native English accents and subtitles in your own language. Practise your English pronunciation and listening comprehension.

‚òÖ THOUSANDS OF EXERCISES
Whatever your level, find online English exercises with the answer keys in order to improve and correct your mistakes. You'll practise all linguistic skill areas: reading, writing, listening and pronunciation. For more advanced levels, there are more complex grammar exercises and other lessons to learn more specific vocabulary in English.

‚òÖ GRAMMAR VIDEOS
Learn English grammar with the help of the videos our native teachers have prepared for you.

‚òÖ CERTIFICATES
You'll get an Official ABA English Certificate every time you pass a level. You can share it on LinkedIn via the app.

‚òÖ A1 TO C1 ENGLISH LEVEL TESTS
You can take a free A1 to C1 level test to make sure you start at the right level for you.

‚òÖ LIVE GROUP CLASSES
You have access to unit review classes to go over everything you've learnt in the course as well as conversation classes so that you can practise speaking and learn advanced English vocabulary. There are live classes every day and for all levels. 

‚òÖ PRACTISE WITH MICROLESSONS
Discover new content every day and learn something new in just a few minutes: videos, podcasts, articles, music‚Ä¶ you'll love them!

OUR PLANS
If you're a beginner, you can start for FREE with our Free plan and start seeing your first results. With this plan, you can take the first unit for your level so that you can get to know our method and you'll also get a free grammar video every day. Like this, we'll help you get into the habit of studying English. 

If you want to go a step further and enjoy a more advanced and complete plan, we recommend the Premium plan. 

With the Premium plan, you have everything included in one price: the complete course + certificates + live classes + microlessons. Unlimited access!

Subscription plans: 3 months, 6 months, 12 months, or 24 months.

Enjoy a 7-day FREE trial, with no obligation to stay. If you're a beginner, we'd love to help guide you in your new journey towards learning English.

Whatever your level, whether it's beginner or advanced; you'll find exercises online that have been adapted to your level. Beginners will have everything they need to improve their linguistic skills, and those who are more advance can broaden their knowledge through grammar exercises and will learn the complexities of advanced English vocabulary.

Download the ABA English app now and start learning and speaking English today!

https://www.abaenglish.com/en/privacy-policy/

https://www.abaenglish.com/en/general-terms-and-conditions/


PLEASE NOTE 
All subscriptions are renewed automatically unless automatic renewal is deactivated at least 24 hours before renewal date. You can manage or cancel your subscription in the Subscriptions menu in your Google Play account.

title: RealLife: Speak, Learn English
description:
The last English learning app you will ever need!

If you ever feel frustrated because you do not understand fast-speaking natives, you forget new expressions, you freeze up in conversation (not knowing the right word), or you do not feel confident and natural speaking, then download RealLife English now! Just look how it helped this learner:

"‚Ä¶my English isn't perfect‚Ä¶ but the app has really helped me to build up my vocabulary. Sometimes I'm having conversations with my colleagues who are natives. When I listen to a word that I learned using the app, I just feel really, really happy because I'm making improvements. It also helped me to improve my pronunciation‚Ä¶. specifically, about the connected speech and how I should pronounce it. I'm trying to focus my efforts on that. I feel like I'm going to achieve my goals if I continue using the app.‚Äù (Daniel G. üá≤üáΩ)

Most classes and apps promise you fluency in months, but then do not prepare you for real-life, everyday situations. You‚Äôre left stuck, your English does not flow. 

Our global team of language learning experts is committed to creating tools for English learners like you that actually work so you can:
‚ÄìAlways remember the right word at the right time
‚ÄìUnderstand practically 100% of what natives say
‚ÄìSpeak English effortlessly and clearly in any situation without fear or mistakes
‚ÄìUnlock new opportunities in your life.

‚û°Ô∏è¬†How it works:

1. üëÇüèºLEARN‚ÄîWe have a huge variety of FUN real-life conversation videos where you‚Äôll learn English you‚Äôll actually use in your everyday life, while developing your listening to understand fast-native speech and vocabulary
2. üß†¬†PRACTICE‚ÄîWatching each lesson, you will unlock Vocabulary Flashcards with the new advanced expressions that you need for your life. These use innovative technology that helps you never forget the new expressions
3. üó£Ô∏è¬†SPEAK‚ÄîActually use your English and discover other cultures in conversations with real people from around the world in the Global Speak. It‚Äôs okay if you are shy. The first two steps will help you build your confidence and develop the skills to communicate naturally in any situation without fear or mistakes. Take your time.

üëâüèº¬†When you first download the app, to get the best experience we highly recommend you join the free RealLife Way Mini-Course, which will introduce you to our popular method and help you be successful!

Look at what other members of our Global Community say:

‚Äî‚ÄúIt has been amazing so far. From being so shy to even initiate a call and barely talking even for a minute last month when I started to now having conversations for even more than an hour. I am really satisfied with my growth in just a month, especially being a Premium Subscriber. So my overall experience is incredible.‚Äù (Tayor D. üáÆüá≥)

‚Äì ‚ÄúThis is indisputably the best source to leap to an advanced level.‚Äù (Feyyazz üáπüá∑)

TRY FOR FREE - NO CREDIT CARD REQUIRED

But if you want to be successful FAST (up to 7x faster), try PREMIUM with a free 7-day trial! You get:
‚Äî Unlimited access to all transcripts
‚Äî 7x More vocabulary per lesson
‚Äî Unlimited speaking time
‚Äî üîú¬†Manage your vocabulary

About RealLife English:

‚Äì ‚ñ∂Ô∏è¬†The RealLife App is brought to you by RealLife English, creators of the globally impactful Youtube Channels Learn English with TV Series (10+ Million Subscribers) and RealLife English (1+ Million Subscribers)

‚Äìüåç¬†Our mission is to guide you beyond the classroom to live your greatest life and connect to the world.

title: EnglishCentral - Learn English
description:
EnglishCentral is an online English learning platform where you can have 1-on-1 live lessons with professional tutors 24/7.  You can also study with more than 20,000 AI-supported videos, covering over 50 topics you select to match your interest and English level.

Are you preparing for English language proficiency exams such as TOEFL, IELTS, TESOL, TEFL, or TOEIC? By studying with EnglishCentral's videos, you can improve your vocabulary, grammar, pronunciation, comprehension, and listening skills and practice speaking with professional English tutors.

Improve your English vocabulary and have fun with our professional English word memorization feature. Practice speaking English anytime with a personal tutor, or engage in conversation with our virtual language learning assistant, Mimi.

Live Lessons

- Practice English over video chat with a professional tutor!
- Select a topic of your choice and talk about it.
- Get instant feedback from your tutor on your pronunciation and progress.

20,000+ AI-Supported Video Lessons

- AI-supported videos covering a wide variety of topics from business to travel.
- Watch a video a day with subtitles, recommended based on your level and interests.
- Learn new vocabulary and test yourself.
- Speak about the video with your Chatbot buddy Mimi.
- Get instant feedback on your pronunciation. 
- Improve your pronunciation with different English accents.

Test Yourself

- Complete vocabulary quizzes based on your level.
- Practice your weak words and sentences.
- Learn more than 50,000 English words.

WATCH
Over 20,000 videos.

LEARN VOCABULARY
Over 50,000 words.

SPEAK
With IntelliSpeech(SM) technology and get instant feedback on your pronunciation & fluency.

GOLIVE!
With 1-on-1 tutors from your mobile device.

Join a community of over 10 million and start learning English now!

Over 10 Million people learn English with EnglishCentral, download the app and start learning English with the best videos and tutors!

Read our full Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy at:

title: Open English: Learn English
description: Are you in search of the perfect app to learn English in a fast and straightforward manner? Download the Open English app today! With our mobile app, you unlock access to the comprehensive content of our English course, expertly designed by leading professionals in English language education. If you're not yet a part of our English learning community, don't worry. You can access all our premium content completely free for 24 hours! This is your chance to explore our unique teaching methods, delve into our interactive tools and lessons, and even enjoy a sample private class. Download it right away! Why Choose Open English's English Course? Our innovative immersion method is tailored to equip you with the vital skills needed to master English and enhance your proficiency. The course offers a plethora of benefits, such as unlimited live classes, interactions with native English-speaking teachers, and engaging, concise lessons that focus on improving your vocabulary, grammar, speaking, and reading comprehension. The best part? You can start learning English for free and experience our method firsthand before making a commitment to enroll! What Makes Open English a Leading App for English Learning? The Open English app offers a unique learning experience, enabling you to leverage both the essential and advanced features of our platform: Unlimited access to 100% live online English classes, available 24/7. This flexibility allows you to learn English from any location, at any time. Participate in real-life conversation scenarios with native English speakers in group classes. Engage in practical exercises and entertaining games that enhance your grammar, writing skills, and English vocabulary. Utilize advanced AI tools, including voice recognition with translation and real-time online correction, to improve your pronunciation and listening skills. Interactive English lessons focused on practical language application in everyday life. Personalized progress tracking via WhatsApp, like having a personal language coach at your fingertips! Discover the Joy of Learning English for FREE with Our Mobile App and test our course for up to 24 hours before deciding to enroll! Experience a private class or our interactive lessons firsthand. Additional Benefits of the Open English Mobile App With our app, you also have the opportunity to: Book and attend private classes with an English teacher, available at an additional cost for a more tailored learning experience. Access preparation modules for the TOEFL, TOEIC, and IELTS exams free of charge. Expand your vocabulary with specialized modules designed to develop your technical English in 15 key job market areas. descriptionHTML:

If you're not yet a part of our English learning community, don't worry. You can access all our premium content completely free for 24 hours! Why Choose Open English's English Course?

Our innovative immersion method is tailored to equip you with the vital skills needed to master English and enhance your proficiency. The course offers a plethora of benefits, such as unlimited live classes, interactions with native English-speaking teachers, and engaging, concise lessons that focus on improving your vocabulary, grammar, speaking, and reading comprehension.

The best part? You can start learning English for free and experience our method firsthand before making a commitment to enroll!

What Makes Open English a Leading App for English Learning?

The Open English app offers a unique learning experience, enabling you to leverage both the essential and advanced features of our platform:

Unlimited access to 100% live online English classes, available 24/7. This flexibility allows you to learn English from any location, at any time.
Participate in real-life conversation scenarios with native English speakers in group classes.
Engage in practical exercises and entertaining games that enhance your grammar, writing skills, and English vocabulary.
Utilize advanced AI tools, including voice recognition with translation and real-time online correction, to improve your pronunciation and listening skills.
Interactive English lessons focused on practical language application in everyday life.

title: Wlingua - Learn Spanish
description:
Learning Spanish has never been so easy. It's perfect for you, whether you already have a beginner, basic, intermediate, or advanced level of Spanish. Thanks to our online Spanish courses, you‚Äôll notice your Spanish improving very quickly. Millions of students have already tried our courses. Would you like to join them?

Our Online Spanish Courses:

Spanish Course In this course you will learn Spanish from scratch. Guaranteed! Regardless of the level you start from, it is designed to help you learn Spanish from day one. Spanish Verb Conjugation Course In this course you will practice the conjugation of Spanish verb tenses. This is extra practice recommended for people who are already doing the General Spanish course. It includes regular and irregular verbs. On the Phone Course In this course you will learn to answer the phone naturally. You will learn the most important phrases and expressions to have a telephone conversation. European Spanish Pronunciation Course In this course you will learn to recognize Castilian or European Spanish sounds. This course has 15 lessons and many exercises to practice and improve your pronunciation. Mexican Spanish Pronunciation Course In this course you will learn to recognize Mexican Spanish sounds. This course has 15 lessons and many exercises to practice and improve your pronunciation. Ser or Estar Course In this course you will learn how and when to use the verbs ser and estar. Each lesson contains explanations, examples and exercises to practice these crucial verbs. You will learn which adjective goes with each verb or several expressions used in everyday conversations.

Our Learning Method:

A learning process designed for you that is both easy and guided: You‚Äôll feel like you‚Äôre learning more and more Spanish every day. Every sentence, exercise, review, and reading has been carefully selected for you. Audio clips in European Spanish and Mexican Spanish: A wide variety of accents with clear, crisp pronunciation. Recorded by professional narrators. Linked concepts: Each word is linked to its use or precise meaning. When you click on the words in each sentence, exercise, or reading, their meaning or an explanation of their use will appear. Lesson structure: Concepts are introduced progressively throughout the course. Only concepts that are explained in the course are used to create the content (sentences, exercises or readings). Vocabulary: Learn the meaning, pronunciation, and use of words with activities adapted to your progress. Grammar exercises: Practice your grammar with exercises linked to explanations. Vocabulary topics: Words are grouped by topic categories. Spaced reviews: Review the vocabulary and grammar at increasingly long intervals. Search function: Find whatever you‚Äôre looking for, including vocabulary and grammar. Reading comprehension texts (readings): Learn and practice with conversations, news, emails, and interviews, among others. Certificates: Earn a certificate that proves your knowledge at the end of each level. Account types: ‚úî Basic: With a Basic account, the course is free, but has some limitations. ‚úî Premium: With a Premium account, you‚Äôll have access to all course content and activities. At Wlingua, we work hard every day to offer you a quality Spanish app that will help you in your work, with that upcoming exam, on your vacation, in communicating with people from around the world... Download our app to learn Spanish!

title: Learn Spanish. Speak Spanish
description: Speak Spanish faster than you ever imagined with Mondly‚Äôs proprietary ILA-method. How? The secret is to make it simple. Have you ever heard a song in the radio which had you bopping your head and wanting to sing along? The first step of learning Spanish is pretty similar. You listen to the sound of native Spanish speakers and repeat some of their words. Mondly‚Äôs state-of-the-art speech recognition shows you how well you already speak and where you can improve. It‚Äôs fun and doesn‚Äôt even feel like learning. Especially because Mondly uses your mother language so you never get lost in translation. The second step is even easier. Take a break. Your lesson is never more than 9 minutes long and here is why: Your brain needs a rest to store the new information. And while you‚Äôre busy with your life, Spanish words and sentences get anchored in your long-term memory. The result: You find yourself effortlessly knowing what to say and when. Don‚Äôt worry about the exact timing. Mondly gives you control over the entire process. You receive friendly reminders exactly when your brain is set for the next dose of knowledge. The third step is all about you. Because now you‚Äôre ready to create your own phrases and adding your individual touch and personality back into the conversation. And when you want to practice, Mondly‚Äôs interactive chat-bot becomes your pocket tutor. There are over 40 practical, real-life situations which take you to the restaurant, shopping, exploring the city and many more. But that‚Äôs not the only reason why Mondly gives you the confidence to speak Spanish. Because the HandsFree mode lets you practice without looking at the screen. Just connect your headphones and you‚Äôre in Paris, chatting away with the locals. Need a quick boost of motivation? Check your progress with the advanced statistics and intelligent reporting. It shows you how far you have come in your journey to master the 5,000 words and phrases Mondly offers you. We all learn in different ways so here are some of the other highlights Mondly offers: ‚Ä¢ Well-structured grammar drills which integrate seamlessly into the content of the lessons ‚Ä¢ Verb conjugations to show you the underlining structure and further boost your confidence ‚Ä¢ Reading and writing games to complete your skills and give you full independence So what does the ILA-Method stand for? It‚Äôs Immersive Language Acquisition and it means with Mondly you pick up Spanish in the most natural way possible. But don‚Äôt trust the over 50 million users who have given the app a 4.7/5.0 rating. Here‚Äôs what the press had to say: ¬ª ‚ÄúThe new and sexier way to learn languages‚Äù - Huffington Post ¬ª ‚ÄúClosest thing to actual immersion‚Äù - TNW ¬ª ‚ÄúA practical approach to language learning likely to be widely adopted.‚Äù - Forbes ¬ª ‚ÄúThe new way to learn languages‚Äù - Inc.com Join the revolution and speak Spanish now! There‚Äôs a new free lesson every day and no ads.

The first step of learning Spanish is pretty similar. You listen to the sound of native Spanish speakers and repeat some of their words.

Mondly‚Äôs state-of-the-art speech recognition shows you how well you already speak and where you can improve. It‚Äôs fun and doesn‚Äôt even feel like learning. Especially because Mondly uses your mother language so you never get lost in translation.

The second step is even easier. Take a break. Your lesson is never more than 9 minutes long and here is why: Your brain needs a rest to store the new information. And while you‚Äôre busy with your life, Spanish words and sentences get anchored in your long-term memory.

The result: You find yourself effortlessly knowing what to say and when. Don‚Äôt worry about the exact timing. Mondly gives you control over the entire process. You receive friendly reminders exactly when your brain is set for the next dose of knowledge.

The third step is all about you. Because now you‚Äôre ready to create your own phrases and adding your individual touch and personality back into the conversation. And when you want to practice, Mondly‚Äôs interactive chat-bot becomes your pocket tutor.

There are over 40 practical, real-life situations which take you to the restaurant, shopping, exploring the city and many more.
But that‚Äôs not the only reason why Mondly gives you the confidence to speak Spanish. Because the HandsFree mode lets you practice without looking at the screen. Just connect your headphones and you‚Äôre in Paris, chatting away with the locals.

Need a quick boost of motivation? Check your progress with the advanced statistics and intelligent reporting. It shows you how far you have come in your journey to master the 5,000 words and phrases Mondly offers you.

title: Learn Spanish ‚Äì Studycat
description:
From the award-winning creators of Studycat for Schools, comes Learn Spanish! The #1 way for kids to learn espa√±ol!

From preschool and beyond, Learn Spanish by Studycat inspires children's innate love of learning with interactive games and activities.

Our bite-sized lessons will keep your child motivated while they discover a new language and build bilingual skills for a lifetime!

WHY STUDYCAT?

‚Ä¢ Learn Spanish, in Spanish. All our activities focus on virtual language immersion, which means your child won't be hearing any English, only Spanish! This might be confusing at first, but trust us, it's the best way to learn.

‚Ä¢ Everyday Language. Our lessons teach words and expressions that kids can apply in their everyday lives, so they can get a head start developing their bilingual abilities.

‚Ä¢ Get Talking Fast. With our interactive speaking challenges, kids will be encouraged to speak entire words and phrases on their own! The earlier kids start their language-learning journey, the more likely they are to reach proficiency quickly.

‚Ä¢ Vocal Variety. Our characters' voices use different tones, expressions, and accents so that kids can pick up on the subtleties of pronunciation from different speakers.

‚Ä¢ Designed by Experts. All our activities are designed by language and early-education experts. Thoughtfully developed lessons will build your child's confidence with every step.

‚Ä¢ Learner Profiles. Create up to four personalized profiles for different family members, allowing tailored learning paths and individual progress tracking.

‚Ä¢ Safe for Kids & Ad-Free. Parents can rest easy knowing that there are no pesky ads to distract children from their learning. All content is appropriate for ages 3 and up.

‚Ä¢ Offline Learning. On a plane, at a restaurant, or in a park? No problem! Learn Spanish by Studycat is available for both online and offline use.

WHAT ARE PARENTS SAYING?

‚ÄúChildren can follow their natural curiosity and walk away with a basic Spanish vocabulary and not even realize it!‚Äù ‚Äî Spanish Hackers

‚ÄúAs a parent trying to raise bilingual children at home, Learn Spanish by Studycat is a helpful app to start them off and create excitement about the language.‚Äù ‚Äî Fluent in 3 Months

‚ÄúEverything has been thought out carefully and the games and activities are really engaging.‚Äù ‚Äî Bilingual Kidspot

--

If you like Learn Spanish by Studycat, try it out for 7 days free! Empower your child to learn like never before, and get extras like printable worksheets and animated stories.

If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Privacy Policy: https://studycat.com/about/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: https://studycat.com/about/terms-of-use/

title: Learn Spanish for beginners
description:
Learn Spanish and have fun! The educational game for beginners!

Discover the most exciting way to learn Spanish with our application, specifically designed for beginners. Whether you're starting from scratch or looking to improve your basic skills, our app offers you a unique and effective learning experience.

36 fun themes and 3 levels of difficulty:
From the basics like the alphabet and numbers to advanced topics like sports and music.

500 words with images and audio: Expand your vocabulary with essential words, accompanied by clear images and audio pronunciation.

Interactive lessons and continuous assessments: Our game provides you with a comprehensive learning experience with interactive lessons and exercises for reading, writing, and conversation. Strengthen your skills in each topic and assess your progress with specific exams and tests, allowing you to consolidate what you have learned and see your language proficiency effectively.

Spanish accent: Clear and modern pronunciation, ideal for understanding and being understood in international contexts by a native speaker from Spain.

Ideal for travelers and support in rehabilitation: If you are planning a trip abroad or looking for a friendly and accessible tool to assist in cognitive rehabilitation situations, our app is perfect. It is widely used by older individuals, those with speech difficulties, and in hospital settings to assist stroke patients in their recovery process and Spanish language learning.

Quickly and confidently: Our course has been designed to provide you with an immersive experience, allowing you to learn Spanish quickly and effectively. Perfect for beginners, our app helps you build a strong foundation in the language.

Goodbye to the dictionary and translation: With our methodology, you won't need to rely on a dictionary or translation tool soon. We provide you with all the necessary tools to understand and be understood in this language.

Play and Learn with a User-Friendly Interface: Our application combines learning with play, making studying Spanish fun and engaging. With an intuitive and easy-to-use interface, we make it easy to navigate between various lessons, activities, and tests, ensuring an enjoyable and efficient learning experience for all users.

Customize your learning experience: With a variety of themes and levels, you can choose what interests you the most. Our tracking system allows you to see your progress and focus on areas for improvement.

More languages with us: we offer courses in French, English, Portuguese, Italian, German, and Chinese

Copyright:
IMPORTANT: We are owners and have copyright of all sounds words
Images have been obtained under licensed Creative Commons CC0

title: LearnSpanish for Kids Game App
description:
Stop wasting your time with apps that help you "memorize better"! Forget flashcards and vocabulary drills, they just don't work. That's because language that sticks is not memorized - it is absorbed. With FabuLingua, kids absorb Spanish naturally - through stories they can understand.  

FabuLingua is "a leader in game-based learning" (according to "Clever", the educational platform that hosts most educational applications). To kids FabuLingua is a FUN mobile game - a game of adventure where their progress in playing through beautiful interactive stories helps them discover new beautiful secret locations, earning gold and diamond keys that unlock treasure chests full of bounty! 

Under the hood of this engaging game, however, there is a ton of learning science!  FabuLingua's story-based, patented method is rooted in the latest science of second language acquisition and develops excellent pronunciation. It is so effective it has won many awards by language-learning and education experts.

Parents love FabuLingua because it's designed for independent learning - parents don't need to speak any Spanish themselves. Families can create up to 6 individual child profiles under one $69.99/year subscription, making it ideal and affordable for siblings or multi-age homeschool settings. From beginner to intermediate Spanish.  Teaches comprehension,  pronunciation, speaking, spelling and reading.

-> Download it today to start a 7-day Free Trial and learn Spanish while trying one of our beautiful interactive stories!
-> Subscribe to our monthly or discounted annual plan for unlimited access to all the interactive stories, gameplay, rewards, and new content!
-> Available for tablets and mobile devices.
-> Any comments or issues?  Email us at support@fabulingua.com with feedback or questions.

WINNER of the 2025 "Top Language Learning Mobile Game & App" award by Educational Technology insights.

PARENT PICKS AWARD 2025 for "Best Educational Products in the World" and "Best Products for Elementary Kids

WINNER of Launchpad global ‚ÄúBest New Language Education Technology‚Äù award organized by the Language Flagship Technology Innovation Center.

WINNER of Fast Company‚Äôs "Innovation by Design" Award


Main Features:

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúPlay to Learn‚Äù - An interactive, story-based mobile game to engage kids and learn Spanish.
‚Ä¢ An adaptive learning path that develops progressive language skills - comprehension, pronunciation, grammar, and literacy.
‚Ä¢ Science-backed ‚ÄúMagical Translations‚Äù learning method based on ‚Äúcomprehensible input.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ A growing collection of beautiful, interactive language-learning stories.
‚Ä¢ Fun free play and games that reinforce knowledge.
‚Ä¢ A free reward system that incentivizes and motivates learning.
‚Ä¢ Audio recording mode that allows the child to practice pronunciation and develop reading skills.
‚Ä¢ Unique playing cards and free collectible digital stickers.
‚Ä¢ New features for stories and games that are added regularly like Leaderboards, Stickerbook, Avatar system, Achievement Badges, Quests, Card Battler
‚Ä¢ Parental controls and progress tracking.
‚Ä¢ MAGICAL TRANSLATIONS- An innovative way to teach Spanish to kids:
Through our Magical Translations‚Ñ¢ method, children see only the Spanish text but hear the narrator‚Äôs rhythmic (and strategically timed) alternation between Spanish and English translation. Our method is supported by Dr. Stephen Krashen‚Äôs Comprehensible Input Hypothesis. Simply put, ‚Äúcomprehensible input‚Äù is new-language input that can be comprehended by listeners despite them not understanding all the words. When kids learn Spanish through comprehensible input they absorb it instead of memorizing it. And that leads to language that sticks.

With FabuLingua Kids absorb Spanish through Stories they can understand.  They come to life in a fun Mobile Game.‚Ä® It‚Äôs natural, effortless and backed by science.

title: Learn Spanish: Daily Readle
description:
Learn Spanish Daily with Real News & Stories. Teacher-Crafted. Student-Ready.

Readle is a Spanish language learning app with real-world news & stories. It is the world's first CEFR-graded reader to help you learn Spanish. Easily read & listen to news & stories anytime, anywhere ‚Äì Take 10 minutes daily to learn Spanish and create a reading habit. Why should you learn Spanish with Readle? ‚Ä¢ Our language experts turn real-world news & stories into fun & bite-sized Spanish A1 ‚Äì B2 Spanish learning courses tailored to your level. ‚Ä¢ Your best companion for reading, listening, comprehension & flashcard vocabulary training with thousands of story courses. Download Readle for FREE and start to learn Spanish the new way! ============== Learn languages with stories and be a part of the revolution: ‚ñ∫ EFFECTIVE SPANISH LEARNING THROUGH IMMERSION Use our scientifically proven immersion method to learn Spanish effectively. Real-world stories & news curated by our language experts and turned into Spanish classes ranging from A1, A2, B1, and B2 levels. ‚ñ∫ BITE-SIZED STORY LANGUAGE LEARNING COURSES +2000 interesting stories & news for you to learn Spanish. Readle allows you to learn them effectively in context, including grammar tips and vocabulary flashcard training. ‚ñ∫ PERFECT PRONUNCIATION Listen to the story audio sentence by sentence. It will help you practice pronunciation and improve your listening skills. ‚ñ∫ INSTANT DICTIONARY Quickly look up a word translation in every article with a tap on the word ‚Äì the easiest way to learn vocabulary, phrases, verbs, and conjugation. Save your time switching between Reverso, Leo, Duden, or other Spanish dictionaries. ‚ñ∫ GRAMMAR HELPER Spanish grammar helpers in each language learning course bring your grammar into action. Learn Spanish grammar quickly from the story context with real examples. ‚ñ∫ VOCABULARY LIST & FLASHCARD Learn Spanish vocabulary or verb conjugation in the story courses. Use spaced repetition to study a word ‚Äì a scientifically proven learning method to review and recall vocabulary at an optimal time. ‚ñ∫ QUIZ FOR COMPREHENSION Test your reading comprehension and practice Spanish grammar, vocabulary, and articles (el & la) with quizzes in each story ‚Äì a great way to challenge your Spanish language skills and prepare yourself for DELE, CELU, SIELE or other Spanish language learning exams. ‚ñ∫ STORY LIBRARY & DAILY NEW STORIES 2000+ news & stories courses for you to learn Spanish in a wide range of topics that are available for language learning: - Travel - Culture - Food - Latest News - Transportation - Entertainment - Science and Medical - Technology - People - Parties Plus, many more ‚Äì add on a daily basis! Readle is a must-have language-learning app for living and traveling in Spanish-speaking countries. Download Readle now and start to learn Spanish! Questions or comments about learning with Readle? Please email us at support@readle-app.org Privacy policy: https://readle-app.com/en/privacy-policy/ Terms of use: https://readle-app.com/en/terms-of-use/ Readle is the best companion for your language learning education & upcoming language learning tests to get ahead. Download Readle and start to learn Spanish!
