title: Learn Spanish Fast: Course
description:
So, you want to Learn Spanish in no time? You need MosaLingua! 
Innovative and effective, our applications have helped more than 13,000,000 people all over the world learning languages in only 10 minutes per day - with actual results!

Learn more about MosaLingua by watching the demonstration video on https://mosalingua.com/en.

Feel free to try our smartphone application to learn Spanish vocabulary for free: you'll see for yourself how well it works! It's a powerful and effective tool - ideal for people who want to learn Spanish Vocabulary and Speak Spanish in no time, without taking long, boring language courses or using a Spanish dictionary or a Spanish translator.

It's useful in any situation: our SRS-based method can help you while you travel to Spain or Mexico, in the workplace, and in everyday life with Spanish lessons and Spanish words that suit your language and conversation needs.

THE BENEFITS OF MOSALINGUA: 
1) Useful, practical Spanish lessons online
Don't waste your time with notions, courses or a Spanish dictionary that won't help you. Instead, learn the 20% Spanish words that you'll use 80% of the time in Spain or Mexico. MosaLingua is Better than a Spanish translator!

2) An innovative method based on scientific research
Our international team is made up of expert polyglots who've used the most modern and proven learning, memorization and consolidation techniques (SRS, active recall, metacognition, etc.) to help you learning Spanish. 

3) Coaching throughout the online learning process
To succeed, you can count on our review sessions that consolidate what you've learned, our mini Spanish lessons, and our advice for better understanding Spanish vocabulary, Spanish words, and improve your conversation.

4) Learning Spanish words and having fun at the same time
Achieve great results and have fun doing so: your progress will boost your MOTIVATION, which is key to any learning plan.

Our Learn Spanish App includes all these features and add-ons: 
‚òÖ +3000 flash cards: useful Spanish words and phrases for communicating and making yourself understood. 
‚òÖ Audio pronunciation: Spanish words and phrases pronounced by native speakers. 
‚òÖ 37 dialogues: improve your oral comprehension with our integrated dialogues and Spanish lessons.
‚òÖ Tips for Studying: our app include useful tips and tricks for faster progress. 
‚òÖ Personalized learning program: get a tailored experience focusing on your specific learning goals (travel, work, everyday life, exams‚Ä¶)


Using MosaLingua‚Äôs highly effective and addictive method, you will be able to memorize an impressive amount of Spanish vocabulary, Spanish words and key phrases in record time.


If you want to learn Spanish, download the MosaLingua Learn Spanish app and try it free ‚Äì you won't regret it!

title: Learn Spanish with flashcards!
description:
ReWord is a highly effective foreign language learning app. It is your best tool to learn Spanish and improve your vocabulary. Did you know you can learn languages just taking 5-10 minutes a day? With our interval system, your Spanish lessons will reach a new level. And will give you greater results, of course!

As with any other language, Spanish lessons must include learning Spanish grammar and memorizing new Spanish words. However, one of the problems with foreign language learning is you can‚Äôt achieve good results if you don‚Äôt systematize the memorizing.
With ReWord, you get a dedicated system and will memorize new Spanish words without much effort on your part.

Features:
‚Ä¢ 5000 words vocabulary. Thousands of Spanish words and phrases divided into thematic categories: choose the category you want to learn this time and change it whenever you want.
‚Ä¢ Add your own words and categories easily: you can create your own word base you want to master first.
‚Ä¢ Handy Spanish flashcards with pictures and example sentences: helpful mental shortcuts to build your vocabulary and understand the nuances of word meaning and how these words are used in real practice.
‚Ä¢ Spaced repetitions really work: ReWord has a science-based approach to memorizing foreign words so you can learn languages at the highest efficiency.
‚Ä¢ Tracking your progress: set your daily goal and keep achieving it every day.
‚Ä¢ Learn Spanish offline: now it is possible to improve your vocab wherever you go.

Yes, with ReWord, memorizing new words is extremely easy and utterly efficient!

Use the app at least twice a day, with regular breaks every few hours. Start with just five words a day and you will have at least 1,825 new words in your active vocabulary within a year. Increase your daily goal, take more Spanish lessons, and you will accelerate your progress and learn Spanish even faster.
ReWord ‚Äì your best foreign language learning app! We are here to help you learn languages in a hassle-free way! Start to speak Espa√±ol!

title: ConjuGato: Learn Spanish Verbs
description: ConjuGato is your perfect Spanish language learning app to easily master verb conjugations. Whether you're a beginner just starting to learn Spanish or aiming to quickly improve your skills, ConjuGato makes grammar practice enjoyable and efficient. Build your vocabulary, enhance your Spanish pronunciation, and learn verbs effectively with convenient flashcards ‚Äì ideal for quick practice anytime, even offline. Why choose ConjuGato? ‚Ä¢ NEW: Guides for each tense and verb form ‚Ä¢ Flexible Practice: Customize verb exercises by irregularity, endings, or popularity ‚Ä¢ Conjugation tables for each verb, with highlighted irregular forms ‚Ä¢ Spaced repetition algorithm for efficient exam preparation and long-term retention ‚Ä¢ Mnemonic flashcards to learn similar verbs together, ideal for beginners! ‚Ä¢ Audio Pronunciation: Listen to Spanish phonetics for all the verb forms ‚Ä¢ Argentinian and Chilean voseo forms ‚Ä¢ Dark Mode for late night studying üåô ‚Ä¢ No ads, no internet connection required: A distraction-free, offline experience ConjuGato was created by a two-person team who moved to Chile without speaking Spanish. Back then, even basic verb conjugation was challenging, and we couldn't find a good app to practice effectively. Out of necessity, we developed ConjuGato to make speaking and learning Spanish easier. It dramatically improved our Spanish skills, and now thousands of learners have successfully used it too ‚Äì just check out all those 5-star reviews! ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê Free version to master Spanish language essentials: ‚Ä¢ 250 most popular verbs + additional 27 mnemonic flashcards ‚Ä¢ Indicative mood ‚Ä¢ Present and Preterite tenses ‚Ä¢ Present progressive (continuous) verb forms If you need more advanced practice, there‚Äôs an affordable one-time upgrade that unlocks everything in the app forever! ‚Ä¢ 1000 verbs + additional 104 mnemonic flashcards ‚Ä¢ All moods: Indicative, Subjunctive, Imperative ‚Ä¢ Complete tense coverage: Present, Preterite, Imperfect, Pluperfect, Conditional, Future (plus perfect and progressive forms) ‚Ä¢ No subscriptions or hidden fees! This app is suitable for both Spanish as it‚Äôs spoken in Spain and also Latin American dialects ‚Äî just disable ‚Äòvosotros‚Äô and you are good to go. üéì Download ConjuGato now and learn Spanish verbs and conjugation with ease!
descriptionHTML:
ConjuGato is your perfect Spanish language learning app to easily master verb conjugations. Whether you're a beginner just starting to learn Spanish or aiming to quickly improve your skills, ConjuGato makes grammar practice enjoyable and efficient. Build your vocabulary, enhance your Spanish pronunciation, and learn verbs effectively with convenient flashcards ‚Äì ideal for quick practice anytime, even offline.

Why choose ConjuGato?
‚Ä¢ NEW: Guides for each tense and verb form
‚Ä¢ Flexible Practice: Customize verb exercises by irregularity, endings, or popularity
‚Ä¢ Conjugation tables for each verb, with highlighted irregular forms
‚Ä¢ Spaced repetition algorithm for efficient exam preparation and long-term retention
‚Ä¢ Mnemonic flashcards to learn similar verbs together, ideal for beginners!
‚Ä¢ Audio Pronunciation: Listen to Spanish phonetics for all the verb forms
‚Ä¢ Argentinian and Chilean voseo forms

ConjuGato was created by a two-person team who moved to Chile without speaking Spanish. Back then, even basic verb conjugation was challenging, and we couldn't find a good app to practice effectively. Out of necessity, we developed ConjuGato to make speaking and learning Spanish easier. It dramatically improved our Spanish skills, and now thousands of learners have successfully used it too ‚Äì just check out all those 5-star reviews! ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Free version to master Spanish language essentials:
‚Ä¢ 250 most popular verbs + additional 27 mnemonic flashcards
‚Ä¢ Indicative mood
‚Ä¢ Present and Preterite tenses
‚Ä¢ Present progressive (continuous) verb forms

If you need more advanced practice, there‚Äôs an affordable one-time upgrade that unlocks everything in the app forever!
‚Ä¢ 1000 verbs + additional 104 mnemonic flashcards
‚Ä¢ All moods: Indicative, Subjunctive, Imperative
‚Ä¢ Complete tense coverage: Present, Preterite, Imperfect, Pluperfect, Conditional, Future (plus perfect and progressive forms)
‚Ä¢ No subscriptions or hidden fees!

This app is suitable for both Spanish as it‚Äôs spoken in Spain and also Latin American dialects ‚Äî just disable ‚Äòvosotros‚Äô and you are good to go.

üéì Download ConjuGato now and learn Spanish verbs and conjugation with ease!
summary: Easy conjugation practice, master Spanish offline with flashcards!

title: Spanish Grammar - Espanido
description:
Learn and practice Spanish grammar with interactive exercises. Espanido makes it fun and simple! Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, you find exercises for all levels, all Spanish tenses, conjugating verbs, and grammar rules. Espanido helps you improve your Spanish in just 10 minutes a day.

Why Espanido?

 ‚úî Sentence-building exercises: Learn to form full sentences, not just memorize words.
 ‚úî Spanish verb conjugation: Practice all Spanish tenses and moods, including perfect tense and subjunctive.
 ‚úî Spanish grammar exercises: Articles, genders, pronouns, prepositions.
 ‚úî Simple grammar explanations: Learn step by step like in a Spanish grammar textbook.
 ‚úî Practice makes perfect: Apply grammar rules in real-life sentences and practice pronunciation.
 ‚úî Short daily lessons‚Äîpractice Spanish grammar and practice from just 10 minutes a day.
 ‚úî Track your progress‚Äîstay motivated with feedback and stats.

Practice all Spanish tenses and verbs:

 ‚Ä¢ Learn all Spanish verb tenses, including present, past, future.
 ‚Ä¢ Understand and practice tricky conjugations.
 ‚Ä¢ Get comfortable with essential Spanish verbs: ser, estar, hacer, poder, decir, ir, pasar, deber, hablar, and more.
 ‚Ä¢ Struggling with the verb "to can" in Spanish or the verb "to do" in Spanish? This app helps you practice and remember them!

Who is Espanido for?

 ¬ª Beginners (A2): Get a solid foundation in simple Spanish grammar and start speaking with confidence.
 ¬ª Intermediate learners (B1‚ÄìB2): Practice advanced Spanish grammar and improve your skills.
 ¬ª Students and test-takers: Espanido is perfect if you're preparing for exams like DELE as it focuses on fundamental grammar.

Your Spanish grammar buddy:

 ‚úî Covers everything from easy Spanish to advanced Spanish step by step.
 ‚úî Works like a complete Spanish grammar guide but in an engaging, interactive format.
 ‚úî Ideal for those learning with Spanish grammar textbooks or looking for structured Spanish grammar practice.

A Premium subscription is required to access all rules in the Espanido app. If you choose to upgrade to Espanido Premium, your account will be charged. 24 hours before the end of the paid period, the amount will be debited from your account to pay for the next one. The current Espanido Premium subscription price starts at $9.99 per month. Prices are in US dollars. They may differ in countries using other currencies and are subject to change without notice. If you choose not to use Espanido Premium, you will be able to continue using the free version of Espanido.

Privacy Policy: https://www.espanido.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://www.espanido.com/terms

Espanido is designed for anyone looking to learn Spanish - whether you're using a Spanish learning app for beginners or exploring advanced grammar topics. It's an ideal alternative to flashcards, Duolingo, Conjuguemos, and Babbel Spanish.

Perfect for students using Spanish workbooks, or searching for Spanish learning games and Spanish flash cards.

Espanido supports all types of learners: those interested in Mexican Spanish, Puerto Rican Spanish, or Dominican Spanish can practice with 200+ verbs, tenses, object pronouns, and sentence structure.

This is more than just another Spanish app. If you‚Äôve searched for how to learn Spanish Espanido is for you. Practice makes perfect! Wlingua, SpanishDict, and other free language learning apps can‚Äôt replace sentence-based practice.

Download Espanido today and make learning Spanish fun, fast, and effective ‚Äî in just 10 minutes a day.

¬°Vamos!

title: Spanish School Bus for Kids
description:
‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢
10-YEAR ANNIVERSARY EDITION
AS FEATURED IN PARENTS LATINA MAGAZINE
WITH NEW MEGA MUSIC VIDEO FROM LATIN GRAMMY ARTISTS

Quickly learn basic Spanish vocabulary with exciting, colorful, and addictive game play through Spanish School Bus for Kids! The Spanish School Bus is the beloved learning tool that has been used by families and teachers for more than a decade, reaching over 1 million users worldwide. 

Inspired by Award-winning instructor Yvette Montalvo and her Montessori-based approach, this app is perfect to help young learners expand their world knowledge while strengthening their Spanish vocabulary. Complete the entire curriculum while unlocking fun-filled achievements along the way!

This product goes well beyond the instruction of basic vocabulary, and aims to inspire a passion for the beautiful Spanish language through introduction of historical figures, landmarks, and catchy songs that kids and parents alike can sing along to. Relevant to any beginning Spanish audience, with special emphasis on accelerating language learning potential in children from Pre-K to 6th grade, this app puts your child on the fast-track to becoming bilingual.

After completing the Vocab Course and Numbers Course for young learners, try the Verbs Course for middle school students and above. Give the Spanish School Bus a try, and see why Parents Latina Magazine has named the Spanish School Bus platform one of the top 5 apps to learn Spanish!!!

Note: This product is now offered as a monthly subscription product, with content updates throughout the year, cancel anytime. (existing customers maintain all existing in-app purchases)

‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢

APP FEATURES:

‚Ä¢ For Beginning Learners, achieve mastery of 300 of the most commonly used nouns, verbs, and adjectives while having a blast doing it! Continue to the Numbers course to master counting in Spanish!

‚Ä¢ For Intermediate Learners, the Verbs Course offers a special emphasis on learning verb tenses that correspond to an Intro to Spanish level course at the middle, high, or college level.

‚Ä¢ 240+ levels including basic vocab topics such as Numbers, Colors, Animals, Food, and more; and a verb topics like AR, ER, and IR verbs in the Present and Past Tense.

‚Ä¢ Addictive game play consisting of four modes: Learning and Memorization, Quick Choice, Matching, and Pi√±ata Mode!

‚Ä¢ 75+ unlockable achievements to track your progress, each including interesting and relevant Fun Facts about Spanish and Latin American culture, along with national treasures and iconic animals. ‚Ä®

‚Ä¢ 12 engaging and educational Spanish music songs included in a single MEGA MUSIC VIDEO, which can be enjoyed on your iPad or iPhone, or shared via Apple TV in a classroom setting!

‚Ä¢ Verb conjugation tool to look-up the most common verbs and how to apply them.

‚Ä¢ Two-player mode to allow more than one user on a single app install and track progress separately.

‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢

ABOUT SPANISH SCHOOL BUS LLC AND INSTRUCTOR YVETTE MONTALVO:

The Spanish School Bus LLC is a family-owned children‚Äôs publishing company based in Austin, Texas. We pride ourselves on delivering meaningful and educational content for children to expand their knowledge, imagination, and passion for learning. We are committed to providing high quality products for families looking to learn together.

Spanish School Bus for Kids was developed with 20+ years of teaching insight from certified Montessori instructor Yvette Montalvo, founder of Mariposas Spanish School in Austin. Profesora Montalvo is a native of the southern US and Monterrey, Mexico.

‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢

Website
www.spanishschoolbus.com

Product Feedback and Support:
hello@spanishschoolbus.com

Privacy Policy: 
Protecting your private information is our priority. To read our App Privacy Policy, please go to http://www.spanishschoolbus.com/privacy

title: Most Common Spanish Words
description:
3000 words are all you need to easily express yourself and have everyday conversations in a language. This app has all the most common Spanish ones, always available on your phone, even while offline.
123416 example sentences to put words into context, with pronunciations
Filter by Levels (A1, A2, B1, B2), Topics, Top 100 Groups, and Parts of Speech
Study without even opening the app, even on your watch, with flexibly scheduled notifications
Flashcard autoplay and auto-pronounce loops over your flashcards for times when you cannot use your hands
Practice with your favorite quiz types to master all words

title: Wlingua - Learn French
description:
Learning French has never been so easy. It's perfect for you, whether you already have a beginner, basic, intermediate, or advanced level of French. Thanks to our online French courses, you‚Äôll notice your French improving very quickly. Millions of students have already tried our courses. Would you like to join them?

Our Online French Courses:

French Course In this course you will learn French from scratch. Guaranteed! Regardless of the level you start from, it is designed to help you learn French from day one. French Pronunciation Course The French alphabet has 26 letters, but more than 30 different sounds! In this course you will be able to learn to distinguish them, see example words of each of them, and practice all of them using various exercises.

Our Learning Method:

A learning process designed for you that is both easy and guided: You‚Äôll feel like you‚Äôre learning more and more French every day. Every sentence, exercise, review, and reading has been carefully selected for you. Audio clips in French: A wide variety of accents with clear, crisp pronunciation. Recorded by professional narrators. Linked concepts: Each word is linked to its use or precise meaning. When you click on the words in each sentence, exercise, or reading, their meaning or an explanation of their use will appear. Lesson structure: Concepts are introduced progressively throughout the course. Only concepts that are explained in the course are used to create the content (sentences, exercises or readings). Vocabulary: Learn the meaning, pronunciation, and use of words with activities adapted to your progress. Grammar exercises: Practice your grammar with exercises linked to explanations. Vocabulary topics: Words are grouped by topic categories. Spaced reviews: Review the vocabulary and grammar at increasingly long intervals. Search function: Find whatever you‚Äôre looking for, including vocabulary and grammar. Reading comprehension texts (readings): Learn and practice with conversations, news, emails, and interviews, among others. Certificates: Earn a certificate that proves your knowledge at the end of each level. Account types: ‚úî Basic: With a Basic account, the course is free, but has some limitations. ‚úî Premium: With a Premium account, you‚Äôll have access to all course content and activities. At Wlingua, we work hard every day to offer you a quality French app that will help you in your work, with that upcoming exam, on your vacation, in communicating with people from around the world... Download our app to learn French!

title: Learn French - Speak French
description:
Start learning French üá´üá∑ quickly and effectively with Mondly‚Äôs free daily lessons! In just minutes you‚Äôll start memorizing core French words, form sentences, learn to speak French phrases and take part in conversations. You‚Äôll feel like having your own French language tutor in your pocket. Loved and trusted worldwide üèÜ Mondly was named "Editors‚Äô Choice" in Google Play and "App of the Year" by Facebook. üåç Beginner or advanced learner, traveler or business professional - This French app works great and dynamically adjusts to your needs. Join over 50 million people that are learning new languages from their mother tongue! Why Mondly? Because we build bridges between people by making language learning fun and easy through technological innovation. TRY MONDLY ‚òÖ "The closest thing to classroom education." ‚Äî Bloomberg ‚òÖ "A practical approach to language learning likely to be widely adopted." ‚Äî Forbes ‚òÖ "The new way to learn languages ." ‚Äî Inc. ‚òÖ "Mondly is like having a private tutor." ‚Äî CNN _____________________

This is how the future of language courses looks like

Our French language learning app gets you started with a basic conversation between two people. You quickly start memorizing core words, use them to build sentences and phrases, and at the end of a 45-minutes module you are able to reconstruct that conversation with your own voice. It‚Äôs an effective way to learn French phrases. State-of-the-art Natural Speech Recognition and Spaced Repetition Algorithms make our French learning app effective for learning languages.

Here are the key features that make Mondly a great tutor for you:

‚úì Crystal-clear audio and professional voice actors. ¬ª Learn the right French pronunciation from conversations between native speakers. ‚úì State-of-the-art Speech Recognition. ¬ª Mondly knows exactly how to listen to your French words and phrases. You will only get a positive feedback if you speak French clearly and correctly. This will improve your pronunciation. ‚úì Useful phrases for real situations. ¬ª Memorizing hundreds of isolated words is not the way to go when it comes to learning French. Mondly teaches you French vocabulary by offering you core words and phrases. Our French language learning apps break the learning process down into short lessons and puts them into themed packs. ‚úì Learn conversational French. ¬ª Conversation is the main reason to take this free course. It will help you build a core French vocabulary with widely-used nouns and verbs, and speak French clearly. ‚úì Verb conjugations. ¬ª If you want to learn French grammar during this course, just tap the French verbs and get the full conjugation on the screen, including the translation. It‚Äôs faster and better than a dictionary. ‚úì Advanced Statistics. ¬ª Our French learning apps use intelligent reporting, so you can always follow your progress. Build your vocabulary step by step and become better daily. ‚úì The Leaderboard. ¬ª See how your friends are doing and compete with people from all over the world to become the best learner in the Mondly community family. Take the Weekly Quiz to become even better. ‚úì Adaptive Learning. ¬ª Learning French is different from person to person. So we taught the app to learn from your way of learning. After little time spent together, Mondly will understand what suits you best and it will become your own guide and customized teacher. ‚òÖ Before you know it, at the end of these French lessons, you will master the most useful 5000 words and phrases and you will be on the fast lane to learning a new language. Continue learning with Mondly: ‚Ä¢ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mondlylanguages ‚Ä¢ Twitter: https://twitter.com/MondlyLanguages ‚Ä¢ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mondlylanguages

title: Learn French - Beginners
description:
Want to learn French online for free? Join over 30 million people who have chosen to study with the BNR Languages apps!

French for beginners ‚Äî designed for anyone who wants to learn French from scratch and study at their own pace, in a simple and practical way.

With interactive activities and native audio to help with pronunciation and listening comprehension, you'll learn French quickly and intuitively.

Study on your own, in your own time, with no daily limits. Choose what you want to practice: reading, writing, listening, or vocabulary. Everything is easy to use and personalized for you.

Exercises use images to help you memorize words, and the review mode lets you practice and refresh everything you've already learned ‚Äî anytime you want.

Learning a new language has never been easier, more accessible, and 100% free!

Find out why our app is the ideal choice to study anytime, anywhere:

- Complete offline French course ‚Äî from beginner to advanced levels.

- Learn on your own! Study French independently, at your own pace, without needing teachers or tutors.

- 100% free! All content and features are available for free ‚Äî you don't need to pay to learn!

- Start from the very beginning, learning the alphabet!

- Set your own study time. Learn as much as you want ‚Äî no time limits! No daily activity limits! Practice and learn as many times as you like every day!

- Large selection of words to help expand your vocabulary.

- Interactive exercises with images that make it easier to memorize new words! Learn in a fun and easy way ‚Äî with a gamified interface that makes studying feel like playing a game.

- Review mode to practice and refresh everything you've already learned.

- Native audio recordings with adjustable playback speed.

- Different types of tests! Practice your reading, writing, and listening skills.

- Full translation available in many languages: Chinese, Spanish, English, Hindi, Arabic, Bengali, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese, Korean, French, Turkish, Vietnamese, Italian, Thai, Persian, Indonesian, Urdu, Polish, Ukrainian, Malay, Uzbek, Romanian, Dutch, Greek, Czech, Hungarian, Swedish, Belarusian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Danish, Norwegian, Slovak, Finnish, Hebrew, Irish, Catalan, Swahili.

- Choose what you want to study and customize your learning experience.

- Perfect for learning French quickly ‚Äî whether for travel, work, study, or to connect with family and friends.

- Simple, intuitive, and user-friendly interface for all ages.

- No internet connection needed to learn French! The app works completely offline.

- Earn medals, track your progress, and stay motivated.

- Join the weekly ranking and compete with other users!

descriptionHTML:
Want to learn French online for free? Join over 30 million people who have chosen to study with the BNR Languages apps!

French for beginners ‚Äî designed for anyone who wants to learn French from scratch and study at their own pace, in a simple and practical way.

With interactive activities and native audio to help with pronunciation and listening comprehension, you'll learn French quickly and intuitively.

Study on your own, in your own time, with no daily limits. Choose what you want to practice: reading, writing, listening, or vocabulary. Everything is easy to use and personalized for you.

Exercises use images to help you memorize words, and the review mode lets you practice and refresh everything you've already learned ‚Äî anytime you want.

Learning a new language has never been easier, more accessible, and 100% free!

Find out why our app is the ideal choice to study anytime, anywhere:

- Complete offline French course ‚Äî from beginner to advanced levels.

- Learn on your own! Study French independently, at your own pace, without needing teachers or tutors.

- 100% free! All content and features are available for free ‚Äî you don't need to pay to learn!

- Start from the very beginning, learning the alphabet!

- Set your own study time. Learn as much as you want ‚Äî no time limits! No daily activity limits! Practice and learn as many times as you like every day!

- Large selection of words to help expand your vocabulary.

- Interactive exercises with images that make it easier to memorize new words! Learn in a fun and easy way ‚Äî with a gamified interface that makes studying feel like playing a game.

- Review mode to practice and refresh everything you've already learned.

- Native audio recordings with adjustable playback speed.

- Different types of tests! Practice your reading, writing, and listening skills.

- Full translation available in many languages: Chinese, Spanish, English, Hindi, Arabic, Bengali, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese, Korean, French, Turkish, Vietnamese, Italian, Thai, Persian, Indonesian, Urdu, Polish, Ukrainian, Malay, Uzbek, Romanian, Dutch, Greek, Czech, Hungarian, Swedish, Belarusian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Danish, Norwegian, Slovak, Finnish, Hebrew, Irish, Catalan, Swahili.

- Choose what you want to study and customize your learning experience.

- Perfect for learning French quickly ‚Äî whether for travel, work, study, or to connect with family and friends.

- Simple, intuitive, and user-friendly interface for all ages.

- No internet connection needed to learn French! The app works completely offline.

- Earn medals, track your progress, and stay motivated.

- Join the weekly ranking and compete with other users!

- New words and vocabulary categories added regularly.

Download the BNR Languages app now and start your French course!
summary: Learn French fast and on your own!

title: Learn French with Le Monde
description:
Frantastique provides daily personalized French lessons. Test Frantastique for free and get a level assessment and a personalized pedagogical report! It‚Äôs the easiest, friendliest way to learn French: 

. More than 2,000,000 people use our method
. Long-term results 
. A personalized approach 
. Modern and business French 
. Adapted for post-beginners (from 15 years old)

Personalized French Content: Frantastique lessons are based on your needs, your requests, and your level. You‚Äôll come across professional scenarios, a variety of accents, exercises and plenty of humor. 10 to 15 minutes daily is all it takes! 

Motivation, Humor and French Culture: Discover the diversity and richness of French culture around the world with the help of Victor Hugo and friends. Every day, you'll come across different accents, songs, and films in addition to original stories and texts. 

Tailored Corrections: After clicking the 'send' button, you will receive a correction with your daily score, explanations of your answers, scripts of dialogues or videos, the vocabulary you have requested and more. 

Progress: Each Frantastique lesson is built dynamically to focus on points of difficulty and your own requests, to ensure you've committed information to your long-term memory. Your French will improve effortlessly, daily and over the long term! 


You can try Frantastique for 7 days free of charge. This test is limited to the first seven days of the program, and is absolutely free and non-binding. Under no circumstances will you be registered for the full, paying version of our lessons without your explicit consent. We guarantee the confidentiality of your personal details. 

Frantastique is designed, edited and developed in its entirety by A9 SAS Gymglish.

title: French lessons - Frantastique
description:
Frantastique delivers short, personalized and fun French lessons. Our goal: your motivation, participation and progress. It‚Äôs the easiest, friendliest way to learn French.

Test Frantastique for free and get a level assessment and a personalized pedagogical report!

‚úì More than 6,000,000 users around the world 
‚úì Long-term results 
‚úì A personalized approach 
‚úì You can try Frantastique for 7 days free of charge
‚úì Adapted for post-beginners (from 15 years old)

1. Each day you'll receive a lesson adapted to your needs, capabilities and goals.

2. Once it's completed, you'll immediately receive personalized corrections and explanations.

3. Your lessons are customized based on your strengths and weaknesses.

4. You'll get a personalized learning report when you finish the course.

Learn French with Frantastique
.... .... .... .... .... ..... 

A story. On a French-speaking planet, an Intergalactic agency staffed by humans and aliens defrosts Victor Hugo to act as a guide to Francophone culture and life. But first, Victor must bring mustard from Earth in order to avoid a bloody revolution.

Learning French isn't simply learning a list of words or a set of rules - language is also culture. For each one of our language courses, we offer a setting that includes diverse characters and personalities, various accents, professional and personal situations, all with a touch of humor.
Assess your level and get certified. Our free trial includes a complete level assessment (containing an outline of your current strengths and weaknesses). You'll get a personalized learning report when you finish the French course.

For web, tablet and mobile. With apps available for iOS and Android, enjoy your French lessons whenever and wherever you like.

Motivation. With its diversity of content, Frantastique motivates and encourages users to progress my making e-learning as fun as possible - the best way to learn French.

Memorization. To consolidate acquired French knowledge, our learning method takes into account our natural tendency to forget things over time. For long-term memorization, our system designs an optimized revision schedule for each student.

Explore a new culture. Each of our French lessons ends with a "dessert": an authentic clip of can't-miss francophone culture. Film, music, literature or television allow you to finish your workout in style.

...... ...... ...... ...... ...... 

Learn French with Frantastique now. Try the first 7 days of Frantastique free of charge. The trial is absolutely free and non-binding. Under no circumstances will you be registered for the full, paying version of our lessons without your explicit consent. We guarantee the confidentiality of your personal details. 

Our French lessons are created in-house by our international pedagogical team. The program is designed so that you can learn French efficiently in the long run. Frantastique is developed in its entirety by A9 SAS Gymglish.

title: Learn French Daily with Readle
description:
Your French Learning App for Daily French Language News & Stories. Teacher-Crafted. Student-Ready.

Readle is a language learning app with real-world news & stories. It is the world's first CEFR-graded reader to help you learn French. Easily read & listen to news & stories anytime, anywhere ‚Äì Take 5 minutes a day to learn French. === Why you should learn French with this French Learning App ‚Ä¢ Our language experts turn real-world news & stories into fun & bite-sized A1 ‚Äì B2 French learning courses tailored to your level. ‚Ä¢ Your best companion for reading, listening, comprehension & flashcard vocabulary training with thousands of story courses. Download Readle for FREE and start to learn French the new way! ============== Learn languages with the Readle French Learning App, and be a part of the revolution: ‚ñ∫ LEARN FRENCH EFFECTIVELY THROUGH IMMERSION Use our scientifically proven immersion method to learn French and create a real learning habit. Real-world stories & news curated by our language experts and turned into French classes ranging from A1 A2 B1 B2 levels. ‚ñ∫ BITE-SIZED STORY LANGUAGE LEARNING COURSES +2000 interesting stories & news for you to learn French. Readle allows you to learn them effectively in context, including grammar tips and vocabulary flashcard training. ‚ñ∫ PERFECT PRONUNCIATION Listen to the story audio sentence by sentence. It will help you practice pronunciation and improve your listening skills. ‚ñ∫ INSTANT DICTIONARY Quickly look up a word translation in every article with a tap on the word ‚Äì the easiest way to learn vocabulary, phrases, verbs, and conjugation. Save your time switching between, Reverso, Leo, Duden, or other French dictionaries. ‚ñ∫ GRAMMAR HELPER French grammar helpers in each language learning course bring your grammar into action. Learn French grammar quickly from the story context with real examples. ‚ñ∫ VOCABULARY LIST & FLASHCARDS Learn French vocabulary or verb conjugation in the story courses. Use spaced repetition to study a word ‚Äì a scientifically proven learning method to review and recall vocabulary at an optimal time. ‚ñ∫ QUIZ FOR COMPREHENSION Test your reading comprehension and practice French grammar, vocabulary, and articles (el & la) with quizzes in each story ‚Äì a great way to challenge your French language skills and prepare yourself for Pipplet, TFI, DELF, DALF or other French language learning exams. ‚ñ∫ STORY LIBRARY & DAILY NEW STORIES 2000+ news & stories courses for you to learn French in a wide range of topics that are available for your French learning: - Travel - Culture - Food - Latest News - Transportation - Entertainment - Science and Medical - Technology - People - Parties Plus many more ‚Äì add on a daily basis! Readle is a must-have French learning app for living and traveling in French-speaking countries. Download Readle now and start to learn French! Questions or comments about learning with Readle? Please email us at support@readle-app.com Privacy policy: https://readle-app.com/privacy-policy/ Terms of use: https://readle-app.com/term-of-use/ Readle is the best companion for your language learning education & upcoming language learning tests to get ahead. Download Readle and start to learn French!

title: Learn French Fast: Course
description:
So, you want to learn French in no time? You need MosaLingua! 
Innovative, easy and effective, our SRS-based application has helped more than 13,000,000 people all over the world learn languages in only 10 minutes per day - with actual results!

Learn more about MosaLingua Learn French app and its effective SRS system by watching the demonstration video on https://mosalingua.com.

Feel free to try our smartphone application Learn French you'll see for yourself how well it works! It's a powerful, easy and effective tool - ideal for people who want to speak French in no time, without taking long, boring language courses or a French translator.

It's useful in any situation: our method can help you learning French quickly while you travel in France or Paris, in the workplace, and in everyday life with our courses that suit your language needs.

THE BENEFITS OF MOSALINGUA: 
1) Useful, practical content to learn French words, French verbs, and French pronunciation
Don't waste your time with notions, courses, or a French dictionary that won't help you learning French. Instead, learn the 20% of the language that you'll use 80% of the time in France or Paris. Better than using a French translator!

2) An innovative method based on scientific research
Our international team is made up of expert polyglots who've used the most modern and proven learning, memorization and consolidation techniques (SRS, active recall, metacognition, etc.).

3) Coaching throughout the learning process
To succeed, you can count on our review sessions that consolidate what you've learned, our mini French lessons, and our advice for better understanding French vocabulary, French verbs, and French pronunciation.

4) Learn French words quickly and have fun at the same time!
Achieve great results and have fun doing so: your progress will boost your MOTIVATION, which is key to any learning plan.

Our French app includes all these add-ons and features:
 ‚òÖ +3000 flash cards: useful phrases and words for communicating and comprehending native French speakers. 
 ‚òÖ Audio pronunciation: our French learning app include phrases and words pronounced by native French speakers. 
 ‚òÖ 37 dialogues: our French app contains 37 dialogues that depict common occurrences that happen during everyday life, professional situations and travel. 
 ‚òÖ Tips and tricks for learning French: to progress your learning level faster and more efficiently. 
 ‚òÖ Essential grammar: pronouns, connectors, and soon to be added on the list‚Äìmini grammar lessons!


Using MosaLingua‚Äôs highly addictive and effective method to learn French, you will be able to memorize a large amount of key phrases and vocabulary in no time


If you want to learn French, download the MosaLingua Learn French app and try it free ‚Äì you won't regret it!

title: Learn French ‚Äì Studycat
description:
From the award-winning creators of Studycat for Schools, comes Learn French! The #1 way for kids to learn fran√ßais!

From preschool and beyond, Learn French by Studycat inspires children's innate love of learning with interactive games and activities.

Our bite-sized lessons will keep your child motivated while they discover a new language and build bilingual skills for a lifetime!

WHY STUDYCAT?

‚Ä¢ Learn French, in French. All our activities focus on virtual language immersion, which means your child won't be hearing any English, only French! This might be confusing at first, but trust us, it's the best way to learn.

‚Ä¢ Everyday Language. Our lessons teach words and expressions that kids can apply in their everyday lives, so they can get a head start developing their bilingual abilities.

‚Ä¢ Get Talking Fast. With our interactive speaking challenges, kids will be encouraged to speak entire words and phrases on their own! The earlier kids start their language-learning journey, the more likely they are to reach proficiency quickly.

‚Ä¢ Vocal Variety. Our characters' voices use different tones, expressions, and accents so that kids can pick up on the subtleties of pronunciation from different speakers.

‚Ä¢ Designed by Experts. All our activities are designed by language and early-education experts. Thoughtfully developed lessons will build your child's confidence with every step.

‚Ä¢ Learner Profiles (coming soon). Create up to four personalized profiles for different family members, allowing tailored learning paths and individual progress tracking.

‚Ä¢ Safe for Kids & Ad-Free. Parents can rest easy knowing that there are no pesky ads to distract children from their learning. All content is appropriate for ages 3 and up.

‚Ä¢ Offline Learning. On a plane, at a restaurant, or in a park? No problem! Learn French by Studycat is available for both online and offline use.

WHAT ARE PARENTS SAYING?

‚ÄúAs a parent trying to raise bilingual children at home, Studycat is a helpful app to start them off and create excitement about the language.‚Äù ‚Äî Fluent in 3 Months

‚ÄúEverything has been thought out carefully and the games and activities are really engaging.‚Äù ‚Äî Bilingual Kidspot

‚ÄúThe concept is so simple but extremely effective. I even found myself learning at the same time.‚Äù ‚Äî Bump, Baby & You

--

If you like Learn French by Studycat, try it out for 7 days free! Empower your child to learn like never before, and get extras like printable worksheets.

If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Privacy Policy: https://studycat.com/about/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: https://studycat.com/about/terms-of-use/

title: Dr French, French grammar
description: Dr French is the ultimate app to learn and review French grammar. In this easy-to-use and intuitive app, the content is organized by topic and level. You will find simple and straight forward lessons with translated examples, as well as exercises to practice what you learn and strengthen your skills. With Dr French, French grammar becomes easy! What is Dr French? ‚Ä¢ Over 240 lessons and 700 exercises ‚Ä¢ Content organized by topics and levels ‚Ä¢ A "Homework" section ‚Ä¢ Lessons suggested to you according to your skills and your learning pace to ensure a steady progression ‚Ä¢ A search bar: search for a word or concept you have trouble with ‚Ä¢ Offline access ‚Ä¢ Lessons available in French, English and Chinese (simplified and traditional characters) ‚Ä¢ No advertisement or unwanted notifications ‚Ä¢ A responsive team Dr French was developed by teachers of French as a foreign language with a view to helping learners from all over the world understand the workings of French grammar. 241 lessons: short and straightforward lessons with over 1000 translated examples, in order to answer ALL your grammar questions. 700 exercises: stimulating exercises to practice what you learn and strengthen your skills, with over 5500 questions. Easy and efficient: the lessons are organized by topic and level. Read the lesson, then do the exercises! Homework: add lessons to your homework and review them when you want. The doctor‚Äôs suggestions: to ensure a regular progression, you can ask Dr French to automatically add lessons to your homework, at the frequency and level of your choosing. Offline access: review French grammar anywhere: on the bus, on the tube, at home or between two meetings. A search bar: using the search bar, you can now enter a word or a notion that you are interested in and directly access the relevant lessons. 4 languages: the content of Dr French is available in French, English, Portuguese and Mandarin Chinese (simplified or traditional characters) in order to enable you to understand the explanations regardless of your level. Over 1000 examples have been translated to ensure a perfect understanding of the grammatical issues at hand. No advertisement or unwanted notifications: The developers of Dr French have given priority to a maximal comfort of use and have removed all undesirable stimulation liable to disturb the learning process. Grammar and only grammar: Dr French focuses on French grammar, and not on vocabulary. There are many other apps out there to help you learn and review French vocabulary! A responsive team: if you encounter any problem with the app, our team is here to answer your questions! We do not use pop-ups to get you to rate our app, so if you like Dr French, please come and rate it! Do you want to learn French? Do you want to learn French grammar? With Dr French, French grammar becomes easy!
descriptionHTML:
Dr French is the ultimate app to learn and review French grammar. In this easy-to-use and intuitive app, the content is organized by topic and level. You will find simple and straight forward lessons with translated examples, as well as exercises to practice what you learn and strengthen your skills.
With Dr French, French grammar becomes easy!

What is Dr French?

‚Ä¢ Over 240 lessons and 700 exercises
‚Ä¢ Content organized by topics and levels
‚Ä¢ A "Homework" section
‚Ä¢ Lessons suggested to you according to your skills and your learning pace to ensure a steady progression
‚Ä¢ A search bar: search for a word or concept you have trouble with
‚Ä¢ Offline access
‚Ä¢ Lessons available in French, English and Chinese (simplified and traditional characters)
‚Ä¢ No advertisement or unwanted notifications
‚Ä¢ A responsive team

Dr French was developed by teachers of French as a foreign language with a view to helping learners from all over the world understand the workings of French grammar.

241 lessons: short and straightforward lessons with over 1000 translated examples, in order to answer ALL your grammar questions.

700 exercises: stimulating exercises to practice what you learn and strengthen your skills, with over 5500 questions.

Easy and efficient: the lessons are organized by topic and level. Read the lesson, then do the exercises!

Homework: add lessons to your homework and review them when you want.

The doctor‚Äôs suggestions: to ensure a regular progression, you can ask Dr French to automatically add lessons to your homework, at the frequency and level of your choosing.

Offline access: review French grammar anywhere: on the bus, on the tube, at home or between two meetings.

A search bar: using the search bar, you can now enter a word or a notion that you are interested in and directly access the relevant lessons.

4 languages: the content of Dr French is available in French, English, Portuguese and Mandarin Chinese (simplified or traditional characters) in order to enable you to understand the explanations regardless of your level. Over 1000 examples have been translated to ensure a perfect understanding of the grammatical issues at hand.

No advertisement or unwanted notifications: The developers of Dr French have given priority to a maximal comfort of use and have removed all undesirable stimulation liable to disturb the learning process.

Grammar and only grammar: Dr French focuses on French grammar, and not on vocabulary. There are many other apps out there to help you learn and review French vocabulary!

A responsive team: if you encounter any problem with the app, our team is here to answer your questions!

We do not use pop-ups to get you to rate our app, so if you like Dr French, please come and rate it!

Do you want to learn French? Do you want to learn French grammar? With Dr French, French grammar becomes easy!
summary:
The complete guide to French grammar
Over 240 lessons and 700 exercises

title: Conjuu - French Conjugation
description:
Learning verb conjugations is fundamental to mastering the French language.

Perfect your spellings of all verb tenses, from the most commonly used to those more advanced. Verbs and tenses are organised into logical groups, as well as regular and irregular forms, allowing you to customise the test to best suit your learning.

A must have for students learning French of all levels from high school to university and anybody preparing for a French proficiency exam.

# Features
- Learn all irregular forms, accents and spellings.
- Contains over 600 most commonly used verbs with full conjugation tables.
- Fully personalisable verbs and tenses.
- Explanation and usage examples on every tense.
- French - English translation.
- Intelligently tests you on the verbs you need to practice the most.
- Word pronunciation to improve memorisation.

# Why use Conjuu to learn French conjugations?
Conjuu breaks the task of learning conjugation into little bite sized tests, allowing you to focus on just the areas you need to improve on. Your answers are checked straight away to improve your certainty and assuredness. When in pressured situations like speaking, you will be able to recall the correct conjugation with confidence.


# Conjuu can be used for free to learn the basic two tenses.

title: Most Common French Words
description:
3000 words are all you need to easily express yourself and have everyday conversations in a language. This app has all the most common French ones, always available on your phone, even while offline.
121536 example sentences to put words into context, with pronunciations
Filter by Levels (A1, A2, B1, B2), Topics, Top 100 Groups, and Parts of Speech
Study without even opening the app, even on your watch, with flexibly scheduled notifications
Flashcard autoplay and auto-pronounce loops over your flashcards for times when you cannot use your hands
Practice with your favorite quiz types to master all words

title: Learn French | LingQ
description:
Transform the way you learn French.

 LingQ helps you grow your French vocabulary and improve your comprehension faster than you ever have before. Dive into a world of authentic French content and take charge of your own language journey to get results.

LingQ provides a fun and effective French learning experience for all language learners, from beginner to advanced. Start with basic lessons and quickly progress by exploring authentic content that captivates you.

Discover the Power of LingQ:
‚úÖ Massive Content Library: Immerse yourself in thousands of hours of French lessons generated from podcasts, books, interviews, and more ‚Äì all with matching text to help you listen and read your way to success.

‚úÖ Import Your Own Content: Turn your favorite Netflix shows, YouTube videos, podcasts, books, and web articles into personalized French lessons. With the help of AI, read, listen, and learn from content you enjoy.

‚úÖ Powerful Reader: LingQ‚Äôs optimized reading interface is the most effective way to read and grow your French vocabulary. LingQ tracks all the words you encounter and gives you the tools to learn them fast.

‚úÖ Interactive Learning: Listen to lessons, follow along in the text, and look up new words instantly. Track your vocabulary growth as you learn in real-time.

‚úÖ Comprehensive Progress Tracking: Monitor your French learning activities, including listening, reading, study time, and vocabulary growth. Track your progress and stay motivated!

‚úÖ Learn Anytime, Anywhere: With LingQ, your learning never stops. Our app lets you study offline and syncs your progress when you‚Äôre back online. Make the most of your downtime by learning on the go.

Advanced Learning Tools and Features:

SRS Vocabulary Review: Reinforce your learning with our SRS (Spaced Repetition System) based vocabulary review.
Simplify French Lessons with Artificial Intelligence: Create beginner-friendly lessons from any content you find online.
Personalized Playlists: Easily listen to your lessons on the go, synced across all apps.
Karaoke Mode: Improve your comprehension by reading along as you listen.
Challenges: Join French challenges and challenge yourself and others in the community. Build a habit, set goals, and stay motivated as you track your progress and achievements. How are you doing versus others in the community?

üìö Built by Language Learners, for Language Learners
LingQ was co-founded by Steve Kaufmann, a renowned polyglot who has learned 20 languages. Often called the ""Godfather of Language Learning,"" he shares valuable tips on his YouTube channel.

Steve‚Äôs YouTube Channel: www.youtube.com/user/lingosteve

Get LingQ Premium and Accelerate Your Learning:
‚úîÔ∏è Unlimited vocabulary lookup and SRS review
‚úîÔ∏è Comprehensive word tracking to boost your progress
‚úîÔ∏è Unlimited importing of content
‚úîÔ∏è Access to AI features

Start your French learning journey with LingQ today!
Visit us at www.lingq.com and discover a smarter way to learn languages.

title: Learn French fast - Lilata
description:
Lilata is a French learning app designed to help adults start speaking the language quickly. By committing just 10 minutes daily, you can learn French through our scientifically proven teaching methods that ensure the easiest way to absorb and apply new language skills. The course is packed with the most useful words, phrases, and grammar tips that every beginner needs to speak French confidently.

Using our game-like, fun lessons, you will learn French from every angle:
* How words and phrases are used in real-life situations. Each phrase is accompanied by sound and plenty of examples.
* How to build sentences like a native.
* How to speak confidently. Our brilliant speech recognition system will help you practice your pronunciation.
* How to write correctly. You'll have the opportunity to elevate your skills with practical exercises and flashcards.

Lilata is more than just a learning tool, it's your personal language tutor and the best app for learning French on your own. It will let you know when you need to learn something new and when to review previous material. This keeps the daily lessons fresh and ensures long-term memorization as you practice. Additionally, Lilata calculates and displays your progress along the way.

A scientifically proven approach to memorizing vocabulary. Lilata‚Äôs learning curriculum is based on the principle of interval repetition at optimal points of the Ebbinghaus Curve of Forgetting. This method, similar to drops of knowledge in traditional flashcards, helps you retain what you learn and keep moving forward in your journey to master the language. This makes Lilata also a great brain training tool, enhancing cognitive functions while you learn.

Don‚Äôt know any French? That‚Äôs ok! Lilata is the best French language app for beginners. It builds a learning habit by making lessons easy and enjoyable. Whether you're learning basic vocabulary, grammar, or taking a comprehensive learning approach, Lilata is designed to cater to all your language needs. After completing the basic course of the application, you will be able to understand the most common everyday phrases and continue your journey to fluency.
 
Lilata‚Äôs approach makes your learning experience efficient and effective. As you make headway through the course, you‚Äôll find yourself able to speak and understand French with ease. Like your own Rosetta Stone, Lilata helps you decode the French language in the most straightforward way possible.

Learn French and elevate your language skills with Lilata. It's fun, effective, and free to start. Picture this: you‚Äôre sitting in a charming Parisian caf√©, confidently ordering drinks, chatting with locals, and understanding every word. Brilliant! Just a few drops of practice each day with Lilata will make this vision a reality.

Download the app and try it for free today!

Learn more about Lilata at https://lilata.com

title: Learn French with flashcards!
description:
ReWord is a highly effective foreign language learning app. It is your best tool to learn French and improve your vocabulary. Did you know you can learn languages just taking 5-10 minutes a day? With our interval system, your French lessons will reach a new level. And will give you greater results, of course!

As with any other language, French lessons must include learning French grammar and memorizing new French words. However, one of the problems with foreign language learning is you can‚Äôt achieve good results if you don‚Äôt systematize the memorizing.
With ReWord, you get a dedicated system and will memorize new French words without much effort on your part.

Features:
‚Ä¢ 5000 words vocabulary. Thousands of French words and phrases divided into thematic categories: choose the category you want to learn this time and change it whenever you want.
‚Ä¢ Add your own words and categories easily: you can create your own word base you want to master first.
‚Ä¢ Handy French flashcards with pictures and example sentences: helpful mental shortcuts to build your vocabulary and understand the nuances of word meaning and how these words are used in real practice.
‚Ä¢ Spaced repetitions really work: ReWord has a science-based approach to memorizing foreign words so you can learn languages at the highest efficiency.
‚Ä¢ Tracking your progress: set your daily goal and keep achieving it every day.
‚Ä¢ Learn French offline: now it is possible to improve your vocab wherever you go.

Yes, with ReWord, memorizing new words is extremely easy and utterly efficient!

Use the app at least twice a day, with regular breaks every few hours. Start with just five words a day and you will have at least 1,825 new words in your active vocabulary within a year. Increase your daily goal, take more French lessons, and you will accelerate your progress and learn French even faster.
ReWord ‚Äì your best foreign language learning app! We are here to help you learn languages in a hassle-free way! Start to speak French!

Play, Learn and Speak ‚Äì discover common phrases for daily French conversation!
‚úî 5,000 useful phrases for conversation.
‚úî Learn French in your tongue (60 languages available).
‚úî Best FREE app for learning fast.

Speak French Fluently in Real Conversations
With Learn French application, you can now explore over 5,000 French phrases for short daily conversations while having absolutely pure fun! Whether you‚Äôre a tourist having a vacation in an French speaking country or someone who just wants to speak a foreign language, this application will help you learn French phrases in a fast, easy and enjoyable way.

Why Our FREE App is Different
‚úî No internet connection required ‚Äì play where you want and when you want (offline).
‚úî 5,000 common phrases ‚Äì audio pronunciations and phonetic transcriptions to show you how native speaker from France actually pronounce them.
‚úî 11 fun games ‚Äì a innovative approach to practice your listening, writing and speaking skills.
‚úî 4 levels for learning: beginner, intermediate, advanced and expert.
‚úî 20 topics divided into 145 subtopics ‚Äì so you‚Äôll know what and when to say each phrase.

More Features to Improve Your French Speaking Vocabulary
‚úî Search and bookmark your most common expressions from the phrasebook.
‚úî Earn points as your French skills progress.
‚úî ‚ÄúRandom Categories‚Äù feature to randomly select the topic, subtopic and game.
‚úî 60 languages ‚Äìso you could understand and speak each phrase easily regardless of which country you‚Äôre from.

About FunEasyLearn:
Fun Easy Learn has developed many applications to help people around the world learn foreign languages for free. Fun Easy Learn applications improve your French skills: speaking, listening and grammar. The dictionary of the apps has human voice pronunciation for each common phrase to improve your speaking skill.

Speak French easily and fluently for travel, business or fun!

title: Drops: Learn French
description:
What if üá´üá∑ French vocabulary learning would be a crazy fun game instead of boring memorisation drills? Drops makes language learning an effortless fun. Practical vocabulary is bound to your memories through beautiful graphics and quick mini-games.
The crazy part? You have only 5 mins per day. Might sound insane but works like charm! :)
These are the ingredients of the secret sauce:
üëÄ 100% illustrated: Pictures directly carry the meaning -  you don‚Äôt have to use your native language at all! No intermediary. Faster, more effective and of course more fun! :)
üèé 5 min sessions: limiting practice time sounds crazy but it it makes it incredibly addictive - which is cool thing for learning. The barrier of entry is close to zero so you can‚Äôt have any excuses: you‚Äôll have 5 minutes even on the busiest day!
üïπ Effortless play: We know why games are fun and addictive and distilled the essence into Drops. The result is a truly immersive experience but it‚Äôs not waste of your time while you play because you build a valuable knowledge.
‚ö°Qucik: Keyboard typing is painfully slow. Welcome rapid swipes and taps! Trust us, you‚Äôll need those extra seconds during the quick learning session ;)
üéØ Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just handpicked practical words. That‚Äôs our focus and we do it extremely well. The app teaches the Korean ‚Äúalphabet‚Äù Hangul (hangoul) too!
üíÅForge a habit: Drops wants to make you language learning addict. Effectiveness is nothing without a well established habit. We help you build one!
We are extremely proud of our lovely word pronunciations by seasoned voice talents!
Drops is free for casual learners: more than 1700 words in 99 topics are all available for everyone. Hardcore language learners can subscribe for premium to progress faster with unlimited learning time. Subscriptions start from $2.99 / month.
 
üåç Our goal is to empower people of the world via language knowledge by providing a special tool that utilizes the universal language we all speak: pictures.
 
 
p.s.: be careful, this app really can get you addicted to to language learning.
 
-----------------
üòç If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :)
 
Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

title: Learn Languages - FunEasyLearn
description: Learn English, Spanish, German, Chinese, French, Russian, or other 28 languages offline with FunEasyLearn. Learn to READ üìñ WRITE ‚úç SPEAK üó£ a language in a fun & easy way. Discover the biggest language learning courses ever so you can easily learn all the reading rules, all the necessary words and all the useful phrases. Contents: üî† ALPHABET (Letters + All Reading Rules + Exceptions): read any word in a new language; üÜï ALL WORDS (continuously updated): nouns, verbs, adjectives, etc. categorized into 26 topics and 157 subtopics; üàö 5,000 PHRASES (frequently used): categorized into 20 topics and 120 subtopics that cover any daily life or travelling situations. You can learn 34 languages: English, American English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Romanian, Russian, Arabic, Bulgarian, Catalan, Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, Slovak, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian. The above-listed languages can be learned from 62 mother tongues. Why FunEasyLearn app? ü¶Ñ At FunEasyLearn, we use science throughout the creation of the entire language learning process, so you could memorize the words and phrases more quickly. We were inspired by TOP 3,000 most used words, when we started developing our language learning app. Soon we got our own vision of what a vocabulary builder and a set of phrases for conversation should look like. After a long process of linguistic research, manual categorization and strategical selection of each word and phrase, we‚Äôve created a unique language learning system. This learning system is an effective and fast way to improve your reading, writing, listening and speaking skills. Track your progress, earn flowers & bees, and use them as payment for a FREE subscription. Review smartly everything you learn and pass exams to be at the top of the FunEasyLearn leaderboard. Top featuresüèÖ ‚òÖ Created with certified translators & professional voice actors from all over the world; ‚òÖ Designed with hand-drawn illustrations that will be appreciated both by kids and adults; Learn a language with FunEasyLearn Have an effortless experience anywhere in the world. Learn how to order a meal in a restaurant, ask for directions, carry out a conversation, do business and always say the right sentences and expressions. Improve your pronunciation in a foreign language with our professional audio recordings and Speech Recognition. The ‚ÄúLearn Languages‚Äù app from FunEasyLearn can also be called a dictionary that contains an alphabet, many words and a phrasebook. Learn and play offline. Study anything you want without being forced to complete a lesson. -------- Our mission is to bring all languages under one roof. Mums, dads, kids, students or teachers, get the free education you deserve with the FunEasyLearn app. -------- Download the FunEasyLearn app right now! Share some love with our new language learning app! Review & rate us! It would mean a lot to our team! Be our friend, feel free to contact us: https://www.funeasylearn.com/ https://www.facebook.com/FunEasyLearn https://www.instagram.com/funeasylearn/

title: Rocket: Learn Languages
description:
Learn Spanish, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Mandarin, Korean (and more) anytime and anywhere with Rocket Languages.

GET STARTED FOR FREE
Sign up for a free trial and see for yourself how quickly you'll be speaking another language!

WE DO LANGUAGE LEARNING LIKE NO ONE ELSE

We take you to the heart of the language you're passionate about and give you everything you need to understand the language and the culture like a local.


Each full level has:
‚Ä¢ Over 60 hours of Audio lessons
‚Ä¢ Over 60 hours of Language & Culture lessons
‚Ä¢ Plenty of Writing lessons (script languages only)
‚Ä¢ Voice Recognition that lets you perfect your pronunciation on the thousands of phrases in every course
‚Ä¢ 24/7 lifetime access with free upgrades
‚Ä¢ All of your progress is synchronized across all of your devices

HAVE LIFETIME ACCESS TO YOUR COURSE.
A new language can be yours for life, and we believe your language course should be too. With Rocket Languages, you can come back in a month, a year or even a decade and still have full access to your courses. You'll also get all of the updates and improvements that we make for free!

PERFECT YOUR PRONUNCIATION.
If you can pronounce words correctly, then you know you'll be understood by the locals - which is why we teach you to talk just like they do. With our courses, you can check your pronunciation using our state-of-the-art voice recognition system and to native speaker audio of thousands of useful words and phrases.

PRACTICE ON-THE-SPOT SPEAKING.
Many new language learners feel nervous about talking to native speakers, so we've created the perfect activity to address this problem. It lets you practice both sides of common conversations in a comfortable, stress-free environment, so that you're ready to respond when you're out in the real world.

LESSON LIST
Remember what you cover.
You'll put a lot of time into learning your new language, so we make sure you can remember it all by including fun and engaging activities in every lesson. These activities use algorithms to identify where you're having trouble and help you practice problematic words and phrases until they stick.

LEARN HOW THE LANGUAGE ACTUALLY WORKS.
Knowing a few set phrases in your new language can be helpful, but will only get you so far in real-life situations. We take you step by step through how the language works so that you can build sentences on your own and actually take part in conversations.

TRAIN YOUR EARS AS WELL AS YOUR MOUTH.
When you first hear someone speak in a language you don't know, it can be hard to make out even a single word. Our courses come with tons of downloadable audio tracks that train your ear to your new language.

BE READY TO BLEND IN WITH THE LOCALS.
Communicating and connecting with people in another language isn't just about using proper grammar - it's also about understanding another culture. We get you ready for this with lessons on everything from greetings and foods to holidays and local customs.

GET COURSES TAILORED FOR YOUR NEW LANGUAGE.
A lot of other courses out there take a cookie-cutter approach, using the same template for every language they teach. At Rocket Languages, we understand that no two languages are exactly alike! That's why we've carefully crafted each of our courses to include what's practical, relevant, and useful for the language you are learning.

STAY ON TRACK AND STAY INSPIRED.
Motivation is key to learning a language, so we make sure to provide you with a wide array of motivational tools and techniques. They'll keep your interest up and your focus sharp so you can meet your goals and make better progress.

Note:
Speech recognition is based on Google's speech recognition. If using a custom ROM, please ensure it is installed.

title: Readle: Learn Languages Daily
description:
Daily Levelled News & Stories for Language Learning. Teacher-Crafted. Student-Ready.

Learn languages faster with over 2,000 real-world news stories, transformed into bite-sized lessons and smart flashcards that make learning quick and effective. Readle (formerly Langster) is the world‚Äôs first CEFR-levelled reader designed to help you learn Spanish üá™üá∏üá≤üáΩ , German üá©üá™, French üá´üá∑, English üá¨üáßüá∫üá∏, Japanese üáØüáµ, and Chinese üá®üá≥ in real-world contexts. Just 5 minutes a day is all it takes to start learning smarter ‚Äî and faster. Why Readle? ‚Ä¢ Our language experts turn real-world news & stories into fun & bite-sized Stories for Spanish A1 - C1 stories and other languages tailored to your level. ‚Ä¢ Readle is your companion for reading, listening, comprehension & flashcard vocabulary training with thousands of stories. Download Readle for FREE and start learning languages in a new way. ======= WHAT LANGUAGES CAN I LEARN? You can learn French üá´üá∑ | learn Spanish üá™üá∏üá≤üáΩ | learn German üá©üá™ | learn English üá¨üáßüá∫üá∏ | learn Japanese üáØüáµ | learn Chinese üá®üá≥ ======= Why learning languages with stories works: ‚ñ∫ EFFECTIVE LEARNING THROUGH IMMERSION Use our scientifically proven immersion method to learn languages effectively. Our language experts curate all stories and news and turn them into language learning courses for CEFR levels A1-A2-B1-B2/ JLPT levels N5, N4, N3, N2 / HSK1 to HSK4 levels. ‚ñ∫ BITE-SIZED STORY LANGUAGE LEARNING COURSES +2000 interesting stories & news for learning languages: Whether you want to learn English, French, German, Spanish, or Japanese, Readle (formerly Langster) allows you to learn in context, including grammar tips and vocabulary flashcard training. ‚ñ∫ IMPROVE READING & LISTENING SKILLS Listen to the story audio, sentence by sentence, to improve your listening skills and pronunciation in a foreign language. Langster is the best resource for news in Spanish, French, German, English, and Japanese, especially for anyone with a basic vocabulary and some grammar knowledge of the language they are learning. ‚ñ∫ INSTANT DICTIONARY Look up a word translation in every article - the easiest way to learn vocabulary, phrases, verbs, and conjugation. Save your time switching between Cambridge, Oxford, Merriam-Webster, Reverso, Larousse fran√ßais, conjugaison fran√ßaise, Leo, Duden, or other French, German, Spanish, English, Japanese, or Chinese dictionaries. ‚ñ∫ GRAMMAR HELPER Grammar helpers in each language learning lesson bring your grammar into action. You can learn grammar quickly from the context with example sentences. The ideal learning companion material for Deutsche Welle, DW learn German, Klett Lernen, Klett Augmented, Schritte Plus Neu, Hueber Media, etc. ‚ñ∫ VOCABULARY LIST & FLASHCARD Learn vocabulary or verb conjugations in the story courses. Use spaced repetition to study a word. ‚ñ∫ QUIZ FOR COMPREHENSION Test your reading comprehension and practice your other language skills like grammar and vocabulary, and memorize definite articles (German: der die das; French: le, la, l', les; Spanish: el, la, los, las, and lo), with quizzes in each story ‚Äì a great way to brush up on language skills and prepare yourself for TOEFL, IELTS, CAE, CPE, TOEIC, DELF, DALF, TCF, TestDaf, DSH, Goethe Zertifikat, DELE, CELU, SIELE and other foreign language exams. ‚ñ∫ STORY LIBRARY & DAILY NEW STORY 2000+ news & stories courses for you to learn French, German, Spanish, Japanese, Chinese, or English in a wide range of topics that are available for foreign language learning: - Travel - Culture - Food - Latest News - Transportation - Entertainment - Science and Medical - Technology - People + many more ‚Äì publish daily! Questions or comments about learning with Readle? Please email us at support@readle-app.com. Privacy policy: https://readle-app.com/en/privacy-policy/ Terms of use: https://readle-app.com/en/terms-of-use/ Discord: https://discord.com/invite/x88nZXHcSf

Daily Levelled News & Stories for Language Learning. Teacher-Crafted. Student-Ready.



Learn languages faster with over 2,000 real-world news stories, transformed into bite-sized lessons and smart flashcards that make learning quick and effective. Readle (formerly Langster) is the world‚Äôs first CEFR-levelled reader designed to help you learn Spanish üá™üá∏üá≤üáΩ , German üá©üá™, French üá´üá∑, English üá¨üáßüá∫üá∏, Japanese üáØüáµ, and Chinese üá®üá≥ in real-world contexts. ‚Ä¢ Our language experts turn real-world news & stories into fun & bite-sized Stories for Spanish A1 - C1 stories and other languages tailored to your level.
‚Ä¢ Readle is your companion for reading, listening, comprehension & flashcard vocabulary training with thousands of stories.

Download Readle for FREE and start learning languages in a new way.
=======

WHAT LANGUAGES CAN I LEARN?

You can learn French üá´üá∑ | learn Spanish üá™üá∏üá≤üáΩ | learn German üá©üá™ | learn English üá¨üáßüá∫üá∏ | learn Japanese üáØüáµ | learn Chinese üá®üá≥

=======
Why learning languages with stories works:

‚ñ∫ EFFECTIVE LEARNING THROUGH IMMERSION
Use our scientifically proven immersion method to learn languages effectively. Our language experts curate all stories and news and turn them into language learning courses for CEFR levels A1-A2-B1-B2/ JLPT levels N5, N4, N3, N2 / HSK1 to HSK4 levels.

‚ñ∫ BITE-SIZED STORY LANGUAGE LEARNING COURSES
+2000 interesting stories & news for learning languages: Whether you want to learn English, French, German, Spanish, or Japanese, Readle (formerly Langster) allows you to learn in context, including grammar tips and vocabulary flashcard training.

‚ñ∫ IMPROVE READING & LISTENING SKILLS
Listen to the story audio, sentence by sentence, to improve your listening skills and pronunciation in a foreign language. Langster is the best resource for news in Spanish, French, German, English, and Japanese, especially for anyone with a basic vocabulary and some grammar knowledge of the language they are learning.

‚ñ∫ INSTANT DICTIONARY
Look up a word translation in every article - the easiest way to learn vocabulary, phrases, verbs, and conjugation. Save your time switching between Cambridge, Oxford, Merriam-Webster, Reverso, Larousse fran√ßais, conjugaison fran√ßaise, Leo, Duden, or other French, German, Spanish, English, Japanese, or Chinese dictionaries.

‚ñ∫ GRAMMAR HELPER
Grammar helpers in each language learning lesson bring your grammar into action. You can learn grammar quickly from the context with example sentences. The ideal learning companion material for Deutsche Welle, DW learn German, Klett Lernen, Klett Augmented, Schritte Plus Neu, Hueber Media, etc.

‚ñ∫ VOCABULARY LIST & FLASHCARD
Learn vocabulary or verb conjugations in the story courses. Use spaced repetition to study a word.

‚ñ∫ QUIZ FOR COMPREHENSION
Test your reading comprehension and practice your other language skills like grammar and vocabulary, and memorize definite articles (German: der die das; French: le, la, l', les; Spanish: el, la, los, las, and lo), with quizzes in each story ‚Äì a great way to brush up on language skills and prepare yourself for TOEFL, IELTS, CAE, CPE, TOEIC, DELF, DALF, TCF, TestDaf, DSH, Goethe Zertifikat, DELE, CELU, SIELE and other foreign language exams.

‚ñ∫ STORY LIBRARY & DAILY NEW STORY
2000+ news & stories courses for you to learn French, German, Spanish, Japanese, Chinese, or English in a wide range of topics that are available for foreign language learning:

- Travel
- Culture
- Food
- Latest News
- Transportation
- Entertainment
- Science and Medical
- Technology
- People

+ many more ‚Äì publish daily!
