title: Wlingua - Learn German
description:
Learning German has never been so easy. It's perfect for you, whether you already have a beginner, basic, intermediate, or advanced level of German. Thanks to our online German course, you‚Äôll notice your German improving very quickly. Millions of students have already tried our courses. Would you like to join them?

Our Online German Course:

German Course In this course you will learn German from scratch. Guaranteed! Regardless of the level you start from, it is designed to help you learn German from day one.

Our Learning Method:

A learning process designed for you that is both easy and guided: You‚Äôll feel like you‚Äôre learning more and more German every day. Every sentence, exercise, review, and reading has been carefully selected for you. Audio clips in German: A wide variety of accents with clear, crisp pronunciation. Recorded by professional narrators. Linked concepts: Each word is linked to its use or precise meaning. When you click on the words in each sentence, exercise, or reading, their meaning or an explanation of their use will appear. Lesson structure: Concepts are introduced progressively throughout the course. Only concepts that are explained in the course are used to create the content (sentences, exercises or readings). Vocabulary: Learn the meaning, pronunciation, and use of words with activities adapted to your progress. Grammar exercises: Practice your grammar with exercises linked to explanations. Vocabulary topics: Words are grouped by topic categories. Spaced reviews: Review the vocabulary and grammar at increasingly long intervals. Search function: Find whatever you‚Äôre looking for, including vocabulary and grammar. Reading comprehension texts (readings): Learn and practice with conversations, news, emails, and interviews, among others. Certificates: Earn a certificate that proves your knowledge at the end of each level. Account types: ‚úî Basic: With a Basic account, the course is free, but has some limitations. ‚úî Premium: With a Premium account, you‚Äôll have access to all course content and activities. At Wlingua, we work hard every day to offer you a quality German app that will help you in your work, with that upcoming exam, on your vacation, in communicating with people from around the world... Download our app to learn German!

Start learning German üá©üá™ quickly and effectively with Mondly‚Äôs free daily lessons! In just minutes you‚Äôll start memorizing core German words, form sentences, learn to speak German phrases and take part in conversations. You‚Äôll feel like having your own German language tutor in your pocket. Loved and trusted worldwide üèÜ Mondly was named "Editors‚Äô Choice" in Google Play and "App of the Year" by Facebook. üåç Beginner or advanced learner, traveler or business professional - This German app works great and dynamically adjusts to your needs. Join over 50 million people that are learning new languages from their mother tongue! Why Mondly? Because we build bridges between people by making language learning fun and easy through technological innovation. TRY MONDLY ‚òÖ "The closest thing to classroom education." ‚Äî Bloomberg ‚òÖ "A practical approach to language learning likely to be widely adopted." ‚Äî Forbes ‚òÖ "The new way to learn languages ." ‚Äî Inc. ‚òÖ "Mondly is like having a private tutor." ‚Äî CNN _____________________

This is how the future of language courses looks like

Our German language learning app gets you started with a basic conversation between two people. You quickly start memorizing core words, use them to build sentences and phrases, and at the end of a 45-minutes module you are able to reconstruct that conversation with your own voice. It‚Äôs an effective way to learn German phrases. State-of-the-art Natural Speech Recognition and Spaced Repetition Algorithms make our German learning app effective for learning languages.

Here are the key features that make Mondly a great tutor for you:

‚úì Crystal-clear audio and professional voice actors. ¬ª Learn the right German pronunciation from conversations between native speakers. ‚úì State-of-the-art Speech Recognition. ¬ª Mondly knows exactly how to listen to your German words and phrases. You will only get a positive feedback if you speak German clearly and correctly. This will improve your pronunciation. ‚úì Useful phrases for real situations. ¬ª Memorizing hundreds of isolated words is not the way to go when it comes to learning German. Mondly teaches you German vocabulary by offering you core words and phrases. Our German language learning apps break the learning process down into short lessons and puts them into themed packs. ‚úì Learn conversational German. ¬ª Conversation is the main reason to take this free course. It will help you build a core German vocabulary with widely-used nouns and verbs, and speak German clearly. ‚úì Verb conjugations. ¬ª If you want to learn German grammar during this course, just tap the German verbs and get the full conjugation on the screen, including the translation. It‚Äôs faster and better than a dictionary. ‚úì Advanced Statistics. ¬ª Our German learning apps use intelligent reporting, so you can always follow your progress. Build your vocabulary step by step and become better daily. ‚úì The Leaderboard. ¬ª See how your friends are doing and compete with people from all over the world to become the best learner in the Mondly community family. Take the Weekly Quiz to become even better. ‚úì Adaptive Learning. ¬ª Learning German is different from person to person. So we taught the app to learn from your way of learning. After little time spent together, Mondly will understand what suits you best and it will become your own guide and customized teacher. ‚òÖ Before you know it, at the end of these German lessons, you will master the most useful 5000 words and phrases and you will be on the fast lane to learning a new language. Pronunciation Scoring - Improve your pronunciation, speak German confidently - Recognize and analyze your pronunciation of each word using A.I. technology - Compare with native pronunciation to detect mistakes - Provide accurate scores after each practice to track progress üîçGerman Dictionary - Easy lookup and learn German vocabulary - Smart, fast, and accurate dictionary similar to top German dictionary apps - Look up vocabulary, idioms, sentence structures, and grammar breakdowns. - All features are designed to help you learn German vocabulary and grammar naturally. üéì Mock tests for GOETHE A1-C1 ‚Äì Learn German for exam success - Practice tests to help you prepare for popular German proficiency exams - Detailed answer explanations help you understand your strengths and weaknesses üéß Listening practice - Learn German by listening to native video - Practice listening skills through hot videos and podcasts, with transcripts to help you understand each sentence. - Audio with reading exercises to practice listening skills with high-quality voices - Easily adjust playback speed, suitable for each learner's level - Attractive videos and podcasts, help you practice listening skills, supplement vocabulary and grammar in real contexts. - Detailed transcripts included, easy to follow lesson content. üìî Vocabulary builder ‚Äì Memorize German words effectively - Words are curated from real reading materials - Easy-to-use flashcards to help you review anytime - Specialized vocabulary such as nursing, restaurant, hotel, sales..., helps you study according to your personal needs. - Smart review function with flashcard vocabulary games, word connection, speaking, word arrangement for long-term memory. - Smart review function with flashcard vocabulary games, word connection, speaking, word arrangement for long-term memory.

Application for:

title: Learn German with Seedlang
description:
Learn German with our language learning app and focus on improving your speaking and listening skills, as well as your vocab knowledge and grammar comprehension. We do this by building interactive experiences using videos of native speakers, so you'll learn the best way possible.

We‚Äòve built this app in partnership with the Easy German YouTube channel and have a strong focus on teaching German with real people and authentic language. This app takes a unique approach to enhancing your speaking, listening, and grammar skills, making it easy to increase and sustain your vocab and grammar knowledge as well as your pronunciation.

Why Seedlang?

Simply put, we combine real humor and fun with a deep understanding of the German language. We craft learning experiences that are unlike others you have experienced before in the world of language apps. Learn German with Seedlang, and you'll be amazed at how swiftly you improve your vocab, grammar, speaking, and listening skills.

Learn German with Interactive Stories

To increase your vocab knowledge, we use video-based interactive stories that are fun, surprising, and memorable. This will help to give context to what you are learning and make building new memories of vocab and grammar feel effortless. You want to increase your vocab knowledge and grammar comprehension without hardships? Try this app, and you will see how simple it is to increase your vocab and grammar skills.

A New Type of Flashcards to Learn German

You've never seen vocab flashcards like these before. They combine video, speaking practice, and embedded grammar to create a fun and effective experience to learn German. This vocab learning feature is also a part of our free content, so you can start creating your own vocab lists and review your vocab regarding your needs.

Learn German Actively Through Speaking

Recording audio of your pronunciation and comparing it with that of German native speakers allows you to improve your speaking. As you practice these improvements, your muscle memory for the language strengthens and speaking becomes effortless.

Grammar at Your Fingertips

We are most receptive to learning grammar after we've made a mistake. So, if you make a grammar mistake with a word, simply click it to display detailed grammar information. We understand the feeling that learning grammar is the most difficult part of learning a new language. But when you learn German grammar with Seedlang, you will find how much easier it is to remember the grammar rules when their explanations are right there at your fingertips when you need them.

Learn German the way you want

Use our vocab trainer to build flashcard decks tailored to the specific vocab that you want to learn. Each vocab card is pulled from one of our stories, ensuring that learning a new language comes with all the fun context that makes it easy to remember your German vocab and grammar topics.

Learn German with Trivia games

Included in this language learning app, you can test your German comprehension by competing against other German language students in an interactive trivia game. This fun feature adds a playful element to your language learning journey and enlarges your vocab knowledge in no time.

You can start this unique language learning adventure with the free app version and explore vocab, grammar, and speaking practice. Every interaction is a step closer to mastering the German language. Start your journey towards A1, A2, B1, and B2 proficiency levels covering pronunciation, grammar, and vocab with the best German language learning tool. Download this free German language learning app now and try learning German the Seedlang way.

title: Learn German ‚Äì Studycat
description:
From the award-winning creators of Studycat for Schools, comes Learn German! The #1 way for kids to learn Deutsch!

From preschool and beyond, Learn German by Studycat inspires children's innate love of learning with interactive games and activities.

Our bite-sized lessons will keep your child motivated while they discover a new language and build bilingual skills for a lifetime!

WHY STUDYCAT?

‚Ä¢ Learn German, in German. All our activities focus on virtual language immersion, which means your child won't be hearing any English, only German! This might be confusing at first, but trust us, it's the best way to learn.

‚Ä¢ Everyday Language. Our lessons teach words and expressions that kids can apply in their everyday lives, so they can get a head start developing their bilingual abilities.

‚Ä¢ Get Talking Fast. With our interactive speaking challenges, kids will be encouraged to speak entire words and phrases on their own! The earlier kids start their language-learning journey, the more likely they are to reach proficiency quickly.

‚Ä¢ Vocal Variety. Our characters' voices use different tones, expressions, and accents so that kids can pick up on the subtleties of pronunciation from different speakers.

‚Ä¢ Designed by Experts. All our activities are designed by language and early-education experts. Thoughtfully developed lessons will build your child's confidence with every step.

‚Ä¢ Learner Profiles (coming soon). Create up to four personalized profiles for different family members, allowing tailored learning paths and individual progress tracking.

‚Ä¢ Safe for Kids & Ad-Free. Parents can rest easy knowing that there are no pesky ads to distract children from their learning. All content is appropriate for ages 3 and up.

‚Ä¢ Offline Learning. On a plane, at a restaurant, or in a park? No problem! Learn German by Studycat is available for both online and offline use.

WHAT ARE PARENTS SAYING?

‚ÄúAs a parent trying to raise bilingual children at home, Studycat is a helpful app to start them off and create excitement about the language.‚Äù ‚Äî Fluent in 3 Months

‚ÄúEverything has been thought out carefully and the games and activities are really engaging.‚Äù ‚Äî Bilingual Kidspot

‚ÄúThe concept is so simple but extremely effective. I even found myself learning at the same time.‚Äù ‚Äî Bump, Baby & You

--

If you like Learn German by Studycat, try it out for 7 days free! Empower your child to learn like never before, and get extras like printable worksheets.

If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Privacy Policy: https://studycat.com/about/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: https://studycat.com/about/terms-of-use/

title: Ling - Learn German Language
description:
Learn German with Ling in just 10 minutes a day!

DOWNLOAD FREE - LEARN WITH GAMES - SPEAK WITH NATIVE SPEAKERS Our free German language learning app is designed to make learning German as easy and as fun as possible! Using a variety of mini-games and interactive learning techniques, you‚Äôll be able to immerse yourself in the German language using just your smartphone! Whether you‚Äôre a complete beginner hoping to learn the basics of the language, or you‚Äôre already pretty fluent and want to learn even more advanced German phrases, or brush up on your knowledge ‚Äì Ling has you covered! FEATURED IN Yahoo ‚Ä¢ VOGUE ‚Ä¢ Forbes ‚Ä¢ NBC Traditional German language lessons can be tedious and dull. At Ling, we‚Äôve made the learning process fun by using puzzles, games, challenges, and quizzes to teach you how to read, write, speak, and understand German! ------------------------------------------------------- OUR German COURSE HIGHLIGHTS ------------------------------------------------------- - Flashcards to test your knowledge - Quizzes to track your progress - Smart chatbot to practice daily conversations - Speaking exercises to improve your pronunciation - Finger tracing via your smartphone screen to become familiar with writing - Match pictures with the corresponding word - Put sentences into the correct order - Complete the unfinished sentence ‚Ä¶ And much, much more! With so many mini-games, challenges, quizzes, and puzzles to teach you German, you‚Äôll have hours of fun learning a new language. It won‚Äôt even feel like learning at all! -------------------------------- KEY FEATURES OF LING -------------------------------- - User-friendly interface - Easy to navigate - Lessons cover the four aspects of the language (reading, writing, speaking, and listening) - Courses for all fluency levels, from absolute beginner to advanced - Mini-games, flashcards, challenges, and interactive games to help you learn faster and more effectively - All courses were created with the help of native speakers of each language - Learn helpful grammar tips while playing fun, interactive games - Learn how to write the alphabet with cutting-edge finger-tracing technology - Learn how to speak about a variety of different topics Ling is available for 60+ different languages: Learn Afrikaans, Learn Albanian, Learn Arabic, Learn Armenian, Learn Bengali, Learn Bosnian, Learn Bulgarian, Learn Burmese, Learn Cantonese, Learn Chinese, Learn Croatian, Learn Czech, Learn Danish, Learn Dutch, Learn English, Learn Estonian, Learn Finnish, Learn French, Learn Georgian, Learn German, Learn Greek, Learn Hebrew, Learn Hindi, Learn Hungarian, Learn Indonesian, Learn Irish, Learn Italian, Learn Japanese, Learn Kannada, Learn Khmer, Learn Korean, Learn Lao, Learn Latvian, Learn Lithuanian, Learn Malayalam, Learn Malaysian, Learn Marathi, Learn Mongolian, Learn Nepali, Learn Norwegian, Learn Persian, Learn Polish, Learn Portuguese, Learn Punjabi, Learn Romanian, Learn Russian, Learn Serbian, Learn Slovak, Learn Slovenian, Learn Spanish, Learn Swahili, Learn Swedish, Learn Tagalog, Learn Tamil, Learn Telugu, Learn Thai, Learn Turkish, Learn Ukrainian, Learn Urdu, Learn Vietnamese Ling Subscription Plans: - Monthly: $14.99 USD - Half-yearly: $39.99 USD - Yearly: $79.99 USD - Lifetime: $149.99 USD If you have any suggestions or feedback, please contact us at support@ling-app.com. Have fun learning!

title: Learn German Daily with Readle
description: Learn German 5-min a day with personalized stories and daily news on your level. Readle is a German language learning app made for learners that strive to get past the basics, and create a real learning habit. Learn German with topics you love from a large library of 2,000 easy and entertaining 5-min reads. Build your German vocabulary with smart flashcards directly from the stories that were curated by native speakers.. Download Readle FREE and start learning German today! üá©üá™ ‚òÖ Easily read and listen to German anytime, anywhere. Just 5 minutes a day and one story each day to learn German even faster. ‚òÖ ‚òÖ Filter stories by your individual level from A1, A2, B1, B2 to C1 and choose topics you enjoy reading. You'll forget that you learn German along the way! ‚òÖ ‚òÖ Enhance your vocabulary with smart flashcards using a spaced repetition system. Add German words from your favorite stories and store them in your long-term memory. ‚òÖ ‚òÖ Over 200 German grammar helpers along the stories will help you understand the complexities of the German language with ease. ‚òÖ Learn German quickly from an A1 beginner to an advanced C1 level. Expand your German vocabulary for TestDaF, Goethe Zertifikat, or daily conversation. Listen to recordings by native German speakers, a perfect way to practice your listening skills. „Äê Customized German Stories „Äë Explore exciting stories & news lessons tailored to A1, A2, B1, B2, and C1 levels, helping you grasp vocabulary and grammar in various contexts. „Äê Individual Flashcards „Äë Create personalized flashcard decks from the German stories you read. Readle uses spaced repetition to ensure you never forget. „Äê Instant German Dictionary „Äë Tap on a word for translation & explanation. No need to open Leo, Duden, or other dictionaries to learn German. „Äê Story Grammar Helper & Key Vocabulary „Äë Get detailed explanations of essential grammar and key vocabulary within stories. Practice German grammar in multiple contexts easily. „Äê Quiz to Test Your German Skills „Äë Each story includes a quiz to practice grammar, vocabulary, and articles (der, die, das). Retake quizzes to improve reading comprehension and prepare for exams like Goethe, DSH, TestDaF, and Telc. „Äê Story Library & New Stories Daily „Äë With 2,000+ German stories across various categories, start learning now with daily new stories to learn German. - Travel - Culture - Food - Latest News (DW News, ZDF, Tagesschau, etc.) - Transportation - Entertainment - Science and Medical - Technology - People - Parties A must-have app for learning German for travel, daily life, or exam preparation. Readle is your best companion for mastering German! Download today and start learning German fast and easily with Readle! title: Wagotabi: Learn Japanese
description:
Wagotabi is your daily companion for learning Japanese from scratch, at your own pace, and with maximum immersion. Learn to read, write, and understand Japanese in context, while retaining Hiragana, Katakana, and Kanji. Use your Japanese skills to progress in the adventure offered by this educational game.

Designed in close collaboration with +300 Japanese language experts, official Japanese prefecture tourist associations and thousands of early testers, Wagotabi provides you with an immersive approach to language learning following a graded reader approach. Words and grammar points are introduced according to the JLPT standard, beginning with N5.

‚Äî

‚óÜ START from zero: the game is beginner friendly: no initial Japanese knowledge needed. Concepts are introduced step by step and used right away in-game. Non-beginners will progress faster and equally enjoy the game.
‚óÜ JOURNEY in Japan: Explore real cities, learn to introduce yourself, order food, ask your way to the locals and unravel hidden secrets!
‚óÜ COLLECT new words, Kana, Kanji and get detailed explanations on grammar patterns and conjugation step-by-step. No more overwhelming Kana / Kanji / vocabulary lists.
‚óÜ CHALLENGE Japanese Grand Masters in their castle to earn their respect!
‚óÜ COMPETE with fellow learners on Kana and Kanji minigames and post your top scores to the leaderboard!
‚óÜ PERSONALIZE your learning experience: benefit from our SRS tool pin-pointing your weaknesses, create your own avatar, set the game difficulty. This is your Japanese journey.
‚óÜ ENJOY a fully ad-free experience without in-app purchase, the game can be entirely played offline!

‚Äî

(Non-exhaustive) list of features :
Interactive dictionary (with illustrations, tags etc.), clear grammar explanation, interactive tooltips, fully voiced in Japanese, SRS powered smart tests, interactions with environment, quests, 2 minigames (Kana and Kanji), boss fights, Hiragana / Katakana / Kanji stroke order and calligraphy, Kanjidex, resembling Kanji, conjugation, cloud save, advanced progress tracking tools ‚Ä¶

‚Äî

Currently available content:
+320 carefully selected words and grammar points   
+165 Kanji  
+450 example sentences  
+1700 voiced Japanese dialogues  
+300 unique NPCs in game  
All words / grammar are used extensively and in context for better retention

‚Äî

Privacy Policy: https://www.wagotabi.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Service: https://www.wagotabi.com/terms-of-service

title: renshuu - Japanese learning
description:
A cute, ad-free, and enjoyable learning experience is waiting for you in the Renshuu community! The free version is unlimited: there‚Äôs no timer before you are forced to pay!

‚òÖ A path for every learning style and every goal ‚òÖ
Whether you are getting started with the alphabets or have been studying for years, jump in exactly where you belong! Don‚Äôt waste time going through what you already know. 

Renshuu maintains learning paths for most textbooks, the JLPT, Kanji Kentei, and for those who just want to learn. You can also carve out your own path! Our community has over 10,000 user-made lessons for even more focused learning.

‚òÖ Cute, relaxing, and fun ‚òÖ
Our mascot Kao-chan is here to let you enjoy learning Japanese, whether it‚Äôs through collectible coins every time you quiz, a character that evolves as you learn, manga pages that you unlock, or hundreds of hand-made illustrations.  

Additionally, we have both single and multiplayer games to help you keep your learning and reviewing fresh! 

‚òÖ Personal service ‚òÖ 
We are just a two-person company - and we don‚Äôt use chat bots. That means that every question you have gets an answer directly from us.  

‚òÖ Rich, in-depth materials ‚òÖ
‚ñ† Vocabulary: over 15,000 native-recorded audio files, 17,000 hand-picked images, and 160,000 example sentences make understanding vocabulary a breeze. Our growing library of accent/pitch data can even help you with accent reduction.
‚ñ† Kanji: 12,000+ kanji, with no limits on what you can study! Over 2,000 colorful mnemonics help you to understand and retain the meanings.
‚ñ† Grammar: Over 800 different expressions, each complete with native-written model sentences, construction diagrams, audio, and over 7,500 hand-made quiz questions. 
‚ñ† Sentences: Thousands of sentences complete with audio, divided by theme and difficulty levels.

‚òÖ A superior quiz system designed around Japanese ‚òÖ
Our SRS-for-Japanese system doesn‚Äôt treat Japanese materials like flashcards to be memorized, and breaks every item down into individual components so you can understand, and not just memorize. Mastery schedules keep you studying only what you need to, pushing weaker materials to the front for you to focus on.

Dozens of different question styles keep things fresh, while a flexible input system (multiple choice, typing, or writing) lets you answer the way that you want to.

‚òÖ Customizable down to the last character ‚òÖ 
Renshuu doesn‚Äôt believe that there is a single way of studying that everyone should adhere to. Our expansive settings and customizations let you adjust the learning environment to what works best for you.

title: Learn Japanese. Speak Japanese
description: Speak Japanese faster than you ever imagined with Mondly‚Äôs proprietary ILA-method. How? The secret is to make it simple. Have you ever heard a song in the radio which had you bopping your head and wanting to sing along? The first step of learning Japanese is pretty similar. You listen to the sound of native Japanese speakers and repeat some of their words. Mondly‚Äôs state-of-the-art speech recognition shows you how well you already speak and where you can improve. It‚Äôs fun and doesn‚Äôt even feel like learning. Especially because Mondly by Pearson uses your mother language so you never get lost in translation. The second step is even easier. Take a break. Your lesson is never more than 9 minutes long and here is why: Your brain needs a rest to store the new information. And while you‚Äôre busy with your life, Japanese words and sentences get anchored in your long-term memory. The result: You find yourself effortlessly knowing what to say and when. Don‚Äôt worry about the exact timing. Mondly by Pearson gives you control over the entire process. You receive friendly reminders exactly when your brain is set for the next dose of knowledge. The third step is all about you. Because now you‚Äôre ready to create your own phrases and adding your individual touch and personality back into the conversation. And when you want to practice, Mondly‚Äôs interactive chat-bot becomes your pocket tutor. There are over 40 practical, real-life situations which take you to the restaurant, shopping, exploring the city and many more. But that‚Äôs not the only reason why Mondly by Pearson gives you the confidence to speak Japanese. Because the HandsFree mode lets you practice without looking at the screen. Just connect your headphones and you‚Äôre in Paris, chatting away with the locals. Need a quick boost of motivation? Check your progress with the advanced statistics and intelligent reporting. It shows you how far you have come in your journey to master the 5,000 words and phrases Mondly by Pearson offers you. We all learn in different ways so here are some of the other highlights Mondly by Pearson offers: ‚Ä¢ Well-structured grammar drills which integrate seamlessly into the content of the lessons ‚Ä¢ Verb conjugations to show you the underlining structure and further boost your confidence ‚Ä¢ Reading and writing games to complete your skills and give you full independence So what does the ILA-Method stand for? It‚Äôs Immersive Language Acquisition and it means with Mondly by Pearson you pick up Japanese in the most natural way possible. But don‚Äôt trust the over 100 million users who have given the app a 4.7/5.0 rating. Here‚Äôs what the press had to say: ¬ª ‚ÄúThe new and sexier way to learn languages‚Äù - Huffington Post ¬ª ‚ÄúClosest thing to actual immersion‚Äù - TNW ¬ª ‚ÄúA practical approach to language learning likely to be widely adopted.‚Äù - Forbes ¬ª ‚ÄúThe new way to learn languages‚Äù - Inc.com Join the revolution and speak Japanese now! There‚Äôs a new free lesson every day and no ads.
descriptionHTML:
Speak Japanese faster than you ever imagined with Mondly‚Äôs proprietary ILA-method. How? The secret is to make it simple. Have you ever heard a song in the radio which had you bopping your head and wanting to sing along?

The first step of learning Japanese is pretty similar. You listen to the sound of native Japanese speakers and repeat some of their words.

Mondly‚Äôs state-of-the-art speech recognition shows you how well you already speak and where you can improve. It‚Äôs fun and doesn‚Äôt even feel like learning. Especially because Mondly by Pearson uses your mother language so you never get lost in translation.

The second step is even easier. Take a break. Your lesson is never more than 9 minutes long and here is why: Your brain needs a rest to store the new information. And while you‚Äôre busy with your life, Japanese words and sentences get anchored in your long-term memory.

The result: You find yourself effortlessly knowing what to say and when. Don‚Äôt worry about the exact timing. Mondly by Pearson gives you control over the entire process. You receive friendly reminders exactly when your brain is set for the next dose of knowledge.

The third step is all about you. Because now you‚Äôre ready to create your own phrases and adding your individual touch and personality back into the conversation. And when you want to practice, Mondly‚Äôs interactive chat-bot becomes your pocket tutor.

There are over 40 practical, real-life situations which take you to the restaurant, shopping, exploring the city and many more.
But that‚Äôs not the only reason why Mondly by Pearson gives you the confidence to speak Japanese. Because the HandsFree mode lets you practice without looking at the screen. Just connect your headphones and you‚Äôre in Paris, chatting away with the locals.

Need a quick boost of motivation? Check your progress with the advanced statistics and intelligent reporting. It shows you how far you have come in your journey to master the 5,000 words and phrases Mondly by Pearson offers you.

We all learn in different ways so here are some of the other highlights Mondly by Pearson offers:
‚Ä¢ Well-structured grammar drills which integrate seamlessly into the content of the lessons
‚Ä¢ Verb conjugations to show you the underlining structure and further boost your confidence
‚Ä¢ Reading and writing games to complete your skills and give you full independence

So what does the ILA-Method stand for? It‚Äôs Immersive Language Acquisition and it means with Mondly by Pearson you pick up Japanese in the most natural way possible. But don‚Äôt trust the over 100 million users who have given the app a 4.7/5.0 rating.

Here‚Äôs what the press had to say:

¬ª ‚ÄúThe new and sexier way to learn languages‚Äù - Huffington Post
¬ª ‚ÄúClosest thing to actual immersion‚Äù - TNW
¬ª ‚ÄúA practical approach to language learning likely to be widely adopted.‚Äù - Forbes
¬ª ‚ÄúThe new way to learn languages‚Äù - Inc.com

Join the revolution and speak Japanese now! There‚Äôs a new free lesson every day and no ads.

title: Todaii: Learn Japanese N5-N1
description:
Learn Japanese in context - READING, LISTENING, SPEAKING and JLPT

With more than 10 fresh news articles daily, you can practice at your own level, from N5 beginner to N1 advanced. Improve your reading skills, expand your vocabulary, and understand Japanese the way natives use it. Why choose Todaii Japanese to learn Japanese? üìö Reading practice - Learn Japanese through real content - Improve Japanese reading skills with content selected from levels N5 to N1 - Topics include Japanese culture, daily life, technology, entertainment, and more. - Integrated 1-touch lookup right in the reading, helping you deeply understand the semantics of words and sentences when needed. - Practice with Quiz to help consolidate skills and memorize lesson content - Practice reading and pronunciation of each word, each sentence üí°A.I. Pronunciation Scoring - Improve your pronunciation, speak Japanese confidently - Recognize and analyze your pronunciation of each word using A.I. technology - Compare with native pronunciation to detect mistakes - Provide accurate scores after each practice to track progress üéì Practice real-life conversations - Learn to speak Japanese naturally - 72 conversations, helping you quickly learn basic communication in Japanese used daily. - Learn Japanese grammar with each conversation. - Designed for learners who want to learn to speak Japanese with confidence. üîçJapanese Dictionary - Easy lookup and learn Japanese vocabulary - Smart, fast, and accurate dictionary similar to top Japanese dictionary apps - Look up vocabulary, idioms, sentence structures, and grammar breakdowns. - All features are designed to help you learn Japanese vocabulary and grammar naturally. üéì JLPT N5-N1 mock test - Learn Japanese for exam success - Full mock tests to help you prepare for the JLPT exam in July and December. - Detailed explanations of answers help you understand and improve your weaknesses. - 356 JLPT N5-N1 reading practice exercises üéß Listening practice - Learn Japanese by listening to native video - Practice listening skills through hot videos and podcasts, with transcripts to help you understand each sentence. - Audio with reading exercises to practice listening skills with high-quality voices - Easily adjust playback speed, suitable for each learner's level - Attractive videos and podcasts, help you practice listening skills, supplement vocabulary and grammar in real contexts. - Detailed transcripts included, easy to follow lesson content. üìîVocabulary - Learn and remember Japanese words faster Vocabulary curated and summarized from real reading passages. Easy-to-use Flashcards to memorize new words. Full JLPT N5-N1 vocabulary list for targeted learning. Application for: - People who want to learn Japanese from scratch or improve existing skills. - Self-learners who want to study Japanese effectively at home. - Learners preparing for the JLPT N5-N1 exams. - Anyone looking to enhance their Japanese reading, listening, and speaking abilities. Whether you're just starting or already have some experience, Todaii Japanese is your trusted app to learn Japanese in a fun, structured, and effective way Let Todaii Japanese be your companion on your journey to learn Japanese and connect deeply with the language and culture of Japan! üì© For feedback or questions, contact us at: todai.easylife@gmail.com Your support helps us make Todaii Japanese better every day.

- Smart, fast, and accurate dictionary similar to top Japanese dictionary apps

title: Bunpo: Learn Japanese
description:
Learn Japanese with Bunpo!

Learn Japanese offline with fun and interactive lessons. Start learning Japanese now!

Bunpo is a fast and easy way to learn Japanese.

This Japanese learning app provides grammar explanations and lessons for learners of any levels, from JLPT N5 to JLPT N4, JLPT N3, JLPT N2 and JLPT N1.

Get JLPT ready with interactive lessons. 
The app offers over 1700 example sentences and 8000 Japanese grammar quiz questions. All come with English-Japanese translations.

Key features:
Learn Japanese Alphabets (Hiragana and Katakana):
Study both hiragana and katakana easily 
Listen how kanas are pronounced

Japanese grammar:
Learn Japanese grammar. Detailed grammar notes in all lessons.
The app contains explanations and exercises for all the grammar points of JLPT N5, JLPT N4, JLPT N3, JLPT N2, JLPT N1.
Japanese grammar courses are organized by its JLPT level.

Japanese Vocabulary:
Learn Japanese words in each lesson.
Tap on Japanese words to bring up the smart look up. (This feature makes you Japanese learning journey easy)

Learn Kanji:
Improve your kanji recognition by reading Japanese sentences.
Study kanji grouped by JLPT levels.
The app contains over 2500 kanji.

Read Japanese:
Learn to read Japanese language sentences in each lesson.

Japanese listening:
Listen to thousands of Japanese audio files to improve your Japanese listening skill.

JLPT:
Japanese grammar notes and exercises for any JLPT level N1 ,N2 ,N3 ,N4 ,N5 

Japanese listening quiz:
Improve your Japanese listening skills by listening and inputting Japanese words.

Offline mode:
Learn Japanese, French German offline! Bunpo is an offline language learning app.

SRS(spaced repetition system):
Enhance your studying with a personalized flash cards powered by SRS (spaced repetition system)

Subscription of Bunpo Plus
Subscribe to Bunpo Plus and get access to the complete Bunpo courses, which has hundreds of premium contents, listening training and review system (spaced repetition system) to help you learn Japanese or French  language anywhere, anytime.

title: Learn Japanese Speak Language
description:
Learn Japanese language, alphabet (hiragana, katakana, kanji & roomaji) and grammar with LuvLingua.

Begin the learning experience already enjoyed by millions around the world.
LuvLingua education apps teach you through fun games, and beginner to intermediate level courses.
Study core words and essential phrases to build a strong foundation of Japanese.
Understand and speak Japanese to communicate more effectively!
Recommended for students, teachers, travellers, and business people who want to learn Japanese.

Gain confidence and level up your ability with the beginner course.
200+ lessons that systematically teach and review new vocabulary, as well as help you construct sentences and questions.
Designed for students to train and improve fundamental language skills & knowledge.

Made by teachers to support and cater to different learning styles.
 - Visual (Picture & Memory Game)
 - Auditory (Listening Quiz)
 - Read-Write (Writing & Multichoice Quiz, Word Guess)
 - Kinesthetic (Animation & Target Game)
Progress in simple, easy stages and remember new lingo in a fast, fun way.

Convenient and interactive phrasebook, full of useful everyday conversation, and sorted into helpful categories.
The phrasebook includes vocabulary and dialogues for greetings, asking directions and telling time.
Test the basics with flashcards of numbers, food, clothing, colors and body parts.
Learn vocabulary and conversation to use in emergencies, school, shopping, travel and work.

Listen to high quality authentic audio of native speakers with clear pronunciation.
Test your listening and speaking ability, and master the correct pronunciation.

Alphabet (hiragana, katakana, kanji & roomaji) lookup menu and quiz.
Recognise, read and test the alphabet (hiragana, katakana, kanji & roomaji).

Grammar section and sentence builder.
Practice, review and improve your grammar ability.
Study the nouns, verbs and adjectives you need.

Quickly and easily lookup a word or phrase in the search section and save it to your favorites for later study.
Track your progress and gain achievements.
Options to change user language, hide / show romanisation.

Words are translated into over 30 languages including English, Spanish, French, German and Chinese (simplified and traditional characters).
Carefully translated by bilingual native speakers and not by computers / online translators.

Learn offline without internet connection.
This app is for all ages. All content in this app is safe for kids and adults.
Lots of free content. Buy the subscription to access all the content.

More advanced curriculum will be added soon.
We are committed to regularly updating this app.
Please send us suggestions about what we can add or improve.
Bugs, feedback or support => luvlingua@gmail.com

Learn Japanese for travel in Japan, work, school, or to talk to friends.

Love Learning Languages
LuvLingua

title: JA Sensei: Learn Japanese JLPT
description:
All-in-one application to learn Japanese. Hiragana, katakana, kanji, vocabulary, phrasebook, grammar, and MUCH more! Basic to advanced lessons. Smart progress tracking exercises to improve your writing, reading, speaking and listening skills. Discover surprising culture facts to think like a Japanese, and avoid embarrassing situations.

GENERAL IMPORTANT BENEFITS

‚òÖ On-going project since 2011, you are sure to get continuous updates and improvements ‚òÖ All audio clips by a native Japanese speaker for authentic Japanese pronunciation. No voice synthesis. ‚òÖ No Internet connection required, almost everything is downloadable ‚òÖ Highly customizable quizzes paired with the scientific SRS system that tracks your progress. ‚òÖ Adapted for beginners to advanced learners

DETAILED INFORMATION

PROGRESSIVE JAPANESE LESSONS ‚úì Ideal introduction to the Japanese language, and quick progress ‚úì For each lesson: Japanese dialogue, vocabulary, grammar, exercises, and a culture page ‚úì Take the final quiz to validate each lesson ‚úì Many entertaining and explanatory illustrations JAPANESE KANA, KANJI, RADICALS ‚úì Phonetic information and audio recordings for each Japanese sound ‚úì Over 6,000 kanji with stroke orders, meanings, word examples, and more. ‚úì Kanji breakdown to analyze the composition of each kanji and remember it more easily ‚úì Powerful kanji search tools by radicals, meanings, on/kun readings, JLPT levels, etc. ‚úì Detailed kanji radicals information (Kangxi number, position, meaning, frequency, etc.) ‚úì Drawing tool to learn how to write kana/kanji/radicals with the right stroke order ‚úì Learn by JLPT, Jouyou, or Kanji Kentai levels ‚úì Create and manage your personal lists JAPANESE PHRASEBOOK ‚úì Over 900 Common Japanese phrases for real life communication grouped by themes ‚úì Smart quiz to improve your Japanese expression and comprehension skills ‚úì Learn Japanese phrases with audio clips and words in context ‚úì Each Japanese phrase can be broken down to get a list of words and detailed grammar explanation ‚úì Record your voice, and compare it to a native speaker's pronunciation ‚úì Create and manage your personal lists JAPANESE AURAL COMPREHENSION ‚úì Listen to entertaining illustrated situations ‚úì 3 levels of difficulty for each situation. Easy enough for beginners and challenging enough for advanced users ‚úì Take the final quiz to validate your comprehension ‚úì All words available in the vocabulary module to learn before listening to the text JAPANESE CULTURE GUIDE ‚úì Be ready for a culture shock and avoid embarrassing situations! ‚úì Fun and surprising detailed information on various topics of the Japanese culture ‚úì Get straight into the Japanese mind to understand how they think and behave. Japanese people will feel more comfortable with you. JAPANESE VOCABULARY ‚úì Thousands of words with audio clips grouped by themes ‚úì Take audio, writing, or even speaking quizzes ‚úì Comments explain the word when necessary ‚úì Search for any word with one easy-to-easy search box ‚úì Record your voice, and compare it to a native speaker's pronunciation ‚úì Create and manage your personal lists of Japanese words AND MUCH MORE TO DISCOVER... ‚úì Grammar: 185 easy to advanced grammar sheets with examples ordered by JLPT ‚úì Japanese Particles: 168 different usages with examples ‚úì Japanese Counters: 45 of the main counters with examples ‚úì Verbs and Adjectives: basic and advanced conjugation ‚úì Numbers: audio quiz, search tool, personal lists, etc. An in-app paid version is proposed to support the investments for new features and contents
descriptionHTML:
All-in-one application to learn Japanese. Hiragana, katakana, kanji, vocabulary, phrasebook, grammar, and MUCH more! Basic to advanced lessons. Smart progress tracking exercises to improve your writing, reading, speaking and listening skills. Discover surprising culture facts to think like a Japanese, and avoid embarrassing situations.


GENERAL IMPORTANT BENEFITS



‚òÖ On-going project since 2011, you are sure to get continuous updates and improvements
‚òÖ All audio clips by a native Japanese speaker for authentic Japanese pronunciation. No voice synthesis.
‚òÖ No Internet connection required, almost everything is downloadable
‚òÖ Highly customizable quizzes paired with the scientific SRS system that tracks your progress.
‚òÖ Adapted for beginners to advanced learners


DETAILED INFORMATION



PROGRESSIVE JAPANESE LESSONS
‚úì Ideal introduction to the Japanese language, and quick progress
‚úì For each lesson: Japanese dialogue, vocabulary, grammar, exercises, and a culture page
‚úì Take the final quiz to validate each lesson
‚úì Many entertaining and explanatory illustrations

JAPANESE KANA, KANJI, RADICALS
‚úì Phonetic information and audio recordings for each Japanese sound
‚úì Over 6,000 kanji with stroke orders, meanings, word examples, and more.
‚úì Kanji breakdown to analyze the composition of each kanji and remember it more easily
‚úì Powerful kanji search tools by radicals, meanings, on/kun readings, JLPT levels, etc.
‚úì Detailed kanji radicals information (Kangxi number, position, meaning, frequency, etc.)
‚úì Drawing tool to learn how to write kana/kanji/radicals with the right stroke order
‚úì Learn by JLPT, Jouyou, or Kanji Kentai levels
‚úì Create and manage your personal lists

JAPANESE PHRASEBOOK
‚úì Over 900 Common Japanese phrases for real life communication grouped by themes
‚úì Smart quiz to improve your Japanese expression and comprehension skills
‚úì Learn Japanese phrases with audio clips and words in context
‚úì Each Japanese phrase can be broken down to get a list of words and detailed grammar explanation
‚úì Record your voice, and compare it to a native speaker's pronunciation
‚úì Create and manage your personal lists

JAPANESE AURAL COMPREHENSION
‚úì Listen to entertaining illustrated situations
‚úì 3 levels of difficulty for each situation. Easy enough for beginners and challenging enough for advanced users
‚úì Take the final quiz to validate your comprehension
‚úì All words available in the vocabulary module to learn before listening to the text

JAPANESE CULTURE GUIDE
‚úì Be ready for a culture shock and avoid embarrassing situations!
‚úì Fun and surprising detailed information on various topics of the Japanese culture
‚úì Get straight into the Japanese mind to understand how they think and behave. Japanese people will feel more comfortable with you.

JAPANESE VOCABULARY
‚úì Thousands of words with audio clips grouped by themes
‚úì Take audio, writing, or even speaking quizzes
‚úì Comments explain the word when necessary
‚úì Search for any word with one easy-to-easy search box
‚úì Record your voice, and compare it to a native speaker's pronunciation
‚úì Create and manage your personal lists of Japanese words

AND MUCH MORE TO DISCOVER...
‚úì Grammar: 185 easy to advanced grammar sheets with examples ordered by JLPT
‚úì Japanese Particles: 168 different usages with examples
‚úì Japanese Counters: 45 of the main counters with examples
‚úì Verbs and Adjectives: basic and advanced conjugation
‚úì Numbers: audio quiz, search tool, personal lists, etc.

An in-app paid version is proposed to support the investments for new features and contents
summary: All aspects of the Japanese language and culture in a single professional app

title: iago - Learn Japanese
description:
iago is the first immersive Japanese Language Visual Novel game! Join Iako-chan and her parrot Iago on an adventure through Japan, learning the conversational phrases & grammar through real-world situations & scenarios! 

Key Features:
- Fully visual stories featuring Iako-chan, Iago, and the rest of the crew
- Dynamic conversations catered to you speaking naturally
- Design your own Japanese curriculum from a vast array of situations
- Receive pronunciation feedback as you practice speaking out loud
- Build grammar skills implicitly by learning phrases in context
- Study at your own pace with flexibility

Why You'll Love It:
- It's just as fun as a video game!
- Unique speak-first approach gets you conversing quickly
- Audio recorded by native Japanese speakers
- Covers casual, day-to-day language not found in textbooks
- More affordable than private tutoring

Join Iako-chan and learn  and start your personalized Japanese learning journey today!

title: MochiKanji - Learn Japanese
description:
MochiMochi - The most joyful Kanji & Japanese vocabulary learning application, helping you memorize 1000 Kanji in just 1 month.

1. JOYFUL LEARNING EXPERIENCE:
MochiMochi is the first application that focuses on delivering a joyful and exciting learning experience. Every detail in the app is perfectly designed to make you exclaim: "What a Mochi experience!" when you Learn Japanese

2. BRIGHT & FRIENDLY DESIGN:
MochiMochi is designed with bright colors to bring a positive, energetic feeling. The super cute duo - Mochi & Michi will follow you in the learning process wherever you are.

3. SPECIAL FEATURE "GOLDEN TIME"
Using special algorithms, MochiMochi analyzes your learning history and reminds you to review at "Golden Time" - the moment right before you forget your vocabulary. MochiMochi helps you learn less, memorize more effectively.

With hundreds of lessons, up to 6000+ Kanji & vocabulary, courses based on many several needs, MochiMochi could ensure that your vocabulary will rapidly increase in just a short time studying with MochiMochi

Download and experience for free today!

=== CONTACT INFORMATION ===
If you have any questions, please contact Mochi:
Website: mochidemy.com
Fanpage: MochiMochi
Email: mochidemy@gmail.com

title: Shinobi: Read & Learn Japanese
description: Shinobi: Read & Learn Japanese is the first reading-focused app that lets you grow from absolute beginner (below JLPT N5) all the way to JLPT N1‚Äîand beyond‚Äîthrough richly illustrated graded stories, daily easy news, and smart review tools. Instead of memorising lists, you absorb vocabulary, kanji and grammar together, in context. What makes Shinobi different ? ‚Ä¢ Graded illustrated stories ‚Äì Hundreds of short, level-tagged stories written by native Japanese teachers. Art, dialog and narration evolve as your level rises, keeping difficulty just right. ‚Ä¢ Daily easy news ‚Äì Follow Japanese news with bite-sized articles rewritten for learners; expand your vocabulary while exploring fresh topics every day. ‚Ä¢ Multi-input immersion ‚Äì Each page combines images, audio and clean text. Seeing, hearing and reading at once builds natural comprehension. ‚Ä¢ Think-in-Japanese approach ‚Äì Inline hints keep you inside the language; you understand meaning without bouncing back to your native tongue, training real-time thinking skills. ‚Ä¢ Smart review built in ‚Äì Tap any word or kanji to save it; spaced-repetition decks surface items just before you forget them, so knowledge sticks effortlessly. ‚Ä¢ Kanji, grammar and vocab together ‚Äì No need for separate apps: stories show how kanji, sentence patterns and new words work side-by-side inside a real story. ‚Ä¢ Adaptive progression ‚Äì Toggle Furigana on and Off, hide specific furigana and bookmarks important words. Why it works Context-first learning reinforces memory through storyline, visuals and sound. Micro-chapters (5-20 pages) fit busy schedules and build daily momentum. Gamified XP and streaks keep motivation high without gimmicks. Comprehensive coverage means one app for reading, listening and review. Start your journey today. Install Shinobi: Read & Learn Japanese !

Shinobi: Read & Learn Japanese is the first reading-focused app that lets you grow from absolute beginner (below JLPT N5) all the way to JLPT N1‚Äîand beyond‚Äîthrough richly illustrated graded stories, daily easy news, and smart review tools. Instead of memorising lists, you absorb vocabulary, kanji and grammar together, in context.

What makes Shinobi different ?

‚Ä¢ Graded illustrated stories ‚Äì Hundreds of short, level-tagged stories written by native Japanese teachers. Art, dialog and narration evolve as your level rises, keeping difficulty just right.
‚Ä¢ Daily easy news ‚Äì Follow Japanese news with bite-sized articles rewritten for learners; expand your vocabulary while exploring fresh topics every day.
‚Ä¢ Multi-input immersion ‚Äì Each page combines images, audio and clean text. Seeing, hearing and reading at once builds natural comprehension.
‚Ä¢ Think-in-Japanese approach ‚Äì Inline hints keep you inside the language; you understand meaning without bouncing back to your native tongue, training real-time thinking skills.
‚Ä¢ Smart review built in ‚Äì Tap any word or kanji to save it; spaced-repetition decks surface items just before you forget them, so knowledge sticks effortlessly.

Context-first learning reinforces memory through storyline, visuals and sound.

Micro-chapters (5-20 pages) fit busy schedules and build daily momentum.

Gamified XP and streaks keep motivation high without gimmicks.

Comprehensive coverage means one app for reading, listening and review.

Start your journey today. Install Shinobi: Read & Learn Japanese !

title: Learn Japanese - 11,000 Words

title: kawaiiDungeon - Learn Japanese

title: Learn Japanese! KURASHI STUDY
description: „ÄêSPECIAL OFFER„Äë All functions are available for free!! Due to 3 PM 20 September (JST) Don't miss out!!! Start learning Japanese! MADE IN JAPAN Experienced Japanese teachers designed our curriculum! üëâ Free features available üëâ Grammar, vocabulary, listening and practice questions üëâ Learn about Japanese living by reading stories! üëâ Rich audio! Let's study Japanese in a fun way! üëâ Recommended for studying for the JLPT(N5 N4 N3 N2) =What is KURASHI STUDY= KURASHI STUDY is an online learning app that helps you learn "Real Japanese" & "Japanese lifestyle" by reading stories like a book. With rich audio content, you can naturally aim to pass the JLPT. Grammar, vocabulary, listening, and practice questions all in one app. Good to improve reading, writing and listening. You can enjoy studying daily life manners, administrative rules, and other knowledge necessary for living in Japan. =Features= ‚úÖ Through the stories, learn useful Japanese phrases for daily life ‚úÖ Learn the necessary manners and government rules to live in Japan ‚úÖ JLPT N5 to N2 level skills acquired naturally ‚úÖ Available in English, Vietnamese and Japanese =Recommended for= - Don't have the time or money to enrol to a Japanese language school - Can't find a convenient, continuous and enjoyable app to learn Japanese Want to... - Pass the JLPT - Study Japanese before going to Japan - Learn practical Japanese that can be used in daily life =Story Mode=. You will learn grammar, vocabulary, and expressions by listening to the audio and reading the explanations of the conversational sentences. üëâPOINT 1 Learn useful Japanese for daily life The main character of the story is Emma, who lives in Japan as an international student from Italy. Let's study words and expressions commonly used in Japanese daily life through conversations with her friends. üëâPOINT 2 Knowledge necessary for life in Japan 96 scenes are released - Manners in shared houses and schools - Rules of government offices and hospitals - Part-time job, travel, etc. Let's learn useful knowledge about life in Japan. üëâPOINT 3 100K letters of audio recorded by Japanese native voice actors All conversations, sample sentences, and expressions have audio. The audio is recorded at a natural speed and in a natural way so that you can use it in daily life in Japan. Good for - Pronunciation check - Listening practice - Shadowing practice üëâPOINT 4 Prepare for the JLPT Our exercises are designed according to the format of the JLPT exam. Experienced Japanese teachers designed curriculum. =Self-study mode= üëâWordbank Plenty of illustrations and audio! Learn daily use vocabulary repeatedly by watching, listening and reading. üëâGrammar notes JLPT N5 to N2 level grammar is covered. Japanese basic grammar that you need to live in Japan is in a single app. You can study Japanese anytime, anywhere. No need to carry your heavy grammar books anymore. üëâDrill Study difficult Japanese verb conjugations repeatedly in an easy and fun way with drills. Just select the dials and answer the exercise questions. üëâPractice: Time & Date Check how to read and pronounce the time / the dates in Japanese. Just set a clock dial or tap the calendar to practice repeatedly with audio. Japanese Culture and Customs Quiz Let's study the Japanese language by taking quizzes. On the "Challenge mode" you can battle with users from all over the world for the best score. =Try now = Download and learn some features for free. descriptionHTML:
„ÄêSPECIAL OFFER„Äë
All functions are available for free!!
Due to 3 PM 20 September (JST)

Don't miss out!!!
Start learning Japanese!

MADE IN JAPAN
Experienced Japanese teachers designed our curriculum!

üëâ Free features available
üëâ Grammar, vocabulary, listening and practice questions
üëâ Learn about Japanese living by reading stories!
üëâ Rich audio! Let's study Japanese in a fun way!
üëâ Recommended for studying for the JLPT(N5 N4 N3 N2)

=What is KURASHI STUDY=
KURASHI STUDY is an online learning app that helps you learn "Real Japanese" & "Japanese lifestyle" by reading stories like a book. With rich audio content, you can naturally aim to pass the JLPT. Grammar, vocabulary, listening, and practice questions all in one app. Good to improve reading, writing and listening. You can enjoy studying daily life manners, administrative rules, and other knowledge necessary for living in Japan.

=Features=
‚úÖ Through the stories, learn useful Japanese phrases for daily life
‚úÖ Learn the necessary manners and government rules to live in Japan
‚úÖ JLPT N5 to N2 level skills acquired naturally
‚úÖ Available in English, Vietnamese and Japanese

=Recommended for=
- Don't have the time or money to enrol to a Japanese language school
- Can't find a convenient, continuous and enjoyable app to learn Japanese
Want to...
- Pass the JLPT
- Study Japanese before going to Japan
- Learn practical Japanese that can be used in daily life

=Story Mode=.
You will learn grammar, vocabulary, and expressions by listening to the audio and reading the explanations of the conversational sentences.

üëâPOINT 1
Learn useful Japanese for daily life
The main character of the story is Emma, who lives in Japan as an international student from Italy. Let's study words and expressions commonly used in Japanese daily life through conversations with her friends.

üëâPOINT 2
Knowledge necessary for life in Japan
96 scenes are released
- Manners in shared houses and schools
- Rules of government offices and hospitals
- Part-time job, travel, etc.
Let's learn useful knowledge about life in Japan.

üëâPOINT 3
100K letters of audio recorded by Japanese native voice actors
All conversations, sample sentences, and expressions have audio. The audio is recorded at a natural speed and in a natural way so that you can use it in daily life in Japan.
Good for
- Pronunciation check
- Listening practice
- Shadowing practice

üëâPOINT 4
Prepare for the JLPT
Our exercises are designed according to the format of the JLPT exam. Experienced Japanese teachers designed curriculum.

=Self-study mode=
üëâWordbank
Plenty of illustrations and audio!
Learn daily use vocabulary repeatedly by watching, listening and reading.

üëâGrammar notes
JLPT N5 to N2 level grammar is covered.
Japanese basic grammar that you need to live in Japan is in a single app. You can study Japanese anytime, anywhere. No need to carry your heavy grammar books anymore.

üëâDrill
Study difficult Japanese verb conjugations repeatedly in an easy and fun way with drills. Just select the dials and answer the exercise questions.

üëâPractice: Time & Date
Check how to read and pronounce the time / the dates in Japanese. Just set a clock dial or tap the calendar to practice repeatedly with audio.

Japanese Culture and Customs Quiz
Let's study the Japanese language by taking quizzes. On the "Challenge mode" you can battle with users from all over the world for the best score.

Download and learn some features for free. If you purchase a paid plan, you can learn all the features without restrictions.

title: Japanese Kanji Study - Êº¢Â≠óÂ≠¶Áøí
description: Kanji Study aims to be a helpful and easy-to-use tool for learning Japanese kanji. The app includes SRS, flashcards, multiple choice quizzes, writing challenges, kanji and word search, custom sets and much more. Kanji Study hopes to be your essential companion for mastering kanji. The app is not entirely free; however, the free version has no ads and offers unlimited study of beginner kanji, radicals, hiragana and katakana. The dictionary and all info screens are also free and unrestricted. The one-time upgrade unlocks the remaining kanji levels and allows you to create your own custom sets. It also supports the continued development of this project. Main Features ‚òÖ Flashcard study ‚Ä¢ Rote memorize kanji in manageable sized sets. ‚Ä¢ View stroke animations, readings, meanings and examples. ‚Ä¢ Customize theme, layout, displayed actions and swipe behavior. ‚Ä¢ Assign study ratings to filter kanji out as you learn them. ‚òÖ Multiple-choice quizzes ‚Ä¢ Customize quizzes to show readings, meanings, example words or sentences. ‚Ä¢ Example words can be selected from JLPT, common vocab and favorites. ‚Ä¢ Quiz times and distractors adapt based on your results. ‚Ä¢ Further customize to repeat wrong answers, auto-play audio, pause after answering and more. ‚òÖ Writing challenges ‚Ä¢ Improve your kanji recognition by challenging yourself to recall and write kanji. ‚Ä¢ Learn the correct stroke order using a finely-tuned stroke detection algorithm. ‚Ä¢ Correct strokes will snap into place and hints will appear if you are struggling. ‚Ä¢ Detect accuracy stroke by stroke or use the self-assessment mode. ‚òÖ Quick kanji and word search ‚Ä¢ Search over 6k kanji using readings, radicals, stroke counts, levels and more all in one text field. ‚Ä¢ Search over 180k words by kanji, kana, romaji or translation language in the same one text field. ‚Ä¢ Combine any number of criteria and see them highlighted in the results. ‚Ä¢ Completely offline and very optimized for quick searching. ‚òÖ Detailed info screens ‚Ä¢ View animated strokes, readings and meanings as well as your study time and quiz stats. ‚Ä¢ See a breakdown of the radicals found within each kanji. ‚Ä¢ Check out example words (grouped by the kanji readings), sentences and names. ‚Ä¢ Explore the kanji used within each of the examples and use the breadcrumbs to navigate back. Additional Features ‚òÖ Study kanji in various sequences including JLPT and Japanese school grades. ‚òÖ Notify yourself with custom study reminders when you haven't studied. ‚òÖ Read Japanese text with over 8k native audio files and text-to-speech support. ‚òÖ Add shortcuts to your home screen to study a particular set. ‚òÖ Use the rankings screen to make custom sets based on study stats. ‚òÖ Favorite kanji, radicals and examples for referencing later. ‚òÖ Save progress using Google Drive or local storage. ‚òÖ Customize MANY additional settings. Add-ons ‚òÖ Guided Study Continue the kanji study journey with unlimited use of the SRS module that tracks kanji and schedules them for review, optimizing your learning efficiency. ‚òÖ Graded Reading Sets Learn kanji through reading. Adds 30k+ mini reading exercises graded kanji-by-kanji in the Kanji Learner's Course sequence. ‚òÖ Outlier Kanji Dictionary Understand the underlying logic behind the Japanese writing system by learning how kanji actually work. Permissions (optional) - In-app Purchase (purchase upgrade) - External Drive (store backup files) - Install Shortcuts (add home screen shortcuts) - Run at startup (reschedule notifications) - Full network access (send analytics) Translations There is a volunteer translation project with contributions to over 30 languages. If you would like to help, please send me an email.
descriptionHTML:
Kanji Study aims to be a helpful and easy-to-use tool for learning Japanese kanji. The app includes SRS, flashcards, multiple choice quizzes, writing challenges, kanji and word search, custom sets and much more. Kanji Study hopes to be your essential companion for mastering kanji.

The app is not entirely free; however, the free version has no ads and offers unlimited study of beginner kanji, radicals, hiragana and katakana. The dictionary and all info screens are also free and unrestricted. The one-time upgrade unlocks the remaining kanji levels and allows you to create your own custom sets. It also supports the continued development of this project.

Main Features

‚òÖ Flashcard study
‚Ä¢ Rote memorize kanji in manageable sized sets.
‚Ä¢ View stroke animations, readings, meanings and examples.
‚Ä¢ Customize theme, layout, displayed actions and swipe behavior.
‚Ä¢ Assign study ratings to filter kanji out as you learn them.

‚òÖ Multiple-choice quizzes
‚Ä¢ Customize quizzes to show readings, meanings, example words or sentences.
‚Ä¢ Example words can be selected from JLPT, common vocab and favorites.
‚Ä¢ Quiz times and distractors adapt based on your results.
‚Ä¢ Further customize to repeat wrong answers, auto-play audio, pause after answering and more.

‚òÖ Writing challenges
‚Ä¢ Improve your kanji recognition by challenging yourself to recall and write kanji.
‚Ä¢ Learn the correct stroke order using a finely-tuned stroke detection algorithm.
‚Ä¢ Correct strokes will snap into place and hints will appear if you are struggling.
‚Ä¢ Detect accuracy stroke by stroke or use the self-assessment mode.

‚òÖ Quick kanji and word search
‚Ä¢ Search over 6k kanji using readings, radicals, stroke counts, levels and more all in one text field.
‚Ä¢ Search over 180k words by kanji, kana, romaji or translation language in the same one text field.
‚Ä¢ Combine any number of criteria and see them highlighted in the results.
‚Ä¢ Completely offline and very optimized for quick searching.

‚òÖ Detailed info screens
‚Ä¢ View animated strokes, readings and meanings as well as your study time and quiz stats.
‚Ä¢ See a breakdown of the radicals found within each kanji.
‚Ä¢ Check out example words (grouped by the kanji readings), sentences and names.
‚Ä¢ Explore the kanji used within each of the examples and use the breadcrumbs to navigate back.

Additional Features

‚òÖ Study kanji in various sequences including JLPT and Japanese school grades.
‚òÖ Notify yourself with custom study reminders when you haven't studied.
‚òÖ Read Japanese text with over 8k native audio files and text-to-speech support.
‚òÖ Add shortcuts to your home screen to study a particular set.
‚òÖ Use the rankings screen to make custom sets based on study stats.
‚òÖ Favorite kanji, radicals and examples for referencing later.
‚òÖ Save progress using Google Drive or local storage.
‚òÖ Customize MANY additional settings.

Add-ons

‚òÖ Guided Study
Continue the kanji study journey with unlimited use of the SRS module that tracks kanji and schedules them for review, optimizing your learning efficiency.

‚òÖ Graded Reading Sets
Learn kanji through reading. Adds 30k+ mini reading exercises graded kanji-by-kanji in the Kanji Learner's Course sequence.

‚òÖ Outlier Kanji Dictionary
Understand the underlying logic behind the Japanese writing system by learning how kanji actually work.

Permissions (optional)

- In-app Purchase (purchase upgrade)
- External Drive (store backup files)
- Install Shortcuts (add home screen shortcuts)
- Run at startup (reschedule notifications)
- Full network access (send analytics)

Translations

There is a volunteer translation project with contributions to over 30 languages. If you would like to help, please send me an email.
summary: Highly customizable kanji learning companion for your Japanese studies.

title: Learn Japanese Fast: Course
description:
So, you want to learn Japanese in no time? You need MosaLingua! Innovative and effective, our application has helped more than 13,000,000 people all over the world learn Japanese in only 10 minutes per day - with actual results!

Popular on app stores, MosaLingua also comes highly recommended by the media and many specialized blogs.

Learn more about MosaLingua by watching the demonstration video on https://mosalingua.com.
Feel free to try our smartphone application for free: you'll see for yourself how well it works!
It's a powerful and effective tool - ideal for people who want to speak Japanese in no time, without taking long, boring language courses.

It's useful in any situation: our method can help you while you travel, in the workplace, and in everyday life with our courses that suit your language needs.

THE BENEFITS OF MOSALINGUA: 
1) Useful, practical content
Don't waste your time with notions and courses that won't help you. Instead, learn the 20% that you'll use 80% of the time.

2) An innovative method based on scientific research
Our international team is made up of expert polyglots who've used the most modern and proven learning, memorization and consolidation techniques (SRS, active recall, metacognition, etc.).

3) Coaching throughout the learning process
To succeed, you can count on our review sessions that consolidate what you've learned, our mini lessons, and our advice for better understanding Japanese vocabulary.

4) Learning and having fun at the same time
Achieve great results and have fun doing so: your progress will boost your MOTIVATION, which is key to any learning plan.

If you want to learn Japanese, download the MosaLingua Learn Japanese app and try it free ‚Äì you won't regret it!

title: Learn Japanese: N5-N2 News
description:
Daily Japanese Language News & Stories. Teacher-Crafted. Student-Ready.

Master Japanese with Readle, the top-rated language-learning app. üáØüáµüáØüáµüáØüáµ Immerse yourself in real-world news and stories, boosting your skills from beginner N5 to advanced N2 JLPT levels. Read and listen to Japanese content anytime, anywhere, and expand your vocabulary in just 10 minutes a day. Start learning Japanese the new way with Readle today! Why Choose Readle? ‚Ä¢ Our team of language experts transforms real-world news and stories into fun & bite-sized Japanese lessons at N5, N4, N3, and N2 levels tailored to your level. ‚Ä¢ Your best companion for reading, listening, grammar, comprehension, and vocabulary with our extensive collection of story courses and flashcards. ‚Ä¢ Achieve Japanese fluency with utmost efficiency and effectiveness. Download Readle for FREE and learn Japanese the new way! LEARN JAPANESE THROUGH IMMERSION Study Japanese effectively with our scientifically backed immersion technique. Our language experts curate engaging real-world stories & news, crafting lessons designed explicitly for N5, N4, N3, and N2 JLPT levels. BITE-SIZED JAPANESE STORIES With over 1000 stories & news articles, Readle offers fun and bite-sized learning lessons with audio that will effectively boost your reading, listening, grammar, and vocabulary skills. LEARN JAPANESE WRITING SYSTEMS Read Japanese and learn the three Japanese writing systems with our N5-N2 stories. Read Hiragana, Katakana, and basic Kanji in one place. With practice, you can master Japanese writing systems and read Katakana, Hiragana, and Kanji with ease. PERFECT PRONUNCIATION Discover how Japanese words sound, listen to the story sentence by sentence, and improve your pronunciation by repeating after native Japanese speakers. Our interactive study tools enhance your listening and pronunciation skills. And with our Romaji helper, you'll perfect your pronunciation with a native-sounding accent. INSTANT DICTIONARY & TRANSLATION Tap to access Japanese word translations in stories - the most convenient way to enrich vocabulary, grasp phrases, understand verbs, and master conjugation. Our new sentence translation feature improves comprehensive skills quickly, saving time by eliminating the need to switch between dictionaries or translation tools. JAPANESE GRAMMAR HELPER Learn Japanese grammar through the immersive language learning experience. Discover practical examples embedded in each story context that truly bring the language to life. Enhance your understanding of Japanese grammar with real examples. COMPREHENSION QUIZZES Challenge your reading skills and reinforce your Japanese grammar and vocabulary with our comprehensive quizzes in each story ‚Äì a great way to challenge your Japanese language skills and prepare yourself for JLPT tests. VOCABULARY WORD LISTS & FLASHCARDS Master Japanese vocabulary and verb conjugation effortlessly with our vocabulary list and flashcards with the spaced repetition learning method. Expand your vocabulary effectively with our carefully crafted study materials. STORY LIBRARY & DAILY NEW STORY Discover an extensive library of over 1,000 news and story lessons covering a wide variety of captivating topics. Immerse yourself in the world of Japanese language learning, expanding your vocabulary and effortlessly acquiring new words. - Travel - Culture - Food - Latest News - Entertainment - Science and Medical - Technology Plus, much more content ‚Äì updated daily! Readle is the must-have foreign language learning app for self-studying, vocabulary building, living, or visiting Japan. Accelerate your Japanese language learning journey and reach Japanese fluency with Readle. Do you have questions or feedback about learning Japanese with Readle? Contact us at support@readle-app.com. We are here to help! Privacy policy: https://readle-app.com/privacy-policy/ Terms of use: https://readle-app.com/term-of-use/
descriptionHTML:
Daily Japanese Language News & Stories. Teacher-Crafted. Student-Ready.



Master Japanese with Readle, the top-rated language-learning app. üáØüáµüáØüáµüáØüáµ
Immerse yourself in real-world news and stories, boosting your skills from beginner N5 to advanced N2 JLPT levels. Read and listen to Japanese content anytime, anywhere, and expand your vocabulary in just 10 minutes a day. Start learning Japanese the new way with Readle today!

Why Choose Readle?
‚Ä¢ Our team of language experts transforms real-world news and stories into fun & bite-sized Japanese lessons at N5, N4, N3, and N2 levels tailored to your level.
‚Ä¢ Your best companion for reading, listening, grammar, comprehension, and vocabulary with our extensive collection of story courses and flashcards.
‚Ä¢ Achieve Japanese fluency with utmost efficiency and effectiveness.

Download Readle for FREE and learn Japanese the new way!

LEARN JAPANESE THROUGH IMMERSION
Study Japanese effectively with our scientifically backed immersion technique. Our language experts curate engaging real-world stories & news, crafting lessons designed explicitly for N5, N4, N3, and N2 JLPT levels.

BITE-SIZED JAPANESE STORIES
With over 1000 stories & news articles, Readle offers fun and bite-sized learning lessons with audio that will effectively boost your reading, listening, grammar, and vocabulary skills.

LEARN JAPANESE WRITING SYSTEMS
Read Japanese and learn the three Japanese writing systems with our N5-N2 stories. Read Hiragana, Katakana, and basic Kanji in one place. With practice, you can master Japanese writing systems and read Katakana, Hiragana, and Kanji with ease.

PERFECT PRONUNCIATION
Discover how Japanese words sound, listen to the story sentence by sentence, and improve your pronunciation by repeating after native Japanese speakers. Our interactive study tools enhance your listening and pronunciation skills. And with our Romaji helper, you'll perfect your pronunciation with a native-sounding accent.

INSTANT DICTIONARY & TRANSLATION
Tap to access Japanese word translations in stories - the most convenient way to enrich vocabulary, grasp phrases, understand verbs, and master conjugation. Our new sentence translation feature improves comprehensive skills quickly, saving time by eliminating the need to switch between dictionaries or translation tools.

JAPANESE GRAMMAR HELPER
Learn Japanese grammar through the immersive language learning experience. Discover practical examples embedded in each story context that truly bring the language to life. Enhance your understanding of Japanese grammar with real examples.

COMPREHENSION QUIZZES
Challenge your reading skills and reinforce your Japanese grammar and vocabulary with our comprehensive quizzes in each story ‚Äì a great way to challenge your Japanese language skills and prepare yourself for JLPT tests.

VOCABULARY WORD LISTS & FLASHCARDS
Master Japanese vocabulary and verb conjugation effortlessly with our vocabulary list and flashcards with the spaced repetition learning method. Expand your vocabulary effectively with our carefully crafted study materials.

STORY LIBRARY & DAILY NEW STORY
Discover an extensive library of over 1,000 news and story lessons covering a wide variety of captivating topics. Immerse yourself in the world of Japanese language learning, expanding your vocabulary and effortlessly acquiring new words.

- Travel
- Culture
- Food
- Latest News
- Entertainment
- Science and Medical
- Technology

Plus, much more content ‚Äì updated daily!

Readle is the must-have foreign language learning app for self-studying, vocabulary building, living, or visiting Japan. Accelerate your Japanese language learning journey and reach Japanese fluency with Readle.

Do you have questions or feedback about learning Japanese with Readle? Contact us at support@readle-app.com. We are here to help!

Privacy policy: https://readle-app.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of use: https://readle-app.com/term-of-use/
