title: Japanese Dictionary Takoboto
description:
Offline Japanese-English dictionary and Japanese language learning study tool. Includes example sentences, kanji information and conjugated forms for each word. Some Japanese words are also translated to many other languages (see below).

The words can be searched using kanji, kana, romaji or latin alphabets. Full sentences and conjugated forms are also recognized. Kanji can be searched by selecting multiple radicals.

FREE FEATURES:

- 200,000+ Japanese words with English translations
- Search as you type with kanji, kana, romaji or alphabet
- Example phrases to see how words are used
- Easy kanji search by selecting multiple radicals
- Conjugations are provided and can be searched as well
- Common misspellings are recognized
- Voice audio using text-to-speech
- Dark theme for studying Japanese at night
- Export to AnkiDroid
- Favorites, history and custom lists of words for review
- Flashcards
- Can add your own custom translations and contribute new words
- Ready-made study lists
- Kana charts
- Japanese grammar links to external web sites
- Pitch display
- Japanese definitions for some words

TAKOBOTO CLOUD (requires paid subscription):

- Synchronize your lists and study data
- Backup your lists and translations to the cloud
- Share lists with others and download shared online study lists
- Access extra online resources such as real voice audio
- Remove ads
- Integrated kanji search by drawing
- Study game / study quizzes (beta)

LANGUAGES:

The Japanese words are partially translated to many languages. Translations can be contributed directly from the app too. Available languages are:

- Japanese ‚Üî English (100% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî German (66% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Russian (43% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Spanish (31% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Dutch (29% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Hungarian (28% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî French (26% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Thai (23% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Portuguese (22% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Indonesian (20% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Swedish (20% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Chinese (19% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Italian (19% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Polish (18% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Finnish (17% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Korean (17% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Persian (16% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Vietnamese (16% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Ukrainian (15% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Arabic (15% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Czech (14% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Danish (12% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Romanian (12% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Slovene (11% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Greek (11% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Lithuanian (8% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Malay (8% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Hindi (8% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Latvian (7% translated)
- Japanese ‚Üî Tagalog (6% translated)

PERMISSIONS

The app uses the internet connection and foreground service permissions to synchronize study and languages data.

ACKNOWLEDGMENT 

Like most of the Japanese dictionary apps out there, the data is from the awesome JMdict project made by the Electronic Dictionary Research and Development Group thanks to Jim Breen and others.

BETA TESTING

If you'd like to get more frequent updates with experimental features (and bugs), please subscribe to receive beta versions by following this link:
https://play.google.com/apps/testing/jp.takoboto

title: KanaOrigin - Learn Japanese
description:
KanaOrigin is an app for learning Japanese Kana, but it's more than that.

- Origins
Starting from the origins, we will take you through the origins of Japanese kana and its relationship with kanji, helping you to better understand and distinguish these kana.

- Quick Search
The Quick Checklist will help you quickly find the kana, date and number you want to know when you need it.

- Learning
A learning style that incorporates multiple memory modes for intensive review based on the forgetting curve and proficiency level. And you can learn some useful Japanese words in line with your learning progress.

In the latest version, an Apple Watch version has been added, so you can get something out of it anytime, anywhere.

- Test
Reinforce your memory of unfamiliar kana through spelling.

- Words
Enhance your memory and understanding of words with vivid 3D models

More features are in the works. You can send an email to kevin@myoland.com to give your feedback.

title: Bunpro Japanese SRS
description:
Master Japanese with Bunpro!

Bunpro is a dynamic tool for learning Japanese that combines expert guidance with an engaging, learner-focused experience. The platform is designed for users of all levels, from those just starting with Hiragana & Katakana, to those who have already passed a JLPT exam. Bunpro offers meticulously crafted lessons, personalized reviews, and interactive practice that empower you to navigate Japanese grammar and vocabulary with confidence and ease.

Key Features:
* 25 JLPT practice tests with full offline support
* Content-Rich Curriculum: Explore over 900 grammar points to learn, each with a hand-crafted explanation to deepen your understanding.
* Diverse Vocabulary Decks: Learn from countless Decks featuring content from anime, manga, textbooks, and more ‚Äî making vocabulary learning engaging and immersion easier. 
* Rich Example Sentences: Immerse yourself in our vast library of 100k+ hand written example sentences that are crafted to showcase unique nuances of the language, all with audio recordings to deepen immersion/studying!
* Smart SRS Reviews: Retain what you learn with our intelligent spaced repetition system that adapts to your progress.
* Interactive Practice: If your answer is incorrect or nearly correct, our system instantly provides targeted feedback to pinpoint your mistakes to help make things as clear as possible.
* Progress Tracking: Stay motivated with detailed stats, streaks, and goal-setting features as you advance toward fluency.

Embark on your journey to Japanese fluency today ‚Äî risk-free! Enjoy a one-month free trial to explore all of Bunpro‚Äôs features and see the difference it makes in your learning. Download now and experience the most engaging way to master Japanese grammar and vocabulary!

title: KanjiKen - Learn Japanese
description:
Learn Japanese with KanjiKen!

KanjiKen takes you all the way from being a complete beginner to knowing Hiragana, Katakana, and all the 2000+ Kanji characters required to be able to read Japanese! Along the way, you will also discover more than 2000 of the most common Japanese words, sorted by real-world usage data, and unlocked once you know the relevant characters. Learn Hiragana, Katakana, Kanji, and Vocabulary, all in one place with KanjiKen!

--- Info ---

KanjiKen (Êº¢Â≠óÂâ£ - lit. Kanji Sword) is here to help you learn Japanese!

Based on real Japanese language usage data, KanjiKen teaches the most common characters and words first. Learn how kanji characters are built and depend on each other, by puzzling together their sub-components by placing the components in the right place. Learn how to pronounce them with common word examples. Practice Hiragana and Katakana with the reading exercises.

KanjiKen offers a complete Kanji and Vocabulary list with a single button press. Don't worry about learning order or what to repeat next, KanjiKen got you covered! With a built-in spaced repetition system (SRS), KanjiKen prioritizes the exercises you struggle with most and helps you memorize and review the exercises effectively. If you get something wrong, the exercise will show up more. If you get a certain exercise right, it will show up less and less, before getting marked as learned and removed from your learning queue.

Study whenever you want. Unlike other apps, KanjiKen will never ask you to commit to unreasonable tasks, like doing hundreds of reviews on a single day. KanjiKen simply asks you to set a achivable time commitment, and helps you keep on track with a streak system and notifications. KanjiKen adapts to you, not the other way around.

--- Usage ---

KanjiKen is designed to be used in short sessions. Set a daily goal, anything between 1 and 30 minutes, and fill your daily quota while waiting for the bus, during downtime, or during a lunch break. A session is over if you hit your daily goal or make too many mistakes. But don't worry! You can start a new session after the time-out period of 30 minutes is over. Hit your daily goal and have some extra time? Just dismiss your daily goal and keep going!

--- Premium ---

Do you want to support further development of KanjiKen?

With KanjiKen Premium you will not only help out the developer but also gain unlimited hearts. Study how long you want, when you want, completely ad-free and without worrying about mistakes. Take a day off, since Premium users can go two days before their streak breaks. Terms of Service (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

title: HelloChinese: Learn Chinese
description: HelloChinese is the best Mandarin Chinese learning app for beginners! Designed in a fun and highly effective manner, HelloChinese helps you rapidly learn Mandarin Chinese from scratch to a conversational level. With HelloChinese, learners can "learn the Chinese language, explore Chinese culture" ‚Äì you will not only learn Mandarin Chinese but also enjoy the process of delving into the culture intertwined with the language. Features: ‚óâ Game-based Chinese learning: You will never get bored. ‚óâ 1000+ graded stories: read engaging stories at your level! ‚óâ Immersive lessons help you to have real-life, practical conversations quickly. ‚óâ Over 2,000 videos - all featuring authentic Chinese speakers! ‚óâ Innovative self-adaptive learning games that incorporate Chinese cultural education. ‚óâ Speech recognition corrects your pronunciation and makes speaking Chinese a breeze. ‚óâ Handwriting specially designed to learn Chinese characters at a faster rate. ‚óâ Systematic courses based on HSK levels. ‚óâ A well-designed Pinyin (pronunciation) course for newbies. ‚óâ Bite-sized curriculum to fortify your Chinese listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills. ‚óâ Simplified and traditional Chinese(Mandarin) are both supported. ‚óâ Offline accessibility: Once a course is downloaded, no internet connection is required. ‚óâ Study progress tracking across multiple devices. With these tools at your disposal, nothing can stop you from mastering Chinese. Start on your path to fluency today! Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HelloChineseApp/ Privacy Policy: http://www.hellochinese.cc/privacy.html Terms of Use: http://www.hellochinese.cc/terms.html Premium users can always reach us at premium@hellochinese.cc if they need any help.

title: SuperChinese: Learn Chinese
description:
Learn Mandarin Chinese faster using Artificial Intelligence. Inspire your biggest potential and talent.

SuperChinese is the world's leading Chinese learning app, based on Artificial Intelligence. It satisfies variety of needs from zero experience learner to professionals.

All the Best Language Learning Approaches Integrated Into 1 Super App 

Powered By AI
¬∑	Spaced Repetition: Remember effortlessly 
¬∑	Animated Videos: Conceptualize Faster
¬∑	Thematic Lessons: Understand Context 
¬∑	Complete fluency: speak Chinese, read Chinese, write characters and improve your Chinese listening
¬∑	Gamification: Enjoy learning Chinese 

For basic Chinese learners we cover Pinyin (think of it as the Chinese alphabet!) so you can learn how to speak Chinese and improve your Chinese pronunciation. Beginner Chinese language learners will find it easy to start learning their target language with Super Chinese. It‚Äôs simple to learn Chinese characters, Chinese vocabulary and essential Chinese phrases. Super Chinese makes learning Chinese easy. 

Features that make learning Mandarin Chinese simple!

Expertly crafted for your success

SuperChinese uses advanced AI technology to meet your personal learning style. Lessons are drawn from a wide range of real-life topics, presented in a way that sticks. 

No need for a language tutor, our Chinese lessons are built to cover all aspects of learning a new language: speak Chinese, read and write Chinese characters, and improve your Chinese listening skills. Are you a beginner? Start with Chinese pinyin. 

Don‚Äôt worry about remembering, focus on what matters our app will do the rest. Language learning made easy!

AI based proficiency Test: Your Chinese test

A unique and precise way to know your exact Chinese level. Customize your learning experience and set yourself on the path to complete Chinese fluency. From basic Chinese to advanced learners of Mandarin Chinese, with our free level test, you‚Äôll always start at the right level. 

Bite-Sized Lessons: Learning Chinese is easy

Learning built around your busy schedule. Each lesson takes about 10-15 minutes to complete, keep your streak going. It only takes a little time every day to improve your Chinese skill.

Speech Recognition: Speak Chinese fluently

Speak like a native. Pronounce words in the right tone and understand their contextual meaning in daily conversations. Super Chinese offers you a faster way to speak Chinese. Struggling with learning Mandarin pronunciation? Your AI language tutor let‚Äôs you know where you need to improve. It doesn‚Äôt just work for Chinese vocabulary, it also works for Chinese phrases! 

Animated Thematic Videos: Top Chinese content

We understand it‚Äôs not easy to learn a foreign language, so we‚Äôve created videos with real dialogue that you can use in a Chinese conversation anytime. It‚Äôs fun and easy! 

Quality Content: easy Chinese lessons

Enjoy over 400 Lessons, split into 9 Chinese levels and based on more than 50 interesting themes. Remember effortlessly through AI powered spaced repetition. Learn Chinese systematically, from basic Chinese to advanced Chinese, we have the right content for all Chinese language learners. 

Accelerate your path to fluency, speak Mandarin Chinese faster
SuperChinese + will give you unlimited access to all top language learning features for the duration of your subscription. 

„ÄäSuper Chinese User terms„Äãhttps://api.superchinese.com/app/protocol
„ÄäSuper Chinese subscription renewal terms„Äãhttps://api.superchinese.com/app/autorenew-protocol 

SPEAK CONFIDENTLY, LIVE MORE

Invest in your future today. Learn Chinese faster using artificial intelligence. Join over a million Chinese learners and download the Super Chinese APP today.

ChineseSkill is a must-have app for all Mandarin Chinese learners, designed by professional CSL (Chinese as a Second Language) teachers with special attention to the unique features of Mandarin Chinese.

Whether you want to work, study, travel, communicate with family, pass the HSK test, or just speak Chinese fluently, ChineseSkill is here to help.

ChineseSkill will teach you everything from Pinyin to Hanzi strokes to essential Chinese vocabulary and practical Chinese grammar. If you're looking to improve your Chinese listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills, ChineseSkill is the way to go!

Why learn Mandarin Chinese with ChineseSkill?
ü§ì Gamified lessons... for serious learners: ChineseSkill Mandarin lessons are short, diverse, practical, and filled with authentic native-speaker audio and video materials! Every unit is complete with helpful Tips, where every Chinese grammar point is explained so you are never left guessing.
üìñ Smart reviews: Ensure easy retention with a wide variety of practice modes, including integrated SRS (Spaced Repetition System).
üí¨ Speaking practice: Bring your Chinese tones up to speed with our Tone Training feature, then put your knowledge to the test with your personalized AI Tutor. Automatic speech assessment and improvement suggestions are included!

‚ú® KEY FEATURES ‚ú®

1. Main Course:
- 500+ engaging bite-sized lessons: Learn every grammar point necessary to pass HSK 4 with flying colors.
- Native-speaker audio & video: Get familiar with authentic Chinese pronunciation.

- Handwriting Practice in every unit: Teach yourself to write Chinese characters stroke by stroke.

- Diverse review modes: Practice makes characters, words, and expressions perfect!

- 100+ topics for stress-free conversations: Speak Chinese on topics that interest YOU!

- Offline learning.

title: Du Chinese: Read&Learn Chinese
description:
Du Chinese is a reading and listening app that helps you learn Chinese naturally, at your own pace. Whether you're a beginner or studying for HSK, learn Chinese while building confidence and vocabulary, one story at a time.

Find free lessons to help you learn Chinese with our wide variety of articles, stories, and courses designed for Chinese learners from beginner to advanced levels. Practice Chinese with pinyin, native audio, and translations with just a tap. Easily access our built-in dictionary, grammar explanations, and flashcards to help you learn Chinese more efficiently. 

Easily maintain your Mandarin proficiency with regular reading and listening practice. With our diverse range of content, from everyday dialogues to original stories, our readings reinforce and strengthen your Chinese fluency.

Beginner, intermediate, or advanced, you will find readings that match your level and improve your Mandarin reading and listening skills.

Features
‚Ä¢ Simplified and Traditional Characters
‚Ä¢ Markings to indicate HSK level, pinyin, and tones
‚Ä¢ Detailed grammar explanations
‚Ä¢ Recommended lessons based on your reading history
‚Ä¢ Written and narrated by native Mandarin speakers
‚Ä¢ Audio synchronized with text
‚Ä¢ Sentence translations and context-dependent word translations
‚Ä¢ Save and review words using an intuitive SRS flashcard system 
‚Ä¢ New lessons added every weekday
‚Ä¢ Pleco, Hack Chinese and Skritter dictionary integration
‚Ä¢ Progress Monitoring

Learn Chinese for free or upgrade to unlock access to:
‚Ä¢ 3000+ articles, stories, and courses to explore
‚Ä¢ Offline study for learning Mandarin on-the-go
‚Ä¢ Audiobook mode for immersive listening experiences

Practice your reading, listening, speaking, and writing all with one app.
‚ñ∂ Reliable and engaging stories that will keep you reading Chinese
‚ñ∂ Listen and repeat with native Mandarin audio to master your tones
‚ñ∂ Summarize and rewrite stories to practice writing characters
‚ñ∂ Memorize characters and new words/vocabulary with flashcards. 

Beginner Chinese learners can start from ni hao and work their way up through our beginner courses that will take them through HSK 1 and HSK 2. Start off with pinyin and hide it when you‚Äôre ready to learn traditional or simplified characters.

Intermediate Chinese learners (HSK 3 and HSK 4) can begin reading more elaborate stories while learning to use Mandarin grammar in context. Hide pinyin or use difficult words only to show pinyin for all words above your level.

Advanced Chinese learners (HSK 5 and HSK 6) will enjoy our short stories adapted from Chinese folktales and our collections on the Tang Dynasty, Han Dynasty, and more! Our app also covers topics like everyday life in China, funny stories, business Mandarin, latest trends in China, and Chinese history.

Read Chinese at your Level:
Whether it‚Äôs our beginner courses about life in China, advanced Chinese stories about history, or snippets of daily conversation, you can find material from HSK 1-6 to practice reading Chinese! When you stumble on a word you can check our Chinese dictionary with translations or jump to Pleco for more definitions.

Save Time:
The Du Chinese app offers a built-in dictionary, pinyin, translations, and professional audio. Take control of your learning experience with our integrations with popular apps like Pleco, Skritter, and Hack Chinese.

Improve Your Tones:
Mastering tones can be very difficult, especially when you‚Äôre trying to mimic a robot! That‚Äôs why we have professional recordings by native speakers for every lesson. So when you say hello in Mandarin, people will understand your ‰Ω†Â•Ω.

Expand Your Vocabulary:
By learning Mandarin as you read, you‚Äôll pick up on the most useful words naturally. As you read, save new words and practice them later to build your vocabulary. Our interactive flashcards make it easy or sync them with Skritter or Hack Chinese. 

Privacy policy: https://www.duchinese.net/privacy_policy.html
Terms of Use: https://www.duchinese.net/tos.html

title: HSK1 Learn Chinese Chinesimple
description: Quickly Master Chinese with Chinesimple HSK ‚Äì Your Path to HSK Certification Learning Chinese can be challenging, but with Chinesimple HSK and our expert tutor Bingo, you can achieve your HSK certificate with ease. The All-in-One App That Combines the Best of Every Chinese Learning Tool ‚Ä¢ üìò Vast Vocabulary: Access 5000+ words for HSK v2 and 11000+ words for HSK v3, covering all essential vocabulary. Think of it as a comprehensive Chinese dictionary and a strong alternative to Pleco Chinese Dictionary. ‚Ä¢ üìù Enhanced Reading & Writing: Develop your skills with detailed Chinese lessons and practical exercises in Chinese grammar and vocabulary. Improve your ability to read Chinese, similar to Du Chinese. ‚Ä¢ üñåÔ∏è Animated Stroke Guidance: Master stroke order and direction with 4000+ engaging animations, similar to Skritter, perfect for learning Hanzi. ‚Ä¢ ‚úçÔ∏è Write Chinese Characters: Our writing system captures the real handwriting of a native person. Computer-generated animations in other apps are cool, but do Chinese characters really look like that on paper? ‚Ä¢ üó£Ô∏è Real-Time Pronunciation: Improve your Chinese speaking skills with voice recognition technology. Practice with Chinese phrases and sentences to enhance fluency. ‚Ä¢ üåè Complete Character Mastery: Learn simplified and traditional Chinese characters for mainland China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, and Macau. This includes Hanzi learning for proficiency. ‚Ä¢ üÉè Comprehensive Flashcards: Access a flashcard for every HSK word, with an image for each one. While they may not be as beautifully illustrated as Chineasy's, we offer over 6000 flashcards with images. And if you think Anki is the ultimate app for flashcards, you might be right... but Chinese flashcards with image for the easiest and most enjoyable learning experience can only be found in Chinesimple. ‚Ä¢ üìà Track Your Progress: Monitor your improvement with comprehensive tests and assessments, preparing you for HSK exams and Chinese exams. Reach the right HSK level with our carefully designed Chinese HSK application. ‚Ä¢ üìñ See Words in Action: Learn word usage through example sentences, similar to other apps like Hello Chinese, ChineseSkill, and Lingodeer. Ideal for those passionate about language learning and wanting to learn languages effectively. ‚Ä¢ üîä Authentic Audio: Listen to native speakers for perfect pronunciation, essential for mastering Chinese pinyin and improving Chinese hanzi understanding. ‚Ä¢ üàØÔ∏è Mandarin Fluency: Achieve fluency in the world's most spoken native language with tools designed for Mandarin learning, ideal for Mandarin beginners. Whether you're just starting to study Chinese or looking to advance, Chinesimple has the resources you need. Plus, gain insights into Chinese cultural nuances as you learn. Eco-Friendly Learning Save time and money while helping the environment. Chinesimple is 100% digital, reducing the need for paper, ink, and plastic. ‚ôªÔ∏è Available in 12 Languages ‚Ä¢ üåç Chinesimple is available in 12 languages: English, Spanish, German, Italian, French, Russian, Portuguese, Indonesian, Vietnamese, Thai, Hindi, and Modern Standard Arabic. All content is fully translated, making it accessible and user-friendly, with comprehensive Chinese translation for every word, sentence, and Chinese text. Become Part of Our Learning Community ‚Ä¢ üåç Over 2,000,000 downloads worldwide. ‚Ä¢ üë• Engaged community of over 300,000 learners. ‚Ä¢ üì± Trusted by users on both iOS and Android platforms since 2012. title: Immersive Chinese
description:
‚Ä¢ The most efficient way to learn spoken Chinese.
‚Ä¢ More than 7500 high-quality audio recordings.
‚Ä¢ Uses the "comprehensible input" method of language learning, providing you with lots of easy to understand Chinese sentences that gradually increase in difficulty.
‚Ä¢ Powerful revision tools that allow you to create highly-customised study sessions.
‚Ä¢ Includes separate slow and normal speed recordings. Hear every detail in the slow version.
‚Ä¢ Choice of simplified or traditional characters.
‚Ä¢ Currently includes 185 lessons and more than 4500 unique sentences
‚Ä¢ 36 lessons are available for free, and a full subscription costs just a few dollars.
‚Ä¢ Save custom lists of vocabulary and sentences and generate study sessions from them.
‚Ä¢ Each line of text (translation, pinyin or Chinese characters) can be individually revealed and hidden.
‚Ä¢ Full offline use supported (all files can be downloaded and stored locally).
‚Ä¢ Detailed notes and definitions.
‚Ä¢ Repetition Training allows you to drill your listening and hear a huge volume of comprehensible input covering the exact material you want to practice.
‚Ä¢ Highly customisable audio playback (set the exact time delay between sentences).
‚Ä¢ Detailed pronunciation guide.
‚Ä¢ Mix of individual sentences and short stories.
‚Ä¢ Audio recorded by a professional broadcaster with perfectly standard Mandarin.
‚Ä¢ Ideal to use alongside other popular study tools such as Pleco or Skritter.
‚Ä¢ Integrates fully with the desktop web browser version (found at www.immersivechinese.com).

Natural and Intuitive Way to Learn Spoken Chinese

The Serial Course contains months worth of content and is designed to take you from absolute beginner all the way to intermediate level. It starts out with extremely simple sentences and gently builds on that, only introducing new material very gradually. The content is carefully designed so that you are never confronted with a word you don't know. The aim of the course is to give you the essential building blocks for forming practical sentences of your own. It naturally integrates spaced repetition so that as you move forward you are continually revising previous content.

Powerful Revision Features

Research into language acquisition has shown that repetition of comprehensible content is one of the most effective ways of learning a language. Repetition Training is a core feature of Immersive Chinese that allows you to play a specific selection of content on a continuous loop according to a number of different settings. You can set the specific time delay before and after each sentence, use normal speed or slow recordings, repeat each sentence a certain number of times, and use a random or sequential order. You can also add custom filters, so you only study the exact material you want to.

Immersive Chinese uses meticulous course design and quality audio content to provide the best way to learn spoken Chinese from scratch. Give it a try and start making progress today.

title: Learn Chinese ‚Äì Studycat
description:
From the award-winning creators of Studycat for Schools, comes Learn Chinese! The #1 way for kids to learn ‰∏≠Êñá (mandarin)!

From preschool and beyond, Learn Chinese by Studycat inspires children's innate love of learning with interactive games and activities.

Our bite-sized lessons will keep your child motivated while they discover a new language and build bilingual skills for a lifetime!

WHY STUDYCAT?

‚Ä¢ Learn Chinese, in Chinese. All our activities focus on virtual language immersion, which means your child won't be hearing any English, only Chinese! This might be confusing at first, but trust us, it's the best way to learn.

‚Ä¢ Everyday Language. Our lessons teach words and expressions that kids can apply in their everyday lives, so they can get a head start developing their bilingual abilities.

‚Ä¢ Get Talking Fast. With our interactive speaking challenges, kids will be encouraged to speak entire words and phrases on their own! The earlier kids start their language-learning journey, the more likely they are to reach proficiency quickly.

‚Ä¢ Vocal Variety. Our characters' voices use different tones, expressions, and accents so that kids can pick up on the subtleties of pronunciation from different speakers.

‚Ä¢ Designed by Experts. All our activities are designed by language and early-education experts. Thoughtfully developed lessons will build your child's confidence with every step.

‚Ä¢ Learner Profiles (coming soon). Create up to four personalized profiles for different family members, allowing tailored learning paths and individual progress tracking.

‚Ä¢ Safe for Kids & Ad-Free. Parents can rest easy knowing that there are no pesky ads to distract children from their learning. All content is appropriate for ages 3 and up.

‚Ä¢ Offline Learning. On a plane, at a restaurant, or in a park? No problem! Learn Chinese by Studycat is available for both online and offline use.

WHAT ARE PARENTS SAYING?

‚ÄúAs a parent trying to raise bilingual children at home, Studycat is a helpful app to start them off and create excitement about the language.‚Äù ‚Äî Fluent in 3 Months

‚ÄúEverything has been thought out carefully and the games and activities are really engaging.‚Äù ‚Äî Bilingual Kidspot

‚ÄúThe concept is so simple but extremely effective. I even found myself learning at the same time.‚Äù ‚Äî Bump, Baby & You

--

If you like Learn Chinese by Studycat, try it out for 7 days free! Empower your child to learn like never before, and get extras like printable worksheets.

If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.

descriptionHTML:
From the award-winning creators of Studycat for Schools, comes Learn Chinese! The #1 way for kids to learn ‰∏≠Êñá (mandarin)!

From preschool and beyond, Learn Chinese by Studycat inspires children's innate love of learning with interactive games and activities.

Our bite-sized lessons will keep your child motivated while they discover a new language and build bilingual skills for a lifetime!

WHY STUDYCAT?

‚Ä¢ Learn Chinese, in Chinese. All our activities focus on virtual language immersion, which means your child won't be hearing any English, only Chinese! This might be confusing at first, but trust us, it's the best way to learn.

‚Ä¢ Everyday Language. Our lessons teach words and expressions that kids can apply in their everyday lives, so they can get a head start developing their bilingual abilities.

‚Ä¢ Get Talking Fast. With our interactive speaking challenges, kids will be encouraged to speak entire words and phrases on their own! The earlier kids start their language-learning journey, the more likely they are to reach proficiency quickly.

‚Ä¢ Vocal Variety. Our characters' voices use different tones, expressions, and accents so that kids can pick up on the subtleties of pronunciation from different speakers.

‚Ä¢ Designed by Experts. All our activities are designed by language and early-education experts. Thoughtfully developed lessons will build your child's confidence with every step.

‚Ä¢ Learner Profiles (coming soon). Create up to four personalized profiles for different family members, allowing tailored learning paths and individual progress tracking.

‚Ä¢ Safe for Kids & Ad-Free. Parents can rest easy knowing that there are no pesky ads to distract children from their learning. All content is appropriate for ages 3 and up.

‚Ä¢ Offline Learning. On a plane, at a restaurant, or in a park? No problem! Learn Chinese by Studycat is available for both online and offline use.

WHAT ARE PARENTS SAYING?

‚ÄúAs a parent trying to raise bilingual children at home, Studycat is a helpful app to start them off and create excitement about the language.‚Äù ‚Äî Fluent in 3 Months

‚ÄúEverything has been thought out carefully and the games and activities are really engaging.‚Äù ‚Äî Bilingual Kidspot

‚ÄúThe concept is so simple but extremely effective. I even found myself learning at the same time.‚Äù ‚Äî Bump, Baby & You

--

If you like Learn Chinese by Studycat, try it out for 7 days free! Empower your child to learn like never before, and get extras like printable worksheets.

title: Dot Languages - Learn Chinese
description:
Dot Languages allows you to learn Mandarin Chinese through reading fun & interesting articles at any level from HSK 1 to HSK 9. This categorisation is ideal if you are practicing for any of the official HSK level exams, or if you just want improve your Chinese & clearly see yourself progress!

You will never run out of great studying materials, as we are adding 6+ new texts to our collection every single day! The materials cover a large range of topics ensuring you become truly proficient & fluent in all the important aspects of daily Chinese conversation.

Learn through our many Mandarin Chinese texts, add your own, or share texts with friends & the wider community. This allows you to find exactly the Mandarin Chinese texts that you find interesting, to make your learning more engaging & fun.

The exercises allow you to grow your reading, listening, and writing skills from a complete beginning level to an advanced learner.

This is the only application if you would like to like to learn & improve your Mandarin Chinese starting at any level - whether or not you are just getting started or if you are already close to fluent!

title: Learn Chinese - Speak Chinese
description:
Start learning Chinese üá®üá≥ quickly and effectively with Mondly‚Äôs free daily lessons! In just minutes you‚Äôll start memorizing core Chinese words, form sentences, learn to speak Chinese phrases and take part in conversations. You‚Äôll feel like having your own Chinese language tutor in your pocket. Loved and trusted worldwide üèÜ Mondly was named "Editors‚Äô Choice" in Google Play and "App of the Year" by Facebook. üåç Beginner or advanced learner, traveler or business professional - This Chinese app works great and dynamically adjusts to your needs. Join over 50 million people that are learning new languages from their mother tongue! Why Mondly? Because we build bridges between people by making language learning fun and easy through technological innovation. TRY MONDLY ‚òÖ "The closest thing to classroom education." ‚Äî Bloomberg ‚òÖ "A practical approach to language learning likely to be widely adopted." ‚Äî Forbes ‚òÖ "The new way to learn languages ." ‚Äî Inc. ‚òÖ "Mondly is like having a private tutor." ‚Äî CNN _____________________

This is how the future of language courses looks like

Our Chinese language learning app gets you started with a basic conversation between two people. You quickly start memorizing core words, use them to build sentences and phrases, and at the end of a 45-minutes module you are able to reconstruct that conversation with your own voice. It‚Äôs an effective way to learn Chinese phrases. State-of-the-art Natural Speech Recognition and Spaced Repetition Algorithms make our Chinese learning app effective for learning languages.

Here are the key features that make Mondly a great tutor for you:

‚úì Crystal-clear audio and professional voice actors. ¬ª Learn the right Chinese pronunciation from conversations between native speakers. ‚úì State-of-the-art Speech Recognition. ¬ª Mondly knows exactly how to listen to your Chinese words and phrases. You will only get a positive feedback if you speak Chinese clearly and correctly. This will improve your pronunciation. ‚úì Useful phrases for real situations. ¬ª Memorizing hundreds of isolated words is not the way to go when it comes to learning Chinese . Mondly teaches you Chinese vocabulary by offering you core words and phrases. Our Chinese language learning apps break the learning process down into short lessons and puts them into themed packs. ‚úì Learn conversational Chinese . ¬ª Conversation is the main reason to take this free course. It will help you build a core Chinese vocabulary with widely-used nouns and verbs, and speak Chinese clearly. ‚úì Verb conjugations. ¬ª If you want to learn Chinese grammar during this course, just tap the Chinese verbs and get the full conjugation on the screen, including the translation. It‚Äôs faster and better than a dictionary. ‚úì Advanced Statistics. ¬ª Our Chinese learning apps use intelligent reporting, so you can always follow your progress. Build your vocabulary step by step and become better daily. ‚úì The Leaderboard. ¬ª See how your friends are doing and compete with people from all over the world to become the best learner in the Mondly community family. Take the Weekly Quiz to become even better. ‚úì Adaptive Learning. ¬ª Learning Chinese is different from person to person. So we taught the app to learn from your way of learning. After little time spent together, Mondly will understand what suits you best and it will become your own guide and customized teacher. ‚òÖ Before you know it, at the end of these Chinese lessons, you will master the most useful 5000 words and phrases and you will be on the fast lane to learning a new language. Continue learning with Mondly: ‚Ä¢ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mondlylanguages ‚Ä¢ Twitter: https://twitter.com/MondlyLanguages ‚Ä¢ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mondlylanguages

title: Laoshi - Learn Chinese
description:
Hey there! Struggling with learning Mandarin Chinese? You're not alone. Laoshi is here to help!

We built this app based on real experiences from other Chinese language learners, just like you. We know it can be tough, especially with characters and tones.

Laoshi offers some awesome features to make learning easier:

‚Ä¢ Laoshi Flashcards: Forget boring flashcards! Laoshi's are specifically designed for Chinese characters, letting you master writing and remembering tones like a champion.

‚Ä¢ Remember what you learn: Laoshi Spaced Repetition System is like a memory booster. Studies show it helps you remember things much better than traditional methods.

‚Ä¢ Your Personal Statistics: Track your progress and stay motivated with your personal stats. See how far you've come in your Chinese learning journey!

‚Ä¢ Word Lists from Textbooks: Stuck in a textbook? No problem! We have word lists for all the popular ones, making it easy to prepare for upcoming classes.

‚Ä¢ Thematic Word Decks: Chinese is contextual! Explore new topics and learn like a breeze with our thematic word decks. You can even build your own!

‚Ä¢ All HSK Exams Decks: Taking the HSK exam? Choose the one you're preparing for and let Laoshi help you ace it!

‚Ä¢ Laoshi Grammar Database: Dive into our massive grammar database with 756 points and learn everything you need to know about Chinese grammar.

‚Ä¢ World-Class Handwriting: Polish your writing and fluency with our world-class handwriting feature.

‚Ä¢ Tone Training: Master tones with specialized exercises designed to help you recognize them like a pro.

‚Ä¢ Stroke Order Worksheet Generator: Surprise! No more paying for a generator. Print out any deck with a single click using our stroke order worksheet generator.

‚Ä¢ Contextual Usage Examples: Each word comes with real-life examples to boost your understanding and usage.

‚Ä¢ Different Voices (Male, Female, Kid): Hear it your way! Choose from 3 distinct voices in 7 languages.

‚Ä¢ More Training Customizations: Flexible control over your learning. Customize your study routine to fit your needs.

‚Ä¢ Deck Favorites: Mark decks as favorites and seamlessly integrate them into your studies.

Here's what our users say:

"Great app! Support is amazing, and the app has stuff I couldn't find anywhere else." - Daniel

"Been using Laoshi for years. Subscription is worth it, and their spaced repetition system rocks!" - Natasha

"I've tried a lot of apps and Laoshi has definitely helped me to remember new words better" - George 

"The handwriting tool is awesome" - Alice M

Laoshi is here to help you reach your Chinese language goals. We have a friendly support team ready to answer your questions. Just email us at app@laoshi.io

Ready to take your Chinese learning to the next level? Download Laoshi today!

title: Pleco Chinese Dictionary
description: Pleco is the ultimate Chinese learning companion - an integrated Chinese English dictionary / document reader / flashcard system with fullscreen handwriting input and live camera-based character lookups, from a company with 17 years' experience making mobile Chinese learning software. Major features: ($ = paid add-on) ‚Ä¢ Great dictionaries: the free app comes with two dictionaries - CC-CEDICT and our in-house PLC dictionary - which together cover 130,000 Chinese words and include 20,000 example sentences with Pinyin. We offer 8 more free dictionaries as optional downloads, including a 22,000-entry Cantonese-English dictionary, and 19 other great dictionaries are available as paid upgrades. ($) ‚Ä¢ Handwriting input: lookup unknown characters by drawing them, with a best-in-class recognition engine. (basic version free, enhanced version $) ‚Ä¢ Live Optical Character Recognizer (OCR): look up Chinese words in the dictionary simply by pointing your device's camera at them, or by scrolling around a still image. ($) ‚Ä¢ Screen Reader/OCR: instantly tap-lookup Chinese words in other apps through a floating interface; works on Android 4.1 and later. (reader free, OCR $) ‚Ä¢ Flashcard System: create a card from any dictionary entry with a single button tap, import premade word lists, use advanced techniques like SRS (spaced repetition), and study in a variety of modes including fill-in-the-blanks and tone drills. (simple version free, full-featured $) ‚Ä¢ Audio Pronunciation: instantly hear male + female native-speaker audio for Chinese dictionary headwords; recordings available for over 34,000 words. (stitched-syllable free, multi-syllable $) Or listen to example sentences with text-to-speech (system TTS free, enhanced $). ‚Ä¢ Powerful search: look up words by Chinese characters, Pinyin (spaces/tones optional), or a combination, with support for wildcards and full-text search. ‚Ä¢ Cross-referencing: tap on any Chinese character / word in any dictionary entry to bring up its definition. ‚Ä¢ Stroke Order Diagrams: animations showing you how to draw each Chinese character; 500 in free app, 28,000 in paid add-on. ‚Ä¢ Voice Recognition: look up words by speaking them into your device's microphone. ‚Ä¢ Document Reader: open a Chinese-language text or PDF file and look up unknown words in the dictionary simply by tapping on them. ($) You can also look up characters on web pages through "Share" and in other documents through the clipboard. (free) ‚Ä¢ PRC- and Taiwan-friendly: supports traditional and simplified characters (in dictionary definitions, stroke order, search, OCR, and handwriting), and supports Zhuyin (with ruby support) as well as Pinyin for pronunciation display. ‚Ä¢ Cantonese: display headwords + perform searches in Jyutping/Yale romanization. We also offer Cantonese dictionary and Cantonese audio add-ons. (some $) ‚Ä¢ No ads: we won't even nag you about buying add-ons. We also offer excellent customer support - send us an email and see for yourself - and an active user community at plecoforums.com. We've been making Chinese dictionary apps since 2000, and our sales and customer base have been steadily growing for 17 years across four different platforms. We take good care of our longtime users: people who bought a dictionary on a Palm Pilot in 2001 can still use that dictionary on a new Android phone in 2020 without even paying an upgrade fee. Paid add-ons can be moved to a new device like any other paid app; just open our free app on your new device and they should reactivate. If you already own Pleco on another OS, see pleco.com/android for migration options. This app uses Accessibility services. (for our Screen Reader feature, which helps users to get by in Chinese-speaking regions without knowing Chinese) Twitter/Facebook: plecosoft
descriptionHTML:
Pleco is the ultimate Chinese learning companion - an integrated Chinese English dictionary / document reader / flashcard system with fullscreen handwriting input and live camera-based character lookups, from a company with 17 years' experience making mobile Chinese learning software.

Major features: ($ = paid add-on)

‚Ä¢ Great dictionaries: the free app comes with two dictionaries - CC-CEDICT and our in-house PLC dictionary - which together cover 130,000 Chinese words and include 20,000 example sentences with Pinyin. We offer 8 more free dictionaries as optional downloads, including a 22,000-entry Cantonese-English dictionary, and 19 other great dictionaries are available as paid upgrades. ($)

‚Ä¢ Handwriting input: lookup unknown characters by drawing them, with a best-in-class recognition engine. (basic version free, enhanced version $)

‚Ä¢ Live Optical Character Recognizer (OCR): look up Chinese words in the dictionary simply by pointing your device's camera at them, or by scrolling around a still image. ($)

‚Ä¢ Screen Reader/OCR: instantly tap-lookup Chinese words in other apps through a floating interface; works on Android 4.1 and later. (reader free, OCR $)

‚Ä¢ Flashcard System: create a card from any dictionary entry with a single button tap, import premade word lists, use advanced techniques like SRS (spaced repetition), and study in a variety of modes including fill-in-the-blanks and tone drills. (simple version free, full-featured $)

‚Ä¢ Audio Pronunciation: instantly hear male + female native-speaker audio for Chinese dictionary headwords; recordings available for over 34,000 words. (stitched-syllable free, multi-syllable $) Or listen to example sentences with text-to-speech (system TTS free, enhanced $).

‚Ä¢ Powerful search: look up words by Chinese characters, Pinyin (spaces/tones optional), or a combination, with support for wildcards and full-text search.

‚Ä¢ Cross-referencing: tap on any Chinese character / word in any dictionary entry to bring up its definition.

‚Ä¢ Stroke Order Diagrams: animations showing you how to draw each Chinese character; 500 in free app, 28,000 in paid add-on.

‚Ä¢ Voice Recognition: look up words by speaking them into your device's microphone.

‚Ä¢ Document Reader: open a Chinese-language text or PDF file and look up unknown words in the dictionary simply by tapping on them. ($) You can also look up characters on web pages through "Share" and in other documents through the clipboard. (free)

‚Ä¢ PRC- and Taiwan-friendly: supports traditional and simplified characters (in dictionary definitions, stroke order, search, OCR, and handwriting), and supports Zhuyin (with ruby support) as well as Pinyin for pronunciation display.

‚Ä¢ Cantonese: display headwords + perform searches in Jyutping/Yale romanization. We also offer Cantonese dictionary and Cantonese audio add-ons. (some $)

‚Ä¢ No ads: we won't even nag you about buying add-ons.

We also offer excellent customer support - send us an email and see for yourself - and an active user community at plecoforums.com.

We've been making Chinese dictionary apps since 2000, and our sales and customer base have been steadily growing for 17 years across four different platforms. We take good care of our longtime users: people who bought a dictionary on a Palm Pilot in 2001 can still use that dictionary on a new Android phone in 2020 without even paying an upgrade fee.

Paid add-ons can be moved to a new device like any other paid app; just open our free app on your new device and they should reactivate.

If you already own Pleco on another OS, see pleco.com/android for migration options.

This app uses Accessibility services. (for our Screen Reader feature, which helps users to get by in Chinese-speaking regions without knowing Chinese)

Twitter/Facebook: plecosoft
summary: Chinese dictionary with handwriting, OCR, flashcards, audio, Cantonese, and more

title: Learn Chinese Fast: Mandarin
description:
So, you want to learn Chinese but don't have much time to spare? You need MosaLingua! Our innovative and efficient app has helped over than 13 million people all over the world learn languages in just 10 minutes a day - and get great results!

MosaLingua is highly recommended by the media and numerous language blogs:

--- selected as one of the 5 best apps in the world for language learning ---
--- it really works ---
--- MosaLingua isn't just one person's success story, it's a revolution ---

Learn more about MosaLingua by watching our video on http://mosalingua.com/en.

Try our smartphone app for free and see for yourself how well it works!

It's a powerful and effective tool, ideal for people who want to start speaking Mandarin Chinese quickly but don't want to take traditional, boring language classes.

It's useful for nearly any situation: our method can help you before and during travel, in the workplace, and in everyday life with our Chinese lessons that suit your unique needs.

THE ADVANTAGES OF MOSALINGUA: 

1) Useful, practical content
Don't waste your time learning concepts and vocabulary words that you'll never need. Instead, learn the 20% of the Chinese language that you'll actually use 80% of the time.

2) An innovative method based on scientific research
Our international team of expert polyglots trust this modern and proven learning method and its memorization techniques (SRS, active recall, metacognition, etc.).

3) Coaching throughout the learning process
For the best chance of success, practice with optimally spaced review sessions to consolidate what you learn, pick up bits of grammar and culture with our mini Mandarin Chinese lessons, and benefit from our expert learning tips and tricks.

4) Language practice you'll actually enjoy
Achieve great results in Chinese and have fun doing so. Seeing progress will boost your MOTIVATION, which is key to any learning plan.


To start learning Chinese today, download MosaLingua now - you won't regret it!

title: GoPlay Chinese - Learn Chinese
description:
Ready to learn Mandarin Chinese? This app makes mastering Chinese not only fun but also effective for any beginner learner! Packed with engaging kids learning games, story time videos, speaking activities, and amazing characters, it‚Äôs designed to help you develop strong Chinese skills while keeping the process enjoyable. Whether you're starting with Chinese pinyin or full sentences, this app provides a simple, interactive way to learn languages at your own pace.

1. GAMES
Dive into learning Mandarin with interactive kids learning games! With hundreds of engaging challenges, you‚Äôll memorize characters, practice Chinese pinyin, and build your Chinese skills in a fun and rewarding way. These games are ideal for both beginners and advanced learners, making it easier for both kids and adults to get started with learning languages while having fun.

2. STORY TIME VIDEOS
Boost your Chinese skills with captivating story time videos. These videos are perfect for kids and beginners aiming to learn Mandarin Chinese in an entertaining and easy-to-understand vibe. The engaging visuals and stories make learning even more enjoyable.

3. DAILY SPEAKING ACTIVITIES
Improve your spoken Chinese with daily speaking activities! Each activity is guided by Chinese pinyin, helping you practice pronunciation and build conversation skills step by step. These speaking exercises are designed to enhance your Chinese skills while making learning languages both practical and fun. You‚Äôll gain confidence and make progress in speaking Chinese with the instant feedback.

4. AMAZING CHARACTERS
Say ‚ÄúNi Hao‚Äù to the friendly, interactive characters who will make your Mandarin Chinese learning an exciting adventure! They will guide you through various language lessons, from understanding Chinese pinyin to constructing complete sentences. These characters make the learning experience more relatable and enjoyable, especially for curious young minds. With their help, you‚Äôll master key concepts while having fun with the kids learning games. Get started today and join in the fun!

CONTACT US
Official website: www.ihuman.com
Email: service@ihuman.com

title: Learn Chinese: Readle Mandarin
description:
Daily Chinese Language News & Stories. Teacher-Crafted. Student-Ready.

Master Chinese with Readle, the top-rated language-learning app offering real-world Mandarin Chinese news and stories to help you boost your skills from HSK1 beginner to HSK4 advanced levels. In just 10 minutes a day, you can learn Chinese vocabulary, pinyin, grammar, and more. Whether you want to expand your Mandarin Chinese skills for conversation, exams, or living in China, Readle makes it easy! Why Choose Readle? - Real-world news and stories tailored to your level (from HSK1 to HSK4) by Mandarin Chinese language experts. - Learn Chinese grammar and expand your vocabulary with our flashcards, quizzes, and interactive learning tools. - Achieve Chinese fluency quickly and effectively with our graded lessons, designed for ultimate language immersion. Download Readle FREE and start learning Chinese today! ============== Learn Mandarin Chinese with stories and news: Readle revolutionizes how you learn Chinese with engaging stories covering topics like travel, culture, food, and more. Our daily lessons and exercises will help you improve your reading, listening, grammar, and speaking abilities. Key Features: ‚ñ∫ Learn Mandarin Through Immersion: Our scientifically-backed immersion method helps you learn Chinese faster. Dive into real-world news and stories that align with your HSK level, from HSK1 to HSK4. ‚ñ∫ Chinese Pinyin Helper: Boost your reading comprehension with our pinyin support for Chinese characters. Learn to read and pronounce Chinese effectively with guidance on pinyin pronunciation. ‚ñ∫ Perfect Pronunciation: With native speaker recordings, you‚Äôll improve your pronunciation and fluency. Repeat after native Mandarin Chinese speakers to master Chinese tones and intonation. ‚ñ∫ Instant Dictionary & Translation: Tap on any word to get instant translations and grammar explanations, eliminating the need for external tools like Pleco or Google Translate. This feature saves time and enhances your learning experience. ‚ñ∫ Chinese Grammar Helper: Each story offers grammar tips that help you understand and apply Chinese grammar in context. Learn how grammar works by seeing it in action in various stories. ‚ñ∫ Vocabulary & Flashcards: Create custom flashcards from words in the stories you read. Use our spaced repetition system to lock new words into long-term memory and expand your Chinese vocabulary. ‚ñ∫ Daily Quizzes: Test your knowledge with quizzes that cover Chinese vocabulary, grammar, and reading comprehension. Prepare for HSK exams with quizzes that simulate real test questions. ‚ñ∫ Story Library with Daily Updates: Our library includes over 2000 stories across various topics, adding new content daily. Immerse yourself in Chinese through stories about: - Travel and Culture - Food and Restaurants - Science and Technology - Daily News and Entertainment ‚Ä¶and more! Readle is the ultimate Chinese learning app for self-study, preparation for the HSK exam, or planning to live or visit China. Start your journey to mastering Chinese with Readle today! Do you have questions or feedback while learning Chinese with Readle? Contact us at support@readle-app.com. We are here to help! Privacy policy: https://readle-app.com/privacy-policy/ Terms of use: https://readle-app.com/term-of-use/

Daily Chinese Language News & Stories. Teacher-Crafted. Student-Ready.



Master Chinese with Readle, the top-rated language-learning app offering real-world Mandarin Chinese news and stories to help you boost your skills from HSK1 beginner to HSK4 advanced levels. In just 10 minutes a day, you can learn Chinese vocabulary, pinyin, grammar, and more. Whether you want to expand your Mandarin Chinese skills for conversation, exams, or living in China, Readle makes it easy!

Why Choose Readle?
- Real-world news and stories tailored to your level (from HSK1 to HSK4) by Mandarin Chinese language experts.
- Learn Chinese grammar and expand your vocabulary with our flashcards, quizzes, and interactive learning tools.
- Achieve Chinese fluency quickly and effectively with our graded lessons, designed for ultimate language immersion.

Download Readle FREE and start learning Chinese today!

==============

Learn Mandarin Chinese with stories and news:
Readle revolutionizes how you learn Chinese with engaging stories covering topics like travel, culture, food, and more. Our daily lessons and exercises will help you improve your reading, listening, grammar, and speaking abilities.

Key Features:
‚ñ∫ Learn Mandarin Through Immersion:
Our scientifically-backed immersion method helps you learn Chinese faster. Dive into real-world news and stories that align with your HSK level, from HSK1 to HSK4.

‚ñ∫ Chinese Pinyin Helper:
Boost your reading comprehension with our pinyin support for Chinese characters. Learn to read and pronounce Chinese effectively with guidance on pinyin pronunciation.

‚ñ∫ Perfect Pronunciation:
With native speaker recordings, you‚Äôll improve your pronunciation and fluency. Repeat after native Mandarin Chinese speakers to master Chinese tones and intonation.

‚ñ∫ Instant Dictionary & Translation:
Tap on any word to get instant translations and grammar explanations, eliminating the need for external tools like Pleco or Google Translate. This feature saves time and enhances your learning experience.

‚ñ∫ Chinese Grammar Helper:
Each story offers grammar tips that help you understand and apply Chinese grammar in context. Learn how grammar works by seeing it in action in various stories.

‚ñ∫ Vocabulary & Flashcards:
Create custom flashcards from words in the stories you read. Use our spaced repetition system to lock new words into long-term memory and expand your Chinese vocabulary.

‚ñ∫ Daily Quizzes:
Test your knowledge with quizzes that cover Chinese vocabulary, grammar, and reading comprehension. Prepare for HSK exams with quizzes that simulate real test questions.

‚ñ∫ Story Library with Daily Updates:
Our library includes over 2000 stories across various topics, adding new content daily. Immerse yourself in Chinese through stories about:

- Travel and Culture
- Food and Restaurants
- Science and Technology
- Daily News and Entertainment ‚Ä¶and more!

Readle is the ultimate Chinese learning app for self-study, preparation for the HSK exam, or planning to live or visit China.

Start your journey to mastering Chinese with Readle today!

Do you have questions or feedback while learning Chinese with Readle? Contact us at support@readle-app.com. We are here to help!

title: TaoLiChinese - Learn Mandarin
description:
TaoLi, the must-have Chinese learning app for Chinese ethusiasts worldwide.

„ÄêFree Chinese Level Test„Äë
Free online Chinese proficiency test to find out your current Chinese level.

„ÄêHSK Standard Course„Äë
Designed specifically for beginners, the Chinese Basics Course integrates multilingual animation videos and innovative teaching theories. 
It covers listening, speaking, reading, and writing comprehensively, making it an ideal choice for learners at HSK levels 1-5. 

„ÄêSpoken Class (English)„Äë
An AI-powered course that covers 8 themes and 40+ scenarios, providing an authentic Chinese dialogue experience. This course includes a variety of interactive exercises, smart voice recognition, AI-powered real-time test, and instant feedback on your learning progress.
The TaoLi teachers offer in-depth explanations of key concepts in both Chinese and English, and they guide you through immersive Chinese language environments, helping you to speak confidently and fluently.

„ÄêVietnam Premium Speaking Course„Äë
Based on HSK standards, carefully selected the most commonly used basic Chinese spoken sentences, accompanied by vivid scenario performances, detailed Vietnamese explanations, and interesting interactive exercises, helping beginners to complete the learning loop in the most efficient and easy way.

„ÄêChinese Corner„Äë
We've prepared a series of videos for you in a cool and creative way to help you learn Chinese. Here, you'll discover a fresh and enjoyable way of learning, no longer dull but full of creativity and fun.

„ÄêTaoLi Live Broadcast„Äë
Professional Chinese teachers on live, teaching you face-to-face, engaging in discussions about Chinese culture, and providing instant answers to your questions.

„ÄêTaoLi WordBook„Äë
Diverse vocabulary book options, with each word offering clear definitions, exquisite images, and pronunciation, making you feel the sense of accomplishment in efficiently accumulating vocabulary during a stress-free learning process. Additionally, you can enhance your Chinese writing skills by watching stroke order animations and practicing character writing step by step.

„ÄêPinyin Course„Äë
TaoLi's Pinyin course is specially designed for zero-basic Chinese learners. The systematic learning method can quickly help you master Pinyin.
This learning module provides a clear pinyin pronunciation chart and courses of tones, initials and finals. Each pinyin lesson will provide supporting exercises to consolidate the learned content. The best is that you are able to practice them Again and Again.

„ÄêChinese Courses„Äë
We provide professional, high-quality Chinese online live as well as recorded series of courses in a variety of categories, including Introductory Chinese, HSK/HSKK, Business Chinese, Everyday Chinese, Chinese Culture, etc. We can even customize an exclusive course according to your needs and goals.

If you have any questions or comments, please feel free to contact us
Email: support@taolihanyu.net

Don't miss out on our latest news and learn more interesting Chinese! Follow us on Facebook and Instagram!
FacebookÔºö  https://www.facebook.com/taolichinese/
InstagramÔºöhttps://www.instagram.com/taolichinese/

title: Ka: Learn Chinese Tones
description:
Having trouble with Chinese tones?
Can you pronounce words using the correct tone?
Are you able to tell apart similar sounds?
Do you know when to use which tone?

Many people think that Chinese is an impossibly complex tonal language to master ‚Äî but that's before they've tried Ka!

Ka is a fun, fast-paced flashcards game that introduces you to the range of different sounds that make up the Chinese language and gives you plenty of listening and pronunciation practice via quick, snappy drills.

With Ka, you'll quickly learn to recognize and tell the difference between different syllables in Mandarin Chinese. By swiping and tapping away in this addictive card-based game, you're drilling your way to Chinese fluency.

You'll stop making embarrassing mistakes like confusing mƒÅ (mother) for m«é (horse) and shƒÅng h√†i (hurt) for sh√†ng h«éi (Shanghai)!

title: ABC Chinese - Learn Chinese
description:
ABC Chinese
    Learning Chinese used to be difficult. 
    The good news is that after you use the "ABC Chinese" app, the Chinese you see will no longer be a combination of lines, but a variety of vivid pictures, and learning Chinese will be very simple and interesting.

    Now you can:
    1 Remember Chinese characters through graphics, and remember pronunciation and meaning through homophonic sentences
    2 Through "writing shorthand", you can quickly remember the structure and meaning of Chinese characters
    3 Through "pronunciation shorthand", you can remember the pronunciation of each Chinese character or word and their translation in one sentence of your native language
    4 You can experience the real language environment in various life scenarios by voice chatting with our AI friends
    5 There are sentences of all levels of HSK, you can practice listening and vocabulary
    6 There are various conversations in life to follow
    7 Quickly follow and master: 100 daily sentences, numbers, places, names, food, objects...

    Our Chinese character flashcards are based on "Origin of Chinese Characters" and re-wrote the memory method of 2,600 Chinese characters, combined with the Ebbinghaus memory curve, and reviewed many times in subsequent learning.

    
    We spent a lot of time compiling shorthand sentences and pictures for Chinese characters and phrases that are easy to understand and remember. They include all the contents of HSK levels 1-6, as well as the "radicals" of Chinese.
    We have added pictures to each Chinese character and phrase. The picture of the Chinese character is drawn based on the text structure of the Chinese character. Combined with the "writing shorthand" of this text, you can quickly remember how to write this Chinese character.
    We have sorted out the relationship between the fonts and meanings of 2,600 commonly used Chinese characters, and simplified and modified them so that you can quickly understand and remember the writing and meaning of Chinese characters. And we have compiled a "jingle" for each Chinese character so that you can remember its pronunciation and meaning through a sentence in your native language.
    We have compiled 4,300 common words, which are also defined by HSK. We have broken down the composition of each word in the word and explained it, so that you can understand the meaning of the word after reading it once and will not make mistakes in subsequent use. We have also compiled shorthand sentences for the words, so that you can remember the word and its meaning through a sentence in your native language.

    The AI ‚Äã‚ÄãChinese teacher in "ABC Chinese" practices conversations with you in multiple simulated life scenarios. The fast language environment allows you to master the phrases and grammar of Mandarin Chinese.
    When you don't know how to speake chinese with AI , you can click the prompt button and AI will tell you what to speak.Just like living in China, you can quickly master Chinese skill.
    Even if you don't know Chinese, you can talk to AI in your own language and get a Chinese response. Currently supported: English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Indonesian, French, German, Italian, Malay

    The follow-up module has more than 50 dialog articles in daily life in China. You can repeat the phrases and sentences you hear and soon you can speak Mandarin. It covers more than 1,600 daily Chinese characters and sentences, which are enough for you to communicate with Chinese people.
    There are not only simple sentences like "Hello Chinese Thank you", but also Chinese ancient poems and tongue twisters, which can help you quickly understand Chinese culture.By reading short sentences aloud you can quickly understand hanzi and pinyin.
    The listening module is divided into different levels from HSK1 to HSK6, It helps you learn Chinese faster, you can get better results by taking the HSK Chinese test


Let's start making learning Chinese easy!

title: DangDai Chinese Áï∂‰ª£‰∏≠ÊñáË™≤Á®ã
description:
*INTRODUCTION
The most professional app to learn Mandarin Chinese!
Now get DangDai Chinese APP to study Chinese on your Phone/Pad.
Learn the first three lessons FREE and fully functional.
------
MTC is presenting this brand new DangDai Chinese APP after half a century‚Äôs worth of educational experience. All the contents of DangDai Chinese APP are from Volume one of a paper-booked series ‚ÄúA Course in Contemporary Chinese.‚Äù The level of Volume one is equivalent to CEFR A1 - A2 (noviced - intermediate mid). 
The ‚ÄúA Course in Contemporary Chinese‚Äù series was first trialed at MTC and other language centers around Taiwan for a year. The current version underwent numerous drafts, and materialized under the careful guidance of the consultants, a diligent reading from the review committee, and feedback from teachers and students.
MTC is very proud to bring you the DangDai Chinese APP. Furthermore, it is our hope that DangDai Chinese APP is a practical APP for your Mandarin Chinese learning.

*FEATURES
1. Study Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese in one APP.
2. Switch to Chinese-Only Mode to train reading skills.
3. Every sentence has English translation and Pinyin (ÊãºÈü≥).
4. Well-chosen vocabulary with English translation, Pinyin (ÊãºÈü≥), Mandarin Phonetic Symbols (Ê≥®Èü≥, Zhuyin), parts of speech and audio pronunciations.
5. Build custom list of favorite vocabulary.
6. Learn every Chinese character in the vocabulary via stroke animation and handwriting practice.
7. Voiced by native Mandarin Chinese speaker.
8. Listen and read simultaneously.
9. Follow the voice and record to practice speaking.
10. Loop repeat/A-B repeat playback.
11. Bookmark and notebook functions.
12. Completed grammatical sections and appropriate example sentences.
13. Various types of exercises and practice tests formulated by Mandarin Chinese teaching experts.

*PUBLISHED BY MTC
The Mandarin Training Center (MTC) was founded in the autumn of 1956 for teaching Chinese as a second language. Currently, the MTC is the largest and the most renowned Chinese language center, with around 1,700 students from more than 70 countries enrolled each academic quarter (three months.) 
MTC students come from different cultures and language backgrounds. They share the common goal of learning to communicate in Chinese effectively--some for employment; some for interests in Chinese culture and history. Many students have never learned Chinese before they enroll at the MTC, whereas some are good enough to start at intermediate and advanced levels. No matter what your motivation for learning Chinese is or the level of your Chinese, the MTC will do all it can to help you make rapid progress. 
Official website: mtc.ntnu.edu.tw/eng/

*SUPPORT
If you have any suggestions, feedbacks or questions, please let us know. :)
E-mail: mtcbook613@gmail.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/mtc.ntnu/
Website: http://www.mtc.ntnu.edu.tw/eng/

title: Learn Chinese Offline
description:
You want a handbook of essential phrases, sentences !
Speak Chinese Phrasebook is an easy to use Phrasebook that will give visitors to China and those who are interested in learning Chinese a good start in the language.
Learn Chinese Free is recorded using native speaker and we have tried our best to be authentic in the pronunciation whilst ensuring it is easy to understand. Recommended app for tourists and business people visiting China or Chinese language country.

Learn Chinese Mandarin Free contains over 1300 commonly-used Chinese phrases and vocabularies for travellers and beginners in 18 categories.
    + Greetings
    + General Conversation
    + Numbers
    + Time and Date
    + Directions & Places
    + Transportation
    + Accommodation
    + Eating out
    + Shopping
    + Colours
    + Cities & Towns
    + Countries
    + Tourist & Attractions
    + Family
    + Dating <3
    + Emergency
    + Sickness
    + Tongue Twisters

NATIVE PRONUNCIATION : 
-- each phrase with speech of native speaker help you speak chinese correctly.

ALWAYS LEARN PHRASES, NOT INDIVIDUAL WORDS: 
‚ñ∂ Meaning: Phrases are easier to remember, because they have meaning, they paint a picture, they tell a story. 
‚ñ∂ Speed: When you learn phrases instead of a word, you're learning how to use that word correctly, and it‚Äôs much faster. When we're children, we learn with phrases, groups of words, not just one word by one word by one word. Word by word is slow. 
‚ñ∂ Pronunciation: In real life some groups of words are said as though it were a single word, in one breath-group, without pausing. If you stop to take a breath in the middle of the phrase, you are not saying it correctly, and you risk being misunderstood.

App is completely offline. No require internet to study
Quick search by Chinese or English
Save your favourite sentences to review later]
When you travel, business to China, don't forget this app

title: Learn Chinese - 5,000 Phrases
description: Play, Learn and Speak ‚Äì discover common phrases for daily Chinese conversation! ‚úî 5,000 useful phrases for conversation. ‚úî Learn Chinese in your tongue (60 languages available). ‚úî Best FREE app for learning fast. Speak Chinese Fluently in Real Conversations With Learn Chinese application, you can now explore over 5,000 Chinese phrases for short daily conversations while having absolutely pure fun! Whether you‚Äôre a tourist having a vacation in an Chinese speaking country or someone who just wants to speak a foreign language, this application will help you learn Chinese phrases in a fast, easy and enjoyable way. Why Our FREE App is Different ‚úî No internet connection required ‚Äì play where you want and when you want (offline). ‚úî 5,000 common phrases ‚Äì audio pronunciations and phonetic transcriptions to show you how native speaker from China actually pronounce them. ‚úî 11 fun games ‚Äì a innovative approach to practice your listening, writing and speaking skills. ‚úî 4 levels for learning: beginner, intermediate, advanced and expert. ‚úî 20 topics divided into 145 subtopics ‚Äì so you‚Äôll know what and when to say each phrase. Topics for Chinese conversation: Greetings, Conversations with friends, Basic sentences, Travel, Transportation, Hotel, Restaurant, Food, Shopping, Work, Business etc. More Features to Improve Your Chinese Speaking Vocabulary ‚úî Search and bookmark your most common expressions from the phrasebook. ‚úî Earn points as your Chinese skills progress. ‚úî ‚ÄúRandom Categories‚Äù feature to randomly select the topic, subtopic and game. ‚úî 60 languages ‚Äìso you could understand and speak each phrase easily regardless of which country you‚Äôre from. About FunEasyLearn: Fun Easy Learn has developed many applications to help people around the world learn foreign languages for free. Fun Easy Learn applications improve your Mandarin skills: speaking, listening and grammar. The dictionary of the apps has human voice pronunciation for each common phrase to improve your speaking skill. Speak Chinese easily and fluently for travel, business or fun!

title: HanziPro: Learn Chinese
description:
The HanziPro app is the best app for you to start learning Mandarin, whether you are a beginner or an intermediate learner. 

HanziPro provides rich Chinese language materials, including authentic words, phrases, Chinese sentences, and everyday topics. At the same time, HanziPro offers learning and testing modules, so you can study Chinese anytime in your spare moments.

---

The specific functions are as followsÔºö

„ÄêTopic Courses„Äë
The app includes a variety of common topics in daily life. Through these topics, you can quickly put the Chinese you've learned into use.

„ÄêHSK Vocabulary List„Äë
The app includes the HSK vocabulary list. By reviewing these words, it can help you pass the Chinese Proficiency Test more easily.

„ÄêReview Algorithm„Äë
The app will automatically arrange reviews for the words, phrases, and sentences that you have learned.

„ÄêChinese Character Writing„Äë
The app provides detailed animated instructions for all Chinese characters, ensuring that you can learn to write each one.

„ÄêPronunciation of Chinese„Äë
The app provides audio guidance for all the words, phrases, and sentences, and you can adjust the speaking speed as you like.

---

If you enjoy using the HanziPro app, please rate and review us. We‚Äôd love to hear from you!

Have questions? Do not hesitate to contact us at whenfung@gmail.com to get help or give us your opinions!

title: Chinesia - Learn Chinese
description:
Join Chinesia and learn Chinese easily and efficiently with learners from around the world! This app supports Chinese learners of various native languages, with 14 language options to choose from, and all core courses are completely free! Carefully designed Chinese courses help you master listening, speaking, reading, and writing easily and effectively. Just spend a few minutes each day, pass levels, play games, and you‚Äôll expand your vocabulary, reinforce grammar, learn to write, and speak fluently ‚Äî all while having fun and making steady progress in your Chinese skills!

Chinesia has over 15 years of experience in international language education. The core Chinese courses are crafted by a team of language education experts, offering 100+ real-life scenarios and 500+ high-frequency practical situations. Combined with cutting-edge AI technology, you can practice real role-play conversations while learning. The courses use highly interactive gamified methods to move away from rote memorization. There are also specially curated cultural lessons to help you truly understand the stories behind the Chinese language!

No matter your current Chinese level, whether you're learning for daily life, school, travel, work, hobbies, or making friends ‚Äî you'll benefit from Chinesia! Come try it out now!

Chinesia offers:

‚óè Learn while playing ‚Äî and for free! Chinesia‚Äôs gamified courses are carefully designed to make improving your Chinese both fun and effective.

‚óè Relaxed and efficient teaching methods. Refined by a team of expert Chinese teachers and proven by global users, our approach aligns with the best memory retention curves, helping you retain what you learn long-term.

‚óè Learning together is more motivating! Join other Chinese learners around the world, climb the leaderboard, and showcase your progress!

‚óè Visualized learning progress with rewards every session. Earn various achievements and badges as you learn. The spark check-in system encourages daily study and keeps you moving steadily toward your Chinese goals.

‚óè All core Chinese courses are completely free! We also support Chinese learning for speakers of 14 native languages, including English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, German, Russian, Vietnamese, Thai, Arabic, Indonesian, Malay, Khmer, and Portuguese!

Chinesia offers three types of subscriptions:
1 month;
3 months;
12 months.

Please note:
Once you confirm your purchase, your payment will be charged to your Google Play account. Your subscription will automatically renew within 24 hours before the current period ends at the same price unless you turn off auto-renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel your subscription or disable auto-renewal anytime in your Google Play account settings.

If you have any questions, feel free to contact us at: [chinesiahelp@gmail.com](mailto:chinesiahelp@gmail.com)
