title: TalkChinese - Learn Chinese
description:
TalkChinese ‚Äî Speak Chinese with ease!
The best way to improve your language skills is through continuous practice! TalkChinese has created a relaxed and enjoyable platform for Chinese oral practice for you. Just open the app, and you can start an interactive conversation with the AI at any time and chat freely about any topic that interests you. At the same time, the AI will instantly provide you with accurate correction and optimization suggestions, helping you to significantly and rapidly improve your spoken language proficiency!

Core Highlights:
1. Scenario Drills and AI Real-life Dialogues
From business negotiations to travel and social interactions, you can choose from over 200 real-life scenarios to master the most authentic oral expressions.

2. Instant Growth Feedback
 Pronunciation calibration, grammar optimization, and word choice suggestions are provided to offer valuable evaluations.

3. Learning Card Instruction
Repeated oral practice of key sentence patterns helps strengthen memory and extend their application in different situations.

4. Reinforcement of Error-prone Points
Personalized training packages for error-prone points are generated, enabling targeted practice and consolidation to avoid making the same mistakes repeatedly.

5. Bilingual Instruction
Based on the mother tongue, it helps learners have a deeper understanding. 

Product Features:
‚úÖ Customized learning plan
‚úÖ Over 500 core courses
‚úÖ 1-on-1 accompanying instruction by an AI private tutor
‚úÖ Intelligent speech recognition and correction
Just 15 minutes a day, bid farewell to the inability to speak Chinese fluently, and achieve confident expression. Join TalkChinese now and start your Chinese learning journey!

Terms of Service: http://app.talkcnlang.com/static/link/TalkChinese-Terms.html
Privacy Policy: http://app.talkcnlang.com/static/link/TalkChinese-Privacy.html

TalkChinese ‚Äî Speak Chinese with ease!
The best way to improve your language skills is through continuous practice! TalkChinese has created a relaxed and enjoyable platform for Chinese oral practice for you. Just open the app, and you can start an interactive conversation with the AI at any time and chat freely about any topic that interests you. At the same time, the AI will instantly provide you with accurate correction and optimization suggestions, helping you to significantly and rapidly improve your spoken language proficiency!

Core Highlights:
1. Scenario Drills and AI Real-life Dialogues
From business negotiations to travel and social interactions, you can choose from over 200 real-life scenarios to master the most authentic oral expressions.

2. Instant Growth Feedback
Pronunciation calibration, grammar optimization, and word choice suggestions are provided to offer valuable evaluations.

3. Learning Card Instruction
Repeated oral practice of key sentence patterns helps strengthen memory and extend their application in different situations.

4. Reinforcement of Error-prone Points
Personalized training packages for error-prone points are generated, enabling targeted practice and consolidation to avoid making the same mistakes repeatedly.

5. Bilingual Instruction
Based on the mother tongue, it helps learners have a deeper understanding.

Product Features:
‚úÖ Customized learning plan
‚úÖ Over 500 core courses
‚úÖ 1-on-1 accompanying instruction by an AI private tutor
‚úÖ Intelligent speech recognition and correction
Just 15 minutes a day, bid farewell to the inability to speak Chinese fluently, and achieve confident expression. Join TalkChinese now and start your Chinese learning journey!

Terms of Service: http://app.talkcnlang.com/static/link/TalkChinese-Terms.html
Privacy Policy: http://app.talkcnlang.com/static/link/TalkChinese-Privacy.html

title: Drops: Learn Mandarin Chinese
description:
What if üá®üá≥ Mandarin Chinese language learning would be a crazy fun game instead of the usual memorization drills? With Drops, it‚Äôs an effortless and fun learning Chinese experience with practical vocabulary that sticks to your memory with its catchy graphics, and quick mini-games. 

The crazy part? It only takes 5 minutes a day to practice Chinese vocabulary. Sounds counter productive but it works like a charm! :)

These are the ingredients of our secret sauce: 

üëÄ 100% illustrated: Images instantly carry a meaning - there‚Äôs no need to use your native language at all! Nothing in the middle to get you second guessing. It‚Äôs faster, effective, and definitely more fun for daily Mandarin Chinese language learning! :) 

üèé 5 min sessions: Limited time for practice sounds crazy but that‚Äôs what makes it incredibly addictive ‚Äì which is a cool thing for learning Chinese words. There‚Äôs close to zero barrier entry for reasons not to learn. You‚Äôll have no excuses even on the busiest day! 

üïπ Effortless play: Games are addictive and fun, and we distilled these as the essence of Drops. The end result? A truly immersive Mandarin Chinese language learning experience that is not a waste of time since while you are playing you are also building a valuable knowledge in language. 

‚ö°Quick: Keyboarding typing is slow. With Drops, taps and rapid swipes is all you need for learning Chinese. Trust us, those extra seconds are handy during the game learning session. ;) 

üéØ Vocabulary only: No grammar, just curated practical words. These two are our focus and we do it pretty well! The Drops app teaches Cantonese and Mandarin too! 

üíÅForge a habit: We want to make you an addict to language learning. An established habit + an effective method is what works with Mandarin Chinese language! And this is the combo that Drops helps you build! 

We are proud of our beautiful word pronunciations from our professional voice talents! 

Drops is free to use for casual learners with 99 topics, and 1700 Chinese words to choose from. Hardcore language learners can opt-in for our premium plans with unlimited learning time and to progress faster. Susbscription plans start from $2.99 per month. 

üåç Empowering people through Chinese language knowledge is our goal, with Drops as a special tool that uses a universal language that we can all speak: pictures! 

P.S. A friendly warning, this language learning app can really get you addicted to learning. :) 

üòç If you love Chinese Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :) Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

title: DuDu Learn Chinese Characters
descriptionHTML:
[DuDu Learn Chinese Characters] is a simple and fun literacy game designed for children's Chinese characters enlightenment. Following the children's cognitive thinking, creative interactive game recognition experience, through different Chinese characters cognitive links, from shallow to deep, let children understand and understand Chinese characters in entertainment.

title: Daily Chinese: Grow Vocabulary
description:
Daily Chinese is the simplest way to grow your Chinese vocabulary. An optimized spaced-repetition algorithm gradually introduces new words each day and makes sure you never forget the words you already know. Master a variety of question types that adjust their difficulty to challenge you, and access AI-generated example sentences and word breakdowns to reinforce your learning.

Create daily reviews from useful, practical word packs that contain 15,000+ total words. Learn the basics, get ahead at work, pass the HSK, survive abroad, and so much more. The words you master are recorded so that you always know the size of your vocabulary and can track your progress.

Through practicing a little every day, Daily Chinese will help you master your Chinese vocabulary forever.

*Spaced-Repetition Algorithm*
The optimized algorithm shows you the words you need to review when you need to review them. New words are introduced daily and the words you‚Äôve already reviewed are shown right before you might forget them, storing them in your long-term memory.

*Master Different Question Types*
More than just flashcards, the app has a variety of different question types to make sure you learn all elements of a word or idiom, including the Chinese characters, pinyin, and definition.

*Example Sentences and Insights*
AI-powered insights for every word and idiom that include example sentences, word insights, etymology, and cultural context.

*Own Your Progress*
Master words and idioms and watch your vocabulary grow. The words you learn are added to your vocabulary collection, giving you proof of your mastery and a record of your progress.

*Learn the Fundamentals*
For beginners, an introductory series presents words in an order that builds upon what you‚Äôve already learned. You‚Äôll quickly learn the basics and develop a strong foundation. 

*Prepare for the HSK*
Daily Chinese includes the most recent official vocabulary lists for all levels of the HSK, Mainland China‚Äôs Chinese proficiency exam.

*Master Idioms and Grammar Words*
Our expertly crafted packs of four-character idioms (ÊàêËØ≠) and grammar words will help you navigate Chinese sentences and take your language ability to the next level.

*Get Around and Live Abroad*
Need to read a Chinese menu, talk to your landlord, or survive study abroad? Our word packs will teach you the essential words you need to know if you are traveling, living, or studying in China. 

*Focus on China*
Go in-depth on Chinese cultural subjects and learn important terms related to politics, religion, traditional medicine, and geography.

*Read the News*
Start reading primary sources in Chinese and stay up on current events by mastering words related to international affairs, trade, technology, and more.

*Survive the Office*
Whether teaching English, working in tech, or running a multinational business empire, we have word packs to help you tackle any job.

*And More‚Ä¶*

title: Chinese Grammar
description:
The Chinese grammar app has handy Chinese lessons offline to answer any questions you might have about the Chinese sentence structure and grammar rules classified by levels. It's better than a Chinese grammar book since you can always have it on you.

You'll find clear and easy to understand lessons illustrated with plenty of examples. There are more than 100 lessons available (and more coming!) from a beginner to an advanced level to learn Chinese grammar offline. The lessons are all in simplified Chinese and traditional Chinese.

The Chinese grammar wiki app has been made with professional teachers that have your understanding in mind, with the linguistic grammar lingua explained. Every Chinese Grammar rule is explained simply.

If you're looking to learn Chinese grammar offline, these lessons will help you greatly to understand the concept behind the Chinese language.

Every lesson is explained simply with Chinese sentence examples and Pinyin. All lessons are accessible with no ads, no sign-up, and offline.

We added a direct shortcut in each lesson to Ninchanese, so you can train and practice using the grammar point directly. Ninchanese is a gamified learning app we also made, and it's definitely worth exploring if you want to master the Chinese language. 

On Ninchanese, each grammar lesson corresponds to a stage to help you understand the grammar point better. Note that you'll need an account on the app to access these stages directly.

We hope you'll like these all free lessons without ads and will give us a 5-star review and leave us a lovely comment. üòª

We wish you success in your Chinese learning!

Basic speaker:

HSK 1: Beginner
HSK 2: Elementary

Independent speaker

HSK 3: Intermediate
HSK 4: Upper Intermediate

Proficient speaker
HSK 5: Advanced

Coming Soon

HSK6

title: Learn Korean - Beginners
description:
Want to learn Korean online for free? Join over 30 million people who have chosen to study with the BNR Languages apps!

Korean for beginners ‚Äî designed for anyone who wants to learn Korean from scratch and study at their own pace, in a simple and practical way.

With interactive activities and native audio to help with pronunciation and listening comprehension, you'll learn Korean quickly and intuitively.

Study on your own, in your own time, with no daily limits. Choose what you want to practice: reading, writing, listening, or vocabulary. Everything is easy to use and personalized for you.

Exercises use images to help you memorize words, and the review mode lets you practice and refresh everything you've already learned ‚Äî anytime you want.

Learning a new language has never been easier, more accessible, and 100% free!

Find out why our app is the ideal choice to study anytime, anywhere:

- Complete offline Korean course ‚Äî from beginner to advanced levels.

- Learn on your own! Study Korean independently, at your own pace, without needing teachers or tutors.

- 100% free! All content and features are available for free ‚Äî you don't need to pay to learn!

- Start from the very beginning, learning the alphabet!

- Set your own study time. Learn as much as you want ‚Äî no time limits! No daily activity limits! Practice and learn as many times as you like every day!

- Large selection of words to help expand your vocabulary.

- Interactive exercises with images that make it easier to memorize new words! Learn in a fun and easy way ‚Äî with a gamified interface that makes studying feel like playing a game.

- Review mode to practice and refresh everything you've already learned.

- Native audio recordings with adjustable playback speed.

- Different types of tests! Practice your reading, writing, and listening skills.

- Full translation available in many languages: Chinese, Spanish, English, Hindi, Arabic, Bengali, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese, Korean, French, Turkish, Vietnamese, Italian, Thai, Persian, Indonesian, Urdu, Polish, Ukrainian, Malay, Uzbek, Romanian, Dutch, Greek, Czech, Hungarian, Swedish, Belarusian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Danish, Norwegian, Slovak, Finnish, Hebrew, Irish, Catalan, Swahili.

- Choose what you want to study and customize your learning experience.

- Perfect for learning Korean quickly ‚Äî whether for travel, work, study, or to connect with family and friends.

- Simple, intuitive, and user-friendly interface for all ages.

- No internet connection needed to learn Korean! The app works completely offline.

- Earn medals, track your progress, and stay motivated.

- Join the weekly ranking and compete with other users!

- New words and vocabulary categories added regularly.

Download the BNR Languages app now and start your Korean course!

title: Learn Korean, Hangul: HeyKorea
description:
15 MINUTES A DAY ‚Äì LEARN KOREAN FROM ZERO

HeyKorea is a smart and convenient Korean learning app with short, visual, and super easy-to-understand lessons designed in a clear and structured roadmap for all learners. Practice your communication, listening, reading, and writing skills while expanding your Korean vocabulary and grammar. Whether you're learning Korean for the TOPIK exam, for work, or just to handle daily conversations while traveling ‚Äî HeyKorea has everything you need, delivering an effective and fun learning experience.

Why choose HeyKorea to learn Korean?

Clear learning roadmap: From in-depth Hangeul lessons to structured paths for TOPIK levels 1‚Äì4 Confident communication: Practice speaking Korean daily with AI HeySpeak Master all 4 skills: Listening, speaking, reading, and writing ‚Äì all the way to achieving TOPIK level 4 Learn 1000+ Korean vocabulary and grammar items ‚úî Themed vocabulary to help you memorize and apply words in real-life situations ‚úî Visual, audio, and flashcard learning boosts memory 3x faster ‚úî Grammar is integrated directly into each vocabulary lesson, making it easy to understand and use Stand out with our AI-powered Korean speaking practice ‚úî Sample dialogues on real topics: travel, daily life, work, and more ‚úî Role-play with AI, receive pronunciation corrections, and build natural speaking reflexes ‚úî Enjoy free conversation mode with HeySpeak AI to level up your speaking skills every day Get ready to conquer the TOPIK level 4 exam ‚úî Practice real TOPIK tests with detailed answers and explanations ‚úî Updated test bank with authentic TOPIK-style questions across multiple levels Personalized learning path with cute collectible badges Complete tasks and earn adorable badges that celebrate your hard work and keep you motivated every day! Learning Korean is easier with HeyKorea! üì© WE'RE HERE FOR YOU We‚Äôre always working to make HeyKorea the best Korean learning app. If you run into any issues or have suggestions, please feel free to contact us at: heykorea@eupgroup.net

title: Learn Korean. Speak Korean
description:
Start learning Korean quickly and effectively with Mondly‚Äôs free daily lessons! In just minutes you‚Äôll start memorizing core Korean words, form sentences, learn to speak Korean phrases and take part in conversations. You‚Äôll feel like having your own Korean language tutor in your pocket. Loved and trusted worldwide üèÜ Mondly was named "Editors‚Äô Choice" in Google Play and "App of the Year" by Facebook. üåç Beginner or advanced learner, traveler or business professional - This Korean app works great and dynamically adjusts to your needs. Join over 100 million people that are learning new languages from their mother tongue! Why Mondly by Pearson? Because we build bridges between people by making language learning fun and easy through technological innovation. TRY MONDLY BY PEARSON ‚òÖ "The closest thing to classroom education." ‚Äî Bloomberg ‚òÖ "A practical approach to language learning likely to be widely adopted." ‚Äî Forbes ‚òÖ "The new way to learn languages ." ‚Äî Inc. ‚òÖ "Mondly is like having a private tutor." ‚Äî CNN _____________________

This is how the future of language courses looks like

Our Korean language learning app gets you started with a basic conversation between two people. You quickly start memorizing core words, use them to build sentences and phrases, and at the end of a 45-minutes module you are able to reconstruct that conversation with your own voice. It‚Äôs an effective way to learn Korean phrases. State-of-the-art Natural Speech Recognition and Spaced Repetition Algorithms make our Korean learning app effective for learning languages.

Here are the key features that make Mondly by Pearson a great tutor for you:

‚úì Crystal-clear audio and professional voice actors. ¬ª Learn the right Korean pronunciation from conversations between native speakers. ‚úì State-of-the-art Speech Recognition. ¬ª Mondly by Pearson knows exactly how to listen to your Korean words and phrases. You will only get a positive feedback if you speak Korean clearly and correctly. This will improve your pronunciation. ‚úì Useful phrases for real situations. ¬ª Memorizing hundreds of isolated words is not the way to go when it comes to learning Korean. Mondly by Pearson teaches you Korean vocabulary by offering you core words and phrases. Our Korean language learning apps break the learning process down into short lessons and puts them into themed packs. ‚úì Learn conversational Korean. ¬ª Conversation is the main reason to take this free course. It will help you build a core Korean vocabulary with widely-used nouns and verbs, and speak Korean clearly. ‚úì Verb conjugations. ¬ª If you want to learn Korean grammar during this course, just tap the Korean verbs and get the full conjugation on the screen, including the translation. It‚Äôs faster and better than a dictionary. ‚úì Advanced Statistics. ¬ª Our Korean learning apps use intelligent reporting, so you can always follow your progress. Build your vocabulary step by step and become better daily. ‚úì The Leaderboard. ¬ª See how your friends are doing and compete with people from all over the world to become the best learner in the Mondly community family. Take the Weekly Quiz to become even better. ‚úì Adaptive Learning. ¬ª Learning Korean is different from person to person. So we taught the app to learn from your way of learning. After little time spent together, Mondly will understand what suits you best and it will become your own guide and customized teacher. ‚òÖ Before you know it, at the end of these Korean lessons, you will master the most useful 5000 words and phrases and you will be on the fast lane to learning a new language. Continue learning with Mondly by Pearson: ‚Ä¢ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mondlylanguages ‚Ä¢ Twitter: https://twitter.com/MondlyLanguages ‚Ä¢ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mondlylanguages

‚úì State-of-the-art Speech Recognition.
¬ª Mondly by Pearson knows exactly how to listen to your Korean words and phrases. You will only get a positive feedback if you speak Korean clearly and correctly. This will improve your pronunciation.

‚úì Useful phrases for real situations.
¬ª Memorizing hundreds of isolated words is not the way to go when it comes to learning Korean. Mondly by Pearson teaches you Korean vocabulary by offering you core words and phrases. Our Korean language learning apps break the learning process down into short lessons and puts them into themed packs.

‚úì Learn conversational Korean.
¬ª Conversation is the main reason to take this free course. It will help you build a core Korean vocabulary with widely-used nouns and verbs, and speak Korean clearly.

‚úì Verb conjugations.
¬ª If you want to learn Korean grammar during this course, just tap the Korean verbs and get the full conjugation on the screen, including the translation. It‚Äôs faster and better than a dictionary.

‚úì Advanced Statistics.
¬ª Our Korean learning apps use intelligent reporting, so you can always follow your progress. Build your vocabulary step by step and become better daily.

‚úì The Leaderboard.
¬ª See how your friends are doing and compete with people from all over the world to become the best learner in the Mondly community family. Take the Weekly Quiz to become even better.

‚úì Adaptive Learning.
¬ª Learning Korean is different from person to person. So we taught the app to learn from your way of learning. After little time spent together, Mondly will understand what suits you best and it will become your own guide and customized teacher.

‚òÖ Before you know it, at the end of these Korean lessons, you will master the most useful 5000 words and phrases and you will be on the fast lane to learning a new language.

Continue learning with Mondly by Pearson:

‚Ä¢ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mondlylanguages
‚Ä¢ Twitter: https://twitter.com/MondlyLanguages
‚Ä¢ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mondlylanguages
summary: Study, speak & learn Korean quickly - words, phrases, grammar & fun lessons.

title: Learn Korean language & Hangul
description:
What if üá∞üá∑ Korean vocabulary learning would be a crazy fun game instead of boring memorisation drills? This app makes Korean language learning an effortless fun. Practical vocabulary is bound to your memories through beautiful graphics and quick mini-games.

The crazy part? You have only 5 mins per day to learn Korean. Might sound insane but works like charm! :)

These are the ingredients of the secret sauce:

üëÄ 100% illustrated: Pictures directly carry the meaning -  you don‚Äôt have to use your native language at all! No intermediary. Faster, more effective and of course more fun for Korean learning process! :)
üèé 5 min sessions: limiting practice time sounds crazy but it it makes it incredibly addictive - which is cool thing for learning. The barrier of entry is close to zero so you can‚Äôt have any excuses: you‚Äôll have 5 minutes even on the busiest day!
üïπ Effortless play: We know why games are fun and addictive and distilled the essence into this app. The result is a truly immersive experience but it‚Äôs not waste of your time while you play because you build a valuable knowledge.
‚ö°Quick: Keyboard typing is painfully slow. Welcome rapid swipes and taps! Especially for Korean vowels, and consonants.Trust us, you‚Äôll need those extra seconds during the quick learning session ;)
üéØ Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just handpicked practical words. That‚Äôs our focus and we do it extremely well. The app teaches the Korean ‚Äúalphabet‚Äù Hangul (hangoul) too!
üíÅ Forge a habit: We want to get you hooked on language learning. Effectiveness is nothing without a well established habit. We help you build one!
We are extremely proud of our lovely word pronunciations by seasoned voice talents!
The app is free for casual learners: more than 2700 words in 150+ topics are all available for everyone. Hardcore language learners can subscribe for premium to progress faster with unlimited Korean language learning time.
 
üåç Our goal is to empower people of the world via language knowledge by providing a special tool that utilizes the universal language we all speak: pictures.
  
p.s.: be careful, this app really can get you addicted to learning Korean language.
 
-----------------
üòç If you love this app as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :)
 
Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

title: Write It! Korean
description:
Are you ready to embark on an exciting journey into the realm of Korean writing? Look no further! "Write It! Korean" is your ultimate companion for mastering the art of Hangul, the Korean alphabet, in a fast, efficient, and enjoyable manner.

Real Handwriting Recognition and Expert-Guided Lessons:
Experience the magic of real handwriting recognition coupled with meticulously crafted guided lessons. This dynamic combination will accelerate your learning curve, allowing you to swiftly memorize new characters while honing your Korean writing skills.

Practice, Test, and Earn Stars:
Delve into the art of writing each Hangul character stroke by stroke, ensuring precision and correctness. Put your newfound expertise to the test by writing and recognizing the characters you've diligently learned. 

Customized Review and Audio Support:
Stay on track to success with our custom review feature. Ensure that you retain and reinforce your hard-earned knowledge, leaving no room for forgetting what you've diligently studied. To enhance your learning experience, we've gone the extra mile by professionally recording audio, enabling you to seamlessly associate sounds with the characters you're mastering.

Study Anywhere, Anytime:
Life is a dynamic journey, and your learning should be no different. With "Write It! Korean," you can study on your terms, regardless of location. Forget about internet connectivity constraints ‚Äì our Korean learning app is fully functional offline, empowering you to nurture your Korean writing skills whether you're on a train, plane, or bus.

"Write It! Korean" Main Features at a Glance:

‚Ä¢ Master Korean writing effortlessly.
‚Ä¢ Premier Korean language learning app.
‚Ä¢ Precision in learning Korean characters.
‚Ä¢ Perfect your Hangul through diligent practice.
‚Ä¢ Explore the world of Hangul characters.
‚Ä¢ Embark on a journey to learn Hangul.
‚Ä¢ Achieve fluency in Hangul writing.
‚Ä¢ Expert-guided Hangul lessons.
‚Ä¢ Hone your Hangul writing skills.
‚Ä¢ Recognize and write Korean letters.
‚Ä¢ Enhance your Korean handwriting proficiency.

Why Choose "Write It! Korean"?

Effortless Learning: Say goodbye to conventional learning methods that leave you overwhelmed and uninspired. "Write It! Korean" offers a dynamic, interactive, and engaging approach to conquering the Korean alphabet and writing.

Advanced Recognition Technology:
Our real handwriting recognition technology is cutting-edge. You'll be amazed at how quickly you can memorize new characters with our state-of-the-art recognition system.

Step-by-Step Mastery:
Our guided lessons are expertly crafted to lead you through the intricacies of Hangul step by step. You'll learn each character stroke by stroke, ensuring that your writing is both beautiful and accurate.

Prove Your Mastery:
Our testing modules add a fun and challenging aspect to your learning journey. After practicing each character, you can put your knowledge to the test and see how well you remember them.

Holistic Learning:
To enhance your learning experience, we've included professionally recorded audio. This means you can not only see and write the characters but also hear them pronounced correctly. It's a holistic approach to learning that helps you connect the written and spoken aspects of the Korean language.

Study Anywhere, Anytime:
Learning on the go has never been easier. "Write It! Korean" is designed to work offline, so you can study anytime and anywhere. Whether you're on a train, a plane, or a bus, you can continue to build your Korean writing skills with ease.

title: Teuida: Learn Languages
description: Learn Spanish, Korean and Japanese language by speaking from the start! Practice speaking essential expressions in first-person POV scenarios. üëÄ "But I can just learn it by watching Netflix!?‚Äù Just like if you were learning how to swim, you‚Äôd go into a pool instead of watching videos of Michael Phelps swimming. You can't learn Korean by listening to BTS, Japanese by watching anime or Spanish by eating tacos! Don't get us wrong, we too love listening to Kpop, watching anime and eating tacos. But if your goal is to ACTUALLY SPEAK, you have to, well ‚Äì SPEAK! TEUIDA's first-person POV conversations will get you speaking everyday expressions in real-life scenarios. ‚è≥ 3 min > 30 min We believe that 3 minutes of actual speaking will help you more than 30 minutes watching someone else speaks. Why waste your precious time learning about languages when you can learn by speaking it yourself? Our interactive lessons not only get you to speak with the tutors but gives instant feedback on your pronunciation. üòè Overcome fear of speaking Research shows that one of the greatest barriers to speaking a language is confidence. After all, what's the point of knowing all the grammar rules and verb conjugations if you can't speak when the moment comes? TEUIDA helps you overcome fear of speaking by simulating real-life scenarios but without all the social anxiety. (i.e. Our characters won't throw shade at you for mispronouncing!) Here‚Äôs a list of things that make TEUIDA different: üéØ Essential expressions No more weird, awkward phrases (translated by bots) that no one actually use in real life. (Let's be honest, when was the last time you had to say "I am a boy, you are a woman" in real-life?) üéØ Effective curriculum Once you master our curriculum, you will be able to know the basic vocabularies, grammars and of course, speak to your friends in Korean and Japanese. üéØ Taught by Bilingual Tutors Our crazy selection of fully bilingual tutors not only speak your target language but understand where you‚Äôre coming from. They know exactly what to teach you because they've been in your shoes! üéØ AI Pronunciation Analysis What's the point of repeating sentences aloud if you can't tell whether you're pronouncing it right? TEUIDA has a convenient voice recognition system that will give instant feedback on your pronunciation. üéØ Fun, Interactive Stories We believe that learning and fun are not mutually exclusive. In fact, learning is most effective when it's fun! You'll find yourself laughing, screaming and at times even cringing with the characters. üéØ Real-life Scenarios Real-life everyday situations! Everything from ordering a drink at the cafe to asking for directions! üéØ Culture-specific tips A wise man once said that "the person who learns language without learning culture risks becoming a fluent fool". We believe understanding culture is the key to learning language. So we hand-selected each scenario to reflect the culture-specific elements of each country. So... what are you waiting for? Stop reading and start speaking with TEUIDA! =========== Please note you will need a TEUIDA Premium plan in order to access all content and exclusive features. We only use the microphone's voice recognition in to evaluate your pronunciation. =========== Contact Developer: Business address: 5th floor, 165, Yeoksam-ro, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea

Practice speaking essential expressions in first-person POV scenarios.



üëÄ "But I can just learn it by watching Netflix!?‚Äù


Just like if you were learning how to swim, you‚Äôd go into a pool instead of watching videos of Michael Phelps swimming. So... what are you waiting for? Stop reading and start speaking with TEUIDA!

title: Mirinae - Learn Korean with AI
description: Are you learning Korean? Mirinae helps you understand all the parts-of-speech and grammar patterns in any Korean text that you give it. ‚óâ Let Mirinae be your AI Korean Teacher! You enter a Korean sentence and Mirinae will translate the sentence, show you all the individual parts of speech, find and explain any grammar patterns present, explain the particles and honorifics and verb conjugations, identify & explain any idioms or neologisms used, and draw out a parse-tree showing all the individual phrases & clauses in the sentence. Click on anything in the explanation for more details, alternate word definitions, example uses, related patterns, cross-references to learning sites and major textbooks, and much more.. All this allows the learner to explore Korean wherever they encounter it, perhaps an example sentence in a dictionary, some song lyrics or drama dialog, etc., discover its meaning, syntax, grammar patterns and any idioms used, and then to explore and continue learning, finding other examples of the patterns and words used. ‚óâ Learn while watching Kdrama or browsing the web There is also a Chrome Extension version that lets you explore and learn from Korean text you encounter on any website, including Kdrama subtitles on streaming sites like Viki.com, Netflix and Youtube. When enabled, the Mirinae extension will detect Korean on any web-page, so you can explore and get a deep understanding of any Korean directly within the page so that it can be very easily used to augment existing Korean teaching, reference and translation sites and video streaming sites. Visit the Chrome Store and search for ‚ÄúMirinae‚Äù. ‚óâ Built-in Dictionary, Searchable Grammar & Idiom Reference and Grammar-term Glossary Mirinae has a built-in dictionary & searchable grammar reference and can also be used as a deep, interactive Korean reference that is driven by examples of the things you want to search for. The library has a large and growing number of idiom patterns and neologisms (newly-coined words), essential for understanding modern spoken Korean, Kpop lyrics and Kdrama dialog. ‚óâ High tech!! Mirinae uses advanced machine learning, natural language processing and a non-deterministic phrase-structure parser, coupled with a proprietary regular-expression grammar-pattern, idiom and neologism library to build a lexical and grammatical analysis of the text, showing a breakdown of the text into its component words and particles and suffixes and other parts-of-speech along with a display of its structure in terms of phrases and predicates and clauses. It also uses an advanced, bi-language embedding-vector meaning disambiguator to provide likely meanings for individual words in the sentence, which is not easily determined from a full sentence-translation, as you might get from a standard translation site. ‚óâ FAQ ‚Ä¢How to use Mirinae? Visit https://mirinae.io/#/support ‚Ä¢ What is Android version compatibility? Mirinae works with Android version 5.1 or greater and may be affected by other settings on your device. If you experience issues with the App, please ensure that you are running Android version 5.1 or higher. If you are unable to update your Android version, installing the update to the Android System WebView available on Play Store may allow Mirinae to function correctly. ‚óâ NOTE ‚Ä¢ If you have any questions or suggestions please contact us: - helpdesk: team@mirinae.io - website: https://mirinae.io - instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mirinae.io/ - twitter: https://twitter.com/mirinae_io - youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/mirinae_io

Click on anything in the explanation for more details, alternate word definitions, example uses, related patterns, cross-references to learning sites and major textbooks, and much more..

All this allows the learner to explore Korean wherever they encounter it, perhaps an example sentence in a dictionary, some song lyrics or drama dialog, etc., discover its meaning, syntax, grammar patterns and any idioms used, and then to explore and continue learning, finding other examples of the patterns and words used.

‚óâ Learn while watching Kdrama or browsing the web
There is also a Chrome Extension version that lets you explore and learn from Korean text you encounter on any website, including Kdrama subtitles on streaming sites like Viki.com, Netflix and Youtube.

When enabled, the Mirinae extension will detect Korean on any web-page, so you can explore and get a deep understanding of any Korean directly within the page so that it can be very easily used to augment existing Korean teaching, reference and translation sites and video streaming sites. Visit the Chrome Store and search for ‚ÄúMirinae‚Äù.

‚óâ Built-in Dictionary, Searchable Grammar & Idiom Reference and Grammar-term Glossary
Mirinae has a built-in dictionary & searchable grammar reference and can also be used as a deep, interactive Korean reference that is driven by examples of the things you want to search for. The library has a large and growing number of idiom patterns and neologisms (newly-coined words), essential for understanding modern spoken Korean, Kpop lyrics and Kdrama dialog.

‚óâ High tech!!
Mirinae uses advanced machine learning, natural language processing and a non-deterministic phrase-structure parser, coupled with a proprietary regular-expression grammar-pattern, idiom and neologism library to build a lexical and grammatical analysis of the text, showing a breakdown of the text into its component words and particles and suffixes and other parts-of-speech along with a display of its structure in terms of phrases and predicates and clauses.

It also uses an advanced, bi-language embedding-vector meaning disambiguator to provide likely meanings for individual words in the sentence, which is not easily determined from a full sentence-translation, as you might get from a standard translation site.

‚óâ FAQ
‚Ä¢How to use Mirinae?
Visit https://mirinae.io/#/support

‚Ä¢ What is Android version compatibility?
Mirinae works with Android version 5.1 or greater and may be affected by other settings on your device. If you experience issues with the App, please ensure that you are running Android version 5.1 or higher. If you are unable to update your Android version, installing the update to the Android System WebView available on Play Store may allow Mirinae to function correctly.

‚óâ NOTE
‚Ä¢ If you have any questions or suggestions please contact us:
- helpdesk: team@mirinae.io
- website: https://mirinae.io
- instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mirinae.io/
- twitter: https://twitter.com/mirinae_io
- youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/mirinae_io
summary: Learn Korean daily sentences using Kpop lyrics Kdrama subtitles with fun lessons

title: Learn Korean Fast: Course
description:
So, you want to learn Korean in no time? You need MosaLingua! Innovative and effective, our application has helped more than 13,000,000 people all over the world learn Korean in only 10 minutes per day - with actual results!

Popular on app stores, MosaLingua also comes highly recommended by the media and many specialized blogs.

Learn more about MosaLingua by watching the demonstration video on https://mosalingua.com.
Feel free to try our smartphone application for free: you'll see for yourself how well it works!
It's a powerful and effective tool - ideal for people who want to speak Korean in no time, without taking long, boring language courses.

It's useful in any situation: our method can help you while you travel, in the workplace, and in everyday life with our courses that suit your language needs.

THE BENEFITS OF MOSALINGUA: 
1) Useful, practical content
Don't waste your time with notions and courses that won't help you. Instead, learn the 20% that you'll use 80% of the time.

2) An innovative method based on scientific research
Our international team is made up of expert polyglots who've used the most modern and proven learning, memorization and consolidation techniques (SRS, active recall, metacognition, etc.).

3) Coaching throughout the learning process
To succeed, you can count on our review sessions that consolidate what you've learned, our mini lessons, and our advice for better understanding Korean vocabulary.

4) Learning and having fun at the same time
Achieve great results and have fun doing so: your progress will boost your MOTIVATION, which is key to any learning plan.

If you want to learn Korean, download the MosaLingua Learn Korean app and try it free ‚Äì you won't regret it!

Beyond conversations, Ganada aids in making your korean language usage more natural with word correction and natural sentence recommendations. title: FillIt: Learn KOREAN with KPOP
description:
Korean song lyrics learning game created by K-Pop Idol Community CHOEAEDOL
Listen to your favorite K-pop music and fill in the lyrics! ‚ÄúFillit‚Äù
This rhythm game with tap-style gameplay like a piano game, Fillit lets you learn Korean while having fun!

1. Guess K-pop lyrics and learn Korean language in an easy and fun way!
Help you learn and memorize Korean words by guessing K-pop lyrics.
Listen to K-pop, read and pronounce the lyrics to help you learn Korean language.
Everyone can enjoy ‚ÄúFillit‚Äù.
An easy to play game for anyone interested in K-pop.
Sing along to your favorite K-pop songs to learn K-pop lyrics.

2. Find out my Korean language level among K-pop fans worldwide!
Compete with other K-pop fans to climb the global leaderboards!
Compete with your friends or family for rankings!

3. Check out the ranking of K-pop artists and songs! Play now to make your bias NO.1!
Just play your favorite song and help your favorite artists or songs to the top.
Learn Korean language while making your favorite artist NO.1.
Check the ranking of each artist and song in real time.

4. Play Fillit anytime, anywhere!
It‚Äôs easy to play every day!
Play Fillit during your breaks, on public transport, before bed, or whenever you have a spare moment.
Fillit can also help you to learn Korean if you listen to K-pop a lot.
If you want to memorize K-pop lyrics, you can play any song in Fillit right now.

5. Fast new song updates!
With regular song updates, you can learn the lyrics to the latest K-pop songs faster than anyone else.

6. K-POP Mini Games 
Guess the song title in just 10 seconds!
A fast-paced K-pop rhythm challenge awaits!

title: Learn Korean with flashcards!
description:
ReWord is a highly effective Korean learning app. It is your best tool to learn Korean vocabulary and improve your Korean language skills. Did you know you can learn languages just taking 5-10 minutes a day? With our spaced repetition system, your Korean lessons will reach a new level. And will give you greater results, of course!

As with any other language, Korean lessons must include learning Korean grammar and memorizing new Korean words. However, one of the problems with foreign language learning is you can‚Äôt achieve good results if you don‚Äôt systematize the memorizing.
With ReWord, you get a dedicated system and will memorize new Korean words without much effort on your part.

Features:
‚Ä¢ 5000 words vocabulary. Thousands of Korean words and phrases divided into thematic categories: choose the category you want to learn this time and change it whenever you want.
‚Ä¢ Add your own flashcards and categories easily: you can create your own word base you want to master first.
‚Ä¢ Handy Korean flashcards with pictures and example sentences: helpful mental shortcuts to build your Korean vocabulary and understand the nuances of word meaning and how these words are used in real practice.
‚Ä¢ Spaced repetitions really work: ReWord has a science-based approach to memorizing foreign words so you can learn languages at the highest efficiency.
‚Ä¢ Tracking your progress: set your daily goal and keep achieving it every day.

title: Podo Korean ‚Äì Learn Korean
description:
Hello! I'm Jeongwoo Park (Danny), a professional Korean teacher. 
Let me introduce you to "Podo Korean," an app designed for serious Korean learners.

‚ñ† Top-quality lessons 
Since 2017, I‚Äôve taught Korean to hundreds of students worldwide. 
I‚Äôve poured all that experience into this app, allowing you to learn Korean just like you‚Äôre receiving private lessons. 
All audio and video content is recorded by a professional Korean teacher, so you can learn authentic pronunciation from native speakers, avoiding any robotic or unnatural sounds.

‚ñ† Reading practice 
Do you want to practice reading but find Korean books or texts too hard? 
To help you, I've written reading materials using simple words and expressions. 
Each sentence is short and easy to understand, with translations and native speaker audio provided. 
"Podo Korean" makes reading practice accessible for everyone.

‚ñ† Writing practice with corrections 
Write sentences using the expressions you‚Äôve learned! 
A Korean teacher will review your writing and correct it to make your sentences sound more natural. 
You can even save the corrected sentences as flashcards.

‚ñ† Flashcards 
Repetitive practice is key to language learning. 
With just a tap on the star icon, you can turn lessons, reading content, and corrected sentences into flashcards. 
Practice anytime using the Flashcards menu.

‚ñ† Multi-language support
Our app supports 7 languages to make learning Korean easier: English, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Indonesian, and Russian. 
Choose your preferred language and start learning Korean today!

‚ñ† Premium membership 
You can learn Hangul and basic expressions for free (ads are required). 
But for more detailed and effective learning, we recommend the premium version. 


‚ñ† Visit us online
Website: https://www.podokorean.com 
Blog: https://blog.podokorean.com 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/koreanwithpodo

For questions and feedback, contact us at 
contact@podokorean.com

title: Learn Korean Speak Language
description:
Learn Korean language, alphabet (hangul / hangeul) and grammar with LuvLingua.

Begin the learning experience already enjoyed by millions around the world.
LuvLingua education apps teach you through fun games, and beginner to intermediate level courses.
Study core words and essential phrases to build a strong foundation of Korean.
Understand and speak Korean to communicate more effectively!
Recommended for students, teachers, travellers, and business people who want to learn Korean.

Gain confidence and level up your ability with the beginner course.
200+ lessons that systematically teach and review new vocabulary, as well as help you construct sentences and questions.
Designed for students to train and improve fundamental language skills & knowledge.

Made by teachers to support and cater to different learning styles.
 - Visual (Picture & Memory Game)
 - Auditory (Listening Quiz)
 - Read-Write (Writing & Multichoice Quiz, Word Guess)
 - Kinesthetic (Animation & Target Game)
Progress in simple, easy stages and remember new lingo in a fast, fun way.

Convenient and interactive phrasebook, full of useful everyday conversation, and sorted into helpful categories.
The phrasebook includes vocabulary and dialogues for greetings, asking directions and telling time.
Test the basics with flashcards of numbers, food, clothing, colors and body parts.
Learn vocabulary and conversation to use in emergencies, school, shopping, travel and work.

Listen to high quality authentic audio of native speakers with clear pronunciation.
Test your listening and speaking ability, and master the correct pronunciation.

Alphabet (hangul / hangeul) lookup menu and quiz.
Recognise, read and test the alphabet (hangul / hangeul).

Grammar section and sentence builder.
Practice, review and improve your grammar ability.
Study the nouns, verbs and adjectives you need.

Quickly and easily lookup a word or phrase in the search section and save it to your favorites for later study.
Track your progress and gain achievements.
Options to change user language, hide / show romanisation.

Words are translated into over 30 languages including English, Spanish, French, German and Chinese (simplified and traditional characters).
Carefully translated by bilingual native speakers and not by computers / online translators.

Learn offline without internet connection.
This app is for all ages. All content in this app is safe for kids and adults.
Lots of free content. Buy the subscription to access all the content.

More advanced curriculum will be added soon.
We are committed to regularly updating this app.
Please send us suggestions about what we can add or improve.
Bugs, feedback or support => luvlingua@gmail.com

Learn Korean for travel in South Korea, work, school, or to talk to friends.

Love Learning Languages
LuvLingua

title: LEARN HANGUL(Korean alphabet)
description:
It consists of 20 stages, from the easiest single vowel to the most difficult one.
It was logically designed so that you can remember character of the before  stage without having to review it. Were you envious of your friends who can read Hangul?  You can do it, too. And you can quickly distinguish many similar letters.
If you have given up learning Hangul, try again (Learn Hangul).
You will be able to write and read Korean, which you could only speak.

title: Wlingua - Learn Italian
description:
Learning Italian has never been so easy. It's perfect for you, whether you already have a beginner, basic, intermediate, or advanced level of Italian. Thanks to our online Italian course, you‚Äôll notice your Italian improving very quickly. Millions of students have already tried our courses. Would you like to join them?

Our Online Italian Course:

Italian Course In this course you will learn Italian from scratch. Guaranteed! Regardless of the level you start from, it is designed to help you learn Italian from day one.

Our Learning Method:

A learning process designed for you that is both easy and guided: You‚Äôll feel like you‚Äôre learning more and more Italian every day. Every sentence, exercise, review, and reading has been carefully selected for you. Audio clips in Italian: A wide variety of accents with clear, crisp pronunciation. Recorded by professional narrators. Linked concepts: Each word is linked to its use or precise meaning. When you click on the words in each sentence, exercise, or reading, their meaning or an explanation of their use will appear. Lesson structure: Concepts are introduced progressively throughout the course. Only concepts that are explained in the course are used to create the content (sentences, exercises or readings). Vocabulary: Learn the meaning, pronunciation, and use of words with activities adapted to your progress. Grammar exercises: Practice your grammar with exercises linked to explanations. Vocabulary topics: Words are grouped by topic categories. Spaced reviews: Review the vocabulary and grammar at increasingly long intervals. Search function: Find whatever you‚Äôre looking for, including vocabulary and grammar. Reading comprehension texts (readings): Learn and practice with conversations, news, emails, and interviews, among others. Certificates: Earn a certificate that proves your knowledge at the end of each level. descriptionHTML:
Learning Italian has never been so easy.
It's perfect for you, whether you already have a beginner, basic, intermediate, or advanced level of Italian. Thanks to our online Italian course, you‚Äôll notice your Italian improving very quickly. Millions of students have already tried our courses. Would you like to join them?

Our Online Italian Course:


Italian Course
In this course you will learn Italian from scratch. Guaranteed! Regardless of the level you start from, it is designed to help you learn Italian from day one.

Our Learning Method:


A learning process designed for you that is both easy and guided: You‚Äôll feel like you‚Äôre learning more and more Italian every day. Every sentence, exercise, review, and reading has been carefully selected for you.

Audio clips in Italian: A wide variety of accents with clear, crisp pronunciation. Recorded by professional narrators.

Linked concepts: Each word is linked to its use or precise meaning. When you click on the words in each sentence, exercise, or reading, their meaning or an explanation of their use will appear.

Lesson structure: Concepts are introduced progressively throughout the course. Only concepts that are explained in the course are used to create the content (sentences, exercises or readings).

Vocabulary: Learn the meaning, pronunciation, and use of words with activities adapted to your progress.

Grammar exercises: Practice your grammar with exercises linked to explanations.

Vocabulary topics: Words are grouped by topic categories.

Spaced reviews: Review the vocabulary and grammar at increasingly long intervals.

Search function: Find whatever you‚Äôre looking for, including vocabulary and grammar.

Reading comprehension texts (readings): Learn and practice with conversations, news, emails, and interviews, among others.

Certificates: Earn a certificate that proves your knowledge at the end of each level.

title: Learn Italian with flashcards!
description:
ReWord is a highly effective foreign language learning app. It is your best tool to learn Italian and improve your vocabulary. Did you know you can learn languages just taking 5-10 minutes a day? With our interval system, your Italian lessons will reach a new level. And will give you greater results, of course!

As with any other language, Italian lessons must include learning Italian grammar and memorizing new Italian words. However, one of the problems with foreign language learning is you can‚Äôt achieve good results if you don‚Äôt systematize the memorizing.
With ReWord, you get a dedicated system and will memorize new Italian words without much effort on your part.

ReWord is the Italian language learning app for you, and here is why:
‚Ä¢ Thousands of Italian words and phrases divided into thematic categories: choose the category you want to learn this time and change it whenever you want.
‚Ä¢ Add your own words and categories easily: you can create your own word base you want to master first.
‚Ä¢ Handy flashcards with pictures and example sentences: helpful mental shortcuts to build your vocabulary and understand the nuances of word meaning and how these words are used in real practice.
‚Ä¢ Spaced repetitions really work: ReWord has a science-based approach to memorizing foreign words so you can learn languages at the highest efficiency.
‚Ä¢ Tracking your progress: set your daily goal and keep achieving it every day.
‚Ä¢ Learn Italian offline: now it is possible to improve your vocab wherever you go.

Yes, with ReWord, memorizing new words is extremely easy and utterly efficiently!

Use the app at least twice a day, with regular breaks every few hours. Start with just five words a day and you will have at least 1,825 new words in your active vocabulary within a year. Increase your daily goal, take more Italian lessons, and you will accelerate your progress and learn Italian even faster.
ReWord ‚Äì your best foreign language learning app! We are here to help you learn languages in a hassle-free way!

title: Learn Italian Vocabulary Words
description:
Learn Italian with games and flashcards. Memorize the most common words in the Italian language along with their articles. Master frequently used core vocabulary and listen to their pronunciation. You'll find multiple sections in the app that suit your learning style, such as common phrases, engaging Italian language games, vocabulary exercises, and more.

Build a daily habit of learning 5 words a day to see long-term results.

Flip the flashcards to find out the meaning of the Italian words.
Swipe right if you learned the word.
Swipe left if you want the card to be shown again in the future.

Features:
Listen to the pronunciation of Italian words, verbs, phrases, articles, and adjectives.
Track your progress in each level.
Images on the back of the card will help you learn naturally.
Organize your vocabulary by difficulty. Review with spaced repetition.

Earn points by learning and practicing. Then unlock phrases and word lists.
Add items to favorites and view your stats.
Learn vocabulary by level: A1, A2, B1, B2, C1, C2.
Phrasebook for daily conversations.
Practice vocabulary by playing.
Learn Italian at your own pace.
Memorize articles.

Premium Features:

Remove ads
Unlock hidden content

title: Verbare: Learn Italian verbs

Conquer one of the most challenging aspects of Italian grammar with ease.

FREE VERSION:
 ‚Ä¢ Includes 110 essential verbs.

PRO VERSION (available through in-app purchase):

title: Drops: Learn Italian
description:
What if üáÆüáπ Italian vocabulary learning would be a crazy fun game instead of boring memorisation drills? Drops makes language learning an effortless fun. Practical vocabulary is bound to your memories through beautiful graphics and quick mini-games.
The crazy part? You have only 5 mins per day. Might sound insane but works like charm! :)
These are the ingredients of the secret sauce:
üëÄ 100% illustrated: Pictures directly carry the meaning -  you don‚Äôt have to use your native language at all! No intermediary. Faster, more effective and of course more fun! :)
üèé 5 min sessions: limiting practice time sounds crazy but it it makes it incredibly addictive - which is cool thing for learning. The barrier of entry is close to zero so you can‚Äôt have any excuses: you‚Äôll have 5 minutes even on the busiest day!
üïπ Effortless play: We know why games are fun and addictive and distilled the essence into Drops. The result is a truly immersive experience but it‚Äôs not waste of your time while you play because you build a valuable knowledge.
‚ö°Qucik: Keyboard typing is painfully slow. Welcome rapid swipes and taps! Trust us, you‚Äôll need those extra seconds during the quick learning session ;)
üéØ Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just handpicked practical words. That‚Äôs our focus and we do it extremely well. The app teaches the Korean ‚Äúalphabet‚Äù Hangul (hangoul) too!
üíÅForge a habit: Drops wants to make you language learning addict. Effectiveness is nothing without a well established habit. We help you build one!
We are extremely proud of our lovely word pronunciations by seasoned voice talents!
Drops is free for casual learners: more than 1700 words in 99 topics are all available for everyone. Hardcore language learners can subscribe for premium to progress faster with unlimited learning time. Subscriptions start from $2.99 / month.
 
üåç Our goal is to empower people of the world via language knowledge by providing a special tool that utilizes the universal language we all speak: pictures.
 
 
p.s.: be careful, this app really can get you addicted to to language learning.
 
-----------------
üòç If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :)
 
Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

üéØ Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just handpicked practical words. That‚Äôs our focus and we do it extremely well. The app teaches the Korean ‚Äúalphabet‚Äù Hangul (hangoul) too!
üíÅForge a habit: Drops wants to make you language learning addict. Effectiveness is nothing without a well established habit. We help you build one!
We are extremely proud of our lovely word pronunciations by seasoned voice talents!
Drops is free for casual learners: more than 1700 words in 99 topics are all available for everyone. Hardcore language learners can subscribe for premium to progress faster with unlimited learning time. Subscriptions start from $2.99 / month.

üåç Our goal is to empower people of the world via language knowledge by providing a special tool that utilizes the universal language we all speak: pictures.


p.s.: be careful, this app really can get you addicted to to language learning.

-----------------
üòç If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :)

Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

title: Learn Italian Fast: Course
description:
So, you want to learn Italian in no time? You need MosaLingua! Innovative and effective, our application has helped more than 10,000,000 people all over the world learn Italian in only 10 minutes per day - with actual results!

Popular on app stores, MosaLingua also comes highly recommended by the media and many specialized blogs.

Learn more about MosaLingua by watching the demonstration video on https://mosalingua.com.
Feel free to try our smartphone application for free: you'll see for yourself how well it works!
It's a powerful and effective tool - ideal for people who want to speak Italian in no time, without taking long, boring language courses.

It's useful in any situation: our method can help you while you travel, in the workplace, and in everyday life with our courses that suit your language needs.

THE BENEFITS OF MOSALINGUA: 
1) Useful, practical content
Don't waste your time with notions and courses that won't help you. Instead, learn the 20% that you'll use 80% of the time.

2) An innovative method based on scientific research
Our international team is made up of expert polyglots who've used the most modern and proven learning, memorization and consolidation techniques (SRS, active recall, metacognition, etc.).

3) Coaching throughout the learning process
To succeed, you can count on our review sessions that consolidate what you've learned, our mini lessons, and our advice for better understanding Italian vocabulary.

4) Learning and having fun at the same time
Achieve great results and have fun doing so: your progress will boost your MOTIVATION, which is key to any learning plan.

If you want to learn Italian, download the MosaLingua Learn Italian app and try it free ‚Äì you won't regret it!

description:
Want to learn Russian online for free? Join over 30 million people who have chosen to study with the BNR Languages apps!

Russian for beginners ‚Äî designed for anyone who wants to learn Russian from scratch and study at their own pace, in a simple and practical way.

With interactive activities and native audio to help with pronunciation and listening comprehension, you'll learn Russian quickly and intuitively.

Study on your own, in your own time, with no daily limits. Choose what you want to practice: reading, writing, listening, or vocabulary. Everything is easy to use and personalized for you.

Exercises use images to help you memorize words, and the review mode lets you practice and refresh everything you've already learned ‚Äî anytime you want.

Learning a new language has never been easier, more accessible, and 100% free!

Find out why our app is the ideal choice to study anytime, anywhere:

- Complete offline Russian course ‚Äî from beginner to advanced levels.

- Learn on your own! Study Russian independently, at your own pace, without needing teachers or tutors.

- 100% free! All content and features are available for free ‚Äî you don't need to pay to learn!

- Start from the very beginning, learning the alphabet!

- Review mode to practice and refresh everything you've already learned.

- Native audio recordings with adjustable playback speed.

- Different types of tests! Practice your reading, writing, and listening skills.

- Full translation available in many languages: Chinese, Spanish, English, Hindi, Arabic, Bengali, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese, Korean, French, Turkish, Vietnamese, Italian, Thai, Persian, Indonesian, Urdu, Polish, Ukrainian, Malay, Uzbek, Romanian, Dutch, Greek, Czech, Hungarian, Swedish, Belarusian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Danish, Norwegian, Slovak, Finnish, Hebrew, Irish, Catalan, Swahili.

- Choose what you want to study and customize your learning experience.

- Perfect for learning Russian quickly ‚Äî whether for travel, work, study, or to connect with family and friends.

- No internet connection needed to learn Russian! The app works completely offline.

- Earn medals, track your progress, and stay motivated.

- Join the weekly ranking and compete with other users!

- New words and vocabulary categories added regularly.

Download the BNR Languages app now and start your Russian course!

description:
Start learning Russian üá∑üá∫ quickly and effectively with Mondly‚Äôs free daily lessons! In just minutes you‚Äôll start memorizing core Russian words, form sentences, learn to speak Russian phrases and take part in conversations. You‚Äôll feel like having your own Russian language tutor in your pocket. Loved and trusted worldwide üèÜ Mondly was named "Editors‚Äô Choice" in Google Play and "App of the Year" by Facebook. üåç Beginner or advanced learner, traveler or business professional - This Russian app works great and dynamically adjusts to your needs. Join over 50 million people that are learning new languages from their mother tongue! Why Mondly? Because we build bridges between people by making language learning fun and easy through technological innovation. TRY MONDLY ‚òÖ "The closest thing to classroom education." ‚Äî Bloomberg ‚òÖ "A practical approach to language learning likely to be widely adopted." ‚Äî Forbes ‚òÖ "The new way to learn languages ." ‚Äî Inc. ‚òÖ "Mondly is like having a private tutor." ‚Äî CNN _____________________

This is how the future of language courses looks like

Our Russian language learning app gets you started with a basic conversation between two people. You quickly start memorizing core words, use them to build sentences and phrases, and at the end of a 45-minutes module you are able to reconstruct that conversation with your own voice. It‚Äôs an effective way to learn Russian phrases. State-of-the-art Natural Speech Recognition and Spaced Repetition Algorithms make our Russian learning app effective for learning languages.

Here are the key features that make Mondly a great tutor for you:

‚úì Crystal-clear audio and professional voice actors. ¬ª Learn the right Russian pronunciation from conversations between native speakers. ‚úì State-of-the-art Speech Recognition. ¬ª Mondly knows exactly how to listen to your Russian words and phrases. You will only get a positive feedback if you speak Russian clearly and correctly. This will improve your pronunciation. ‚úì Useful phrases for real situations. ¬ª Memorizing hundreds of isolated words is not the way to go when it comes to learning Russian. Mondly teaches you Russian vocabulary by offering you core words and phrases. Our Russian language learning apps break the learning process down into short lessons and puts them into themed packs. ‚úì Learn conversational Russian. ¬ª Conversation is the main reason to take this free course. It will help you build a core Russian vocabulary with widely-used nouns and verbs, and speak Russian clearly. ‚úì Verb conjugations. ¬ª If you want to learn Russian grammar during this course, just tap the Russian verbs and get the full conjugation on the screen, including the translation. It‚Äôs faster and better than a dictionary. ‚úì Advanced Statistics. ¬ª Our Russian learning apps use intelligent reporting, so you can always follow your progress. Build your vocabulary step by step and become better daily. ‚úì The Leaderboard. ¬ª See how your friends are doing and compete with people from all over the world to become the best learner in the Mondly community family. Take the Weekly Quiz to become even better. ‚úì Adaptive Learning. ¬ª Learning Russian is different from person to person. So we taught the app to learn from your way of learning. After little time spent together, Mondly will understand what suits you best and it will become your own guide and customized teacher. ‚òÖ Before you know it, at the end of these Russian lessons, you will master the most useful 5000 words and phrases and you will be on the fast lane to learning a new language. Continue learning with Mondly: ‚Ä¢ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mondlylanguages ‚Ä¢ Twitter: https://twitter.com/MondlyLanguages ‚Ä¢ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mondlylanguages

title: Wlingua - Learn Russian
description:
Learning Russian has never been so easy. It's perfect for you, whether you already have a beginner, basic, intermediate, or advanced level of Russian. Thanks to our online Russian courses, you‚Äôll notice your Russian improving very quickly. Millions of students have already tried our courses. Would you like to join them?

Our Online Russian Courses:

Russian Course In this course you will learn Russian from scratch. Guaranteed! Regardless of the level you start from, it is designed to help you learn Russian from day one. Russian Cases Course In this course you will study Russian cases. You will practice their forms and learn how to use them correctly with additional practice exercises. Designed for people who are already doing the General Russian course.

Our Learning Method:

A learning process designed for you that is both easy and guided: You‚Äôll feel like you‚Äôre learning more and more Russian every day. Every sentence, exercise, review, and reading has been carefully selected for you. Audio clips in Russian: A wide variety of accents with clear, crisp pronunciation. Recorded by professional narrators. Linked concepts: Each word is linked to its use or precise meaning. title: Learn Russian
description:
Learn Russian is your all-in-one app for mastering the Russian language. Whether you are starting as a complete beginner or already have experience, this app gives you everything you need to improve your Russian grammar, vocabulary, listening, and reading skills in a structured and engaging way.

Why Learn Russian with this app?

Learning a new language can be overwhelming, but Learn Russian makes the process simple and enjoyable. With a clear learning path, interactive practice, and a wide range of exercises, you can build confidence and fluency step by step. You don‚Äôt just memorize words‚Äîyou actually understand how Russian works and how to use it in real-life situations.

Key Features:

‚Ä¢ General Learning Track ‚Äì Follow a guided, step-by-step curriculum designed to help you progress naturally from beginner to advanced Russian.
‚Ä¢ Practice Quizzes ‚Äì Reinforce your knowledge with interactive quizzes covering Russian grammar, vocabulary, and comprehension.
‚Ä¢ Listening & Reading Exercises ‚Äì Improve your Russian listening comprehension with audio lessons and sharpen your reading skills with carefully selected texts.
‚Ä¢ Grammar Library & Exercises ‚Äì Access clear explanations of Russian grammar rules and test your understanding with targeted practice.
‚Ä¢ Vocabulary Builder ‚Äì Learn and remember the most useful Russian words and phrases with fun activities and spaced review.
‚Ä¢ Reading Library ‚Äì Explore a wide variety of Russian reading materials, from simple texts to more advanced passages, each with comprehension questions to check understanding.

Learn Russian for Every Goal

No matter your motivation, this app adapts to your needs:

For beginners ‚Äì Start with the basics of Russian grammar, essential vocabulary, and pronunciation.

For travelers ‚Äì Learn useful Russian phrases to communicate confidently on your trips.

For students ‚Äì Strengthen your Russian skills to support your studies and exams.

For professionals ‚Äì Build your Russian language ability to use in business or work environments.

For culture lovers ‚Äì Read authentic Russian texts and listen to native speakers to immerse yourself in the language.

Learn at Your Own Pace

Study Russian anytime, anywhere. The app is designed for flexible learning‚Äîyou can follow the structured track or focus on the areas you need most, such as grammar, vocabulary, or listening. Progress is always saved, so you can learn Russian consistently without losing track.

Why This App Works

Comprehensive ‚Äì Covers grammar, vocabulary, reading, listening, and comprehension.

Engaging ‚Äì Interactive quizzes and activities keep you motivated.

Effective ‚Äì Learn Russian step by step, building a strong foundation and moving toward fluency.

Accessible ‚Äì All explanations are in your native language, making it easier to understand complex Russian concepts.

Learning Russian has never been easier or more enjoyable. Whether you want to prepare for travel, work, study, or simply explore the rich Russian culture, this app is the perfect companion.

Download Learn Russian now and start speaking Russian with confidence today!

title: Learn Russian with Flashcards!
description:
Learning Russian has never been this easy! Memorize Russian words and improve your vocabulary with ReWord - a highly effective foreign language learning app.

If you need to learn Russian for work, want to travel to Russia, or just want to watch Russian movies in the original and understand the plot - you are here! Over a million users are happy to be expanding their vocabulary in different languages with ReWord! With the app, you get a dedicated system and will memorize Russian vocab without much effort on your part.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Built-in dictionary contains thousands of Russian words and phrases divided into categories. It includes the most frequently used Russian words, as well as some other thematic topics.
‚Ä¢ To learn Russian words, all you need to do is swipe handy flashcards with pictures and example sentences - helpful mental shortcuts to build your vocabulary and understand the nuances of word meaning and how these words are used in real practice.
‚Ä¢ Easily add your own flashcards: translations, pictures, and example sentences are automatically filled in.
‚Ä¢ Spaced repetitions really work: ReWord has a science-based approach to memorizing foreign words so you can learn languages at the highest efficiency.
‚Ä¢ Learning stats: Track your word memory over the past week, month, three months, and year.
‚Ä¢ Track your progress: set your daily goal and keep achieving it every day.
‚Ä¢ Night theme for comfortable Russian learning before bed.
‚Ä¢ Learn Russian language offline: now it is possible to improve your vocab wherever you go, and turn learning Russian into a daily routine.
‚Ä¢ Simple and clear interface without any disctracting elements.

To make Russian language learning even more efficient, it is recommended to use the ReWord Russian language self-tutor two or three times a day, several hours apart. By learning at least 5 Russian words a day and devoting time to Russian lessons daily, you will expand your vocabulary by 1800 words in a year.

ReWord is an excellent Russian language self-study tool for those who are already learning Russian or just starting to learn Russian. Start learning Russian today!

title: Russian Listening & Speaking
description:
Looking to improve your Russian-speaking and listening skills? Look no further than Russian Listening & Speaking - the ultimate app for immersive video conversations. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, our engaging curriculum and interactive features will help you master the language with confidence.

With Russian Listening & Speaking, you'll have access to a comprehensive range of video lessons that enable you to practice your conversation skills with authentic Russian videos. Our dialogue-based learning approach immerses you in practical scenarios, giving you the firsthand experience you need to become a fluent speaker.

The app also features native Russian speakers for conversational practice, allowing you to improve your speaking skills and communicate effectively in Russian. Our structured curriculum and user-friendly design make Russian Listening & Speaking the perfect choice for anyone looking to master the language.

So why wait? Download Russian Listening & Speaking today and start your journey to becoming a confident and fluent Russian speaker!

We're always happy to receive feedback to improve your learning experience!

title: Learn Russian Fast: Course
description:
So, you want to learn Russian, but don't have much time to spare? You need MosaLingua! Innovative and efficient, our application has helped more than 13 million people all over the world learn languages in just 10 minutes a day - with real results!

MosaLingua is highly recommended by the media and numerous language blogs.


Learn more about MosaLingua by watching our video on https://mosalingua.com/en.
Try our smartphone application for free: you'll see for yourself how well it works!
It's a powerful and effective tool - ideal for people who want to start speaking Russian quickly, without traditional, boring language classes.

It's useful in any situation: our method can help you before and during travel, in the workplace, and in everyday life with our Russian lessons that suit your unique needs.

THE ADVANTAGES OF MOSALINGUA: 
1) Useful, practical content
Don't waste your time learning concepts and lessons that won't help you. Instead, learn the 20% of the Russian language that you'll actually use 80% of the time.

2) An innovative method based on scientific research
Our international team of expert polyglots trust this modern and proven learning method and its memorization and consolidation techniques (SRS, active recall, metacognition, etc.).

3) Coaching throughout the learning process
For your best chances of success, practice with optimally-spaced review sessions to consolidate what you learn, pick up bits of grammar and culture with our mini Russian lessons, and benefit from our expert learning tips and tricks.

4) Learn and have fun at the same time
Achieve great results in Russian and have fun doing so: your progress will boost your MOTIVATION, which is key to any learning plan.

If you want to learn Russian, download the MosaLingua Learn Russian app and try it free ‚Äì you won't regret it!
