title: Learn Russian Language
description:
Learn Russian language, alphabet (Cyrillic)  and grammar with LuvLingua.

Begin the learning experience already enjoyed by millions around the world.
LuvLingua education apps teach you through fun games, and beginner to intermediate level courses.
Study core words and essential phrases to build a strong foundation of Russian.
Understand and speak Russian to communicate more effectively!
Recommended for students, teachers, travellers, and business people who want to learn Russian.

Gain confidence and level up your ability with the beginner course.
200+ lessons that systematically teach and review new vocabulary, as well as help you construct sentences and questions.
Designed for students to train and improve fundamental language skills & knowledge.

Made by teachers to support and cater to different learning styles.
 - Visual (Picture & Memory Game)
 - Auditory (Listening Quiz)
 - Read-Write (Writing & Multichoice Quiz, Word Guess)
 - Kinesthetic (Animation & Target Game)
Progress in simple, easy stages and remember new lingo in a fast, fun way.

Convenient and interactive phrasebook, full of useful everyday conversation, and sorted into helpful categories.
The phrasebook includes vocabulary and dialogues for greetings, asking directions and telling time.
Test the basics with flashcards of numbers, food, clothing, colors and body parts.
Learn vocabulary and conversation to use in emergencies, school, shopping, travel and work.

Listen to high quality authentic audio of native speakers with clear pronunciation.
Test your listening and speaking ability, and master the correct pronunciation.

Alphabet (Cyrillic) lookup menu and quiz.
Recognise, read and test the alphabet (Cyrillic).

Grammar section and sentence builder.
Practice, review and improve your grammar ability.
Study the nouns, verbs and adjectives you need.

Quickly and easily lookup a word or phrase in the search section and save it to your favorites for later study.
Track your progress and gain achievements.
Options to change user language, hide / show romanisation.

Words are translated into over 30 languages including English, Spanish, French, German and Chinese (simplified and traditional characters).
Carefully translated by bilingual native speakers and not by computers / online translators.

Learn offline without internet connection.
This app is for all ages. All content in this app is safe for kids and adults.
Lots of free content. Buy the subscription to access all the content.

More advanced curriculum will be added soon.
We are committed to regularly updating this app.
Please send us suggestions about what we can add or improve.
Bugs, feedback or support => luvlingua@gmail.com

Learn Russian for travel in Russia, work, school, or to talk to friends.

Love Learning Languages
LuvLingua

title: Learn Russian
description:
This application is designed to help you learn Russian and improve your Russian vocabulary. It will be useful for students, tourists, businessmen and anyone interested in learning Russian!

The application will help you to remember new Russian words and easily check your knowledge, practice spelling and listening to words. It can be used by people with any level of language knowledge from beginner to advanced.

Here you can find the most important and common Russian words and phrases for various topics: Greetings, People, Communication, Transport, City, Tourism, Travel, Health, Shopping, Food, Nature, House, Farm, Tools etc. 

Features:

- You can learn ready-made vocabulary topics or create your own sets of words or phrases.
- Flashcards will help to you learn and revise Russian vocabulary.
- Audio pronunciation and transcription of Russian words and phrases 
- Multiple choice exercises to recognize the correct translation. 
- Stats to monitor your learning progress.
- Correct mistakes to achieve the best results.
- Simplified mode for beginners.
- Select favorite words and phrases to create your own study list or improve your vocabulary.
- You can create your own notes to save and keep any texts, ideas or other information.
- Clean and simple design, multiple light and dark themes for your choice.
- Convenient search system by Russian words or translation.
- No internet connection required.

title: Drops: Learn Russian
description:
What if üá∑üá∫ Russian vocabulary learning would be a crazy fun game instead of boring memorisation drills? Drops makes language learning an effortless fun. Practical vocabulary is bound to your memories through beautiful graphics and quick mini-games.
The crazy part? You have only 5 mins per day. Might sound insane but works like charm! :)
These are the ingredients of the secret sauce:
üëÄ 100% illustrated: Pictures directly carry the meaning -  you don‚Äôt have to use your native language at all! No intermediary. Faster, more effective and of course more fun! :)
üèé 5 min sessions: limiting practice time sounds crazy but it it makes it incredibly addictive - which is cool thing for learning. The barrier of entry is close to zero so you can‚Äôt have any excuses: you‚Äôll have 5 minutes even on the busiest day!
üïπ Effortless play: We know why games are fun and addictive and distilled the essence into Drops. The result is a truly immersive experience but it‚Äôs not waste of your time while you play because you build a valuable knowledge.
‚ö°Qucik: Keyboard typing is painfully slow. Welcome rapid swipes and taps! Trust us, you‚Äôll need those extra seconds during the quick learning session ;)
üéØ Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just handpicked practical words. That‚Äôs our focus and we do it extremely well. The app teaches the Korean ‚Äúalphabet‚Äù Hangul (hangoul) too!
üíÅForge a habit: Drops wants to make you language learning addict. Effectiveness is nothing without a well established habit. We help you build one!
We are extremely proud of our lovely word pronunciations by seasoned voice talents!
Drops is free for casual learners: more than 1700 words in 99 topics are all available for everyone. Hardcore language learners can subscribe for premium to progress faster with unlimited learning time. Subscriptions start from $2.99 / month.
 
üåç Our goal is to empower people of the world via language knowledge by providing a special tool that utilizes the universal language we all speak: pictures.
 
 
p.s.: be careful, this app really can get you addicted to to language learning.
 
-----------------
üòç If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :)
 
Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

title: Learn the Russian Alphabet
description: 2 free decks, pay ONCE to unblock 26 decks (Premium) Join us: https://www.youtube.com/c/hackeandoidiomas ‚òÖ Do you want to learn Russian, but the alphabet (cyrillic) seems intimidating? ‚òÖ It is easier than it seems! Learn the 33 Russian letters (cyrillic script) in a single day! ‚òÖ All 21 Russian consonants, ‚òÖ 10 Russian vowels, ‚òÖ 2 Russian special symbols. You have access to 26 steps with: ‚òÜ 1135 words to learn how to read, along with a Read aloud function. ‚òÜ 206 useful sentences, with translation, to drill and reinforce. This very easy to use app lets you learn the Russian alphabet (cyrillic) easily. You can practice all the Russian words with a Read aloud function‚Ñ¢. In the last two steps of the learning you will be able to read full sentences written in Russian (cyrillic), and you will be able to amaze your Russian friends with tongue twisters in Russian. You'll fully master the Russian alphabet (cyrillic). Russia is the biggest country in the world, and the Russian language is spoken by more than 200 million people not only in Russia, but also in the former Soviet republics. Russian is a Slavic language, and it will help you learn other Slavic languages, as Ukranian or Bielorussian. It is the language of huge Classics, as Dostojevsky, Pushkin or Tchekhov. You'll learn the Russian alphabet (cyrillic) in a single day - no doubt. Don't worry if you don't speak Russian yet - this app aims to teach you the Russian (cyrillic) alphabet.

title: Learn Russian - 5,000 Phrases
description: Play, Learn and Speak ‚Äì discover common phrases for daily Russian conversation! ‚úî 5,000 useful phrases for conversation. ‚úî Learn Russian in your tongue (60 languages available). ‚úî Best FREE app for learning fast. Speak Russian Fluently in Real Conversations With Learn Russian application, you can now explore over 5,000 Russian phrases for short daily conversations while having absolutely pure fun! Whether you‚Äôre a tourist having a vacation in an Russian speaking country or someone who just wants to speak a foreign language, this application will help you learn Russian phrases in a fast, easy and enjoyable way. Why Our FREE App is Different ‚úî No internet connection required ‚Äì play where you want and when you want (offline). ‚úî 5,000 common phrases ‚Äì audio pronunciations and phonetic transcriptions to show you how native speaker from Russia actually pronounce them. ‚úî 11 fun games ‚Äì a innovative approach to practice your listening, writing and speaking skills. ‚úî 4 levels for learning: beginner, intermediate, advanced and expert. ‚úî 20 topics divided into 145 subtopics ‚Äì so you‚Äôll know what and when to say each phrase. Topics for Russian conversation: Greetings, Conversations with friends, Basic sentences, Travel, Transportation, Hotel, Restaurant, Food, Shopping, Work, Business etc. More Features to Improve Your Russian Speaking Vocabulary ‚úî Search and bookmark your most common expressions from the phrasebook. ‚úî Earn points as your Russian skills progress. ‚úî ‚ÄúRandom Categories‚Äù feature to randomly select the topic, subtopic and game. ‚úî 60 languages ‚Äìso you could understand and speak each phrase easily regardless of which country you‚Äôre from. About FunEasyLearn: Fun Easy Learn has developed many applications to help people around the world learn foreign languages for free. Fun Easy Learn applications improve your Russian skills: speaking, listening and grammar. The dictionary of the apps has human voice pronunciation for each common phrase to improve your speaking skill. Speak Russian easily and fluently for travel, business or fun!

title: Learn Russian. Speak Russian.
description:
Quickly learn to speak and understand Russian with interactive video lessons narrated in any of 146 languages.

"Affordable, responsive, easy to set up, and simple to access, Bluebird is loaded with user-friendly features and contains an enormous amount of content. This is an excellent resource for users seeking a handy, enhanced mobile experience for language learning." - Library Journal Free daily lessons for beginner, intermediate and advanced learners. Choose from 2,000 pre-recorded lessons (over 5 years of lessons) or create a truly personalized course that revolves around the things you love. If you‚Äôre learning for your job, you can even create a personalized course for any of 60 occupations. Bluebird uses the scientifically proven spaced repetition technique, so you‚Äôll learn quickly and retain what you learn long-term. Just listen and repeat ‚Äì it‚Äôs that easy. Learn Russian hands-free. No typing or swiping needed. Learn while you‚Äôre exercising, cooking, commuting, or relaxing at home. You can even stream your Bluebird lessons to smart speakers like Google Home or to your TV. You‚Äôll Learn: * 2,000 high frequency words. (84% of everyday speech includes these powerful words.) * The top 100 verbs ‚Äì with conjugations in the past, present, and future tenses. * How to build complete sentences on your own. * How to manage dozens of everyday situations. * How to handle complex conversations. Watch Your Progress: * 2,000 quizzes will test your knowledge and reinforce what you learn. * Each quiz contains a variety of question types to evaluate your listening, reading, and writing skills. * See your statistics for both your lessons and quizzes at any time. A Global Approach Bluebird brings language learning to the world‚Äôs population in an unprecedented way. You can learn Russian from any of 146 narration languages. Something for Everybody Whether you‚Äôre preparing for a trip or want to learn Russian for fun, school, or work, Bluebird will teach you what you need to know, and ensure you remember what you learn long-term. And, with family-friendly content throughout, your whole family can enjoy learning Russian the Bluebird way. Unparalleled Content and Quality Bluebird has the most comprehensive language courses in the world, with an average of 10,000 instructional phrases per language. Each Bluebird lesson lasts between 15 and 45 minutes, with the average lesson lasting 30 minutes. Our curriculum is teacher-designed and human-translated; our narrators and actors are professional voice-over artists and native speakers of their respective languages; and our audio is studio-grade.

Bluebird brings language learning to the world‚Äôs population in an unprecedented way. You can learn Russian from any of 146 narration languages.

Something for Everybody

Whether you‚Äôre preparing for a trip or want to learn Russian for fun, school, or work, Bluebird will teach you what you need to know, and ensure you remember what you learn long-term. And, with family-friendly content throughout, your whole family can enjoy learning Russian the Bluebird way.

title: Russian Ai: AI Learn Russian
description:
Russian Ai APP is a personalized Russian learning application designed for you. 
Covering A1-B1 level courses, it is especially suitable for beginners and those who need to quickly master survival Russian. 
With concise courses, gamified learning, and scenario-based training, it helps you apply Russian effortlessly in travel, work, and everyday life.

What does Russian Ai APP offer?
>>Cyrillic Alphabet Learning: Step-by-step mastery of Russian pronunciation and the Cyrillic alphabet.
>>Scenario-Based Courses: Covers daily conversations, travel, work, and exam scenarios.
>>AI Pronunciation Practice: Smart feedback to correct your pronunciation and improve speaking skills quickly.
>>Bite-Size Russian Courses: Compact lessons focusing on high-frequency words and phrases for mastering survival Russian.
>>1-on-1 Private Tutoring: Personalized sessions tailored to your needs for effective learning.
>>Gamified Vocabulary Learning: Fun and engaging exercises for memorizing words and mastering sentence patterns.

Who is Russian Ai APP for?
>>Beginners interested in learning Russian with no prior experience.
>>Students preparing for A1-B1 level Russian proficiency exams.
>>Travelers and study-abroad applicants heading to Russia.
>>Enthusiasts eager to explore Russian culture and language.

Learners aiming to quickly improve their Russian listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills.

How to Contact UsÔºösupport@myrussianai.com

Terms of Service: https://legal.myrussianai.com/terms-of-service?lang=en

title: Bootstrap Russian Grammar
description:
Packed with 200 grammar topics and over 3000 annotated examples, *Bootstrap Russian Grammar* is a proven grammar based approach that gets you communicating in Russian precisely and with confidence.

"‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê At the time of writing I have 2060 consecutive days on Duolingo. During that time I‚Äôve appreciated Duo for the vocabulary but found it very difficult to learn grammar. I‚Äôve got a couple of grammar books (that I don‚Äôt have the time to properly study) and I‚Äôve tried several grammar apps (that are characteristically poorly written, poorly explained and generally very unhelpful). I‚Äôve learned more Russian grammar from this app in three days than I have in the past five years. If you‚Äôre serious about understanding Russian, this is the best ¬£25 you‚Äôll spend."

----  Review by user JezDavis ‚Äì Aug 26, 2023

'Bootstrap Russian Grammar' provides the solid grounding in grammar basics that is the key to mastering Russian as a second language. Grammatical rules and concepts are clearly explained in order of importance. Each topic builds on the last - step-by-step. 

Hundreds of new words are introduced alongside the grammar to help learners quickly build their Russian speaking and comprehension prowess.

Starting from the beginning, the idea is progress in small self-contained steps (called 'topics'). Each topic builds on the last, by incrementally adding new grammatical patterns, new vocabulary and lots and lots of useful examples. 

Each topic includes a thorough explanation of the grammar and then lots of examples that illustrate the grammar. Each example includes an English translation, as well as notes highlighting how each example illustrates that topic's grammar, as well as the meanings of new Russian words.

A companion BOOK is now available called "BootStrap Russian Grammar". The book contains all the content contained in this book - including 200 grammar topics and over 3000 example phrases. 

Just search for "BootStrap Russian Grammar" on Amazon.

The book and mobile app are easy to coordinate using QR codes. Just scan the QR code at the beginning of any chapter in the book with the app and it will take you straight to the topic where you will find all the examples with the high-quality audio matching the chapter in the book.

So if you prefer to have the grammar set out in book form but would also like to be able to listen to the example sentences, then the book/app combination is perfect for you.

A companion BOOK is now available called "BootStrap Russian Grammar". The book contains all the content contained in this book - including 200 grammar topics and over 3000 example phrases.

The book and mobile app are easy to coordinate using QR codes. Just scan the QR code at the beginning of any chapter in the book with the app and it will take you straight to the topic where you will find all the examples with the high-quality audio matching the chapter in the book.

So if you prefer to have the grammar set out in book form but would also like to be able to listen to the example sentences, then the book/app combination is perfect for you.
summary: Learn Russian grammar step-by-step:  200 topics and over 3000 examples

title: Most Common Russian Words
description:
- 3000 words are all you need to express yourself and have everyday conversations in a language easily. This app has all the most common Russian ones that are essential to know for everyday conversations, always available on your phone anywhere, anytime, even while offline.
- 111.192 example sentences to put words into context, with pronunciations
- Automatic and flexible spaced repetition, so you will always see and practice the words that are the most beneficial to review based on last review time, number of times reviews, and current status of the word
- Filter by levels (A1, A2, B1, B2), over 100 topics, categories, and sub-categories (e.g. family, food, entertainment, home, time, work, nature, body, travel, society, feelings, health, education, technology), and parts of speech (adjectives, nouns, verbs, adverbs, pronouns, prepositions, conjunctions)
- Study without even opening the app, on your lock screen or smartwatch, with flexibly scheduled notifications
- Flashcard autoplay and auto-pronounce loops over your flashcards for times when you are multi-tasking and cannot use your hands for an effortless hands-free learning experience (so you can learn even when working, watching a movie, or doing chores)
- Practice with your favorite interactive quiz types to master your vocabulary (there are a total of 7 practice types with 28 total variations regarding hint, answer type, and language)
- Easily accessible dictionary that lets you search with English or Russian terms, and you can even expand your search to all 111.192 example sentences that contain the given keywords
- Backup and sync your word progress, stars, statistics, and practices across all devices in real-time so that you can pick up any of your devices with the latest state already synced
- Stick to your goals by setting a daily review goal, and optional daily notifications to remind you to study
- You can understand your current study level and progress and monitor the current states of all 3000 most common words with a single glance from the main screen
- Core features are free forever, while extra features can be unlocked by in-app purchases

title: Learn Russian Vocabulary Words
description:
Learn 3500 Russian nouns, adjectives and verbs to enrich your vocabulary. Memorize most common Russian words. Listen pronunciation of the words. Learn with word games, phrases and word lists. Use flash cards to master frequently used, core vocabulary.

Build a daily habit of learning 5 words a day to see long term progress.

- Flip the flashcards to find out the meaning of the Russian words. 
- Swipe right if you learned the word.
- Swipe left if you want the card to be shown again in the future.

Features:
- Listen pronunciation of the Russian words, verbs, phrases and adjectives.
- Track your progress in each level.
- Images provided in the back of the card to help you remember the words naturally. New images are being added.
- Review learned words.
- Play word games to practice in an entertaining way.
- Earn points by learning and practicing. Then unlock phrases and word lists.
- Favorite words and stats.
- Common words for all levels: A1,A2,B1,B2,C1,C2
- Unlock Phrasebook and word lists as you progress for several topics.

title: Learn Russian Cases and Vocab
description:
Learn Russian language with MemRussian, the ultimate app to learn Russian. Master Russian word declension and improve your Russian vocabulary. Say goodbye to memorization struggles and hello to precision in your Russian language and Russian grammar. Start your journey to learn Russian today with MemRussian!

Key Features:

- Cyrillic Keyboard: The app comes with the Cyrillic keyboard so you don't need it to start learning new words.

- Russian Dictionary: A built-in Russian dictionary that comes with over 90,000 words. The Russian dictionary includes declensions for nouns/adjectives and conjugations for verbs.

 - Precise Learning: MemRussian not only teaches you new words but also guides you on word stress placement and the intricate world of word declension.

 - Comprehensive Coverage: Explore every facet of Russian declension with our extensive database. Every Russian noun's declension is at your fingertips, ensuring you're well-equipped to tackle the complexities of the language.

 - Effective Repetition: Our unique Spatial Repetition method guarantees you won't forget what you've learned. Whether it's Russian vocabulary or declension, questions adapt in difficulty, providing support until you can recall the target words from memory without assistance.

 - Varied Practice: Practice both Russian vocabulary and declension. Configure your practice to focus on specific Russian cases and watch your proficiency soar.

 - Progress Tracking: MemRussian keeps tabs on your practice sessions, allowing you to review your growth directly within the app. Cultivate effective learning habits and witness your improvement firsthand.

Elevate your Russian language skills today by expanding your vocabulary and mastering Russian declension with MemRussian. Start your journey to fluency now!

title: Learn Portuguese - Beginners
description:
Want to learn Portuguese online for free? Join over 30 million people who have chosen to study with the BNR Languages apps!

Portuguese for beginners ‚Äî designed for anyone who wants to learn Portuguese from scratch and study at their own pace, in a simple and practical way.

With interactive activities and native audio to help with pronunciation and listening comprehension, you'll learn Portuguese quickly and intuitively.

Study on your own, in your own time, with no daily limits. Choose what you want to practice: reading, writing, listening, or vocabulary. Everything is easy to use and personalized for you.

Exercises use images to help you memorize words, and the review mode lets you practice and refresh everything you've already learned ‚Äî anytime you want.

Learning a new language has never been easier, more accessible, and 100% free!

Find out why our app is the ideal choice to study anytime, anywhere:

- Complete offline Portuguese course ‚Äî from beginner to advanced levels.

- Learn on your own! Study Portuguese independently, at your own pace, without needing teachers or tutors.

- 100% free! All content and features are available for free ‚Äî you don't need to pay to learn!

- Start from the very beginning, learning the alphabet!

- Set your own study time. Learn as much as you want ‚Äî no time limits! No daily activity limits! Practice and learn as many times as you like every day!

- Large selection of words to help expand your vocabulary.

- Interactive exercises with images that make it easier to memorize new words! Learn in a fun and easy way ‚Äî with a gamified interface that makes studying feel like playing a game.

- Review mode to practice and refresh everything you've already learned.

- Native audio recordings with adjustable playback speed.

- Different types of tests! Practice your reading, writing, and listening skills.

- Full translation available in many languages: Chinese, Spanish, English, Hindi, Arabic, Bengali, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese, Korean, French, Turkish, Vietnamese, Italian, Thai, Persian, Indonesian, Urdu, Polish, Ukrainian, Malay, Uzbek, Romanian, Dutch, Greek, Czech, Hungarian, Swedish, Belarusian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Danish, Norwegian, Slovak, Finnish, Hebrew, Irish, Catalan, Swahili.

- Choose what you want to study and customize your learning experience.

- Perfect for learning Portuguese quickly ‚Äî whether for travel, work, study, or to connect with family and friends.

- Simple, intuitive, and user-friendly interface for all ages.

- No internet connection needed to learn Portuguese! The app works completely offline.

- Earn medals, track your progress, and stay motivated.

- Join the weekly ranking and compete with other users!

- New words and vocabulary categories added regularly.

Download the BNR Languages app now and start your Portuguese course!

title: Learn Brazilian Portuguese
description: Learn Brazilian Portuguese with free lessons daily. Let Mondly teach you the Brazilian Portuguese language quickly and effectively. In just minutes you‚Äôll start memorizing core Brazilian Portuguese words, form sentences, learn to speak Brazilian Portuguese phrases and take part in conversations. Fun Brazilian Portuguese lessons improve your vocabulary, grammar and pronunciation like no other language learning method. Beginner or advanced learner, traveler or business professional with a tight schedule? The app works great and dynamically adjusts to your needs. Explore language exercises for reading, listening, writing and speaking enhanced with a dictionary, verb conjugator and state-of-the-art speech recognition technology - you‚Äôll feel like having your own Brazilian Portuguese language tutor in your pocket. Download the language learning pill today and enjoy the benefits of learning a new language for life. The secret path to language learning Remember the Brazilian Portuguese language classes in school? You started with hundreds of basic words and expressions, continued with tons of Brazilian Portuguese grammar lessons and at the end of a full semester‚Äôs language course you could barely translate a sentence or say ‚ÄúHello!‚Äù to a foreigner. That‚Äôs the traditional way to learn a language. Mondly has a different approach, that‚Äôs opposite to the average language course. This is how the future of language courses looks like The App gets you started with a basic conversation between two people. You quickly start memorizing core words, use them to build sentences and phrases, and at the end of a 45-minutes module you are able to reconstruct that conversation with your own voice. It‚Äôs an effective way to learn Brazilian Portuguese phrases. State-of-the-art Natural Speech Recognition and Spaced Repetition Algorithms make the app effective for learning languages. Here are the key features that make Mondly a great tutor for you: Crystal-clear audio and professional voice actors. Learn the right Brazilian Portuguese pronunciation from conversations between native speakers. State-of-the-art Speech Recognition. Mondly knows exactly how to listen to your Brazilian Portuguese words and phrases. You will only get a positive feedback if you speak Brazilian Portuguese clearly and correctly. This will improve your pronunciation. Useful phrases for real situations. Memorizing hundreds of isolated words is not the way to go when it comes to learning Portuguese. Mondly teaches you Portuguese vocabulary by offering you core words and phrases. The app breaks the learning process down into short lessons and puts them into themed packs. Learn conversational Portuguese. Conversation is the main reason to take this free course. It will help you build a core Portuguese vocabulary with widely-used nouns and verbs, and speak Brazilian Portuguese clearly. Verb conjugations. If you want to learn more during this course, just tap the Portuguese verbs and get the full conjugation on the screen, including the translation. It‚Äôs faster and better than a dictionary. Advanced Statistics. The App uses intelligent reporting, so you can always follow your progress. Build your vocabulary step by step and become better daily. The Leaderboard. See how your friends are doing and compete with people from all over the world to become the best learner in the Mondly community family. Take the Weekly Quiz to become even better. Adaptive Learning. Learning Portuguese is different from person to person. So we taught the app to learn from your way of learning. After little time spent together, Mondly will understand what suits you best and it will become your own guide and customized teacher. Before you know it, at the end of these Portuguese lessons, you will master the most useful 5000 words and phrases and you will be on the fast lane to learning a new language.

Verb conjugations. If you want to learn more during this course, just tap the Portuguese verbs and get the full conjugation on the screen, including the translation. It‚Äôs faster and better than a dictionary.

Advanced Statistics. The App uses intelligent reporting, so you can always follow your progress. Build your vocabulary step by step and become better daily.

The Leaderboard. See how your friends are doing and compete with people from all over the world to become the best learner in the Mondly community family. Take the Weekly Quiz to become even better.

Adaptive Learning. Learning Portuguese is different from person to person. So we taught the app to learn from your way of learning. After little time spent together, Mondly will understand what suits you best and it will become your own guide and customized teacher.

Before you know it, at the end of these Portuguese lessons, you will master the most useful 5000 words and phrases and you will be on the fast lane to learning a new language.
summary: Learn Portuguese easily. Speak & study - words, phrases, grammar & fun lessons.

title: Portuguese for Beginners
description: ADVANTAGES OF OUR APP: * Pronunciation by a native speaker * European or Brazilian Portuguese * 2378 words split into 180 topic lessons * Does not require permanent Internet connection * Beautiful illustrations for each word * Phonetic transcription for each word * Dark interface to study at night * Choose from male and female voice * Built in app dictionary with progress * Game "True or False" to review pas material * Special lessons with favorite, difficult, old, random words * Flexible sound settings (music, speaker, effects) * Just 10-15 minutes per day to learn all words * For adults and teens 13+ Only 10-15 minutes per day Spending just 10-15 minutes every day, will easily allow you to remember all useful Portuguese words. While memorizing words, the frequency of lesson is more important than duration of each lesson. 10 minutes on each day of the week will be more productive than one hour of tuition a week. One minute lessons Taking into account busyness of modern life, we designed each lesson in the way so it would never take more than one minute to complete it! So you no longer need to search for free time to practice Portuguese! Simply, once you get a chance, launch the app and do one lesson at a time =) Short sessions will not affect efficiency of word memorization. Only useful Portuguese words Portuguese for Beginners: LinDuo HD is a free and quick start to learn Portuguese language! Unlike others, we have only the most useful words, which are divided into 180 topic based lessons. Quality is here! Teach-yourself Portuguese is designed, that it will use your visual and echoic memory to help you memorize Portuguese words fast and easy! Special illustrations We use only specially developed infographics (developed by psychologists), so your eyes can quickly identify meaning of word or action without stressing them with small unnecessary details. Word pronunciation by native speakers Our app will help you master pronunciation of Portuguese words! Each word is recording by professional native speaker! Additionally, in the settings you can choose between male or female voice. Dynamic lesson difficulty The app changes lesson difficulty gradually as you progress. To achieve this, it keeps stats for EVERY word! Example: in the spelling mode, initially you need to insert several missing letters in a word, then create a word having extra letters and finally, when you are ready, you will need to type the entire word on the keyboard. Modes for quick learning The App includes four additional lesson types which are made of Favorites, Difficult, Old, Random words. You can add any word to your favorites and later create custom lesson from your Favorite words. Words are automatically added to "Difficult" (the ones you struggle to memorize) and "Old" (which you have not reviewed for a long time) sections. A "Random" mode will create a unique lesson. Do not need to know how to read If you cannot read yet, no problem! Each word has a transcription in your language! And for more experienced ones, in the settings, you can choose a phonetic (like in a dictionary) transcription. Additional features Thanks to your reviews, we are constantly updating the app to make it better! To help you take care of your eyesight, with just one tap, you can activate dark theme. If you temporarily do not have internet access, no problem! The App can work offline as well! Review Past Material Many good apps do not pay enough attention to review past material! For this purpose we created the word game "True or False". It is very simple, but it's addictive and the most importantly, it helps to repeat past material and never to forget it! Support and Contact Us If you have any questions or suggestions, please never hesitate to send us an email admin@lin-duo.com or use in-app contact form. We are always happy to answer your questions!

title: Learn Portuguese Fast
description:
So, you want to learn Brazilian Portuguese in no time? You need MosaLingua! Innovative and effective, our application has helped more than 13.000,000 people all over the world learn Brazilian Portuguese in only 10 minutes per day - with actual results!

Popular on app stores, MosaLingua also comes highly recommended by the media and many specialized blogs.

Learn more about MosaLingua by watching the demonstration video on https://mosalingua.com.
Feel free to try our smartphone application for free: you'll see for yourself how well it works!
It's a powerful and effective tool - ideal for people who want to speak Brazilian Portuguese in no time, without taking long, boring language courses.

It's useful in any situation: our method can help you while you travel, in the workplace, and in everyday life with our courses that suit your language needs.

THE BENEFITS OF MOSALINGUA: 
1) Useful, practical content
Don't waste your time with notions and courses that won't help you. Instead, learn the 20% that you'll use 80% of the time.

2) An innovative method based on scientific research
Our international team is made up of expert polyglots who've used the most modern and proven learning, memorization and consolidation techniques (SRS, active recall, metacognition, etc.).

3) Coaching throughout the learning process
To succeed, you can count on our review sessions that consolidate what you've learned, our mini Brazilian Portuguese lessons, and our advice for better understanding vocabulary.

4) Learning and having fun at the same time
Achieve great results and have fun doing so: your progress will boost your MOTIVATION, which is key to any learning plan.

If you want to learn Portuguese , download the MosaLingua Learn Portuguese app and try it free ‚Äì you won't regret it!

title: Drops: Learn Portuguese
description:
What if üáµüáπ European Portuguese vocabulary learning would be a crazy fun game instead of boring memorisation drills? Drops makes language learning an effortless fun. Practical vocabulary is bound to your memories through beautiful graphics and quick mini-games.
The crazy part? You have only 5 mins per day. Might sound insane but works like charm! :)
These are the ingredients of the secret sauce:
üëÄ 100% illustrated: Pictures directly carry the meaning -  you don‚Äôt have to use your native language at all! No intermediary. Faster, more effective and of course more fun! :)
üèé 5 min sessions: limiting practice time sounds crazy but it it makes it incredibly addictive - which is cool thing for learning. The barrier of entry is close to zero so you can‚Äôt have any excuses: you‚Äôll have 5 minutes even on the busiest day!
üïπ Effortless play: We know why games are fun and addictive and distilled the essence into Drops. The result is a truly immersive experience but it‚Äôs not waste of your time while you play because you build a valuable knowledge.
‚ö°Qucik: Keyboard typing is painfully slow. Welcome rapid swipes and taps! Trust us, you‚Äôll need those extra seconds during the quick learning session ;)
üéØ Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just handpicked practical words. That‚Äôs our focus and we do it extremely well. The app teaches the Korean ‚Äúalphabet‚Äù Hangul (hangoul) too!
üíÅForge a habit: Drops wants to make you language learning addict. Effectiveness is nothing without a well established habit. We help you build one!
We are extremely proud of our lovely word pronunciations by seasoned voice talents!
Drops is free for casual learners: more than 1700 words in 99 topics are all available for everyone. Hardcore language learners can subscribe for premium to progress faster with unlimited learning time. Subscriptions start from $2.99 / month.
 
üåç Our goal is to empower people of the world via language knowledge by providing a special tool that utilizes the universal language we all speak: pictures.
 
 
p.s.: be careful, this app really can get you addicted to to language learning.
 
-----------------
üòç If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :)
 
Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

description: Play, Learn and Speak ‚Äì discover common phrases for daily Portuguese conversation! ‚úî 5,000 useful phrases for conversation. ‚úî Learn Portuguese in your tongue (60 languages available). ‚úî Best FREE app for learning fast. Speak Portuguese Fluently in Real Conversations With Learn Portuguese application, you can now explore over 5,000 Portuguese phrases for short daily conversations while having absolutely pure fun! Whether you‚Äôre a tourist having a vacation in an Portuguese speaking country or someone who just wants to speak a foreign language, this application will help you learn Portuguese phrases in a fast, easy and enjoyable way. Why Our FREE App is Different ‚úî No internet connection required ‚Äì play where you want and when you want (offline). ‚úî 5,000 common phrases ‚Äì audio pronunciations and phonetic transcriptions to show you how native speaker from Portugal actually pronounce them. ‚úî 11 fun games ‚Äì a innovative approach to practice your listening, writing and speaking skills. ‚úî 4 levels for learning: beginner, intermediate, advanced and expert. ‚úî 20 topics divided into 145 subtopics ‚Äì so you‚Äôll know what and when to say each phrase. title: Learn Portuguese with ReWord
description:
ReWord is a highly effective Portuguese vocabulary learning app. It is your best tool to learn European Portuguese or Brazilian Portuguese language and improve your vocabulary. Did you know you can learn languages just taking 5-10 minutes a day? With our interval system, your Portuguese lessons will reach a new level. And will give you great results, of course!

As with any other language, Portuguese lessons must include learning Portuguese grammar and memorizing new Portuguese words. However, one of the problems with foreign language learning is you can‚Äôt achieve good results if you don‚Äôt systematize the memorizing.
With ReWord, you get a dedicated system and will memorize new Portuguese words without much effort on your part.

Features:
‚Ä¢ In-built Portuguese dictionary contains thousands of Portuguese words and phrases divided into thematic categories, including the most commonly used words in Portuguese. Choose the category you want to learn this time and change it whenever you want.
‚Ä¢ Ability to learn Brazilian Portuguese
‚Ä¢ Ability to learn European Portuguese
‚Ä¢ Add your own Portuguese words and categories easily: you can create your own word base you want to master first.
‚Ä¢ Handy flashcards with pictures and example sentences: helpful mental shortcuts to build your vocabulary and understand the nuances of word meaning and how these words are used in real practice.
‚Ä¢ Spaced repetitions really work: ReWord has a science-based approach to memorizing foreign words so you can learn languages at the highest efficiency.
‚Ä¢ Tracking your progress: set your daily goal and keep achieving it every day.
‚Ä¢ Offline mode: now it is possible to learn Portuguese wherever you go.

Yes, with ReWord, memorizing new words is extremely easy and utterly efficient, for both beginners and advanced learners!

Use the app at least twice a day, with regular breaks every few hours. Start with just five words a day and you will have at least 1825 new words in your active vocab within a year. Increase your daily goal, take more Portuguese lessons, and you will accelerate your progress and learn Portuguese even faster.
ReWord ‚Äì your best Portuguese learning app! We are here to help you learn languages in a hassle-free way! Start to speak Portuguese!

title: Practice Portuguese
description:
Master European Portuguese from Portugal with interactive, step-by-step lessons and a massive library of dialogues (with translated subtitles).

Since 2012, we've helped thousands of expats, travellers, and students worldwide learn Portuguese. Our small-but-mighty team focuses on only 1 language, so we can take a more practical, human approach to the unique challenges of learning European Portuguese: closed vowel pronunciation, the subtleties of formal vs. informal language, and much more.

Practice Portuguese was founded when Joel (from Canada) struggled to find non-Brazilian learning resources, so he teamed up with Rui (from Portugal) to solve this once and for all!

** TRUSTPILOT SCORE: Excellent 4.9 / 238 Ratings **

‚ÄúI've studied four languages so far in my adult life, and Practice Portuguese is by far the best experience I've had.‚Äù 
‚Äì Carrie Chauhan

‚ÄúInstead of just copying what every other language learning app does, the team seems to actually think about what would be useful to a learner‚Äù 
‚Äì Audrey

SPEAK PORTUGUESE AS SOON AS POSSIBLE
‚Ä¢ Read, write, listen, and speak your way to fluency! 
‚Ä¢ Interactive lessons, from A1 (beginner) to B2 (advanced)
‚Ä¢ Learn grammar & culture via engaging Learning Notes, with real-world insights & audio examples
‚Ä¢ 800+ Portuguese dialogues with translated subtitles, speed controls, vocabulary & expressions list, and comprehension quizzes. New episodes added regularly!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR EXPERIENCE
‚Ä¢ Follow Units in order or jump directly to what you need to learn.
‚Ä¢ Learn everything from basic greetings and forming questions, to more specialized content like buying a home, ordering food, opening a bank account, and more!
‚Ä¢ Listen offline: Download dialogues and audio review sessions. (Note: Other features including transcripts, Smart Review, Lessons, and Learning Notes require Internet access.)
‚Ä¢ Smart Review: Save useful phrases as flash cards and master them using proven "spaced repetition" techniques
‚Ä¢ Verbs: Master 100's of popular Portuguese verbs so conjugating becomes second nature.

1-ON-1 SUPPORT
Whenever you need help or extra motivation, reach out and we‚Äôll get you back on track!

** WHAT MEMBERS ARE SAYING **

‚ÄúHands-down this is THE ultimate site for learning European Portuguese...The two creators create the perfect blend between the pronunciation and grammar of a native, Rui, and the perspective, empathy, and sponge-of-mind of a foreigner, Joel.‚Äù
‚Äì Emily Reynolds

‚ÄúFriendly, bite-sized lessons that make it easy to practice every day. It has been amazing to track my progress and realize I understand more and can even communicate a bit after just a few months of 15 minutes a day.‚Äù
‚Äì Sophia Bogle

‚ÄúIf you want to learn European Portuguese, this is the site to use. I have been an educator for 27 years, and am not easily impressed by educational software. Yet I am so impressed by the care, thought, and planning behind this site. The team at Practice Portuguese has made learning a new language an absolute joy.‚Äù
‚Äì Jay Resh

FREE
‚Ä¢ Learning Notes: Portuguese grammar & culture
‚Ä¢ Portuguese Dialogues: Shorties, Videos, & Podcasts
‚Ä¢ Offline Audio: Listen on-the-go and adjust speed
‚Ä¢ Preview the "Units" available in Premium

PREMIUM
‚Ä¢ 100+ Units: Step-by-step lessons, from A1 (beginner) to B2 (Advanced)
‚Ä¢ 800+ Dialogues: Instant access to all Portuguese-English transcripts
‚Ä¢ Smart Review: Save phrases to practice using Flash Cards / Quiz / Audio-Only modes
‚Ä¢ Verb conjugation practice
‚Ä¢ Members-only Forum

IN-APP SUBSCRIPTION
If you subscribe via Google Play, payment will be charged to App Store Account. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Subscriptions and auto-renewal can be managed in your device's Account Settings after purchase. Taxes may be added to the cost, depending on your region.

Privacy Policy
practiceportuguese.com/privacy-policy

Terms of Use
practiceportuguese.com/terms-conditions
descriptionHTML:
Master European Portuguese from Portugal with interactive, step-by-step lessons and a massive library of dialogues (with translated subtitles).

Since 2012, we've helped thousands of expats, travellers, and students worldwide learn Portuguese. Our small-but-mighty team focuses on only 1 language, so we can take a more practical, human approach to the unique challenges of learning European Portuguese: closed vowel pronunciation, the subtleties of formal vs. informal language, and much more.

Practice Portuguese was founded when Joel (from Canada) struggled to find non-Brazilian learning resources, so he teamed up with Rui (from Portugal) to solve this once and for all!

** TRUSTPILOT SCORE: Excellent 4.9 / 238 Ratings **

‚ÄúI've studied four languages so far in my adult life, and Practice Portuguese is by far the best experience I've had.‚Äù
‚Äì Carrie Chauhan

‚ÄúInstead of just copying what every other language learning app does, the team seems to actually think about what would be useful to a learner‚Äù
‚Äì Audrey

SPEAK PORTUGUESE AS SOON AS POSSIBLE
‚Ä¢ Read, write, listen, and speak your way to fluency!
‚Ä¢ Interactive lessons, from A1 (beginner) to B2 (advanced)
‚Ä¢ Learn grammar & culture via engaging Learning Notes, with real-world insights & audio examples
‚Ä¢ 800+ Portuguese dialogues with translated subtitles, speed controls, vocabulary & expressions list, and comprehension quizzes. New episodes added regularly!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR EXPERIENCE
‚Ä¢ Follow Units in order or jump directly to what you need to learn.
‚Ä¢ Learn everything from basic greetings and forming questions, to more specialized content like buying a home, ordering food, opening a bank account, and more!
‚Ä¢ Listen offline: Download dialogues and audio review sessions. (Note: Other features including transcripts, Smart Review, Lessons, and Learning Notes require Internet access.)
‚Ä¢ Smart Review: Save useful phrases as flash cards and master them using proven "spaced repetition" techniques
‚Ä¢ Verbs: Master 100's of popular Portuguese verbs so conjugating becomes second nature.

1-ON-1 SUPPORT
Whenever you need help or extra motivation, reach out and we‚Äôll get you back on track!

** WHAT MEMBERS ARE SAYING **

‚ÄúHands-down this is THE ultimate site for learning European Portuguese...The two creators create the perfect blend between the pronunciation and grammar of a native, Rui, and the perspective, empathy, and sponge-of-mind of a foreigner, Joel.‚Äù
‚Äì Emily Reynolds

‚ÄúFriendly, bite-sized lessons that make it easy to practice every day. It has been amazing to track my progress and realize I understand more and can even communicate a bit after just a few months of 15 minutes a day.‚Äù

‚ÄúIf you want to learn European Portuguese, this is the site to use. I have been an educator for 27 years, and am not easily impressed by educational software. Yet I am so impressed by the care, thought, and planning behind this site. The team at Practice Portuguese has made learning a new language an absolute joy.‚Äù
‚Äì Jay Resh

title: Learn Portuguese with LENGO
description:
Learning languages has never been so easy! More and more people learn languages with LENGO every day. Join today and be part of our growing community!

LENGO IS FREE TO USE
Our goal is to make education accessible to anyone. Thus, all basic features are permanently free to use. We are continuously extending paid content as well as free content to make LENGO even better.

WHAT TO EXPECT
LENGO equips you with everything you need to learn the language you want. It has been shown that you can significantly reduce the time invested in learning a new language by using instant feedback, recurrent material, and other methodologies that LENGO supports. Another aspect that is likely to improve your learning success is the motivation methods, which are often missing from traditional language-learning methods. However, you still have to bring some initiative.

EXTRA CONTENT? THAT'S PREMIUM
With LENGO Premium, you unlock your full potential. You unlock everything you need to learn languages as quickly and successfully as possible.

ABOUT LENGO
LENGO is a language learning platform that strives to enrich global human interaction by improving people‚Äôs ability to communicate.

Privacy policy: https://www.lengo.io/about/privacy/
Terms of use: https://www.lengo.io/about/terms

Questions? Contact us:
contact@lengo.io

---------------------------------------------------------------

Information about the auto-renewable nature of the subscription

A subscription is not essential to get access to the full learning materials. You can also gain access by uploading content that adds value to the community. Otherwise, content can be unlocked through in-app-purchases. However, subscriptions are useful for users who want full access without any further action required. The subscribed user does not have to pay attention to our digital currency. Therefore, full access to the app is Lengo Premium.

Each subscription will be automatically renewed unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period. Your iTunes account will be automatically charged at the same price for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current payment period unless you change your subscription preferences in your iTunes Account Settings. When a subscription is canceled, access to the app‚Äôs courses and features will expire at the end of the current payment period.

title: Learn Brazilian Portuguese
description: Learn Brazilian Portuguese from 61 native languages, for free & offline, with FunEasyLearn. Learn to READ üìñ WRITE ‚úç and SPEAK Brazilian Portuguese üí¨ Discover the fun & easy way to learn all the reading rules, all the words you‚Äôll ever need and all the useful phrases in the Brazilian Portuguese language. üöÄ Contents ‚Ä¢ 6,000 Brazilian Portuguese words (constantly growing): the most common nouns, verbs, adjectives, etc., categorized into 7 levels and 200 topics; ‚Ä¢ 5,000 Brazilian Portuguese phrases (frequently used): the most important phrases for daily conversations and travelling, categorized into 10 levels and 120 topics. Enhance your vocabulary by learning words, sentences and expressions for beginner, intermediate and advanced learners. üîî Why learn Brazilian Portuguese with FunEasyLearn? FunEasyLearn reinvents language learning. Our team of linguists and teachers have developed a unique language learning strategy. The secret lies in combining an alphabet with all the reading rules, all the necessary words and a practical phrasebook into one app. This allows our users to read a word or phrase, pronounce it correctly, associate it with an illustration and practice it with listening, writing and speaking games. üèÜ Top features Hand-drawn illustrations ‚Äì memorize the new vocabulary faster with intuitive illustrations; Professional audio recordings ‚Äì listen to audios recorded by native speakers; Detailed statistics ‚Äì analyze your results and track your progress; Review manager ‚Äì review everything you learn; Smart search ‚Äì find quickly the words and phrases you need; Hide what you know ‚Äì hide the content you already know; Speech recognition ‚Äì improve your pronunciation; Offline ‚Äì use the app anywhere in the world, with no internet connection. üíº Brazilian Portuguese for business Get access to special Brazilian Portuguese lessons created for your business. We provide specialized courses for taxi drivers, hotel & restaurant staffs, flight-attendants, shop-assistants, etc. ‚úà Brazilian Portuguese for travelling Learn how to book a hotel room, order a meal in a restaurant, ask for directions, carry out a conversation and speak confidently with the native speakers. üôå Brazilian Portuguese for adults We adapt the contents depending on the age of the learner. Both you and your kid can learn Brazilian Portuguese and have fun. FunEasyLearn Free Subscription Subscribe for FREE, with the flowers you earn while playing language learning games. Learn Brazilian Portuguese, play for free! It‚Äôs fast & easy. üì¥ üì• Download the FunEasyLearn Brazilian Portuguese course right now! Recommend the app to your friends and get a reward. Learn how to book a hotel room, order a meal in a restaurant, ask for directions, carry out a conversation and speak confidently with the native speakers.

title: Learn Brazilian Portuguese
description: Play, Learn and Speak ‚Äì discover common phrases for daily Brazilian Portuguese conversation! ‚úî 5,000 useful phrases for conversation. ‚úî Learn Brazilian Portuguese in your tongue (60 languages available). ‚úî Best FREE app for learning fast. Speak Brazilian Portuguese Fluently in Real Conversations With Learn Brazilian Portuguese application, you can now explore over 5,000 Brazilian Portuguese phrases for short daily conversations while having absolutely pure fun! Whether you‚Äôre a tourist having a vacation in an Brazilian Portuguese speaking country or someone who just wants to speak a foreign language, this application will help you learn Brazilian Portuguese phrases in a fast, easy and enjoyable way. Why Our FREE App is Different ‚úî No internet connection required ‚Äì play where you want and when you want (offline). ‚úî 5,000 common phrases ‚Äì audio pronunciations and phonetic transcriptions to show you how native speaker from Brazil actually pronounce them. ‚úî 11 fun games ‚Äì a innovative approach to practice your listening, writing and speaking skills. ‚úî 4 levels for learning: beginner, intermediate, advanced and expert. ‚úî 20 topics divided into 145 subtopics ‚Äì so you‚Äôll know what and when to say each phrase. Topics for Brazilian Portuguese conversation: Greetings, Conversations with friends, Basic sentences, Travel, Transportation, Hotel, Restaurant, Food, Shopping, Work, Business etc. More Features to Improve Your Brazilian Portuguese Speaking Vocabulary ‚úî Search and bookmark your most common expressions from the phrasebook. ‚úî Earn points as your Brazilian Portuguese skills progress. ‚úî ‚ÄúRandom Categories‚Äù feature to randomly select the topic, subtopic and game. ‚úî 60 languages ‚Äìso you could understand and speak each phrase easily regardless of which country you‚Äôre from. About FunEasyLearn: Fun Easy Learn has developed many applications to help people around the world learn foreign languages for free. Fun Easy Learn applications improve your Brazilian Portuguese skills: speaking, listening and grammar. The dictionary of the apps has human voice pronunciation for each common phrase to improve your speaking skill. Speak Brazilian Portuguese easily and fluently for travel, business or fun!

title: Learn Brazilian Portuguese
description:
What if üáßüá∑ Brazilian Portuguese vocabulary learning would be a crazy fun game instead of boring memorisation drills? Drops makes language learning an effortless fun. Practical vocabulary is bound to your memories through beautiful graphics and quick mini-games.
The crazy part? You have only 5 mins per day. Might sound insane but works like charm! :)
These are the ingredients of the secret sauce:
üëÄ 100% illustrated: Pictures directly carry the meaning -  you don‚Äôt have to use your native language at all! No intermediary. Faster, more effective and of course more fun! :)
üèé 5 min sessions: limiting practice time sounds crazy but it it makes it incredibly addictive - which is cool thing for learning. The barrier of entry is close to zero so you can‚Äôt have any excuses: you‚Äôll have 5 minutes even on the busiest day!
üïπ Effortless play: We know why games are fun and addictive and distilled the essence into Drops. The result is a truly immersive experience but it‚Äôs not waste of your time while you play because you build a valuable knowledge.
‚ö°Qucik: Keyboard typing is painfully slow. Welcome rapid swipes and taps! Trust us, you‚Äôll need those extra seconds during the quick learning session ;)
üéØ Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just handpicked practical words. That‚Äôs our focus and we do it extremely well. The app teaches the Korean ‚Äúalphabet‚Äù Hangul (hangoul) too!
üíÅForge a habit: Drops wants to make you language learning addict. Effectiveness is nothing without a well established habit. We help you build one!
We are extremely proud of our lovely word pronunciations by seasoned voice talents!
For casual learners: more than 1700 words in 99 topics are all available for everyone. Hardcore language learners can subscribe for premium to progress faster with unlimited learning time. Subscriptions start from $2.99 / month.
 
üåç Our goal is to empower people of the world via language knowledge by providing a special tool that utilizes the universal language we all speak: pictures.
 
 
p.s.: be careful, this app really can get you addicted to to language learning.
 
-----------------
üòç If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :)
 
Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

title: Learn Portuguese Brazilian
description:
Learn Portuguese (Brazilian) language, alphabet and grammar with LuvLingua.

Begin the learning experience already enjoyed by millions around the world.
LuvLingua education apps teach you through fun games, and beginner to intermediate level courses.
Study core words and essential phrases to build a strong foundation of Portuguese (Brazilian).
Understand and speak Portuguese to communicate more effectively!
Recommended for students, teachers, travellers, and business people who want to learn Portuguese (Brazilian).

Gain confidence and level up your ability with the beginner course.
200+ lessons that systematically teach and review new vocabulary, as well as help you construct sentences and questions.
Designed for students to train and improve fundamental language skills & knowledge.

Made by teachers to support and cater to different learning styles.
 - Visual (Picture & Memory Game)
 - Auditory (Listening Quiz)
 - Read-Write (Writing & Multichoice Quiz, Word Guess)
 - Kinesthetic (Animation & Target Game)
Progress in simple, easy stages and remember new lingo in a fast, fun way.

Convenient and interactive phrasebook, full of useful everyday conversation, and sorted into helpful categories.
The phrasebook includes vocabulary and dialogues for greetings, asking directions and telling time.
Test the basics with flashcards of numbers, food, clothing, colors and body parts.
Learn vocabulary and conversation to use in emergencies, school, shopping, travel and work.

Listen to high quality authentic audio of native speakers with clear pronunciation.
Test your listening and speaking ability, and master the correct pronunciation.

Alphabet lookup menu and quiz.
Recognise, read and test the alphabet.

Grammar section and sentence builder.
Practice, review and improve your grammar ability.
Study the nouns, verbs and adjectives you need.

Quickly and easily lookup a word or phrase in the search section and save it to your favorites for later study.
Track your progress and gain achievements.
Options to change user language, hide / show romanisation.

Words are translated into over 30 languages including English, Spanish, French, German and Chinese (simplified and traditional characters).
Carefully translated by bilingual native speakers and not by computers / online translators.

Learn offline without internet connection.
This app is for all ages. All content in this app is safe for kids and adults.
Lots of free content. Buy the subscription to access all the content.

More advanced curriculum will be added soon.
We are committed to regularly updating this app.
Please send us suggestions about what we can add or improve.
Bugs, feedback or support => luvlingua@gmail.com

Learn Portuguese (Brazilian) for travel in Brazil, work, school, or to talk to friends.

Love Learning Languages
LuvLingua

summary: Learn Portuguese, language learning, alphabet, grammar, speak words and phrases

title: Learn Brazilian Portuguese
description:
Learn 3500 Brazilian Portuguese nouns and verbs to enrich your vocabulary. Memorize most common Brazilian Portuguese words. Listen pronunciation of the words. Learn with word games, phrases and word lists. Use flash cards to master frequently used, core vocabulary.

Build a daily habit of learning 5 words a day to see long term progress.

- Flip the flashcards to find out the meaning of the Brazilian Portuguese words. 
- Swipe right if you learned the word.
- Swipe left if you want the card to be shown again in the future.

Features:
- Listen pronunciation of the Brazilian Portuguese words, verbs and phrases.
- Track your progress in each level.
- Images provided in the back of the card to help you remember the words naturally. New images are being added.
- Review learned words.
- Play word games to practice in an entertaining way.
- Earn points by learning and practicing. Then unlock phrases and word lists.
- Favorite words and stats.
- Common words for all levels: A1,A2,B1,B2,C1,C2
- Unlock Phrasebook and word lists as you progress for several topics.

- Swipe left if you want the card to be shown again in the future.

Features:
- Listen pronunciation of the Brazilian Portuguese words, verbs and phrases.
- Track your progress in each level.
- Images provided in the back of the card to help you remember the words naturally. New images are being added.
- Review learned words.
- Play word games to practice in an entertaining way.
- Earn points by learning and practicing. Then unlock phrases and word lists.
- Favorite words and stats.
- Common words for all levels: A1,A2,B1,B2,C1,C2
- Unlock Phrasebook and word lists as you progress for several topics.
summary: Memorize Portuguese words, vocabulary, phrases, articles, verbs with flashcards

title: Learn Portuguese - Lingokit
description:
Learn (European) Portuguese Lingokit is an easy to use mobile Portuguese phrasebook that will give visitors to Portugal and those who are interested in learning Portuguese a good start in the language.

Learn Portuguese Lingokit is recorded using a native speaker and we have tried our best to be authentic in the pronunciation whilst ensuring it is easy to understand. Recommended app for tourists and business people visiting Portugal and Portuguese speaking countries.

FEATURES

‚Ä¢ Universal app works on iPhone, iPod Touch, & iPad
‚Ä¢ Carefully translated list of essential phrases
‚Ä¢ 200+ common words and phrases included for FREE
‚Ä¢ Upgrade and unlock all 1,000+ phrases in 18 categories
‚Ä¢ Audio recorded by native speakers
‚Ä¢ Option to playback audio at slower speed
‚Ä¢ No internet connection required
‚Ä¢ Highlight important words with tips
‚Ä¢ Store frequently used phrases in favourites
‚Ä¢ Search by words inside the app
‚Ä¢ No adverts or annoying popups

CATEGORIES

FREE Categories:

* Greetings
* General conversation
* Numbers
* Directions and places
* Transportation
* Eating out
* Emergency

PRO Categories:

* Time and date
* Accommodation
* Shopping
* Colours
* Towns and provinces
* Countries
* Tourist attractions
* Family
* Dating
* Feeling sick
* Body parts
* Occasion phrases
* Sports
* Action words
* Tongue twisters

‚Ä¢ HOW TO RESTORE PURCHASES?
Purchases are one-time and carry over between devices. To restore your purchases on a new device, tap on PRO badge on one of the locked categories, tap on the Restore Purchase button. Even if you forget to do this step and try to buy the app again, it will be restored for free.

‚Ä¢ WE READ EVERY E-MAIL.
We're a small company, but we reply to every support request. Let us try to help at support@codegent.com and we will do our best to help in any way!

THANKS FOR ALL THE SUPPORT IF YOU LIKE THE APP PLEASE LEAVE A REVIEW :-)

Privacy Policy: https://www.lingokit.app/legal/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://www.lingokit.app/legal/terms-of-use

title: Ling Learn Portuguese Language
description:
Learn Portuguese with Ling in just 10 minutes a day!

DOWNLOAD FREE - LEARN WITH GAMES - SPEAK WITH NATIVE SPEAKERS Our free Portuguese language learning app is designed to make learning Portuguese as easy and as fun as possible! Using a variety of mini-games and interactive learning techniques, you‚Äôll be able to immerse yourself in the Portuguese language using just your smartphone! Whether you‚Äôre a complete beginner hoping to learn the basics of the language, or you‚Äôre already pretty fluent and want to learn even more advanced Portuguese phrases, or brush up on your knowledge ‚Äì Ling has you covered! FEATURED IN Yahoo ‚Ä¢ VOGUE ‚Ä¢ Forbes ‚Ä¢ NBC Traditional Portuguese language lessons can be tedious and dull. At Ling, we‚Äôve made the learning process fun by using puzzles, games, challenges, and quizzes to teach you how to read, write, speak, and understand Portuguese! ------------------------------------------------------- OUR Portuguese COURSE HIGHLIGHTS ------------------------------------------------------- - Flashcards to test your knowledge - Quizzes to track your progress - AI chatbot to practice daily conversations - Speaking exercises to improve your pronunciation - Finger tracing via your smartphone screen to become familiar with writing - Match pictures with the corresponding word - Put sentences into the correct order - Complete the unfinished sentence ‚Ä¶ And much, much more! With so many mini-games, challenges, quizzes, and puzzles to teach you Portuguese, you‚Äôll have hours of fun learning a new language. It won‚Äôt even feel like learning at all! -------------------------------- KEY FEATURES OF LING -------------------------------- - User-friendly interface - Easy to navigate - Lessons cover the four aspects of the language (reading, writing, speaking, and listening) - Courses for all fluency levels, from absolute beginner to advanced - Mini-games, flashcards, challenges, and interactive games to help you learn faster and more effectively - All courses were created with the help of native speakers of each language - Learn helpful grammar tips while playing fun, interactive games - Learn how to write the alphabet with cutting-edge finger tracing technology - Learn how to speak about a variety of different topics Ling is available for 60+ different languages: Learn Afrikaans, Learn Albanian, Learn Arabic, Learn Armenian, Learn Bengali, Learn Bosnian, Learn Bulgarian, Learn Burmese, Learn Cantonese, Learn Chinese, Learn Croatian, Learn Czech, Learn Danish, Learn Dutch, Learn English, Learn Estonian, Learn Finnish, Learn French, Learn Georgian, Learn German, Learn Greek, Learn Hebrew, Learn Hindi, Learn Hungarian, Learn Indonesian, Learn Irish, Learn Italian, Learn Japanese, Learn Kannada, Learn Khmer, Learn Korean, Learn Lao, Learn Latvian, Learn Lithuanian, Learn Malay, Learn Malayalam, Learn Marathi, Learn Mongolian, Learn Nepali, Learn Norwegian, Learn Persian, Learn Polish, Learn Portuguese, Learn Punjabi, Learn Romanian, Learn Russian, Learn Serbian, Learn Slovak, Learn Slovenian, Learn Spanish, Learn Swahili, Learn Swedish, Learn Tagalog, Learn Tamil, Learn Telugu, Learn Thai, Learn Turkish, Learn Ukrainian, Learn Urdu, Learn Vietnamese Ling Subscription Plans: - Monthly: $14.99 USD - Half-yearly: $39.99 USD - Yearly: $79.99 USD - Lifetime: $149.99 USD If you have any suggestions or feedback, please contact us at support@ling-app.com. Have fun learning!

title: Portuguese Listening Speaking
description:
Are you looking to learn Portuguese? Look no further than Portuguese Listening & Speaking! Our app offers immersive video-based learning that caters to beginners as well as advanced learners, enabling everyone to improve their speaking and listening skills through real-life, authentic scenarios.

With Portuguese Listening & Speaking, users have access to a wide variety of video lessons that help them practice their conversation skills with genuine Portuguese videos. Our dialogue-based approach immerses users in practical scenarios, allowing them to gain first-hand experience with the language.

Our step-by-step learning process has been designed to provide users with a better understanding of the Portuguese language. You can touch any word to learn its meaning, and expand your vocabulary in no time.

The app also features native Portuguese speakers for conversational practice, enabling users to improve their speaking skills and communicate fluently in Portuguese. With a structured curriculum and user-friendly design, Portuguese Listening & Speaking is the perfect choice for anyone looking to master the language.

We at Portuguese Listening & Speaking are always happy to receive feedback, and are committed to providing a seamless and rewarding learning experience. So why wait? Start your journey to becoming a confident and fluent Portuguese speaker today!

title: Nemo Portuguese
description:
Nemo is designed to start you speaking the most useful words in Portuguese immediately and confidently. With millions of downloads from around the world, Nemo is now available for Android phones and tablets.

‚úì Every Portuguese word is pronounced clearly in high quality audio from a native speaker.
‚úì All audio is downloaded to your device, and is available offline or in airplane mode.
‚úì Master your accent with the Speech Studio. Simply record yourself saying a phrase and then hear your voice next to the teacher‚Äôs. Then try again. You‚Äôll be AMAZED how quickly your foreign accent melts away.
‚úì Nemo is not built around lessons at all. It is meant to be picked up throughout the day, whenever you have a few minutes to spare.
‚úì NO PRIOR KNOWLEDGE of Portuguese is required.

Nemo targets the words and phrases most often used in conversation. For beginners, we‚Äôve prepared ‚ÄúIf You Only Learn 10 Things‚Äù, ‚ÄúIf You Only Learn 50 Things‚Äù, and ‚ÄúIf You Only Learn 100 Things‚Äù lists for a fast introduction to the essentials. Intermediate learners can progress to a course of the highest frequency words needed for travel and business and begin to have conversations in Portuguese in a month. Advanced students will benefit most from the Speech Studio technology to correct their foreign accent.

With Nemo, you can customize flashcards to exercise the language skill you want to improve. When beginning a new topic, setup flashcards to practice translation of Portuguese to English so you can build familiarity with new words. Next, switch to translate English to Portuguese to train your recall and ability to speak. To complete mastery, switch to cards that specialize in fine-tuning your listening and perfecting your pronunciation.

Any card can be marked as a favorite, allowing you to make your own custom deck of cards to focus on the words of the day. Turn on Review Mode to recap what you practiced earlier in the day to boost your memory retention.

Dive into what you want to learn at any time. The phrasebook offers quick access to the vocabulary in the app through a Portuguese-English dictionary interface. Nemo also functions as a translator. Simply find the words you need in the search interface and play its audio through the device speaker.

‚óÜ Get off the beaten path or find comfort with traveler phrases.
‚óÜ Build your proficiency with numbers and the most important verbs and sentence building blocks.
‚óÜ Supports a ‚ÄúWord Gender‚Äù mode to display extra information about the gender of words.

Portuguese is one of the most widely used languages in the world. Born in Portugal, it is now the primary language in Brazil and used in several African countries. The audio in this app is recorded by a native speaker of Brazilian Portuguese. This app will help you speak in Rio de Janeiro, Lisbon or S√£o Paulo.

Use your new skills to make friends, impress old friends, bring smiles to children, get out of jams, experience new things, talk confidently, and make your travel and cultural experience more rich and fulfilling.

Download this free app now!

title: Simply Learn Portuguese
description:
‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ Learn Portuguese language when visiting Portugal ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Simply Learn Portuguese Language App is a FREE language app that will assist you to speak Portuguese quickly and effectively.

All Portuguese phrases and words are presented to you in both phonetic and original Portuguese writing. They are recorded by a native speaker from Portugal.

Save your favorite phrases and words to review them without fuss.

Study your vocabulary with flashcards using the spaced repetition technique.

Test your knowledge with fun Portuguese language quiz and review your score.

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ Survive when travelling in Portugal ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Use the Portuguese phrasebook to survive in Portugal. All important survival phrases are included.

For example, let the app speak to the Taxi driver in Portugal to show them where you want to go.

Search all phrases and words to quickly access what you need.

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ Main Features ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

‚úì 300+ free Portuguese phrases and words ‚úì Recorded by a native speaker from Portugal ‚úì High quality audio ‚úì Spaced repetition learning system ‚úì Portuguese quiz to review your skills ‚úì Track your learning progress ‚úì Save your favorite phrases and words ‚úì Quick search function ‚úì Copy the phrases to the clipboard (by clicking long on the phrase) ‚úì Play the sound more slowly ‚úì Adjust the quiz and flashcards settings for Portuguese to English, English to Portuguese

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ Learning Categories ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

FREE version: * Numbers * Time&Date * Basic Conversation * Greetings * Directions Phrases * Directions Words * Eating out in Portugal * Sightseeing in Portugal * Shopping in Portugal * Emergency * Accommodation

PRO version: * Advanced Conversation * Health * Border Crossing * Questions * Places * Food * Vegetables * Fruits * Colors * Romance I * Romance II * Post Office * Phone & Internet * Banking * Occupations * Business Talk * Hobbies * Feelings * Body * Animals * Family * Countries

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ Feedback appreciated ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

If you like this app, please take a few seconds to give a rating or review. If you have any feedback, suggestions or advise I am more than happy if you let me know.

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖAbout US‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Website: www.simplylearnlanguages.com/portuguese Facebook: www.facebook.com/simplylearnlanguages/ Feedback: support@ling-app.com Privacy Policy: https://simplylearnapp.com/privacy.html

Have fun learning Portuguese!
