title: Learn Portuguese: Speak Fast
description: ‚Ä¢ Portuguese Language Lessons - Portugu√™s The freedom that comes with this app approach to language acquisition is liberating. Offering 121 lessons without any financial strings attached allows you to steer your Portuguese learning voyage however you see fit. Whether you're racing toward fluency or cruising at a leisurely pace, the app ensures that the only commitments you make are to your own linguistic capabilities & personal development. But our utility extends beyond individual growth; it serves as a critical tool for social inclusion & professional success, especially for immigrants & refugees. Balancing job-hunting or navigating through Portuguese's intricate bureaucracy requires a robust command of the language. Out lessons are engineered for efficiency & long-term retention, making them invaluable aids for preparing for job interviews or comprehending legal procedures. ‚Ä¢ Learn to speak Portuguese (Brazilian) In an environment where finances often serve as barriers to self-improvement & integration, We commitment-free, zero-cost model stands out as a beacon of accessibility. Particularly for refugees & immigrants operating on limited budgets, the app is less a luxury & more a lifeline. It doesn't ask for your credit card; it asks for your dedication to mastering a language that can open numerous doors in your new homeland. Students, too, they find this app's approach useful, particularly when contending with the complexities of Portuguese grammar & pronunciation. Using the app as a supplementary learning resource, students can elevate their academic performance in areas that test vocabulary & pronunciation. With us, you're not merely learning to navigate through sentences; you're gearing up to navigate through life in a culture that values precision, thoughtfulness & innovation. Learning Portuguese is like unlocking a treasure trove of intellectual, cultural & historical riches. The language has been the medium for some of the world's greatest thinkers, poets & inventors, from the storytelling genius of the Brothers Grimm to the groundbreaking theories of Albert Einstein. The app transforms what could be an overwhelming quest into an invigorating journey, employing games & activities that suit your unique learning style. This app gradual, drip-feed methodology helps you internalize the vocabulary in manageable chunks, building a sturdy foundation akin to Portuguese engineering mastery. ‚Ä¢ Why learn Portuguese? üåü Portuguese resource for homeschooling Parents look for good foreign language resources to teach Portuguese as homeschooling grows. Your homeschooler deserves excellent app to learn Portuguese, giving them the tools to communicate & understand Portuguese. This homeschool foreign language resource helps build Portuguese vocabulary & provides a place to practice the proper pronunciation of Portuguese. Does your child want to learn Portuguese? üåü Portuguese resource for foreign language teachers It isn't easy for a foreign language teacher to find good foreign language resources to help students improve their new Portuguese language skills. we focus on building Portuguese vocabulary & teaching the proper pronunciation of Portuguese. It is an entirely great resource that foreign language teachers can confidently recommend. Students do not need an account to learn on the website. Do you teach Portuguese? Try this foreign language resource. üåü Boost your professional development with Portuguese language skills Invest in your future & learn Portuguese to accelerate your career. With the rapid pace of change, you must continually update your skills & knowledge. Stand out from the crowd with Portuguese language skills. üåü Learn Portuguese & get more out of your travel experience Before a trip, the best preparation you can do is to learn some Portuguese words. Learning Portuguese will provide you with a better experience during your travels. Start learning Portuguese today with us.

You will discover thousands of bright flashcards, learn Portuguese words and phrases, will be capable of easily memorising them, and will always be able to keep your Portuguese vocabulary updated regardless of whether you have just started learning Portuguese or are a native speaker. To succeed in studying the Portuguese language, you need to use the materials studied as efficiently as possible. LinGo has only the most necessary things to learn Portuguese language phrases and words as quickly as possible and reinforce the studied material. The more often you revise, the better you will know and be able learn to speak Portuguese fluently. If you already know and speak Portuguese well, you will have an even greater time guessing Portuguese words and memorising them with millions of users around the world.

The LinGo Portuguese learning app can easily help you to brush up your knowledge of the Portuguese language. Discover how to learn the Portuguese language quickly and effectively in only 10-15 minutes per day. You will improve your Portuguese vocabulary with confidence and maintain the required level for long period of time. Use the application in any place and time of your convenience: at home, on the road, during breaks at work, in the morning, or before going to bed.

The best feature of the LinGo Portuguese language learning app is that the words and phrases you will learn are very helpful for beginners who may already be around Portuguese speakers and need to learn Portuguese words in context quickly. Learn Portuguese flashcards, words and phrases within the app and improve your Portuguese vocabulary in just 5 to 10 minutes per day.

Playing online is also one of the best ways to test your knowledge of Portuguese vocabulary. Play in duo mode with your friends or other players. The app features useful functions that enable you to do exercises and take tests, or only study what you have gotten wrong. You can also skip the Portuguese for Beginners course and move to more advanced Portuguese lessons.

title: Learn Portuguese Vocabulary
description:
Free app to learn Portuguese by improving your VOCABULARY in an easy and fast way, with more than 5,000 words classified by levels and topics.

Are you currently learning Portuguese, but you have trouble remembering new words? Has it been a while since you learned Portuguese and now you wish to refresh your vocabulary?
Bilinguae Portugu√™s is the perfect app to improve your vocabulary.
Learn Portuguese anywhere, anytime!

- More than 5,000 words classified by levels and topics.
- Captivating photos will help you memorize the words visually.
- Words are pronounced by native speakers.
- 3 basic exercises in each topic to learn the words and several supplementary exercises for further voluntary practicing.
- Intelligent revision system which will make you revise the word according to your hits and mistakes. The more often you get a word wrong, the more often this word will be revised until you remember it.
- The gender of the noun will also appear, so that you will learn directly the correct article to each noun. The plural form of each noun will also be displayed. 
- Progress saved in cloud: The progress you make will be stored on our server whenever you connect to the internet. All devices (smartphones, tablets, ‚Ä¶) will be synchronized. In this way, you won‚Äôt lose your progress, even if you have to reinstall the app for whatever reason. 
- Offline usage: You will need internet connection only the first time you use the app, for downloading new words, but then you can work OFFLINE whenever you want. 
- Multi-user system: The app can be used by several users. Each user can access one‚Äôs own account with a password and have the progress saved. Perfect for families or couples who share the same device, like a tablet.

title: Learn Arabic. Speak Arabic
description: Learn Arabic with free lessons daily. Let Mondly teach you the Arabic language quickly and effectively. In just minutes you‚Äôll start memorizing core Arabic words, form sentences, learn to speak Arabic phrases and take part in conversations. Fun Arabic lessons improve your vocabulary, grammar and pronunciation like no other language learning method. Beginner or advanced learner, traveler or business professional with a tight schedule? The app works great and dynamically adjusts to your needs. Explore language exercises for reading, listening, writing and speaking enhanced with a dictionary, verb conjugator and state-of-the-art speech recognition technology - you‚Äôll feel like having your own Arabic language tutor in your pocket. Download the language learning pill today and enjoy the benefits of learning a new language for life. The secret path to language learning Remember the Arabic language classes in school? You started with hundreds of basic words and expressions, continued with tons of Arabic grammar lessons and at the end of a full semester‚Äôs language course you could barely translate a sentence or say ‚ÄúHello!‚Äù to a foreigner. That‚Äôs the traditional way to learn a language. Mondly has a different approach, that‚Äôs opposite to the average language course. This is how the future of language courses looks like The App gets you started with a basic conversation between two people. You quickly start memorizing core words, use them to build sentences and phrases, and at the end of a 45-minutes module you are able to reconstruct that conversation with your own voice. It‚Äôs an effective way to learn Arabic phrases. State-of-the-art Natural Speech Recognition and Spaced Repetition Algorithms make the app effective for learning languages. Here are the key features that make Mondly a great tutor for you: Crystal-clear audio and professional voice actors. Learn the right Arabic pronunciation from conversations between native speakers. State-of-the-art Speech Recognition. Mondly knows exactly how to listen to your Arabic words and phrases. You will only get a positive feedback if you speak Arabic clearly and correctly. This will improve your pronunciation. Useful phrases for real situations. Memorizing hundreds of isolated words is not the way to go when it comes to learning Arabic. Mondly teaches you Arabic vocabulary by offering you core words and phrases. The app breaks the learning process down into short lessons and puts them into themed packs. Learn conversational Arabic. Conversation is the main reason to take this free course. It will help you build a core Arabic vocabulary with widely-used nouns and verbs, and speak Arabic clearly. Verb conjugations. If you want to learn more during this course, just tap the Arabic verbs and get the full conjugation on the screen, including the translation. It‚Äôs faster and better than a dictionary. Advanced Statistics. The App uses intelligent reporting, so you can always follow your progress. Build your vocabulary step by step and become better daily. The Leaderboard. See how your friends are doing and compete with people from all over the world to become the best learner in the Mondly community family. Take the Weekly Quiz to become even better. Adaptive Learning. Learning Arabic is different from person to person. So we taught the app to learn from your way of learning. After little time spent together, Mondly will understand what suits you best and it will become your own guide and customized teacher. Before you know it, at the end of these Arabic lessons, you will master the most useful 5000 words and phrases and you will be on the fast lane to learning a new language.

title: Kaleela - Learn Arabic
description: Learn Arabic Online with Kaleela! Discover Kaleela, an innovative app crafted specifically for non-native speakers to learn Arabic in a dynamic and engaging manner. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or an advanced learner, Kaleela provides tailored resources to meet your needs. Kaleela is the ultimate Arabic learning app, designed to immerse non-native speakers in the heart of the Arabic language. We focus on five key language skills: Writing, Listening, Speaking, Reading, and Culture. Kaleela offers a range of courses tailored to suit every level and interest: - Arabic Alphabet: Start with the basics and shapes of the Arabic alphabet and progress to long and short vowels. - Modern Standard Arabic: Gain proficiency in the language, from greetings to linking words. - Arabic Dialects: Explore the unique characteristics of Jordanian/Palestinian, Syrian, Egyptian, Iraqi, and Saudi dialects. - Grammar: Build a solid foundation in Arabic grammar to understand and construct accurate sentences. - Comprehension: Practice reading and listening comprehension to enhance your understanding of Arabic in context. Kaleela sets itself apart from other language-learning apps through the following points: - CEFR Approach:Kaleela stands out by using the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR), which categorizes learners into six levels and provides a structured, personalized path for mastering Arabic. - Interactive Learning Experience: Kaleela transforms learning into a fun experience with interactive lessons that engage users. Our method blends practical language skills with real-life contexts, keeping learners motivated and eager to progress. - Courses Designed for Every Skill Level: Our courses are designed to cater to learners of every proficiency level, from beginners to advanced speakers. Each course offers structured content that progressively builds your skills and confidence in the Arabic language. - Multimedia Resources: Benefit from a variety of learning tools, including videos, voice recordings, and exercises that cater to different learning styles. These resources make vocabulary acquisition, pronunciation, and comprehension easy to grasp. - Multiple languages to serve learners globally:At Kaleela, we understand the importance of accessibility in language learning. That's why we offer a diverse selection of languages, including Spanish, French, Italian, Romanian, Portuguese, Korean, Indonesian, Chinese, Turkish, English, and more to come, ensuring that learners from around the world can easily engage with our Arabic courses. - Learning Mechanism with Repetition and Structure: Kaleela offers a refined learning mechanism that emphasizes repetition and structured progression, making it easier for learners to recall and apply what they‚Äôve learned. - Cultural Context: Kaleela incorporates cultural elements and real-life scenarios to enhance the learning experience, helping users understand the context in which the language is used. Get Started Today! Download and subscribe to Kaleela to access a comprehensive library of Arabic lessons, dialects, and cultural insights. Our app is your all-in-one solution for learning Arabic. title: Learn Arabic Alphabet: Games
description:
Looking for a way to teach kids or beginners the Quran but not sure where to start?
Want to give your child an early start in learning Arabic and the Quran, while making sure the process is engaging and enjoyable?
Interested in trying a modern and innovative approach to teaching your kids the Arabic alphabet?
Hoping to find a method to keep your kids interested in their Arabic/Quran lessons?
Want to make sure that your child is well-equipped to be able to read the Quran?

If you answered yes to any of these questions then the great news is that this app "Learn Arabic Alphabet: Games" has been made for exactly these purposes.

This Arabic alphabet app for kids is designed to help children learn the Arabic alphabet in a playful and engaging way which is the very first step in the journey of learning to read the Quran. It leaves a great impression on kids and encourages them to want to learn more and happily continue their journey to the Quran.


App Features

- Colorful illustrations, engaging animations, and educational mini-games that make learning and recognizing Arabic letters exciting and memorable

- Proper pronunciation of all letters of the Arabic alphabet

- Visuals showing exactly how to pronounce each letter

- Self recordings to make sure users are pronouncing the letters correctly

- Sounds of every letter of the Arabic alphabet repeatedly playing every time a letter is tapped on in all games to help with retention

- 14 fun and interactive mini games to help kids learn and remember all Arabic letters

- Islamic theme with nature sounds and Muslim kids characters 

- No music to reinforce Islamic teachings 

- No ads to ensure kids don‚Äôt have to see inappropriate ad content and they can play all games smoothly without disruption


Games Included

- Pop the Balloons: Classic kids‚Äô fun game where kids pop balloons with the Arabic alphabet

- Memory Matching: Kids have to find a pair of 2 Arabic letter cards to make a match

- Fishing Game: Kids can go fishing with a twist. Instead of fishing for fish, they are fishing for Arabic letters

- Collect Arabic Letters: Kids can move around a driving car to collect letters of the Arabic alphabet

- Connect 4 Game: A letter is called out and kids have to find that letter from a range of letters. They have to find 4 letters in a row to win the game

- Paint the Letters: Kids get a chance to fill in letters of the Arabic alphabet using color

- Sort the Letters in Order: All letters have to be sorted in the order of the Alphabet

- Tap on the Correct Letter: A range of letters is displayed and kids have to choose the correct one

and many more‚Ä¶


Whether you're seeking to give your child a head start in learning Arabic and the Quran or simply looking for an entertaining Islamic app for kids, this app offers a comprehensive solution that meets all your needs ‚Äì and then some.

‚Ä¢ Words shift in colour as you learn them in the Quran reader
‚Ä¢ Translations gradually disappear as your understanding grows

üèÖ COMPETE & CONNECT
‚Ä¢ Earn points with each activity
‚Ä¢ Win badges competing with users worldwide
‚Ä¢ Create custom leaderboards for friends and family
‚Ä¢ Learn together and stay motivated

We've reimagined the Arabic learning process at every step. It doesn't matter whether you're a beginner, intermediate or expert - there's a clear path from your current level to 100% understanding.
summary: Feel Your Heart Move In Prayer. Understand Quran in just 10 minutes a day.

title: Learn Arabic Language: arabee
description:
LEARN ARABIC LANGUAGE

Are you looking for an effective and affordable way to help your child learn & speak Arabic language? arabee offers an award-winning Arabic language learning program with Arabic lessons that will nurture your child's love for Arabic and enhance Arabic learning skills in a modern way. With just 15 minutes of daily practice to learn & speak Arabic using the arabee: Arabic Learning & Speaking App, you will witness remarkable progress in your child's Arabic writing, speaking & vocabulary skills in a matter of weeks. WHAT SETS ARABEE APART? ‚òÖ No Arabic required to start learning Arabic ‚òÖ Structured Arabic lessons programme uses clever, modern teaching tools to maximize retention ‚òÖ Interactive content - videos, games, songs, books, arabic flashcards ‚òÖ Easy-to-navigate icons ‚òÖ Affordable and easy to use platform for learning Arabic DIVERSE LEARNING TO LEARN ARABIC LANGUAGE Our diverse Arabic lessons and activities cater to various learning styles and keep children engaged as they progress through the levels to learn Arabic including Arabic writing & vocabulary. CREATED BY ARABIC LANGUAGE EXPERTS arabee is created by Arabic language experts and educators. Our team ensures that children not only retain their knowledge but also apply Arabic in real-life situations. By using the Modern Standard Arabic (MSA) Communication method, we empower children to communicate effectively in Arabic beyond the confines of a classroom. STEP BY STEP JOURNEY arabee starts the Arabic learning journey with short animated videos that teach Arabic language structures, key Arabic letters, words, sounds, Arabic writing, Arabic speaking and Arabic vocabulary. These videos provide a comprehensive foundation for learning the Arabic language. EASY TO USE arabee is a child and parent friendly app. Our navigation and icons easily take you through the levels and activities, giving detailed explanations along the way on how to manage tasks. SONGS FOR SPEAKING ARABIC Sing along with arabee - Our Arabic songs, carefully crafted with delightful voices, will keep children singing and help them in speaking Arabic with their friends for hours. Traditional learning through reading is an excellent way to spend quality time with your child and further enhance their skills in speaking Arabic. GAMES FOR ARABIC LEARNING Our Arabic language learning application also offers interactive and enjoyable educational games that make Arabic lessons fun and easy to remember. These games engage students and reinforce their understanding of the Arabic language in an entertaining way. INTERACTIVE BOOKS, ACTIVITIES, AND REAL-LIFE SITUATIONS Colorful worksheets and activity books help develop young hands' motor skills, enhancing hand-eye coordination. arabee equips children to use Arabic in real life situations like eating out, ordering a drink, expressing how you feel with emotions, giving an opinion or making new friends. arabee has gained recognition worldwide and is widely used in schools and educational institutes in the UAE and beyond as a comprehensive solution for Arabic lessons. It has proven to be an effective tool for building a solid foundation in the Arabic language for young learners. The program comes with online tracking, clearly defined outcomes, term plans, and teaching guidelines, ensuring that children progress steadily. RESEARCH BASED ARABIC LANGUAGE LEARNING Our program is research-based, incorporating a structured educational framework that takes into consideration children's language development at each level of Arabic language learning. Educational institutes interested in implementing arabee can contact us directly to discuss the tailored programs we offer to schools. Start your child's Arabic learning journey today! Download arabee to learn Arabic and witness the joy and progress as they master the ability to understand, read, and speak Arabic fluently.

title: Learn Arabic Language
description:
Learn Arabic language, alphabet and grammar with LuvLingua.

Begin the learning experience already enjoyed by millions around the world.
LuvLingua education apps teach you through fun games, and beginner to intermediate level courses.
Study core words and essential phrases to build a strong foundation of Arabic.
Understand and speak Arabic to communicate more effectively!
Recommended for students, teachers, travellers, and business people who want to learn Arabic.

Gain confidence and level up your ability with the beginner course.
200+ lessons that systematically teach and review new vocabulary, as well as help you construct sentences and questions.
Designed for students to train and improve fundamental language skills & knowledge.

Made by teachers to support and cater to different learning styles.
 - Visual (Picture & Memory Game)
 - Auditory (Listening Quiz)
 - Read-Write (Writing & Multichoice Quiz, Word Guess)
 - Kinesthetic (Animation & Target Game)
Progress in simple, easy stages and remember new lingo in a fast, fun way.

Convenient and interactive phrasebook, full of useful everyday conversation, and sorted into helpful categories.
The phrasebook includes vocabulary and dialogues for greetings, asking directions and telling time.
Test the basics with flashcards of numbers, food, clothing, colors and body parts.
Learn vocabulary and conversation to use in emergencies, school, shopping, travel and work.

Listen to high quality authentic audio of native speakers with clear pronunciation.
Test your listening and speaking ability, and master the correct pronunciation.

Alphabet lookup menu and quiz.
Recognise, read and test the alphabet.

Grammar section and sentence builder.
Practice, review and improve your grammar ability.
Study the nouns, verbs and adjectives you need.

Quickly and easily lookup a word or phrase in the search section and save it to your favorites for later study.
Track your progress and gain achievements.
Options to change user language, hide / show romanisation.

Words are translated into over 30 languages including English, Spanish, French, German and Chinese (simplified and traditional characters).
Carefully translated by bilingual native speakers and not by computers / online translators.

Learn offline without internet connection.
This app is for all ages. All content in this app is safe for kids and adults.
Lots of free content. Buy the subscription to access all the content.

More advanced curriculum will be added soon.
We are committed to regularly updating this app.
Please send us suggestions about what we can add or improve.
Bugs, feedback or support => luvlingua@gmail.com

Learn Arabic for travel in Egypt & Dubai, work, school, or to talk to friends.

Love Learning Languages
LuvLingua

title: Awlad - Learn arabic
description:
Awlad School is an arabic language learning software made for beginners.
Fully illustrated by the BDouin Studio, it has unique features in the realm of digital learning :
- Interactive mini-assessments
- Lessons in Cartoon format (!). Effective for immersive learning
- Fun mini-stories, to catch young student's attention
- Voiced dialogues played by professional comedians
Already more than 4000 screens available to learn reading, writing and the first basics of dialogue in arabic!
Note: The method is developed under the supervision of an educational director holding an Ijaza, certifying his memorization of the 7 different types of reading of the Qur'an, and a degree in languages from the University of Sorbonne in France.
NEW : Thanks to the support of our partners, the method is now 100% free!
Feel free to support us by talking about the app around you and leaving a beautiful review : )
PS : Some sections of the app are under active development. Thanks for your patience!

title: Drops: Learn Arabic
description:
Could üá∏üá¶ Arabic language learning be a crazy fun game instead of the usual and boring memorization exercises? Drops makes Arabic language learning easy in an effortlessly fun way. Practical Arabic vocabulary is injected in your memory through the use of beautiful pictures and fast mini-games. 
And the best part is it only takes 5 minutes a day for you to practice Arabic language. Sounds crazy but it does work like a charm and soon you will be a pro in learning Arabic words! :) 

Here‚Äôs our secret sauce for success: 

üëÄ 100% illustrated: Images instantly identify a meaning ‚Äì there‚Äôs no need to use your native language to analyze the meanings. Nothing in the middle, only the faster, more effective, and fun way of learning the Arabic language. 

üèé 5 min sessions: A limited practice session sounds crazy but it is what makes it surprisingly addictive ‚Äì which is a cool thing when it comes to learning Arabic.  You‚Äôll have zero reasons why you shouldn‚Äôt learn everyday. 5 minutes  is all it takes and you can squeeze it in even in your busiest schedule. 

üïπ Effortless play:  We understand why games are addictive and fun. That is the reason why short mini games are the essence of the Drops app. The end result is an immersive and engaging gameplay that won't be a waste of your time, but instead it would help you build valuable knowledge in the Arabic language. 

‚ö°Quick: Taps and swipes are all you need! Goodbye boring and slow keyboard typing. You‚Äôll need those extra seconds during your quick Arabic learning session. 

üéØ Vocabulary only: No grammar, just highly curated practical Arabic words. This are our focus and we are very good at it. 

üíÅForge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an Arabic language learning addict. Thus, a well-established habit + effectiveness will help you become one. We are also proud of our beautiful Arabic word pronunciations by our very talented seasoned Arabic voice talents. 

With more than 1700 Arabic words and 99 topics, Drops is FREE for casual learners. If you‚Äôre an intermediate or advanced level Arabic language learner, you can easily subscribe for premium to get unlimited learning time and be able to progress faster. Premium plans start from $2.99 per month. 

üåç Empowering everyone around the globe with language knowledge is part of our goal, and we utilize a special tool that uses a universal language that we can all understand: pictures! 

P.S. Be careful, this app is addictive! You‚Äôll get hooked to learning the Arabic language! ;) 
________________________________________ 
üòç If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :) Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

title: Learn Arabic Fast: Course
description:
So, you want to learn Arabic in no time? You need MosaLingua! Innovative and effective, our application has helped more than 13,000,000 people all over the world learn Arabic in only 10 minutes per day - with actual results!

Popular on app stores, MosaLingua also comes highly recommended by the media and many specialized blogs.

Learn more about MosaLingua by watching the demonstration video on https://mosalingua.com.
Feel free to try our smartphone application for free: you'll see for yourself how well it works!
It's a powerful and effective tool - ideal for people who want to speak Arabic in no time, without taking long, boring language courses.

It's useful in any situation: our method can help you while you travel, in the workplace, and in everyday life with our courses that suit your language needs.

THE BENEFITS OF MOSALINGUA: 
1) Useful, practical content
Don't waste your time with notions and courses that won't help you. Instead, learn the 20% that you'll use 80% of the time.

2) An innovative method based on scientific research
Our international team is made up of expert polyglots who've used the most modern and proven learning, memorization and consolidation techniques (SRS, active recall, metacognition, etc.).

3) Coaching throughout the learning process
To succeed, you can count on our review sessions that consolidate what you've learned, our mini lessons, and our advice for better understanding Arabic vocabulary.

4) Learning and having fun at the same time
Achieve great results and have fun doing so: your progress will boost your MOTIVATION, which is key to any learning plan.

If you want to learn Arabic, download the MosaLingua Learn Arabic app and try it free ‚Äì you won't regret it!

description:
Want to learn Arabic online for free? Join over 30 million people who have chosen to study with the BNR Languages apps!

Arabic for beginners ‚Äî designed for anyone who wants to learn Arabic from scratch and study at their own pace, in a simple and practical way.

With interactive activities and native audio to help with pronunciation and listening comprehension, you'll learn Arabic quickly and intuitively.

Study on your own, in your own time, with no daily limits. Choose what you want to practice: reading, writing, listening, or vocabulary. Everything is easy to use and personalized for you.

Exercises use images to help you memorize words, and the review mode lets you practice and refresh everything you've already learned ‚Äî anytime you want.

Learning a new language has never been easier, more accessible, and 100% free!

Find out why our app is the ideal choice to study anytime, anywhere:

- Complete offline Arabic course ‚Äî from beginner to advanced levels.

- Learn on your own! Study Arabic independently, at your own pace, without needing teachers or tutors.

- 100% free! All content and features are available for free ‚Äî you don't need to pay to learn!

- Start from the very beginning, learning the alphabet!

- Set your own study time. Learn as much as you want ‚Äî no time limits! No daily activity limits! Practice and learn as many times as you like every day!

- Large selection of words to help expand your vocabulary.

- Interactive exercises with images that make it easier to memorize new words! Learn in a fun and easy way ‚Äî with a gamified interface that makes studying feel like playing a game.

- Review mode to practice and refresh everything you've already learned.

- Different types of tests! Practice your reading, writing, and listening skills.

- Full translation available in many languages: Chinese, Spanish, English, Hindi, Arabic, Bengali, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese, Korean, French, Turkish, Vietnamese, Italian, Thai, Persian, Indonesian, Urdu, Polish, Ukrainian, Malay, Uzbek, Romanian, Dutch, Greek, Czech, Hungarian, Swedish, Belarusian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Danish, Norwegian, Slovak, Finnish, Hebrew, Irish, Catalan, Swahili.

- Choose what you want to study and customize your learning experience.

- Perfect for learning Arabic quickly ‚Äî whether for travel, work, study, or to connect with family and friends.

- Simple, intuitive, and user-friendly interface for all ages.

- No internet connection needed to learn Arabic! The app works completely offline.

- Earn medals, track your progress, and stay motivated.

- Join the weekly ranking and compete with other users!

- New words and vocabulary categories added regularly.

Download the BNR Languages app now and start your Arabic course!

title: Learn Arabic Alphabet ‚Äì Kids
description:
Help Your Child Fall in Love with the Arabic language. Offline and Ad-Free

Imagine the joy of watching your child confidently recognize and write Arabic letters, their face lighting up with pride as they learn the foundations of Quran recitation. With Everyday Alif: Learn Arabic Alphabet Games, this is more than just a possibility‚Äîit‚Äôs a journey your child can begin today.

Everyday Alif blends faith-based education with fun and engaging games, making Arabic easy, exciting, and deeply meaningful. Whether you‚Äôre introducing your child to the beauty of the Quran or helping them build valuable Arabic language skills, Everyday Alif is here to guide and support them every step of the way.

________________________________________

Why Parents Choose Everyday Alif
Every parent wants the best for their child. With Everyday Alif, you‚Äôre giving your child a gift that lasts a lifetime‚Äîthe confidence to learn Arabic and the foundations for Quran recitation, all in a safe, joyful, and creative environment.

üìñ Quran Foundations
Everyday Alif builds your child‚Äôs confidence in reading the Quran by teaching them the Arabic alphabet step by step.

üéâ Fun Educational Games
Turn learning into playtime! Interactive games and colorful challenges keep your child excited, engaged, and eager to learn.

________________________________________

Everyday Alif: Key Features

üìù Trace Arabic Letters
Build your child‚Äôs confidence as they trace and write Arabic letters, one stroke at a time. 

üöó Arabic Letters Journey
Take your child on a colorful car journey! Along the way, they‚Äôll collect Arabic letters, strengthening their recognition skills in an exciting, interactive environment.

üéà Balloon Popping Game
Make learning fun with balloon-popping! As your child pops balloons, they‚Äôll discover Arabic letters and learn their proper order‚Äîbuilding skills in a joyful, stress-free way.

üñåÔ∏è Arabic Alphabet Coloring
Watch your child‚Äôs creativity flourish as they draw Arabic and color in Arabic letters and shapes. This feature lets them explore the artistic beauty of Arabic while reinforcing their learning.

üíß Washing Arabic Letters Game
Turn letter recognition into a hands-on adventure! In this unique game, kids "wash away" letters on the screen to reveal their shapes, making learning unforgettable.

üìñ Faith-Based Learning
Set your child on the path to success in Quran reading and recitation. Everyday Alif gives them the tools they need to master foundational Arabic and build a strong connection to the Quran.
________________________________________

What Makes Everyday Alif Different?
üåü Designed for Kids, Loved by Parents
Bright colors, joyful animations, and intuitive design make Everyday Alif irresistible for kids‚Äîwhile its ad-free, privacy-first focus earns parents‚Äô trust.

üåü Progressive Learning
Your child starts with the basics of Arabic letters and gradually builds confidence toward forming words, laying the foundation for both Quranic recitation and conversational Arabic.

üåü Safe, Ad-Free Environment
No ads, no distractions, and no data collection‚Äîjust a safe, nurturing space where your child can learn and grow.

________________________________________

Your Child Deserves the Best Start
Imagine the pride you‚Äôll feel as your child confidently traces their first Arabic letters, repeats the letter or even draws letters with their own artistic flair. Everyday Alif gives your child the tools they need to thrive‚Äîwhile keeping learning fun, creative, and rooted in faith.
________________________________________

description:
Learn Arabic easily!

Welcome to Bright: a smart and simple application for learning Arabic.

Bright uses the best method of spaced repetition and a special memory training technique Fast Brain. Thanks to the interactive teaching methods, users memorize 90% of information.

You will find 24 sets of Arabic words with exercises.

Memorize at least 250 core words every month and speak and translate without the dictionary. Just 10 minutes a day anytime, anywhere.
 	
With Bright, you‚Äôll increase your vocabulary and quickly master listening comprehension. You‚Äôll remember the correct spelling and make your pronunciation better.

The application adjusts to you. Your results and detailed learning statistics will enhance assessment of your knowledge and give you motivation to move on.

Simply Learn Arabic Language App is a FREE language app that will assist you to speak Arabic quickly and effectively.

All Arabic phrases and words are presented to you in both phonetic and original Arabic writing. They are recorded by a native speaker from arabic countries.

Save your favorite phrases and words to review them without fuss.

Study your vocabulary with flashcards using the spaced repetition technique.

Test your knowledge with fun Arabic language quiz and review your score.

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ Survive when travelling in arabic countries ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Search all phrases and words to quickly access what you need.

title: Arabius: Learn Saudi Arabic
description:
Learn Saudi Arabic in a natural way, without having to memorize or study!  Our unique ICE Methodology (Immersive, Customized, Experiential) gets you understanding and interacting with new words faster than any other methodology.

WHAT IS ARABIUS?
A revolutionary language learning methodology developed for our clients at our center in Riyadh. Rather than focusing on memorization and speaking, we focus first on simply understanding and interacting with words through fun and exciting games. Languages are not memorized, they are acquired naturally. No studying or memorizing required. Just play the games and you will start to understand basic words and sentences quicker than you ever thought possible.

WHY DO YOU FOCUS ON SAUDI ARABIC?
First of all, because we love Saudi! But also because Saudi Arabic is what people actually speak in daily life in KSA. Modern Standard Arabic is a beautiful and important language, but our focus is on helping you in real communication in daily life.Within a few sessions in our app, you will know common greetings and responses. And with a few more, you will be hearing and arranging complete sentences in Saudi Arabic
 
HOW IS ARABIUS BETTER?
Other language-learning apps are focused on either getting you hooked rather than actual learning OR rote memorization. Instead we focus on teaching you new words in an intuitive way.  Rather than focusing on speaking, we focus on teaching you to understand many words at once. We use recordings of native speakers rather than computer generated sounds so you can hear all the nuances of the language. We NEVER use English to teach Arabic! Translation methodologies do not work. Rather we use pictures to encourage your brain to associate the object with the sound of the new word.


KEY APP FEATURES:
MINI SESSIONS
After completing specified milestones, you will be able to pay (or use a coupon code) to attend a mini session! These are live video sessions with a native speaker for 30 minutes to practice your language skills. Sometimes, these mini sessions will be content reviews. Other times, there will be new content, specific to the mini sessions, that you will learn in your live session. This feature makes the Arabius App extremely unique from other language-learning apps. The ability to connect with a live, native speaker is a guarantee that your language is progressing, and is a goal to strive towards! 

CULTURE CARDS
As you venture through the sessions, you will earn golden dates as a reward for your efforts! These can be cashed in at our store for unique culture cards on interesting cultural topics (such as Arabic coffee!)

TOUR SAUDI
Since the Arabius App is entirely focused on Saudi Language and Culture, you will be traveling virtually through various regions of the country! Enjoy all the distinct aspects of Saudi Arabic learning language and culture as you visit the country virtually!

LEARNING STYLE
While the instructional language of the app is English, when it comes to teaching Arabic, you will find that no English is used! Everything is following our immersive methodology. Users will match sounds they hear to images they see, focusing on hearing and speaking first, and reading later. This allows for faster learning as it follows a more natural immersion style. It also allows for you to learn and understand unique words for foods, drinks, phrases, and items that are common in Saudi, but don‚Äôt always have a clear translation. 

SPACED REPETITION WORD STRENGTHENING
By strategically selecting when and how words are reviewed, repetition is minimized and language-learning speed remains efficient and effective. 

Download the Arabius App for free today!
descriptionHTML:
Learn Saudi Arabic in a natural way, without having to memorize or study! Our unique ICE Methodology (Immersive, Customized, Experiential) gets you understanding and interacting with new words faster than any other methodology.

WHAT IS ARABIUS?
A revolutionary language learning methodology developed for our clients at our center in Riyadh. Rather than focusing on memorization and speaking, we focus first on simply understanding and interacting with words through fun and exciting games. Languages are not memorized, they are acquired naturally. No studying or memorizing required. Just play the games and you will start to understand basic words and sentences quicker than you ever thought possible.

WHY DO YOU FOCUS ON SAUDI ARABIC?
First of all, because we love Saudi! But also because Saudi Arabic is what people actually speak in daily life in KSA. Modern Standard Arabic is a beautiful and important language, but our focus is on helping you in real communication in daily life.Within a few sessions in our app, you will know common greetings and responses. And with a few more, you will be hearing and arranging complete sentences in Saudi Arabic

HOW IS ARABIUS BETTER?
Other language-learning apps are focused on either getting you hooked rather than actual learning OR rote memorization. Instead we focus on teaching you new words in an intuitive way. Rather than focusing on speaking, we focus on teaching you to understand many words at once. We use recordings of native speakers rather than computer generated sounds so you can hear all the nuances of the language. We NEVER use English to teach Arabic! Translation methodologies do not work. Rather we use pictures to encourage your brain to associate the object with the sound of the new word.


KEY APP FEATURES:
MINI SESSIONS
After completing specified milestones, you will be able to pay (or use a coupon code) to attend a mini session! These are live video sessions with a native speaker for 30 minutes to practice your language skills. Sometimes, these mini sessions will be content reviews. Other times, there will be new content, specific to the mini sessions, that you will learn in your live session. This feature makes the Arabius App extremely unique from other language-learning apps. The ability to connect with a live, native speaker is a guarantee that your language is progressing, and is a goal to strive towards!

CULTURE CARDS
As you venture through the sessions, you will earn golden dates as a reward for your efforts! These can be cashed in at our store for unique culture cards on interesting cultural topics (such as Arabic coffee!)

TOUR SAUDI
Since the Arabius App is entirely focused on Saudi Language and Culture, you will be traveling virtually through various regions of the country! Enjoy all the distinct aspects of Saudi Arabic learning language and culture as you visit the country virtually!

LEARNING STYLE
While the instructional language of the app is English, when it comes to teaching Arabic, you will find that no English is used! Everything is following our immersive methodology. Users will match sounds they hear to images they see, focusing on hearing and speaking first, and reading later. This allows for faster learning as it follows a more natural immersion style. It also allows for you to learn and understand unique words for foods, drinks, phrases, and items that are common in Saudi, but don‚Äôt always have a clear translation.

SPACED REPETITION WORD STRENGTHENING
By strategically selecting when and how words are reviewed, repetition is minimized and language-learning speed remains efficient and effective.

Download the Arabius App for free today!
summary: Learn Saudi Arabic and culture. Live sessions with native speakers.

title: AlifBee Kids Learn Arabic
description:
Spark Your Child's Love for Arabic with AlifBee Kids!

Imagine the joy on your child's face as they confidently greet someone with "Kaifa Haluka" (How are you) in Arabic! AlifBee Kids makes learning Arabic fun, engaging, and accessible for children ages 2 and up.

Why Parents Love AlifBee Kids:

  • Safe & Ad-Free Environment: Let your child explore the world of Arabic with confidence, knowing there are no ads to disrupt their learning.
  • Early Language Advantage: Research shows young children excel at language acquisition. AlifBee Kids helps them grasp Arabic naturally, fostering cognitive development.
  • Bilingual Benefits: Regardless of their native language, your child can seamlessly learn Arabic with AlifBee Kids.
  • No Prior Arabic Knowledge Needed: Help your child develop a love for Arabic, even if you don't speak it yourself. This is perfect for families who want their children to connect with their heritage or recite the Quran with proper pronunciation.
  • Customizable Learning: Tailor your child's experience by activating or deactivating specific topics based on their interests.
  • Accredited by Pearson: AlifBee Kids is endorsed by the world-renowned education company Pearson, ensuring a high-quality learning experience.

Meet Sinbad, Your Child's Arabic Adventure Buddy!

AlifBee Kids uses the Entertainment Language Immersion Method, turning Arabic learning into an exciting adventure with Sinbad and his 23 friends. Engaging games, songs, and stories make learning fun and effective.

  • Catchy Songs: Memorable tunes help children effortlessly absorb Arabic words and how to pronounce them.
  • Native Speaker Voices: Authentic Arabic from Sinbad and his friends ensures cultural immersion and proper pronunciation.
  • Comprehensive Curriculum: AlifBee Kids covers the entire KG curriculum, including Arabic letters, math, cognitive skills, life skills, geography, science, Islamic studies, and more.

Track Your Child's Progress & Celebrate Learning Together!

  • Personalized Learning: Create individual profiles, choose age-appropriate curriculum and topics, and monitor your child's learning journey with ease.
  • Downloadable Activities: Take learning offline with printable worksheets that enhance writing, coloring, and motor skills.

Take Action Now

Gift Your Child the Gift of Language: Download AlifBee Kids today and unlock a world of opportunity! Watch them blossom into confident bilingual speakers while having a blast along the way.

Start with Free Activities: Explore the app for free, and subscribe for full access whenever you're ready.

Subscription Details:

You can:

  • Choose from monthly, quarterly or yearly subscriptions
  • Make payment through your iTunes Account.
  • Manage or cancel your subscription anytime.

It is a small but powerful investment in your child's future. If you do not like it, you can get a refund for up to one month after subscription.

Learn More:

  • AlifBee Kids Terms of Use
  • Let's Connect

Are you looking to learn Arabic? Look no further than Arabic Listening & Speaking! Our app offers immersive video-based learning that caters to beginners as well as advanced learners, enabling everyone to improve their speaking and listening skills through real-life, authentic scenarios.

With Arabic Listening & Speaking, users have access to a wide variety of video lessons that help them practice their conversation skills with genuine Arabic videos. Our dialogue-based approach immerses users in practical scenarios, allowing them to gain first-hand experience with the language.

Our step-by-step learning process has been designed to provide users with a better understanding of the Arabic language. You can touch any word to learn its meaning, and expand your vocabulary in no time.

The app also features native Arabic speakers for conversational practice, enabling users to improve their speaking skills and communicate fluently in Arabic. With a structured curriculum and user-friendly design, Arabic Listening & Speaking is the perfect choice for anyone looking to master the language.

We at Arabic Listening & Speaking are always happy to receive feedback, and are committed to providing a seamless and rewarding learning experience. So why wait? Start your journey to becoming a confident and fluent Arabic speaker today!

title: Arabic alphabet for beginners
description:
Do you think learning to read Arabic by yourself is hard? Well not anymore!
Download our app today and start learning how to read and write Arabic. Begin with learning the alphabet through our interactive course which is divided into 27 lessons.  Each lesson focuses on just one letter (except for the first lesson). Each letter is thoroughly studied with descriptions, examples, various forms of application in writing, and also pronunciation. Once you complete all the lessons, you should find yourself easily and effectively capable of reading the Arabic language. 
The initial page of the application contains a list of lessons. On each line before the title of the lesson is a circle, showing the test results in percent. In each lesson, there is a test to check the passed material. The application is built on the well-known textbook ¬´Muallim sani" and preserves the order of the letters studied in that textbook (not in alphabetical order-- the alphabet can be viewed only by selecting the menu item "Alphabet").

RECOMMENDATIONS FOR WORKING WITH THE PROGRAM:
To facilitate learning and understanding, the lessons are arranged in increasing complexity, from easy to difficult, so you need to start learning from the first lesson, and as you master the material, move on to the next lesson. First, go through the whole lesson by flipping the buttons below, back and forth, listening to the pronunciation of all the words and, if necessary, looking at the transliteration. Then, turn off the pronunciation and transliteration and read the whole lesson. After reading each word individually, check yourself by clicking on the scoring button (located at the bottom of the screen). After that, pass the test (the button is located on the top right) and, in case of successful passage, go to the next lesson. If difficulties arise, you can go through the lesson, again. Doing this program, you will easily master the Arabic letters and learn to read in Arabic.

title: WordUp | AI Vocabulary Builder
description:
The world‚Äôs first AI-based English vocabulary builder app. If you are serious about your English, you will fall in love with WordUp. It is the smartest way to perfect your English, and learn every word that matters while enjoying the process!


Vocabulary Builder: 
Vocab builder feature in WordUp utilizes advanced algorithms to expand vocabulary and improve English skills. It recommends a new word each day based on your current knowledge, allowing you to gradually enhance your language proficiency. By incorporating daily words into your learning routine, WordUp ensures steady and consistent growth in your vocabulary.

Knowledge Map
WordUp helps you build a map of your knowledge by identifying the words you know and the words you don't know. It helps you learn new words by identifying the gaps in your vocabulary and suggesting the most important and useful English words to focus on. By incorporating daily vocabulary and tracking your progress, the Knowledge Map enables you to steadily increase your vocabulary and enhance your understanding of English words.
All 25,000 useful English words are ranked in the order of IMPORTANCE, and USEFULNESS, based on how often they are used in real-world spoken English (extracted from thousands of movies, and TV shows).

To actually learn the words that you discover in your Knowledge Map, WordUp gives you everything you need, and more! From word definitions and pictures to tens of entertaining examples from movies, quotes, news, and more. So you get a good feel of how to use each word in context. 

Multilingual Translations
There are also translations in more than 30 languages including French, Spanish, German, Arabic, Turkish, Persian, ...

The daily reviews then kick in. Like flashcards, the words will come back with games and challenges until you master them. It's called Spaced Repetition, and it's scientifically proven to help memorise them forever!

WordUp is unlike any vocabulary builder app you've seen before. It is not another dictionary app, although it can be used as an English dictionary too.

Suitable for Various Users:
WordUp's novel approach to language learning and expanding your vocabulary will leave you feeling confident and empowered. Whether you are new to English, are preparing for an English exam (IELTS, TOEFL, etc), or are a native English speaker, you will find WordUp helpful and entertaining. Just give it a try and see for yourself!

Vocab builder feature in WordUp utilizes advanced algorithms to expand vocabulary and improve English skills. It recommends a new word each day based on your current knowledge, allowing you to gradually enhance your language proficiency. By incorporating daily words into your learning routine, WordUp ensures steady and consistent growth in your vocabulary.

Knowledge Map
WordUp helps you build a map of your knowledge by identifying the words you know and the words you don't know. It helps you learn new words by identifying the gaps in your vocabulary and suggesting the most important and useful English words to focus on. By incorporating daily vocabulary and tracking your progress, the Knowledge Map enables you to steadily increase your vocabulary and enhance your understanding of English words.
All 25,000 useful English words are ranked in the order of IMPORTANCE, and USEFULNESS, based on how often they are used in real-world spoken English (extracted from thousands of movies, and TV shows).

To actually learn the words that you discover in your Knowledge Map, WordUp gives you everything you need, and more! From word definitions and pictures to tens of entertaining examples from movies, quotes, news, and more. So you get a good feel of how to use each word in context.

Multilingual Translations
There are also translations in more than 30 languages including French, Spanish, German, Arabic, Turkish, Persian, ...

The daily reviews then kick in. Like flashcards, the words will come back with games and challenges until you master them. It's called Spaced Repetition, and it's scientifically proven to help memorise them forever!

WordUp is unlike any vocabulary builder app you've seen before. It is not another dictionary app, although it can be used as an English dictionary too.

Suitable for Various Users:
WordUp's novel approach to language learning and expanding your vocabulary will leave you feeling confident and empowered. Whether you are new to English, are preparing for an English exam (IELTS, TOEFL, etc), or are a native English speaker, you will find WordUp helpful and entertaining. Just give it a try and see for yourself!
summary: Improve & expand English vocabulary. Learn fresh words daily with vocab builder

title: English Vocabulary PRO
description:
Discover the key to unlocking the English language with our comprehensive app designed specifically for English learners of all levels. Whether you're just starting your journey into English or looking to polish your skills, this app is your ultimate companion.

Features:

English Vocabulary: Dive into an extensive collection of words, curated to enhance your everyday communication skills. Each entry comes with definitions, usage examples, and pronunciation guides to help you grasp the essence of the word.

Phrasal Verbs: Phrasal verbs can be tricky, but our app demystifies them for you. Learn the meanings of common phrasal verbs and how to use them in sentences to sound more like a native speaker.

Idioms: Idioms add color to the language. With our easy-to-understand explanations, you'll master the art of using idioms to express ideas more vividly.

Collocations: Discover word pairs that frequently go together and learn how to use them to make your English sound more natural and fluent.

Whether you're preparing for an English exam, aiming to improve your conversational skills, or just curious about the language, our app provides you with the tools you need to succeed. Each section is designed to be accessible, engaging, and most importantly, effective in helping you build a stronger English vocabulary.

Join thousands of learners who are already enhancing their English skills with our app. Start your journey to fluency today!

Can you afford not to join us?

title: Vocabulary flashcards: Vocabuo
description:
Learn English, Spanish, German, French, Italian or Swedish words through smart flashcards. See word's usage in infinite amount of sentences and learn through proven spaced-repetition method. 

Create collections of English, Spanish, German, French, Italian and Swedish vocabulary from any piece of text you'd like. Be it news articles, song lyrics, ebooks or short stories. Vocabuo will extract the words in their basic forms, taking conjugations and prefixes into account, and prepares them for practice. 

Practice with flashcards by simply swiping left or right. Cycle though unlimited amount of sentences to get the best feeling for the word. Obtain more information about the word's meaning, origin and related words by clicking the explanation button! Hear the proper pronunciation of each sentence, immediately after revealing the answer. 

Add more vocabulary from videos or by reading your favorite websites.

title: TOEFL Vocabulary Flashcards
description:
Don't just stare at wordlists‚Äîmaster the 600 most important TOEFL vocabulary words with the highly-rated free flashcards for your Android phone or tablet. Practice every day to improve your vocab knowledge.

- 600+ vocab words picked by an expert TOEFL tutor
- Definitions and example sentences for every word
- Decks for every difficulty level
- Track your progress as you study
- Smart algorithm focuses your practice for efficient learning

This app gives you free access to all of Magoosh‚Äôs TOEFL flashcards. Sign in with a Magoosh account (or create a new one) to save your progress to the web. You can continue your practice online at https://toefl.magoosh.com/flashcards/vocabulary

Written by TOEFL experts
------------------------
The entire TOEFL wordlist is selected and defined with usage examples by Magoosh‚Äôs expert TOEFL tutors, led by Chris Lele and Lucas Fink. Chris has been teaching the TOEFL for more than 10 years, runs a popular vocabulary series on YouTube and he‚Äôs also written an eBook on vocabulary. He is unbeatable in Scrabble, or any other word game for that matter. Lucas studied creative writing at Bard College and has been teaching English grammar and standardized tests since 2008.

Review that really sticks
-------------------------
Academic research has found that memories are formed by repeated exposure to new information, so Magoosh‚Äôs flashcard app uses a spaced repetition system. Words you are learning will reappear frequently (occurring less frequently the better you know them) and words you already know won‚Äôt be repeated. The TOEFL word list is also culled to only 600 so that you don't waste time learning unimportant words.

About Magoosh
-------------

Review that really sticks

title: Essential Vocabulary
description:
We have implemented the most advanced learning algorithm along with an optimized and advanced version of Leitner box so you can learn and memorize the most essential English words in a short time and with much less efforts compared to other learning methods.

By using this app you can expand your vocabulary significantly in a short period of time and never worry about reading and understanding English texts again.

About 90% of all general English dialogues and texts are covered by these essential words. So by learning and memorizing them you can master the English comprehension in no time.

Main Features:
‚Ä¢ Each word comes with it's definition , an example, human pronunciation, synonyms and antonyms and a high quality picture to help you learn better.

‚Ä¢ Learn how to use a word in sentences by reading each lesson's provided story which include all of the words in that lesson.

‚Ä¢ Along with Supermemo algorithm - the most advanced spaced repetition algorithm - which has an efficiency 5 times better than traditional algorithms such as Leitner.

‚Ä¢ With a lot of useful features that will make your learning better and more attractive .

‚Ä¢ You can create you own flashcards to learn anything you want with the help of app's advance learning algorithm.

We have put a lot of efforts in order to create a beautiful and simple user interface yet with a lot of advanced features so that you never get exhausted during your learning time.

title: LanGeek | English Vocabulary
description:
LanGeek is an all-in-one language learning app designed to help users enhance their English skills through interactive lessons and personalized learning. Suitable for learners at all levels, the app offers a structured approach to mastering vocabulary, expressions, grammar, pronunciation, and reading. With comprehensive tools and resources, it provides everything you need to achieve fluency.

üìù The most common English words

title: GRE Vocabulary Flashcards
description:
Magoosh has helped MILLIONS of students pass their GRE!

Master the 1500 most important GRE words with free flashcards! Practice every day to improve your vocab knowledge. Study to rectify your benightedness and prepare to trounce the GRE verbal section!


‚Ä¢ 1500 vocab words picked by an expert GRE tutor

‚Ä¢ Definitions and example sentences for every word

‚Ä¢ Decks for every difficulty level

‚Ä¢ Track your progress as you study

‚Ä¢ Smart algorithm focuses your practice for efficient learning


This app gives you access to all of Magoosh‚Äôs GRE vocab flash cards.


Who makes the flashcards?

===

The entire GRE wordlist is selected and defined with usage examples by Magoosh‚Äôs expert GRE tutor, Chris Lele. He has been teaching the GRE for more than 10 years, runs a popular vocabulary series on YouTube and he‚Äôs also written an eBook on vocabulary. He is nigh unbeatable in Scrabble, or any other word game for that matter.


How well will I learn the words?

===

Academic research has found that memories are formed by repeated exposure to new information, so Magoosh‚Äôs flashcard app uses a spaced repetition system. Words you are learning will reappear frequently (occurring less frequently the better you know them) and words you already know won‚Äôt be repeated. The GRE word list is culled so that you focus on only the most important words.


Your practice will focus on the words that you need to review the most to make sure the words you learn will really stick.


What is Magoosh?

===

Magoosh is an online test prep company with a focus on teaching the GRE.


The Magoosh team blogs about GRE words, formulas, grammar, problem solving, quantitative reasoning, and reading comprehension along with GRE study guides and study tips.


How else should I study?

===

Search the app store for ‚Äúmagoosh gre‚Äù to prep for the GRE Exam with Magoosh‚Äôs video lessons app. Learn all the math, verbal, and writing you need to know for the test!


What about other tests?

===

Magoosh also has apps for GMAT prep and English grammar. Search the store for ‚Äúmagoosh gmat‚Äù or ‚Äúmagoosh english‚Äù to find them!


How do I contact you?

===

Customer satisfaction is incredibly important to us. If you have any questions or comments, please send us an email at help@magoosh.com and we‚Äôll get back to you as quickly as we can. 


‚ÄúThe collection of words is great. I liked the visual indication of the three categories and their progress.‚Äù


‚ÄúThe Magoosh staff was awesome; I peppered them with questions and requests and they always responded thoroughly and quickly.‚Äù


‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt have much time to prepare for the GRE, and Magoosh made it possible for me to succeed on the test in a short period of time. I looked at Kaplan GRE, Barron‚Äôs, and Princeton Review products, and I can confidently say that Magoosh was definitely the best.‚Äù


‚ÄúThe team is really great and actually cares about your score as much as they would care about their own. Simply the best.‚Äù


Don‚Äôt wait until the last minute to start studying, start memorizing words today!

title: PONS Vocabulary Trainer
description:
Do you learn new words, but forget them after a while? Then get the PONS Vocabulary Trainer on your smartphone. With this app you can practice your words anywhere - even when you‚Äôre offline. Thanks to its scientifically based 7-stage model, you learn your words in small chunks over a longer period of time until they‚Äôre guaranteed to stay in your memory. The app uses an intelligent algorithm to remind you when words are ready for repeating.

The training is divided into the phases memorizing, practicing and testing. Various exercises make learning fun, and you will always get feedback and tips from Ponsi, the motivated frog. You can also check your learning statistics to keep track of your performance.

The PONS Vocabulary Trainer is waiting for your words. You can 
- create your own lessons 
- buy ready-made lessons
- create study groups to share words and practice together
- transfer your words easily from the PONS Online dictionary
- Statistics and rankings so you can compete with your classmates.
- Calendar mode so you are prepared for the next vocabulary test.

The PONS vocabulary trainer - available for over 25 languages and also accessible as a web version in any browser at trainer.pons.com
 
About PONS: 
PONS has been developing green materials for learning languages for life for over 40 years: from classic dictionaries and grammar aids to audio and software language courses right up to free online services. 

www.pons.com

title: Key English | IELTS Vocabulary
description:
The best way to learn vocabulary is to start with the most common words. Key English | IELTS Vocabulary will teach you the most frequent words in Academic, IELTS and TOEFL English texts. It also has an IELTS Writing Task 2 section to help you develop your essay writing!

Vocabulary features:
‚Ä¢	Written by a professional Academic English Instructor.
‚Ä¢	Learn the words, their definitions AND example sentences to see how they are used in context.
‚Ä¢	Follow your progress and save your data to the cloud.
‚Ä¢	Game mode with leveling system will help keep you motivated.
‚Ä¢	Synonyms help you learn words in groups.
‚Ä¢	Multiple choice, spelling, synonym and grammar games give you confidence! 
‚Ä¢	Save difficult words to view and play games with later. 
‚Ä¢	Important vocabulary lessons teach you how to study.
‚Ä¢	Examples and definitions are carefully prepared for English learners.
‚Ä¢	No annoying logins or internet connection needed!
‚Ä¢	Includes important vocabulary for essay writing.

Writing Task 2 features:
‚Ä¢	Interactive lessons help you learn important essay techniques.
‚Ä¢	Practice with example tasks and study our model answers, complete with notes that focus on the key aspects of essay writing.
‚Ä¢	Know more about band descriptors with our band descriptors guide.

This app contains no ads and all its features are free. If you want to support us, you can make an in-app donation or pay a small fee to have your essays marked with feedback emailed to you by our experienced IELTS teachers.

About the developer

My name is Sam and I am an Academic English teacher. I have found that my students often are able to understand new words, but find it difficult to use them in the correct situations. I decided to write this app to not only teach students the most important academic words, but also help them know how and when to use them. Consequently, the dictionary entries contain definitions AND example sentences written at a level of English that learners can understand.

Spelling, synonyms and grammar is all covered for each word to help students remember what they learn. 

If you are unable to pay the small fee for the full app, send me an email (see additional information) and I‚Äôll send you a code to unlock the full app for free!

Happy learning!

title: Vocabulary Miner: Flashcards
description:
Vocabulary Miner is a free Flashcard maker. No magic fluency, you just say more with every word. 

Vocabulary Miner - Flashcards made brilliantly simple. Learn vocabulary and learn languages.

 It makes vocabulary learning easy and fun as your personal vocabulary trainer. 

Great for:
- a foreigner in a new country
- an advanced learner
- a beginner
- a traveler
- an enthusiast
---------------------------

‚õèÔ∏èCreate your own vocabulary flashcards in the vocabulary app Vocabulary Miner

OR

‚õèÔ∏èBuy PREMIUM - Save time by downloading users' and experts' Word lists as the Premium member from the database with 18+ languages and 2000+ topics for every purpose: travel packages, relocation, shopping, illness‚Ä¶  more than 950 000 Flashcards.

THEN

Study with flashcards everywhere, on all devices (iPhone, Android, iPad).

You can learn vocabulary and even create free Flashcards online and OFFLINE.

---------------------------
What ELSE you CAN DO?

- Publish your vocabulary for others. 
- Rate and comment on Word Lists made by other users.
- Listen to pronunciation on each and every Flashcard
- Learn new words in context with example sentences and improve vocabulary

---------------------------
WHY Vocabulary Miner? 

1. This vocabulary learning app has also import and export of words via the Web App https://app.vocabulary-miner.com. Import easily by COPY & PASTE from any of your Word Lists in your computer. It is therefore a printable Flashcard maker - you can print in .pdf or download in .csv. 

2. No prescribed lessons - you decide what you want to learn. 

3. Learn more than one language at once in this Flashcard maker app.

4. Each Word list has its own statistics to track your progress. They show you that you remember more and more words with every learning session. 

 5. This Flashcard maker app has 6 language settings besides English (Czech, Slovak, Polish, French, Spanish, German). The app sets your language according to your phone language.

6. Your Word Lists are always safe on our servers.


PREMIUM Membership

‚öíÔ∏è Once you go Premium, all Word lists with vocabulary are free to use without limits.

‚öíÔ∏è The database is growing every day: In 2020, there were 950 000 Flashcards in 14 languages created by experts and users!

(learn Czech, learn not only basic English vocabulary, learn basic German words, learn Croatian, learn Ukrainian, learn Russian, learn Serbian, learn Turkish, learn Slovak, learn Spanish, learn basic French words, learn Latin, learn Bulgarian, learn Italian)

‚öíÔ∏èShare vocabulary with the community and download Word lists of other users. 


For info: 
www.vocabulary-miner.com
www.facebook.com/vocabularyminer
www.medium.com/vocabularyminer 

WebApp for fast import and export of printable Flashcards: 
https://app.vocabulary-miner.com


‚õèÔ∏èFor FREE in Vocabulary Miner - Flashcard maker app:

- Offline learning
- Statistics for every Word List
- 7 language settings - English, Czech, Slovak, Polish, French, Spanish, German
- Create your own vocabulary list
- Import/export via Web App and real-time synchronization with the app
- Works on all devices
- Nice design
- Publish vocabulary for others

title: Vocabulary.com
description:
With its uniquely effective word learning system, the Vocabulary.com app helps you master words through a fun and addictive game. And it‚Äôs powered by the world's smartest, fastest dictionary. From the makers of the award-winning Vocabulary.com website, this app will expand your vocabulary with lightning speed!

IT‚ÄôS A SCIENCE...
Vocabulary.com is a comprehensive program for lifelong learning of vocabulary, in which each activity is specially chosen for you.

‚Ä¢ We use sophisticated algorithms to help you learn more effectively.
‚Ä¢ We start with 235,858 questions that teach 15,914 words.
‚Ä¢ We use the science of learning to model how you learn (and retain) new words.
‚Ä¢ By comparing your answers to the hundreds of millions of answers given by other Vocabulary.com users, we personalize your learning experience and choose the best question for you at just the right time.

...AND IT‚ÄôS A GAME
We‚Äôve turned learning vocabulary into an addictive game. You may not even notice that you‚Äôre learning along the way.

‚Ä¢ Accumulate points, achievements and badges.
‚Ä¢ Compete with Vocabulary.com users from throughout the world.

YOU CHOOSE...
Studying for an exam like the SAT, GRE, or TOEFL? We have learnable lists for you, covering everything from standardized tests to breaking news ‚Äî you name it.

‚Ä¢ Choose from one of our 50,000 ready-to-learn lists.
‚Ä¢ Or if you see a word in the dictionary that you want to learn, just click "learn this word" and we'll teach it to you.

...OR WE CHOOSE
Don't have a specific word or list in mind? Let our adaptive learning system find the right word for you.

‚Ä¢ Just play a few questions, and we'll pinpoint the words that are appropriate for your level.
‚Ä¢ We won't waste your time on words that are too easy or too hard.

YOU IMPROVE
Like a good coach, Vocabulary.com won‚Äôt give up on you. Whether you pick the words or let us find them for you, we‚Äôll work with you until you've mastered them.

And even after you've achieved mastery, we'll continue to reinforce what you have learned to make sure that it all stays fresh in your memory. Next thing you know, you‚Äôll be expanding your vocabulary and improving your communication, a key to success in school and business.

FINALLY, A DICTIONARY WITH A SOUL
Our dictionary was written for humans, by humans. Look up a word, and you‚Äôll read a friendly explanation that you'll actually remember. It‚Äôs as if your favorite teacher were explaining it to you.

We include clever usage tips and thousands of real-world example sentences that'll show you how words live in the wild and will make you more confident about using them yourself.

See a word you‚Äôd like to know better? Tap "Learn this Word" and easily add it to your learning program.

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING
"Vocabulary.com is among the quickest and most intelligent ways for students to improve their vocabulary. Regardless of education level or age, Vocabulary.com will help master the words that are essential to academic and business success." ‚ÄîNational Education Association

‚ÄúEducators who are familiar with Vocabulary.com are impressed by the technology. It is a sign, they say, that real progress is finally being made in computer-assisted education.‚Äù  ‚ÄîThe New York Times

‚ÄúVocabulary.com could actually make speaking well cool again.‚Äù ‚ÄîTIME

‚ÄúVocabulary.com boasts a Web-based dashboard bristling with points, levels, progress bars and achievement bonuses, among other attractions.‚Äù ‚ÄîUSA Today

HONORS AND AWARDS
‚Ä¢ TIME‚Äôs 50 Best Websites of the Year
‚Ä¢ PC Magazine's Top 100 Websites of the Year
‚Ä¢ Tech & Learning Award of Excellence
‚Ä¢ Webby Awards: Official Honoree in Education
