title: IELTS Exam Preparation: Vocabu
description: Prep for the IELTS exam with Magoosh! Learn the 600 most important IELTS English vocabulary words with our easy to use flashcards and master your vocab with full definitions, example sentences and more! Best of all, you can study using our flashcards for free! ---------------------------------------------------------------- MASTER YOUR IELTS VOCAB - STUDY WITH MAGOOSH ---------------------------------------------------------------- - Practice & learn 600 English vocab words picked by an expert IELTS exam tutor - Complete definitions & example sentences for each word - Decks of flashcards for multiple difficulty levels; easy, intermediate and advanced - Track your progress, identify your strengths and areas for improvement - Smart algorithm optimizes the flashcards for accelerated learning & optimized study - FREE access to all of the flashcards, just sign in to your Magoosh account! WRTTEN BY EXPERT IELTS TUTORS Every word, definition, and example sentence in this app has been selected, written and triple checked by our team of expert tutors led by led by Eliot Friesen, Lucas Fink, and Chris Lele. Eliot is the IELTS Curriculum Manager at Magoosh and has successfully coached college-level ESL students for years. Lucas has written an eBook on TOEFL preparation and has a hugely popular YouTube series on English vocabulary. Chris is a vocabulary master and has helped students of all backgrounds improve their language skills and test scores. Now they‚Äôre here to help you! LEARN FASTER. LEARN SMARTER. Magoosh uses spaced repetition to make your learning sessions as streamlined as possible! Academic studies and tests have shown that spaced repetition is shown to significantly increase learning efficiency and information retention. Words and definitions you‚Äôre learning will reappear on flashcards to help you learn them faster, appearing less and less frequently as you know them better. Our IELTS prep flashcards contain the 600 most important English vocab words you should learn to ace the IELTS test, making sure you don‚Äôt waste your time learning unimportant vocabulary. ABOUT MAGOOSH We‚Äôre an online test preparation service with a passion for teaching English through video lessons and practice questions. In addition to our apps and courses, you can check out our active blog for even more IELTS tips, study guides, strategies, and other useful learning resources. Visit our website: https://ielts.magoosh.com GET IN TOUCH WITH US We‚Äôre always striving to make our services as beneficial to you as possible! If you have any feedback, suggestions for new features or you just want to drop in and say hi, send us an email at help@magoosh.com. DOWNLOAD FOR FREE & START MASTERING YOUR IELTS VOCABULARY TODAY

title: VoCat - My Own Vocabulary
description:
You can create your own vocabulary with no limit to the number of words, and use the app even without data :)
The cute cat Nero is a bonus.


Easily create your own vocabulary
‚Ä¢ Just enter a word and Google Translator automatically completes the meaning, part of speech, and synonyms.
‚Ä¢ It is very convenient to use, so you can easily add words.
‚Ä¢ You can easily find the results of Naver Dictionary and Google Translate with one click of a button.
‚Ä¢ You can create a vocabulary in Excel or Google Sheets and easily add it to the app in CSV format.


Record with images
‚Ä¢ You can select a photo from the album and record it with words.
‚Ä¢ You can record by taking pictures with the camera directly.


Share it easily
‚Ä¢ You can share the vocabulary as CSV.
‚Ä¢ Share the vocabulary with your friends to study together.


Back up safely
‚Ä¢ You can back up your entire data as a file.
‚Ä¢ Back up your entire data to Google Drive with the click of a button to keep it safe.


Use the vocabulary prepared in the bookstore
‚Ä¢ English
  ‚Ä¢ SAT words
‚Ä¢ Japanese
  ‚Ä¢ JLPT
‚Ä¢ Chinese
  ‚Ä¢ HSK
‚Ä¢ Medicine


See what you've studied on the calendar
‚Ä¢ You can see the words added that day on the calendar.
‚Ä¢ Quiz history is also displayed on the calendar, so you can review it.


Learn by taking quizzes
‚Ä¢ At the end of the quiz, you can retest by collecting only the wrong words.
‚Ä¢ Swipe Cards (FlashCard)
‚Ä¢ Multiple Choice
‚Ä¢ Dictation
‚Ä¢ Blinker


Get word alerts
‚Ä¢ It is important to see the words often!
‚Ä¢ You can receive word notifications at any time you want.


Plan your study schedule
‚Ä¢ You can make a schedule by specifying how many words in the vocabulary to study per day.
‚Ä¢ According to the learning schedule, you can select only the words you want to learn today and take the quiz.


Listen to the words
‚Ä¢ Words will be read using the built in speech engine (TTS, Text To Speech).
‚Ä¢ You can listen to words like listening to music.


The following languages are supported
‚Ä¢ Afrikaans
‚Ä¢ Albanian
‚Ä¢ Amharic
‚Ä¢ Arabic

Would you like to make your own vocabulary?
descriptionHTML:
You can create your own vocabulary with no limit to the number of words, and use the app even without data :)
The cute cat Nero is a bonus.


Easily create your own vocabulary
‚Ä¢ Just enter a word and Google Translator automatically completes the meaning, part of speech, and synonyms.
‚Ä¢ It is very convenient to use, so you can easily add words.
‚Ä¢ You can easily find the results of Naver Dictionary and Google Translate with one click of a button.
‚Ä¢ You can create a vocabulary in Excel or Google Sheets and easily add it to the app in CSV format.


Record with images
‚Ä¢ You can select a photo from the album and record it with words.
‚Ä¢ You can record by taking pictures with the camera directly.


Share it easily
‚Ä¢ You can share the vocabulary as CSV.
‚Ä¢ Share the vocabulary with your friends to study together.


Back up safely
‚Ä¢ You can back up your entire data as a file.
‚Ä¢ Back up your entire data to Google Drive with the click of a button to keep it safe.


Use the vocabulary prepared in the bookstore
‚Ä¢ English
‚Ä¢ SAT words
‚Ä¢ Japanese
‚Ä¢ JLPT
‚Ä¢ Chinese
‚Ä¢ HSK
‚Ä¢ Medicine


See what you've studied on the calendar
‚Ä¢ You can see the words added that day on the calendar.
‚Ä¢ Quiz history is also displayed on the calendar, so you can review it.


Learn by taking quizzes
‚Ä¢ At the end of the quiz, you can retest by collecting only the wrong words.
‚Ä¢ Swipe Cards (FlashCard)
‚Ä¢ Multiple Choice
‚Ä¢ Dictation
‚Ä¢ Blinker


Get word alerts
‚Ä¢ It is important to see the words often!
‚Ä¢ You can receive word notifications at any time you want.


Plan your study schedule
‚Ä¢ You can make a schedule by specifying how many words in the vocabulary to study per day.
‚Ä¢ According to the learning schedule, you can select only the words you want to learn today and take the quiz.


Listen to the words
‚Ä¢ Words will be read using the built in speech engine (TTS, Text To Speech).
‚Ä¢ You can listen to words like listening to music.


The following languages are supported

title: Wordismo ‚Äì English Vocabulary
description:
Learn English with Wordismo ‚Äì Fun, Easy, and Effective!
Learning English vocabulary has never been this fun or effective! Wordismo is the perfect app for all levels ‚Äì from beginner to advanced ‚Äì helping you improve your English step by step at your own pace.

English Vocabulary Flashcards
Study English words from A1 to C2 level with specially designed flashcards. Each word comes with its meaning in your native language, pronunciation, and an example sentence. Includes special categories for exam prep like YDS, Y√ñKDƒ∞L, TOEFL, and IELTS.

Test Your Vocabulary with Interactive Quizzes
Reinforce your learning with quizzes tailored to your level. Earn points for correct answers, climb the leaderboard, and win exciting rewards!

NEW: Interactive English Courses
Wordismo now goes beyond vocabulary! Develop all four core skills ‚Äî listening, speaking, reading, and writing ‚Äî with comprehensive, interactive lessons.
Courses include:
‚Ä¢ Video lessons and real-life dialogues
‚Ä¢ Grammar explanations in your native language
‚Ä¢ Listening exercises with multiple accents (British, American, Australian)
‚Ä¢ Guided writing practices
‚Ä¢ Progress tracking with quizzes and assignments
‚Ä¢ Downloadable PDF resources

Level-Based Reading Passages
Read and listen to texts written by English language experts. Improve your comprehension with exercises after each passage. Passages are narrated with different accents to boost your pronunciation and listening skills.

Learn with English Literature Classics
Read simplified versions of classic English novels tailored to your level.
Each chapter includes:
‚Ä¢ Key vocabulary tables
‚Ä¢ Reading comprehension questions
‚Ä¢ Audio narration in different accents
‚Ä¢ Vocabulary used in real context

Take the Vocabulary Test
Curious about how many English words you know? Take Wordismo‚Äôs quick test to find out your level and what you still need to learn.

Prepare for Language Exams
Study with vocabulary flashcards and quizzes specifically designed for YDS, Y√ñKDƒ∞L, TOEFL, and IELTS. Build your academic vocabulary and boost your exam performance.

Built-In English‚ÄìNative Language Dictionary
Look up unfamiliar words and learn their English definitions, translations, synonyms, and how they‚Äôre used in real sentences.

Compete and Win Rewards
Earn points through quizzes, rise to the top of the leaderboard, and win monthly prizes. Learning English can be fun and rewarding!

Expert-Created Content
All Wordismo content is created and reviewed by experienced English language teachers.

Start your English learning journey today with Wordismo ‚Äì practical, motivating, and made for success!

Have feedback? Contact us at: info@wordismo.com
Terms of Use: https://www.wordismo.com/kullanici-sozlesmesi

title: Flashcard maker vocab notebook
description:
For everyone who studies a foreign language - English, French, Spanish or others! 
Learn new words the way you want, 5 times faster! 

Use MemoWord flashcards maker as your own wordnote or vocab notebook: 
  =>  save all words and phrases to app in a snap ! - make your own flashcards, 
  =>  create customs vocab lists, 
  =>  choose handy learning modes, 
  =>  revise my vocabulary - learned or difficult flash cards.

Study language, using any handy chance you get -  by flipping through the flash cards, or by listening to your words with repetition - it's possible with MemoWord flashcards wordbook!

It's the most useful flashcard maker and word-coach: voice input, built-in translator, synthesis of speech, tips for your flashcards, and flexible customization of learning modes - all to help your new foreign word retention and memorization. 

Homework or exam preparation? IELTS test prep, TOEFL, DELE, DELF or TOPIK? 
All your foreign words will be at hand anytime and anywhere!  
It will be easy for you to learn the necessary vocabulary!

 6 HANDY MEMORIZATION MODES WITH WORD REPETITION:

  ‚úì  Flashcards (duocards)
  ‚úì  Flashcards audio (pronunciation recognition)
  ‚úì  Learn on-the-go (listen to your words while doing something or at the wheel)
  ‚úì  Quiz (quizlet with 3 options)
  ‚úì  Quiz audio
  ‚úì  Writing test

UNIQUE FEATURES OF OUR FLASHCARDS APP:

 =>  create different language profiles for different learning languages,
 =>  manage your wordlists and falshcards,  
 =>  use search among your data,
 =>  classify words as learned and difficult for your smart repetition system,
 =>  learn your words on multiple devices and offline, 
 =>  upload your own sets of vocabulary in xlsx format,
 =>   share your flashcards in the app, etc.

Whether you learn English, German, Portuguese, Korean, Ukrainian, Russian, Hebrew, or any other language vocabulary, MemoWord Flashcard Maker is your vocab trainer and learning tool to simplify memorizing.

Pre-made vocabulary sets, both thematic and grammar, are available for the most studied languages:
   ‚úì  basic, intermediate and advanced vocab (A1, A2, B1, B2, C1, C2);
  -‚úì  irregular verbs, phrasal verbs, collocations, frequent words, idioms, slang, and argot;
   ‚úì  vocab for test or exam topics - TOEFL, IELTS, TOEIC, DELE, DEFT, TOPIK, etc.

MemoWord flashcard maker will be your better study tool - personal vocab notebook and word coach - all in one app! It‚Äôs a bit like the legendary old website anki (ankiapp) with spaced repetition, but Memo Word allows you to add new words and create flashcards directly inside your app, and learn your new words more effectively!  

LANGUAGES WITH PRONUNCIATION:
  
Albanian, Arabic, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Croatian, Cantonese, Czech, Chinese, Danish, Dutch, English flashcards, Estonian, Filipino, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Quizlet, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malay, Marathi, Nepali, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese, Welsh.

WITHOUT VOICE FUNCTION: 

Afrikaans, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Ankidroid, Basque,  Corsican,  Esperanto, Georgian, Hawaiian, Irish, Kazakh, Kyrgyz, Lao, Latin, Maltese, Maori, Mongolian, Persian, Scots, Serbian, Swahili, Uzbek, Zulu, and others.

FREE - MODE AND PREMIUM: 

You can fully enjoy all the Premium features for 3 first days without any subscription. 
Then you can take out a Premium. 3 months of our Premium subscription cost like only 1 lesson with a teacher! This is a good investment, considering that you will learn vocabulary 5 times faster and easier!

You can use the free mode too. It allows you to create 50 flashcards and learn by using 2 learning modes. After you memorize them, you can delete the learned cards and create the new ones.
 
Terms of Use - http://bit.ly/2P010mp

title: Learn English Vocabulary

English Vocabulary Builder: Your Ultimate Learning English Dictionary!

Are you ready to improve your vocabulary and master the language? Look no further than the Learning English Dictionary, an amazing English learning app for adults. title: Blarma - Learn Words
description:
BLARMA: BUILD VOCABULARY ‚Äì LEARN NEW WORDS & LANGUAGES

 Looking for fun, easy, and fast ways to learn new languages? Want to effectively memorize all the new words that you‚Äôve learned and boost your vocabulary? Download Blarma and learn new languages fast and easily by building vocabulary üìò. Our vocabulary builder app allows you to improve vocabulary quickly through fun and simple memorization techniques, daily challenges, and audio-visual learning with practice tests.

EXPAND VOCABULARY IN 10+ WORLD LANGUAGES

 üí° Learn English words: Boost your English vocabulary through easy language learning challenges. descriptionHTML:
BLARMA: BUILD VOCABULARY ‚Äì LEARN NEW WORDS & LANGUAGES


Looking for fun, easy, and fast ways to learn new languages? Want to effectively memorize all the new words that you‚Äôve learned and boost your vocabulary?

Download Blarma and learn new languages fast and easily by building vocabulary üìò. Our vocabulary builder app allows you to improve vocabulary quickly through fun and simple memorization techniques, daily challenges, and audio-visual learning with practice tests.

EXPAND VOCABULARY IN 10+ WORLD LANGUAGES


üí° Learn English words: Boost your English vocabulary through easy language learning challenges. Our easy English learning app starts by selecting English as your target language, and your native language. Then you need to select your English knowledge level (English for Beginners, Intermediate, Advanced).

In the end, Blarma requires you to enter the number of words you want to learn daily and prepares you lessons with practice quizzes to learn English words and expand English vocabulary.

üåç- Learn international languages: Unlike most vocabulary and language learner apps that focus on easy English learning only, Blarma is a different language learning app. You can do the same process as for the English language to boost vocabulary, improve word knowledge, and:

‚Ä£ Learn Spanish words
‚Ä£ Learn Vietnamese words
‚Ä£ Learn German words
‚Ä£ Learn Chinese words
‚Ä£ Learn Korean words
‚Ä£ Learn Portuguese words
‚Ä£ Learn Chinese language
‚Ä£ Learn Hindi language
‚Ä£ Learn Russian language
‚Ä£ Learn Arabic words
‚Ä£ Learn Italian words
‚Ä£ Learn Turkish words
‚Ä£ Learn Indonesian language.

‚ö°Ô∏èFAST & EFFECTIVE LANGUAGE LEARNING TECHNIQUE
Compared to the complicated language learning apps where you need to learn hard grammar, Blarma is focused on building your vocabulary.

Our unique memorization technique requires you to see a photo and read the word description in your native language. You can also swipe to listen to the word and read the definition of the word in the original language too.

Then you need to guess the correct words with the Visual, Listening, Pronunciation, and Writing Tests. All words that you learn are collected and saved, so you can repeat and memorize them faster.

Even more, Blarma features a Spaced Repetition System, an evidence-based learning technique that helps you permanently remember your newly learned words by reminding you after 1, 3, 7, 30, and 120 days.

üåéBLARMA ‚Äì VOCABULARY BUILDER FEATURES:
‚óè learn new languages by building vocabulary
‚óè fast language learning memorization technique
‚óè select what category of words to learn first (verbs, adjectives, people, nutrition, education, business, and more)
‚óè select new words that you don‚Äôt know, skip the ones you know
‚óè learn pronunciation, meaning, writing
‚óè 10+ international languages supported
‚óè for beginner, intermediate, and advanced language learners
‚óè get notification reminders daily to build a language-learning habit
‚óè Visual, Listening, Pronunciation, and Writing Test for faster learning
‚óè repeat learned words
‚óè add words to your vocabulary collection
‚óè Spaced Repetition System that reminds you about your newly learned words after 1, 3, 7, 30, and 120 days.
‚óè see your number of words learned, current streak, streak record, and active days.

Now it‚Äôs time to learn and practice new languages in a fun and easy way through audio-visual vocabulary games and practice tests.

‚òëÔ∏èDownload and use Blarma ‚Äì Vocab Builder for FREE!

------
REACH OUT
If you have any queries about our vocabulary builder language learning app, or you want to suggest a new language, please contact us at appblarma@gmail.com Till then learn new words and languages by expanding your vocabulary with our fast foreign language learning app.

title: Word of the Day: Vocabulary
description:
Improve your vocabulary with new words. Learn definitions and build up your English word list. Our vocabulary builder is a fun way to word up new expressions. Word of the day helps you to learn new words with definition everyday.

DAILY VOCABULARY BUILDING
Boost your language skills with Word of the Day app. Our interactive vocabulary builder and vocabulary games combine fun with learning to keep you motivated. Learn a new word every day and practice your new vocabulary words to strengthen your communication. Improve vocabulary with clear explanations of each definition, and easily develop the habit to learn word a day. Track your progress with our daily English words app. Challenge yourself with words booster exercises, follow a 1day 1word routine, and elevate your skills to confidently tackle any difficult word and steadily improve English vocabulary.

CURATED WORD COLLECTION
Each word of the day is carefully selected to guide you on your daily word learning journey. Study everyday vocabulary words using our vocabulary builder and play interactive vocabulary games. Reinforce your understanding of each definition and make steady progress as you learn word a day. Store your favorites in your word list dictionary and use words booster exercises to advance your skills. Stick to a 1day 1word schedule, master each difficult word, and consistently elevate your skills while you improve English vocabulary.

MINI STORIES
Each engaging word story helps you understand the everyday vocabulary words you‚Äôre learning, making it easy and fun to learn a new word everyday. Play fun vocabulary games, explore examples for each definition, and use the vocabulary builder to deepen understanding. Organize words in your word list dictionary and review them with our daily English words app. Challenge yourself with words booster exercises, follow a 1day 1word routine, and master each difficult word. Stories help you elevate your understanding and steadily improve English vocabulary.

ILLUSTRATIONS
Every daily word comes with engaging illustrations to make the everyday vocabulary words more memorable. The vocabulary builder helps you learn each word‚Äôs definition, making it easy to learn word a day. Keep favorites in your word list dictionary and review them in our daily English words app. Complete words booster challenges, maintain a 1day 1word habit, and feel smarter as you use each difficult word you learn. Visuals help elevate learning and support efforts to improve English vocabulary.

GAMES & QUIZZES 
Dive into English with Word of the Day and grow your vocab steadily with each daily word. Pick up a new word everyday with interesting vocabulary words, examples, and explanations in the vocabulary builder. Play vocabulary games and get quizzed on each definition to help you effectively learn word a day. Track progress in your word list dictionary, review words in our daily English words app, and build retention with words booster exercises. Stick to a 1day 1word habit to master each difficult word and elevate your communication to consistently improve English vocabulary.

NOTIFICATIONS
Stay motivated with reminders from Word of the Day. Receive a daily word notification to learn your everyday vocabulary words. Use the vocabulary builder and play vocabulary games to strengthen memory. Review each definition, organize words in your word list dictionary, and practice them to learn word a day. Track progress in our daily English words app, complete words booster activities, follow a 1day 1word plan, and tackle every difficult word you encounter. Notifications help elevate learning and consistently improve English vocabulary.

Word of the day helps you word up and learn new words with definition everyday. Improve your vocabulary and discover new words easily. Learn definitions, build up your English word list, and enjoy our vocabulary builder.

title: Rozum ‚Äî Vocabulary Builder
description:
Rozum ‚Äî The Smartest Way to Learn English Words.
Expand your vocabulary faster and practice speaking naturally with Linoo ‚Äî your personal AI Tutor.

Rozum helps you learn new English words daily and master advanced and practical English vocabulary that traditional language learning apps often miss. If you're looking to expand vocabulary, strengthen your language skills, and express yourself more clearly and confidently, Rozum is the perfect choice.

Why choose Rozum?
‚Äí Real life situations: Learn new words daily and practice carefully selected 150+ Word Stacks, designed for real-life scenarios.
‚Äí Speaking practice: talk to AI tutor Linoo, get immediate feedback and be ready for your next conversation.
‚Äí Unlimited learning: No time limits. Learn and practice thousands of English words every day, completely free using vocabulary builder!
‚Äí Offline mode: Learn new words daily anywhere ‚Äî even during flights or in places without internet access.
‚Äí Interactive practices: Power up your brain with scientifically proven methods ‚Äî Spaced Repetition and Multimodal Learning. No more freezing ‚Äî your vocabulary builder is accessible immediately.
‚Äí Smart words in 26 vocab categories: Discover practical vocabulary builder that is actually useful in the modern world.

Why improving vocab with Rozum matters?
Your vocabulary builder is your tool to express yourself clearly and make people listen with interest. With Rozum you can expand vocabulary, learn English words, and expand vocabulary effortlessly. Learning new words daily helps you develop sophisticated speech and communicate with confidence in any situation. Expand vocabulary with Linoo - your personal AI tutor!

Who is Rozum for?
Our product is designed for anyone who wants to learn new words daily and sound smarter in English:

If you're looking for the best vocabulary builder to learn English vocabulary, Rozum is your ultimate word learning app!
Start expanding your vocabulary today! Download Rozum now and learn new words daily to expand your vocabulary, expand your vocab, and elevate your speech.

title: SAT Flashcards: Prep & Vocab
description:
Master important SAT concepts with Magoosh's SAT flashcards! It's easy to use and will help you memorize key concepts quickly!

‚Ä¢ English and Math SAT concepts 
‚Ä¢ 350 vocab words picked by an expert SAT tutor
‚Ä¢ Definitions and example sentences for every concept and word
‚Ä¢ Decks for every difficulty level
‚Ä¢ Track your progress as you study
‚Ä¢ Smart algorithm focuses your practice for efficient learning

This app gives you access to all of Magoosh‚Äôs SAT flashcards. Sign in with a Magoosh account (or create a new free one) to save your progress to the web so that you can continue your practice online at https://sat.magoosh.com/flashcards

Written by SAT experts
=====
The entire SAT wordlist is selected and defined with usage examples by Magoosh‚Äôs expert SAT tutors, headed by Chris Lele. He has been teaching the SAT for more than 10 years, runs a popular vocabulary series on YouTube and he‚Äôs also written an eBook on vocabulary. He is unbeatable in Scrabble, or any other word game for that matter.

Review that really sticks
=====
Academic research has found that memories are formed by repeated exposure to new information, so Magoosh‚Äôs flashcard app uses a spaced repetition system. Concepts and words you are learning will reappear frequently (occurring less frequently the better you know them) and words you already know won‚Äôt be repeated. 

‚ÄúI really like the way the words appear and the simple interface to show progress of the user. You guys have put good use of algorithms so one comes out learning the words well. The best flashcard app to date.‚Äù - Arif

‚ÄúAbsolutely awesome. This is an excellent way to significantly improve vocabulary in a short amount of time. I learned 100 new words while waiting for my flight at the airport. Good job Magoosh!‚Äù - Tameka

About Magoosh
=====
We're an online test prep company with a focus on teaching the SAT through videos and personalized customer support.

In addition to our online course, we blog about SAT words, formulas, grammar, review, writing and an occasional question of the day along with SAT study guides and study tips at http://magoosh.com/sat/

More SAT study tools
=====
Search the app store for ‚Äúmagoosh sat‚Äù to continue your prep for the College Board‚Äôs SAT with Magoosh‚Äôs SAT Prep & Practice app.

When you‚Äôre ready to practice for the full SAT exam, Magoosh‚Äôs website has more than 700 excellent SAT Math, SAT Reading and SAT Writing practice questions, each with its own detailed video explanation. After each quiz, you can review your answers to see your strengths and weaknesses. Visit http://sat.magoosh.com for more information.

(Magoosh also has an app for learning English grammar. Search the store for "magoosh english" to find it)

Your Magoosh account
=====
If you don't already have a Magoosh account, just enter your email address, choose a password and tap "Sign In" and we'll create one for you! It's completely free, and we only use your email address to sync your progress to the web so that you can continue your practice online at http://sat.magoosh.com/flashcards/vocabulary

Have any questions? Please ask!
=====
Customer satisfaction is incredibly important to us. If you have any questions or comments, please send us an email at support@magoosh.com or call +1-510-214-0212 and we‚Äôll get back to you as quickly as we can.

‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt have much time to prepare, and Magoosh made it possible for me to succeed on the test in a short period of time. I looked at Kaplan SAT, Barron‚Äôs, and Princeton Review products, and I can confidently say that Magoosh was definitely the best.‚Äù

‚ÄúThe team is really great and actually cares about your score as much as they would care about their own. Simply the best.‚Äù

Don‚Äôt wait until the last minute to start studying, start using Magoosh‚Äôs SAT Flashcards app today!

title: italki: learn any language
description:
Start learning or keep improving your English, French, German or any other language with private tutoring, thanks to qualified native teachers, and join more than ten million students around the world. Do you want to learn a new language? Would you like to study English with a native teacher? You speak a bit of French and you‚Äôre not sure how to keep on learning? Language academies don‚Äôt fit your schedule? Download italki, register for free and learn English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Japanese, Korean and more languages. Customize the way you learn languages; connect with native teachers according to your interests, work experience, etc. In italki you‚Äôll find qualified language teachers to learn the language you like best (English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Japanese, Korean‚Ä¶). Make the most of this opportunity to learn languages, practice your conversation skills, get to know new cultures and grow professionally. Aside from the italki‚Äôs community‚Äôs support, video call tutoring with native teachers is the best tool for you to learn a language.

italki, the app to learn languages with tutoring

More than 150 languages available with native teachers

üá¨üáß English üá©üá™ German üá™üá∏ Spanish üá´üá∑ French üáÆüáπ Italian üáØüáµ Japanese üá∞üá∑ Korean ‚Ä¶ and more!

‚åö Language classes where and when you want them

Do you want to make the most of your lunch break at work or your daily walk to learn English? Choose the class duration (30, 45, 60 or 90 minutes) and adjust it to your schedule. Use italki Classroom, Skype, Zoom or another platform for your online language classes and start speaking the language you always wanted to learn, or practice the languages you want to get better at.

üîé Master the language skills you need the most

italki's qualified teachers tailor their language classes to your current level (A1, A2, B1, B2, C1, C2). They will build every lesson based on your personal needs and weaknesses, to ensure you progress fast. Choose a course that fits your priorities: conversation, business, grammar, creative writing, exam preparation‚Ä¶ You have lots of options available for each language!

üí∏ Pay as you go

Forget about paying a lot without knowing if you‚Äôll be able to attend all the classes. With italki, you pay per class. You can also buy credits to spend them little by little or buy a package and save on the final price. Educators set their own prices, from less than $10 for qualified teachers to less than $5 for tutors. You also have three classes for less than $5 each to try, so you can make sure it‚Äôs right for you!

üì± Connect with thousands of native teachers

Find English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Japanese, and Korean teachers, and teachers of many more languages. Choose your teacher according to their interests, specialization, or even their accent: British or American English, to learn English and any other language you need. Some teachers use language-teaching materials in their tutoring classes, such as books, videos, cards, etc.

üåç The community goes beyond classes

Discover italki‚Äôs free community where you can ask questions, practice English, German, Spanish or any other language, and speak languages with other students so you learn together. Learn beyond your classes with language exchanges. Invite your friends to join italki to study a language, and earn $10 every time one of them spends their first $20. They will also earn $5 for adding you as their referrer. Study online, learn languages with native tutors in italki and expand your world.

Use italki Classroom, Skype, Zoom or another platform for your online language classes and start speaking the language you always wanted to learn, or practice the languages you want to get better at.

üîé Master the language skills you need the most


italki's qualified teachers tailor their language classes to your current level (A1, A2, B1, B2, C1, C2). They will build every lesson based on your personal needs and weaknesses, to ensure you progress fast.
Choose a course that fits your priorities: conversation, business, grammar, creative writing, exam preparation‚Ä¶ You have lots of options available for each language!

üí∏ Pay as you go


Forget about paying a lot without knowing if you‚Äôll be able to attend all the classes. With italki, you pay per class. You can also buy credits to spend them little by little or buy a package and save on the final price.
Educators set their own prices, from less than $10 for qualified teachers to less than $5 for tutors. You also have three classes for less than $5 each to try, so you can make sure it‚Äôs right for you!

üì± Connect with thousands of native teachers


Find English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Japanese, and Korean teachers, and teachers of many more languages. Choose your teacher according to their interests, specialization, or even their accent: British or American English, to learn English and any other language you need.
Some teachers use language-teaching materials in their tutoring classes, such as books, videos, cards, etc.

üåç The community goes beyond classes



Discover italki‚Äôs free community where you can ask questions, practice English, German, Spanish or any other language, and speak languages with other students so you learn together. Learn beyond your classes with language exchanges.
Invite your friends to join italki to study a language, and earn $10 every time one of them spends their first $20. They will also earn $5 for adding you as their referrer.

Study online, learn languages with native tutors in italki and expand your world.
summary: Online classes in English, French, German, Spanish, Italian & more languages

title: uTalk - Learn 150+ Languages
description: Learn languages fast: uTalk gets results because every word you hear is in your new language and you speak, listen and understand from Day One. The app has a huge range of 150+ languages and with free starter words in each, you can try it risk-free. Score full marks in the games and you can also unlock an extra topic in your language for free. uTalk helps you speak a new language for these 3 reasons: 1. Learn from the locals: We record native speakers so you can hear every word pronounced clearly. We then get you to mimic their pronunciation and compare your intonation with theirs. Practise until you get it right ‚Äì you can even slow the audio down if it‚Äôs too fast. 2. Crammed full of words: Useful everyday words and phrases. Topics, like Food and Drink, take around two to three hours to complete. But you can dip in for just five minutes at a time or longer. With 60+ topics, that‚Äôs a total of 180 hours of learning. 3. Keeps you motivated: Check your scores on progress bars as you move through five progressively difficult games. To get full marks, you‚Äôll have to know the words as well as your own language. Who‚Äôs it for? uTalk‚Äôs tried and trusted way to learn a new language has been developed over 30 years and is perfect for beginners. But, because of its wide-ranging language, it‚Äôs also invaluable for intermediates looking to fill in gaps in their vocabulary and pronunciation. How it works: Subscribe to everything on uTalk or buy individual languages or topics. Learn on any device, at home or on the move. The app automatically syncs between your devices. Work offline by downloading content. descriptionHTML:
Learn languages fast: uTalk gets results because every word you hear is in your new language and you speak, listen and understand from Day One.

The app has a huge range of 150+ languages and with free starter words in each, you can try it risk-free. Score full marks in the games and you can also unlock an extra topic in your language for free.


uTalk helps you speak a new language for these 3 reasons:

1. Learn from the locals: We record native speakers so you can hear every word pronounced clearly. We then get you to mimic their pronunciation and compare your intonation with theirs. Practise until you get it right ‚Äì you can even slow the audio down if it‚Äôs too fast.

2. Crammed full of words: Useful everyday words and phrases. Topics, like Food and Drink, take around two to three hours to complete. But you can dip in for just five minutes at a time or longer. With 60+ topics, that‚Äôs a total of 180 hours of learning.

3. Keeps you motivated: Check your scores on progress bars as you move through five progressively difficult games. To get full marks, you‚Äôll have to know the words as well as your own language.

Who‚Äôs it for? uTalk‚Äôs tried and trusted way to learn a new language has been developed over 30 years and is perfect for beginners. But, because of its wide-ranging language, it‚Äôs also invaluable for intermediates looking to fill in gaps in their vocabulary and pronunciation.

title: Langotalk-AI Language Learning
description:
Langotalk is the world's best AI Language Learning App for friendly & stress free chats.

In the app, you can simply chat or speak with dozens of AI Bots on anything you like, in your desired language, and get auto-corrected by the AI.

Langotalk uses the best AI technology in the market to enhance language learning. We believe that AI enables a very personal method for language learning, which is tailored to your level, preferred way of learning, and interests, which makes learning much more fun and effective. Our mission is to enhance your language learning journey using this revolutionary technology.


The app is already used by over 50,000 people, and we get great reviews on a daily basis.

Language Learning AI | Learn Spanish AI | Learn French AI | Learn German AI | Learn Dutch AI | Learn Italian AI

title: Pimsleur | Language Learning
description:
Online Foreign Language Learning for Spanish, French, Korean and more with Pimsleur - Learn to speak 50+ foreign languages fluently with just 30 minutes of language learning practice a day!

The Pimsleur Method‚Ñ¢ is the most effective way to learn a foreign language, achieve native conversational fluency, and use the language in your everyday life. Learn to speak fluent Spanish, French, Korean, German, Chinese, Arabic, Japanese and more with ease. Pimsleur‚Äôs easy language learning resources make learning a new language fun, flexible and rewarding. Work on your vocabulary, learn grammar and practice speaking fluently, with just 30 minutes of language practice a day! 

Our innovative online audio lessons focus on enhancing your vocabulary, pronunciation and speaking skills without the burden of grammar tables, making language learning and practice enjoyable and accessible. Dive into cultural topics that enrich your understanding and language fluency, and join thousands of adults who have transformed their language skills online with Pimsleur.

Whether you're just starting or already looking to improve your language fluency, Pimsleur offers a convenient online language learning platform designed for a flexible study schedule that fits into your daily routine. Learn to speak a new language anytime, anywhere - even in the car as a family using CarPlay. 

Why Choose Pimsleur as Your Language Partner?

-Scientifically proven method for fast, lasting language fluency.
-Just 30 minutes a day to speak a new foreign language with confidence.
-Learn offline, hands-free, and without distractions, no Wi-Fi needed.
-Perfect your pronunciation and practice real conversations with a smart AI language tutor. 
-Sync across devices to track your progress and keep your learning streak going.
-Join the global community of Pimsleur learners!

Discover the full list of languages here: Albanian, Arabic (Eastern), Arabic (Egyptian), Arabic (Modern Standard), Armenian (Eastern), Armenian (Western), Chinese (Cantonese), Chinese (Mandarin), Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dari Persian, Dutch, Farsi Persian, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Haitian Creole, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Lithuanian, Norwegian, Ojibwe, Pashto, Polish, Portuguese (Brazilian), Portuguese (European), Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Spanish (Latin American), Spanish (Spain-Castilian), Swahili, Swedish, Swiss German, Tagalog, Thai, Turkish, Twi, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese.

Join millions who trust Pimsleur for effective online language learning. Download now and see how easy it is to start speaking a new language!

FREE TRIAL AVAILABLE
Don‚Äôt miss out - try Pimsleur for FREE and start mastering a new language today! With a complimentary lesson in 51 languages, you'll experience the most effective way to achieve conversational fluency from Day 1.

PREMIUM FEATURES

CORE CONVERSATIONAL LANGUAGE LEARNING LESSONS
Enjoy 30-minute conversational sessions anywhere. Learn to speak another language in just 30 days!

READ
You won‚Äôt just learn foreign languages; you'll learn to read without sacrificing speaking skills!

SPEAK
Overcome beginner shyness and learn to speak new languages fluently with role-play & review transcripts with AI language learning & voice recognition.

SKILLS
Practice phrases by topic & learn easily with vocabulary flashcards. Learn foreign languages with Quick Match & Speed Rounds.

SYNC PROGRESS
Track learning progress across different devices, sync & stream offline with no ads. With the convenience of remote learning, you can learn languages without interruptions for effective language transfer.

DAILY LESSONS TO BUILD STREAKS
Keep your daily learning streak as you go and become fluent forever!

Feature availability depends on the language. Visit our website for more information & a complete list of the different languages available.

title: Lingbe: Practice languages
description:
JUST PRESS THE CALL BUTTON AND START PRACTICING LANGUAGES STRAIGHT AWAY!!!

üìû Lingbe is the ultimate language exchange app. The best way to learn and improve a language is to practice on a daily basis with native speakers and other users that are practicing the same language. It doesn‚Äôt matter if you want to learn, improve or just practice spanish üá™üá∏, portuguese üáµüáπ, French üá´üá∑, italian üáÆüáπ, japanese üáØüáµ, German üá©üá™, etc.. in our community you will always find someone available that will help you practice the language of your choice through free voice conversations. All you have to do is press the call button and we will find you a person who will help you learn and practice the language of your choice in that very moment. After the conversation you will receive feedback in terms of grammar, pronunciation and fluency üí¨ so you can always see how fast you are learning and progressing. title: Lingvist: Learn Languages Fast
description:
Based on the latest research in cognitive science & AI, Lingvist quickly predicts your current level & identifies which words will be most useful for you to learn next.

You can now learn 15 languages from English, including the culturally rich Japanese, Korean and learn Scandinavian languages Swedish, Danish or Norwegian. 

Use Lingvist FREE for 14 days!

Lingvist helps you cultivate a healthy routine and lets you know once you‚Äôve exceeded the optimal amount of daily study time. It keeps you challenged and tracks your progress using AI. 

With the help of an intelligent AI-powered spaced repetition algorithm that continuously learns from our user base, Lingvist presents you problems that are on the tip of your tongue, just as you‚Äôre about to forget them.

Lingvist is designed for people who want to take their comprehension to the next level. Alongside a deck based on the most frequently used words in your target language, you can tailor the course with handcrafted decks in specialist subjects, ensuring that you‚Äôll be ready for the language encounters relevant to you. 
		
You can even prepare to have comfortable conversations about niche topics by uploading a textbook or Wikipedia article and having Lingvist generate a custom deck based on the content. Both custom and built-in Lingvist decks present your target vocabulary in a variety of realistic settings.

Lingvist doesn‚Äôt replace the most fun  part of learning a language ‚Äì speaking it with real people ‚Äì instead, it will give you a firm foundation of vocabulary, with grammar tips concisely integrated into the experience, allowing you to rely on whichever balance of intuition and logic suits you best.

If you want to reach your language learning goals faster, whether it's fluency, pronunciation, confidence, or more technical vocabulary, there‚Äôs no app like Lingvist. From beginner to advanced user, there‚Äôs always a new idiom or grammatical structure to learn.

Full courses are available in European or Latin American Spanish, French, Japanese, German, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Russian, Korean, Swedish, Danish, Norwegian, Polish and Estonian. Speakers of other languages (Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Turkish, French, German, Italian, Brazilian Portuguese, Spanish, Latin American Spanish, Russian, Estonian, Thai, Hindi, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese, Polish, Arabic and Ukrainian) can also learn English grammar and business English vocabulary with Lingvist.

No wonder users keep saying, ‚ÄúThis is the best vocabulary app I‚Äôve ever had!‚Äù

Learn French Grammar organically, practice for the Dipl√¥me Approfondi de Langue Fran√ßaise (DALF), and breeze through your finals!
Understand the dialect ‚Äì study the particular expressions of Mexican Spanish or Spanish from Spain.
Learn German, learn Korean, learn Italian, learn Japanese ‚Äì Choose from over 50+ language pairs!
Progress efficiently in your target language with a vocabulary builder app that adapts to you.

Personalize your learning experience to best suit you, whether it‚Äôs enforcing correct diacritics or ultra-slow audio playback.

Soak up the real language as it‚Äôs actually spoken & improve your vocabulary and grammar. 

SUBSCRIPTION: You will need a subscription to access the full learning materials for all languages we offer. Each subscription is automatically renewed unless auto-renew is deactivated at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period. When a subscription is canceled, access to courses and features will expire at the end of the current payment period.

Visit our blog for interesting facts on how to learn languages:
‚ñ∏‚ñ∏ Lingvist blog: https://lingvist.com/blog/

Follow us for more language-learning inspiration:
‚ñ∏‚ñ∏ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/theLingvist
‚ñ∏‚ñ∏ Instagram: instagram.com/thelingvist/
‚ñ∏‚ñ∏ Twitter: https://twitter.com/lingvist
‚ñ∏‚ñ∏ LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/lingvist

Privacy Policy: https://lingvist.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: https://lingvist.com/tos/

title: Andy English Language Learning
description:
Dive into the world of language learning with Andy, your personal English learning app. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or an advanced learner, Andy offers an interactive way to learn English easily and effectively.

WHY CHOOSE ANDY?

‚óè Personalized English Tutoring: Andy isn't just an app; he's your friend. He provides a hands-on approach to English speaking and comprehension, ensuring you practice English in real-life situations.

‚óè Engage in English Conversation: From casual greetings to deep discussions about art, travel, and movies, practicing English conversation with Andy feels like chatting with a friend. It's a stress-free environment, as Andy, unlike humans, doesn‚Äôt judge. This is the perfect place to practice without feeling shy.

‚óè Master the English Vocabulary: Stumble upon a word you don‚Äôt recognize? Just ask Andy! Not only will you receive a definition, but also examples to ensure you remember it. Regular reminders will help reinforce your vocabulary.

‚óè In-Depth Grammar Lessons: Forget about boring grammar lessons. Andy delivers bite-sized daily lessons, testing your understanding, and providing feedback. Each English learning session is interactive, ensuring you grasp the concepts.

‚óè Learn Languages Beyond English: While Andy specializes in English, the methodology used can pave the way for you to learn languages beyond just English. After all, the best way to learn - languages is through practice.

‚óè Available Anytime: Whether you have 5 minutes or 5 hours, Andy is always there. Learn English for free at your pace, and work on your listening skills with message audios.

‚óè A Fun Experience: It‚Äôs not just about learning. Andy brings humor, curiosity, and a personal touch to the table. It feels like you're talking to a real person.

A DEEPER DIVE INTO ANDY'S METHODOLOGY

Andy is built upon the latest in language learning methodologies. This ensures a seamless blend of real-world conversation practice, structured lessons, and innovative technology. The design ensures you not only learn English easily but also retain what you learn.

PRACTICE MAKES PERFECT

With Andy, you‚Äôre not just learning; you‚Äôre constantly practicing. This regular practice ensures you‚Äôre always improving, whether it‚Äôs your English vocabulary or your conversational skills. The more you use Andy, the closer you get to mastering the English language.

A COMMUNITY OF LEARNERS

Join a global community of users who share your passion. Share tips, discuss nuances, or just engage in a fun English conversation. The community, along with Andy, makes learning feel less like a task and more like a fun group activity.

A JOURNEY, NOT A DESTINATION

Remember, language learning is not about reaching an end goal but about the journey. Enjoy the process, relish the challenges, and celebrate the small victories. With Andy, every day is a step closer to fluency in English and understanding the nuances of language.

STAY UPDATED WITH ANDY

Our team is continuously working to improve and expand Andy's capabilities. From adding new English vocabulary lessons to enhancing its conversational abilities, we ensure Andy remains the best free language learning app. Stay tuned for regular updates and new features that aim to make your language learning journey even more enriching!

title: Quick Pronunciation
description: Download now and start improving your pronunciation! Speak with more confidence and impress your boss, colleagues, customers, tourists, and everyone else! Pronouncing foreign words can be a tricky job. There are several irregular words and some of them are just impossible to guess. Quick Pronunciation came to save you precious time when learning a foreign language. Write any word in the box and your phone will speak it for you! In a second! No distraction, no complicated interface, easy access to the last words or retrieve the full list in a single tap. Very useful for language teachers and students who need to check some word pronunciation on the go. Don't be fooled by its simple look! Quick Pronunciation can pronounce even the most complex medical terms, biblical words, botanical names, huge numbers and much more =) Available languages: ‚óæÔ∏è English US / UK ‚óæÔ∏è Spanish ‚óæÔ∏è Italian ‚óæÔ∏è German ‚óæÔ∏è French ‚óæÔ∏è Japanese ‚óæÔ∏è Russian ‚óæÔ∏è Hindi ‚óæÔ∏è Portuguese ‚óæÔ∏è Korean ‚óæÔ∏è Greek Write a comment to request new languages! Features ‚úîÔ∏è No Ads ‚úîÔ∏è Hear any word instantly ‚úîÔ∏è Minimal battery usage ‚úîÔ∏è Very small app size ‚úîÔ∏è Dark/light themes ‚úîÔ∏è Long-click the flag icon to select other languages ‚úîÔ∏è Easy access to recent entries ‚úîÔ∏è Internet connection not required (uses native text-to-speech functionality) Developed by Tiago Colombo

title: English Pronunciation
description:
English Pronunciation is very important so how can I improve my pronunciation and How to pronounce? It's one of the most common questions I am asked is. So I make this app to answer that question, and hopefully help you improve your English pronunciation. I believe that good pronunciation is essential for speaking and understanding spoken English well.

- Pronunciation app that teaches you how to pronounce English properly and also checks your pronunciation (phonetic) to make sure you do it right.

- "English Pronunciation App" support teachers to teach their students well.

With this English Pronunciation Training application, you will learn some important topics about speaking English properly such as:
-  Short vowels
-  Long vowels
-  Double vowel sounds
-  Voiced consonants
-  Voiceless consonants
-  Other consonants
-  Mouth and tongue positions when pronouncing sounds
-  Voiced and unvoiced sounds
- How to pronounce with a a lot of rules in English

Moreover, there are some unique features that helps you learn to pronounce English better:
-  You can hear the pronunciation and many examples (phrases and sentences) about that.
-  You can tap on the words in practice area to hear the correct pronunciation of that word
-  FREE Pronunciation videos with phonetics letters that helps you know the right way to pronounce a word
-  You can view your progress after spoken english
-  You can earn points after making correct pronunciations
-  You can remove ads to use full functions

title: American English Pronunciation
description:
This app helps students learn to distinguish the various sounds of American English, which is the first step in being able to produce those sounds. 

Students can learn, practice, and take tests on both individual sounds and double sounds. The double sounds, which consist of a consonant and a vowel, were added to help students differentiate sounds in context.

If you find any problems, help improve this app by reporting them at www.aepronunciation.com. Translations into other languages are also welcome.

If you find any problems, help improve this app by reporting them at www.aepronunciation.com. Translations into other languages are also welcome.
summary: Learn the sounds of American English and the symbols used to write them.

title: English Sounds Pronunciation
description:
Get your hands on the app that helps to deal with the most difficult part of the English language - pronunciation of the sounds! 

Don't be afraid to listen to how you pronounce the sounds and compare yours with the "dictionary" version :)

Access all of the English sounds in one place, logically categorized with a description, picture and video for each one, and start learning and mastering them - we've done everything to make the process easy and user-friendly. Not only can you listen to the right pronunciation according to most dictionaries, you can also record your own version to compare. 

The first version of the app has pronunciation of the sounds of American English only, but download the app even if you're after British English - we are going to add these sounds very soon!

This app fully supports android's dark theme and is written by professionals to provide you with the best experience possible.

Download it now and check your pronunciation!

title: Say It: English Pronunciation
description:
Do you want to improve your English speaking, listening, pronunciation and vocabulary? The award-winning SayIt: English Pronunciation app makes speech pronunciation visual, interactive and easier to learn. Feel more confident speaking American or British English with Say It (SayIt app).

FREE download and 7-day trial with access to basic tests, sounds and all 44 phonemes with a carefully curated selection of 100 words, in British and American English accent, and now up to 50% off first 1-month subscription! (¬£11.99 p/mth at end of introductory period - cancel at any time, see below.)

üèÜ Winner of the English Speaking Union President's Award for New Technology in ELT. üèÜ

SayIt is like having an on-call private English pronunciation teacher with you on your device! Try it today - free version includes 100 sample words covering all 44 sounds in standard English. Upgrade to access games, more advanced tests and features with 36,000+ words in British and American English.

HOW IT WORKS
üí™ see the soundwave, syllables, and which are stressed (strong)
üëâ touch and drag to listen to the library pronunciation slowly
üëÜ tap the phonemes (IPA symbols, British/American English)
üé§ record your own pronunciation, and compare it to the Oxford model
üòÄ self-assess your progress and get feedback from your teacher, friends or colleagues - share your voice recording and soundwave directly from the app

In research conducted by university colleagues, international students predominantly rated all features of SayIt - range of vocabulary, phonetic alphabet blocks, stress markers, interactive soundwaves - as ‚Äòvery useful‚Äô. The majority of respondents agreed that using SayIt over a longer period would enable them to:

* Perform better academically
* Increase their enjoyment of living in the UK

SayIt is designed and developed by our team of language teachers and pronunciation experts, and includes 36,000+ recordings from Oxford. The unique visual interface allows you to interact with the model and your recording, pinpointing difficult areas and improving them quickly.

- Improve professional and Business English skills, for your work or career; feel more confident in meetings and when networking in more advanced English
- Covers 75%+ of the Academic Word List; ideal for university study, preparing for IELTS, TOEFL, Cambridge First (B2), Advanced (C1), or Proficiency (C2)
- Downloaded in over 155 countries, by professionals, students and teachers  

Research shows practising your English pronunciation also improves your:
üí¨ Speaking
üéß Listening
üìö Reading
üñã Writing
‚úÖ Grammar
 
Teachers - your students will love using SayIt! The app is co-designed by teachers and learners. Our objective is to empower learners, demystifying the sound-spelling system in English and making pronunciation improvement accessible for everyone.

Subscribe to SayIt to access to our full range of content - try it FREE with 100 words for 7 days (¬£11.99 p/mth at the end of 7 days, and you can cancel any time before then without charge). Payment will be charged to your Google Play account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the chargeable period. You can check when your subscription will renew in SayIt, or cancel at any time via the Google Play account details on your device. When a subscription is cancelled, access to the app‚Äôs full content will expire at the end of the current payment period.
 
While SayIt offers access to large American and British English word lists - they can take a few minutes to download, depending on your WIFI access.

To read our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service, go to: www.phona.co.uk/privacy-policy
 
We love to connect with teachers as much as our learners! Get in touch or follow us and find out how we can support all your learners -

* Email: info@phona.co.uk 
* Facebook: /sayitpron
* Instagram: /sayit_pronunciation

title: Pronunciation App English
description:
Improve Your English Pronunciation with Our Interactive App!

Unlock the power of confident English speech with Pronunciation App English. Whether you're a language learner, professional, or someone looking to refine your accent, our app offers a comprehensive and engaging learning experience. No internet? No problem! Enhance your pronunciation offline anytime, anywhere.

üó£Ô∏è Key Features:

Offline Pronunciation Learning: Master English pronunciation without needing an internet connection.
Listen and Repeat: Improve your skills by listening to native pronunciations and echoing them.
Foundation of Accurate Pronunciation: Start strong with correct English word pronunciations.
Daily Practice Regimen: Build the right habits with consistent daily practice.
Learn Anywhere, Anytime: Progress daily in your English pronunciation journey.
Multilingual Pronunciation: Change the language and practice pronouncing words in various languages.
Difficult Word List: Access a list of difficult English words and learn how to pronounce them correctly.
üìö Learn and Progress:
Effortlessly improve your English pronunciation with a seamless blend of learning and practice. Transform your speech clarity and confidence. The app provides helpful articles to enhance your learning experience, ensuring you have all the resources needed to perfect your pronunciation.

üåê Perfect for:

Language Learners and Enthusiasts
Professionals Aiming for Clear Communication
Non-Native English Speakers
Students Improving Pronunciation Skills
Anyone Dedicated to Enhancing Verbal Skills
üìà Why Pronunciation App English?
Empower your verbal expression with impeccable pronunciation. Download now to embark on your journey to articulate and confident English speech.

The Pronunciation App English is not just a tool but a comprehensive learning platform. With our app, you can:

Practice Anytime, Anywhere: The offline mode ensures you can practice your pronunciation skills even without an internet connection. Whether you're on a commute or in a remote area, learning is always accessible.
Engage with Native Speakers: Listen to native English speakers and practice your pronunciation by repeating after them. This method ensures you develop an authentic accent and intonation.
Educational Articles: Gain access to a variety of helpful articles that cover different aspects of English pronunciation. Learn tips, tricks, and techniques from language experts.
Difficult Word Examples: Struggle with tricky English words? Our app includes a list of commonly mispronounced words with detailed pronunciation guides to help you master them.
Multilingual Support: Our app supports multiple languages. Switch to your native language and practice pronouncing English words, or use it to learn how to pronounce words in other languages.
Daily Practice and Progress Tracking: Set daily practice goals and track your progress over time. Our app helps you stay motivated and committed to improving your pronunciation skills.
Interactive Learning Tools: Use interactive tools like quizzes and pronunciation games to make learning fun and engaging. Test your knowledge and see how much you've improved.
User-Friendly Interface: Our app is designed to be intuitive and easy to use. Navigate through lessons, practice sessions, and articles with ease.
Community Support: Join a community of learners and get feedback from peers. Share your progress, ask questions, and learn from others' experiences.
Start your journey to better pronunciation today with Pronunciation App English. Our app is designed to cater to all levels, from beginners to advanced learners. Whether you're preparing for an important presentation, aiming to improve your communication skills, or simply want to speak English more confidently, our app has the tools you need to succeed.

Download Pronunciation App English now and take the first step towards perfect pronunciation!

title: Forvo Pronunciation Guide
description: Improve your pronunciation with Forvo! Forvo Pronunciation Guide lets you listen, request and record pronunciations in more than 400 languages. With Forvo, you can search for words and listen to pronunciations recorded by authentic native speakers of the language you require. And it's not just the world's most spoken languages such as English, Spanish, Chinese, Arabic, Russian, French, German, Japanese, or Italian, you can also search for words in Kabyle, Bashkir, Tamil and many, many others. Features: * Search for words and listen to pronunciations from native speakers. * English pronunciations, French pronunciations, German pronunciations, Chinese pronunciations, Spanish pronunciations and hundreds more. * More than 7 million pronunciations available. * Compare different accents for the same word in the same language. * Listen to male or female voices. * Keep track of your recently listened pronunciations. * Works with your forvo.com account. * Record pronunciations in your native language and help fellow learners! * Learn to pronounce properly in more than 450 languages. * Dark mode so your eyes don't get tired. * Follow the pronunciations of those users whose voices you like the most. * Interface available in English, Spanish and French. Forvo also allows you to compare the way a word is pronounced in different accents from the same language. Forvo guarantees that you are always listening to pronunciations by native speakers. You can listen to these pronunciations by both female and male speakers and you can also adapt Forvo to your own requirements. Join the biggest pronunciation network in the world.

title: Pronunroid - IPA pronunciation
description:
‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Pronunroid is an educational game that makes practicing English phonetics more fun! 

It's aimed at practicing IPA (International Phonetics Alphabet) transcription of English words using General American accent. It has four main parts:

* Guess symbol: In this game, you are presented with three words that share a phonetic symbol which you have to guess.

* Guess pronunciation: In this game you are presented with a written word and you have to write the pronunciation for it in IPA.

* Guess spelling: In this game you are presented with the pronunciation of a word in IPA and you have to write the corresponding word. This, in addition to training your pronunciation skills, trains your spelling!

* Look up word: This function looks up the IPA pronunciation of a word.

Pronunroid is aimed at English as second language (ESL) learners. You can check out the symbols used at Wikitionary.

Right now, Pronunroid uses for the games the 2000 most common English words. However, you can try to look up the pronunciation of any word with the search feature. If Wordnik is aware of different pronunciations, you will get them all.

PERMISSIONS

The application requires access to Internet in order to download the pronunciations. It also sends anonymous statistics about its usage.

The external storage permission is needed for moving the app to the SD card.

* Look up word: This function looks up the IPA pronunciation of a word.

Pronunroid is aimed at English as second language (ESL) learners. You can check out the symbols used at Wikitionary.

Right now, Pronunroid uses for the games the 2000 most common English words. However, you can try to look up the pronunciation of any word with the search feature. If Wordnik is aware of different pronunciations, you will get them all.

PERMISSIONS

The application requires access to Internet in order to download the pronunciations. It also sends anonymous statistics about its usage.

The external storage permission is needed for moving the app to the SD card.
summary: Practice IPA transcriptions of American English pronunciation anywhere!

title: English Pronunciation  IPA
description:
Learning English is important from the basics, and phonetic symbols (IPA) are the first knowledge that English learners need to master.

**Key Features:**

- **Comprehensive Phonetic Symbol Learning**: Covers all English phonetic symbols, including short vowels, long vowels, diphthongs, and consonants, helping you fully understand and master English pronunciation.
- **Interactive Learning**: Enhances your learning effectiveness through lively and fun interactive exercises. The app provides rich examples and exercises to ensure that you do not feel bored during the learning process.
- **Phonetic Symbol Comparison**: Unique comparison features for similar phonetic symbols, helping you distinguish common pronunciation errors and improve your pronunciation accuracy.
- **Native Speaker Demonstrations**: Learn correct pronunciation methods step-by-step with demonstrations of standard mouth movements by native speakers, making your pronunciation more natural.
- **Pronunciation Tips Sharing**: Detailed analysis of pronunciation tips, helping you grasp the key points of pronunciation and solve pronunciation problems.
- **Real-time Feedback**: Provides real-time pronunciation scoring and feedback, helping you correct pronunciation errors promptly and continuously improve.
- **Word Pronunciation Details**: Shows the pronunciation details of each word, comparing the pronunciation of each syllable, and learning the correct pronunciation through examples.


**Target Audience:**

- **English Beginners**: Start from scratch, systematically learn English phonetic symbols, and lay a solid foundation for pronunciation.
- **Learners Seeking to Improve Pronunciation**: Correct pronunciation errors and improve pronunciation accuracy and fluency.
- **English Enthusiasts**: Further understand the mysteries of English pronunciation and improve listening and speaking skills in English.

Whether you are a beginner or already have some knowledge of English, our app will be the best partner for your English learning journey. Download now and start your English learning journey!

title: Spell and Pronunciation
description: Introducing the Ultimate Spell and Pronunciation App: Your Personal Language Companion! Are you tired of making spelling mistakes in your emails, documents, or social media posts? Do you struggle with pronouncing certain words correctly? Look no further, as our spell and pronunciation app is here to save the day! With an array of powerful features and user-friendly interface, it's the perfect tool to enhance your language skills. Spell Checker: Never let a misspelled word slip through the cracks again! Our app's advanced spell checker diligently scans your text, underlining potential errors and offering suggestions for corrections. Whether it's a simple typo or a complex word, our comprehensive dictionary ensures accurate spellings every time. Boost your writing confidence and leave no room for embarrassing mistakes. Pronunciation Guide: Speak with confidence and finesse using our app's pronunciation feature. Have you ever encountered a word that left you tongue-tied? Our app provides crystal-clear audio pronunciations for a vast range of words. Simply type in the word or phrase, and listen to the correct pronunciation. Enhance your vocabulary, refine your accent, and impress others with your impeccable speech. Keyword Targeting: Our app is designed to cater to all your spell-checking and pronunciation needs. We understand the importance of accuracy and efficiency when it comes to language. That's why our app integrates keyword targeting, ensuring that it recognizes industry-specific jargon, technical terms, and specialized vocabulary. Whether you're a student, professional, or language enthusiast, our app has you covered. Personalization and Learning: We believe in personalized learning experiences, which is why our app allows you to create custom word lists and bookmarks. Save your frequently misspelled words or challenging pronunciations for quick access and practice. With each use, our app adapts to your language patterns, helping you improve over time. It's like having a personal language tutor right in your pocket! User-Friendly Interface: Navigating our app is a breeze, thanks to its intuitive and user-friendly interface. Whether you're a tech-savvy individual or a beginner, you'll find the app easy to use and aesthetically pleasing. Access spell-checking and pronunciation features with just a few taps, and let the app guide you to language perfection. Download our Spell and Pronunciation App today and unlock a world of language excellence! Perfect your spelling, enhance your pronunciation, and become a confident communicator. Say goodbye to embarrassing mistakes and hello to impeccable language skills. Let our app be your language companion and elevate your linguistic prowess like never before!

title: English Pronunciation
description:
Master your English pronunciation with our cutting-edge app, designed to help you perfect both UK English and US English pronunciations. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, this app provides personalized lessons and feedback to improve your pronunciation skills.

Practice with a wide range of words, phrases, and sentences. Enter your own content and hear it in either UK English or US English. Also practice speaking and our app will help you along the way.

Whether you're preparing for an exam, an interview, or just aiming to enhance your English pronunciation, this app is your ultimate companion.

Explore the nuances between UK English and US English pronunciation, and take your pronunciation skills to the next level. Start your journey to flawless English pronunciation today!

title: BoldVoice - Accent Trainer
description:
GOOGLE PLAY BEST OF 2021

BoldVoice is the top accent training app for English. Learn with videos from expert accent coaches, and record your voice to get instant pronunciation feedback. 10 minutes a day to become a confident English speaker.

> How is BoldVoice different?
BoldVoice is the only accent training app that gives you video lessons from expert accent coaches. They teach and demonstrate the pronunciation skill, before you practice with your own voice. This learning method the best way to master your English pronunciation.

With BoldVoice, you can:
* Train your American accent with video lessons from American accent coaches 
* Master the English pronunciation of sounds, words, and sentences
* Speak English confidently by practicing with our advanced speech AI
* Get tips to become a better public speaker as an ESL professional
* See noticeable improvement in your pronunciation with only 10 minutes of practice a day

> Learn from expert speech coaches
BoldVoice's accent coaches are the best in the industry, helping Hollywood stars master their accents. They will be your guides in your path to clear and confident English pronunciation. With fun, bite-sized video lessons, you will master the sounds, intonation, rhythm, pitch, and all the elements of the American accent.

> Get Immediate Feedback on your Pronunciation
Record your voice, and our advanced speech Artificial Intelligence scores you and gives you personalized feedback. You can listen to yourself, and compare your own voice with the coach‚Äôs recording to refine your pronunciation further.

> Discover your Pronunciation Level
Our Pronunciation Assessment gives you a complete overview of your strengths and areas for improvement. You can clearly see your speech improve.

> Hyper-Personalized Learning
Best of all, BoldVoice personalizes your English pronunciation course to your native language. Your lesson plan will focus on the aspects of American pronunciation that are challenging for speakers of your native language.

> Who is it for?
BoldVoice helps advanced English speakers to speak more confidently and clearly. If you've ever wondered how to learn the American accent, or wanted to improve your English pronunciation overall, you're in the right place. Whether your goal is accent reduction or confident public speaking as a non-native English speaker, BoldVoice can help.

Users from 100+ native languages use BoldVoice to improve their professional performance, better collaborate with coworkers, prepare for job interviews, prepare for job presentations, and study for standardized English tests (like TOEFL, IELTS, and TOEIC).

> Awards and Recognition
BoldVoice is designed by a team of linguists, speech and accent professionals with experience including: Harvard, Yale, Netflix, Marvel, CBS, NBC, Broadway
BoldVoice was selected as a Best App of the Year 2021 by Google
BoldVoice was recognized as a top Education app by Forbes in 2021
BoldVoice was featured on TechCrunch as "the app that helps non-native English speakers find their voice"
