title: Word Pronunciation Spell Check
description:
Word pronouncer & spell corrector application is an outstanding pronounciation app that helps to understand the pronunciation of different words. This Words Pronunciation app is really handy for those people who want to learn how to pronounce words. Just write the word in the text field and this Word Pronouncer will pronounce that word. You can listen to pronunciation in 10 other languages with this language pronunciation. Besides, the Words Pronunciation app contains a spelling correction feature that will identify spelling mistakes. This Word Pronouncer: Spell Check app will help you learn pronunciation and correct spelling.

Word Pronouncer and Spell Check is a simple and easy to use app to check word pronunciation. This English word pronunciation app has both functionality pronunciation checker, spelling check, and spell corrector. Word pronunciation is a lightweight utility app that helps you to learn how to pronounce it right and how to check the correct spelling of words.

Spell Corrector and Word Pronouncer app also provide features like speak and translate, text translator, and bookmarking. Word Pronouncer offers easy to type and speak option in multiple languages. Simply type your text or copied text, and paste it into the text box, click on mic button to hear what you have typed or pasted. Text to Speech contains a lot of amazing features like input text, Copy, Delete, share results, and many more.

It has become easy to extract text from pictures with OCR Scanner. This image to text app gets text from an image by scanning via its OCR recognition feature. The Text Scanner also allows importing pictures from gallery to get text from a picture. This OCR Scanner - Text Scanner can translate text into any language easily. Furthermore, you can share, delete, and copy text easily.

ü§î How to use üîäWord pronouncer with ‚úîÔ∏è Spell Check App‚ùì

üî¥ Open the Word pronouncer and spell checker app.
üî¥ Go to Words Pronunciation
üî¥ write any English word you need to pronounce
üî¥ click on the mic button
üî¥ Words Pronunciation app will pronounce words with a voice loud reader.
üî¥ You can listen to it again to practice how to pronounce words properly.

You can use this English spell check and word pronouncer app on daily basis as practice and it will affect your pronunciation and also works as a spell corrector in the right way. The pronunciation checker app will support you how to pronounce a word and how to check the spelling of words, phrases, sentences, and paragraphs. This word pronunciation: language pronunciation app is a basic and advanced training tool to expand your speaking skills. Simply type your word or sentence and then listen to the pronunciation of that word.

Word pronunciation and spell checker app give speak and translate feature. In voice to text feature just click on mic button and your voice will be converted into audio to text. Speak to translate supports 100+ languages. you can translate your text into any language you need. This speak & translate language (STT) will support different features like copy, share, save and delete your translated text.

Text Translator all languages (TTS) are text input method & it also contains a text copy paste option you can copy this translated text and share it with others. Save your translated translation as bookmark. Listen to translated text with text to speak. Tap on speaker button to listen audio of the text.

üëâ Pronunciation Checker
üëâ Spell Corrector & Spell Checker

Furthermore, this Spell Check app holds a spelling correction feature that helps out in identifying spelling mistakes. So, if you liked this Words Pronunciation app, please let us know in the reviews section. Thanks and have an amazing day ahead!

title: Prononce pronunciation checker
description:
The application allows you to listen, record and compare using speech recognition, as well as by ear, recorded image of speech with the original.

For each lesson, a table of the results of its execution at different points in time can be saved.

Works for most languages, can work offline for some languages.

Allows you to compare both short and long fragments of text (dictation mode).


When compared using speech recognition, it shows the confidence level and possible alternatives.

Can get any text from other Apps that will be sent with share button.

The work is carried out in the lessons, which are divided into separate screens. Lessons can be created, saved, exported, imported and downloaded from the Internet.

Premium mode removes ads and includes No-sleeping  screen ,  Use SD card   and a Dark theme settings.

title: English Pronunciation Trainer
description:
English Pronunciation Trainer - The Sounds of British English

‚óè There is a system of symbols for writing the sounds of English. We have a guide to these symbols and also videos to show how to pronounce each of the sounds.

‚óè Pronunciation is very difficult to correct if you have been speaking English for a long time. As you know, practice does not make perfect, it makes permanent. That means if you practice incorrectly, it will become permanent. You need to correct this problem before moving forward because having bad pronunciation is one of the most difficult aspects of speaking to someone who does not speak English well. 

‚óè The pronunciation lessons provided here are American English pronunciation and will provide you with an explanation, instruction, and audio files to help you pronounce sounds correctly. If you don't have access to a native speaker to give you feedback, I encourage you to record and listen to yourself. Although it might be tedious, you'll be surprised at how helpful this actually is.

The App have: 
- Videos teaching you speak the sounds of English
- Conversations for practice English Listening skill.
- English Grammar have supported.
- Many lessons for learner improve English Vocabulary skill.

title: AnkiDroid Flashcards
description:
Memorize anything with AnkiDroid!

AnkiDroid lets you learn flashcards very efficiently by showing them just before you would forget. It is fully compatible with the spaced repetition software Anki (including synchronization), which is available for Windows/Mac/Linux/ChromeOS/iOS.

Study all sorts of things wherever and whenever you want. Make good use of idle times on bus trips, in supermarket queues or any other waiting situation!

Create your own flashcard decks or download free decks compiled for many languages and topics (thousands available).

Add material through the desktop application Anki or directly through Ankidroid. The application even supports adding material automatically from a dictionary!

Need support? https://docs.ankidroid.org/help.html (much preferred over comments in reviews here :-) )

‚òÖ Key features:
‚Ä¢ supported flashcard contents: text, images, sounds, mathjax
‚Ä¢ spaced repetition (supermemo 2 algorithm)
‚Ä¢ text-to-speech integration
‚Ä¢ thousands of premade decks
‚Ä¢ progress widget
‚Ä¢ detailed statistics
‚Ä¢ syncing with AnkiWeb
‚Ä¢ open source

‚òÖ Additional features:
‚Ä¢ write answers (optional)
‚Ä¢ whiteboard
‚Ä¢ card editor/adder
‚Ä¢ card browser
‚Ä¢ tablet layout
‚Ä¢ import existing collection files (via Anki Desktop)
‚Ä¢ add cards by intent from other applications like dictionaries
‚Ä¢ custom font support
‚Ä¢ full backup system
‚Ä¢ navigation by swipe, tap, shake
‚Ä¢ fully customisable
‚Ä¢ dynamic deck handling
‚Ä¢ dark mode
‚Ä¢ 100+ localisations!
‚Ä¢ All previous AnkiDroid versions can be downloaded from the website
descriptionHTML:
Memorize anything with AnkiDroid!

AnkiDroid lets you learn flashcards very efficiently by showing them just before you would forget. It is fully compatible with the spaced repetition software Anki (including synchronization), which is available for Windows/Mac/Linux/ChromeOS/iOS.

Study all sorts of things wherever and whenever you want. Make good use of idle times on bus trips, in supermarket queues or any other waiting situation!

Create your own flashcard decks or download free decks compiled for many languages and topics (thousands available).

Add material through the desktop application Anki or directly through Ankidroid. The application even supports adding material automatically from a dictionary!

Need support? https://docs.ankidroid.org/help.html (much preferred over comments in reviews here :-) )

‚òÖ Key features:
‚Ä¢ supported flashcard contents: text, images, sounds, mathjax
‚Ä¢ spaced repetition (supermemo 2 algorithm)
‚Ä¢ text-to-speech integration
‚Ä¢ thousands of premade decks
‚Ä¢ progress widget
‚Ä¢ detailed statistics
‚Ä¢ syncing with AnkiWeb
‚Ä¢ open source

‚òÖ Additional features:
‚Ä¢ write answers (optional)
‚Ä¢ whiteboard
‚Ä¢ card editor/adder
‚Ä¢ card browser
‚Ä¢ tablet layout
‚Ä¢ import existing collection files (via Anki Desktop)
‚Ä¢ add cards by intent from other applications like dictionaries
‚Ä¢ custom font support
‚Ä¢ full backup system
‚Ä¢ navigation by swipe, tap, shake
‚Ä¢ fully customisable
‚Ä¢ dynamic deck handling
‚Ä¢ dark mode
‚Ä¢ 100+ localisations!
‚Ä¢ All previous AnkiDroid versions can be downloaded from the website
summary: Memorize anything efficiently with AnkiDroid! Many pre-built decks available.

title: Quizlet: More than Flashcards
description:
Quizlet gives you study tools that teach you ‚Äî not just tell you the answer ‚Äî so you can walk into every test with confidence.

Your personalized feed recommends exactly what to study next, powered by your courses, your school and what students like you are studying now. Jump in faster with Study Bites: bite‚Äësized suggestions, progress updates and content tailored to your learning goals.

Turn your notes into study materials
* Turn class notes into practice tests, study guides and flashcards so you can review your material in the way that works best for you
 * Create flashcards from scratch or let AI generate a deck from your study materials

Flashcards that fit your routine
* Discover millions of flashcard sets created by students and teachers
* Sort cards into Know and Still learning to track progress
* Save decks for offline access and study anywhere

Practice that adapts to you
* Turn any flashcard set into practice questions to reinforce knowledge
* Study with multiple choice, true/false and written questions
* Quizlet adapts based on what you know and what needs more work
* Seamlessly pick up where you left off across all your devices

Exam‚Äëready tests
* Simulate test day with a personalized practice test generated from any flashcard set
* Customize the number of questions and formats to challenge yourself in different ways
* Get instant scoring and feedback to spot gaps and build confidence

Homework help when you need it
* Expert‚Äëauthored, step‚Äëby‚Äëstep solutions to tough homework problems
* Check your work in challenging subjects like Calculus, Chemistry and Electrical Engineering
* Use AI‚Äëpowered support to unpack each step or explore alternative approaches

Study together
* Collaborate with classmates by matching strengths and weaknesses
* Share decks, get help on tough topics and master material faster

Quizlet is the all-in-one study tool for language learning, vocabulary and test prep.

Quizlet Plus subscriptions will be charged to your Google account. Your monthly or annual subscription automatically renews unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscriptions in your Account Settings after purchase. Some features may not be available in your country or region.

Terms of Service: https://quizlet.com/tos
Privacy Policy: https://quizlet.com/privacy

title: Brainscape: Smarter Flashcards
description: Delete your old flashcard apps! Brainscape has the SMARTEST AI-powered flashcard maker, the BEST marketplace of expert flashcards, and the MOST EFFECTIVE spaced repetition study algorithm on the planet. How does it work? Brainscape‚Äôs intelligent study system has been designed in accordance with decades of proven cognitive science to help you learn faster and remember longer than with any other flashcard app. (And we don‚Äôt waste time on games. Our flashcards are for serious learners.) Brainscape distills any subject down into bite-sized facts (neatly organized into decks and classes), which are posed as question-and-answer pairs, compelling you to actively recall information from scratch. You then rate how well you know each concept on a scale of 1 to 5, and Brainscape determines the perfect time interval at which to repeat that flashcard again. If you know the answer well, you‚Äôll see that flashcard less often; if you don‚Äôt know it well, you‚Äôll see it again and again, at frequent intervals, until it‚Äôs deeply ingrained into your brain. And it‚Äôs this totally unique combination of active recall, self-assessment (metacognition), and spaced repetition that is scientifically proven to significantly slash your required study time! Where do all of Brainscape‚Äôs awesome flashcards come from? Three places: THE WORLD‚ÄôS TOP EXPERTS. Brainscape partners with top publishers, schools, and educators to create comprehensive collections of certified flashcards for a diverse array of subjects, from foreign languages (we are the best language-learning tool in the world) to high-stakes exams like the AP series, MBE (bar exam), Series 7, NCLEX, MCAT, and more. YOUR PEERS. Top students, professors, teachers, tutorpreneurs, and businesses around the world have created over 1 million subjects that are available to search on Brainscape‚Äôs Knowledge Genome. YOU! You can easily create and organize thousands of multimedia flashcards featuring text, images, and even audio files, both on Brainscape‚Äôs website AND within the app itself. You can also share your decks with your classmates and collaboratively develop content together. How much does it cost? Creating and sharing great text flashcards is FREE. (Woohoo! And sorry, we do have to charge for image creation for security reasons.) And for unlimited access to ALL of Brainscape's user-generated and premium, expert-curated content, as well as optional features, like bookmarks and card reversibility--or to me your content private, you can upgrade to Pro for $19.99 (monthly), $59.99 (every 6 months), or $95.99 (annually). Alternatively, you can unlock a LIFETIME of learning with Brainscape for a one-time cost of only $199.99 American dolla billz. The fine print: The 3 recurring subscriptions (monthly, semiannual, and annual) will renew automatically within 24 hours before the end of the current period, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the period. You can cancel auto-renewal any time by going to Account Settings, and the cancellation will apply after the active subscription period is complete. Go ahead and learn more about our Terms and Privacy Policy at brainscape.com/terms. What‚Äôs on the horizon? It‚Äôs our vision to empower everyone, everywhere to rise to the challenge of personalized forever-learning. And for this reason, we love hearing from our user community: it‚Äôs through your feedback that we can continue to innovate our platform to be more convenient, efficient, and even fun and social to use!

title: Noji: Study with Flashcards
description:
Noji - is the flashcards app that based on an enhanced spaced repetition algorithm and allows you to increase vocabulary in learning languages, prepare for exams and study new materials. Noji app could be an effective study helper tool and avoid managing physical note cards by using digital index cards.
You can get all the benefits from our app:

- Study with cards: create, customize and share your own flashcard decks or download over 50000 of decks compiled for learning languages and different topics.
- Spaced repetition: In our app you create flash cards and the in-built algorithm manages everything else. It understands what piece of information you are about to forget and shows you the very index cards right on time and helps you to memorize it.
- Share decks: share any of your sets with your friends, schoolmates or language learners just like you.
- Study modes: Use different review modes to keep you engaged while studying, which includes: writing review, multiple answers, audio player, and the good old review.
- Learning Languages: It helps you with improving your language learning and increasing or building up your vocabulary. Study English, Spanish, German, Kanji, Chinese, Russian, Hindi, Portuguese and more.
You‚Äôll feel all the power of spaced repetition method with our flashcard app, if you are:
- Students - download the app on your device and be a part of the thousands of students who succeed with preparing for exams and learning languages.
- Teachers - make your database of knowledge using cards and share them with your students.
- Language learners - flashcards are the best way to increase vocabulary and learn languages on the go. You can find a hundred pre-made decks with different languages, or upload and create your own and share them with language learners just like you.

Our app interface is simple and clear but the same it is extremely powerful in learning languages, preparing for exams and it could become a real study helper tool for you. It helps you manage thousands of flashcards without wasting time on their management. You can create index cards on mobile phones and tablets. Also we have Portuguese localization, German localization, French localization, Spanish localization and Chinese localization.
Join our community of thousands of students around the world who succeed with spaced repetition method of study. We also love getting personalized feedback, so don't be shy to message us right in the app! We personally answer all messages.
Get the Noji app and master flashcards on the go.

title: Flashcard maker
description:
Features

- Quickly create cards with easy operation
Easy to use and made with a thorough focus on ease of use. Quickly create cards.

- Customize it to fit your needs
You can customize it to suit yourself by displaying only the cards you have difficulty with or rearranging them in any order you like. You can also search for words, copy cards, and more.

- Speech-reading function
Text-to-speech reading of cards is supported. The cards can be read out loud, not only in English, but also in several other languages, making it ideal for listening comprehension. The cards can also be played back repeatedly, making it useful in a variety of situations, such as listening while on the move. The reading speed can also be adjusted, so if you have difficulty understanding the text, you can slow down the speed of the reading.

- Support for attaching images and sounds
Images and sounds can be attached to the card. You can launch the camera or voice recorder from within the app and quickly attach them to the card.

- Test mode
A test mode with four choices is provided to play with the flashcards you have created. The test mode is a fun way to learn through audio and animations. You can freely set the scope of the test, for example, to test only the cards you have difficulty with.

- Edit flashcards on PC
CSV file output and import are supported. You can output a template from the application and import it to your PC to register cards at once using your PC.

- Share created flashcards with friends
The app is equipped with a function for outputting flashcards, allowing you to easily share card data.

- Study only the cards you are weak in
You can set the memorization level for each card. You can also display and test only the cards you have difficulty with.

- Beautiful App Design
We aimed to create an app with a beautiful and sophisticated design that makes you want to touch it.

title: AlgoApp Flashcards
description:
Ranked #1 Education app in multiple countries world-wide. Featured in the New York Times.

Learning Chinese characters? Kanji? Medicine? Another subject with lots to memorize? With that much to learn, you need the right flashcard app, to get the most from your study time.

That's why AlgoApp uses an improved form of Spaced Repetition (SRS), built with Artificial Intelligence (AI), to maximize the amount of learning you get done in each study session. When you go to study, the AI chooses which flashcards you need to work on, based on a detailed analysis of your progress. It's like a coach, for your brain.

Make your own flashcards, styled how you like. AlgoApp lets you use colors, bulleted lists, and more. Or search through millions of flashcards that are ready for you to download. Your choice.

You get all this power, wrapped in a simple, polished app.

SIMPLE
  ‚Ä¢ Easy to add cards directly from the mobile app
  ‚Ä¢ Format your cards using colored text, bulleted lists, underlines, and more, all without knowing CSS
  ‚Ä¢ Flip your decks to study back-to-front, with a couple taps
  ‚Ä¢ Syncs automatically with desktop, web app, and your other phones and tablets
  ‚Ä¢ Create decks on the go
  ‚Ä¢ Make cards using photos from your camera
  ‚Ä¢ Share any deck with a friend by putting in their email

POWERFUL
  ‚Ä¢ Fully-featured‚Äî-NOT a "companion" app that requires a computer
  ‚Ä¢ Detailed stats on each of your decks, and individual cards too
  ‚Ä¢ For advanced formatting, supports HTML and CSS
  ‚Ä¢ Text-to-speech (TTS) that reads parts of your cards in English or other languages
  ‚Ä¢ Automatic translation
  ‚Ä¢ Automatic furigana generation annotation for Japanese kanji
  ‚Ä¢ Study offline, and your new cards and progress sync when you're back online

USER-FRIENDLY
  ‚Ä¢ Dashboard that shows your overall progress
  ‚Ä¢ Study at any time; doesn't force you to study cards on a rigid schedule
  ‚Ä¢ Study your recent decks from the Dashboard in just 2 taps
  ‚Ä¢ "Night Mode" that's easy on your eyeballs when studying in the dark
  ‚Ä¢ Settings sync across all your devices

title: ABC Flash Cards - Sight Words
description:
ABC Flash Cards - Sight Words is a dynamic educational app designed to foster early literacy and numeracy skills in young children, helping parents provide effective early learning tools at home. This app combines colorful ABC Flash Cards and interactive Sight Words flash cards with engaging Math Flash Cards, creating a complete package to build foundational language and math skills. Developed specifically for young children ages 2-6, ABC Flash Cards - Sight Words offers an intuitive and fun learning experience to support early vocabulary, reading comprehension, and numerical understanding.

Key Features
ABC Flash Cards with Vivid Illustrations
Introduce the alphabet with clear, vibrant flash cards. Each letter card is paired with a charming illustration and audio pronunciation, making it ideal for children‚Äôs first steps in language learning. Kids can recognize letters, associate them with sounds, and gain familiarity with essential phonics.

Sight Words Flash Cards
Build vocabulary skills with a comprehensive selection of sight words, perfect for early reading practice. The app covers basic and 2nd-grade sight words, encouraging young readers to identify words by sight rather than decoding them one letter at a time. This key skill is essential for fluent reading and comprehension.

Math Flash Cards for Numerical Literacy
Lay the groundwork for math skills with number flash cards and basic math concepts. Children can begin counting, recognizing numbers, and exploring early arithmetic in a gentle, age-appropriate way, helping them develop confidence in numbers.

Interactive Learning Games
Keep children engaged with interactive games designed to make learning enjoyable. These games reinforce the concepts presented in the flash cards, allowing kids to practice ABCs, sight words, and numbers in an immersive way. It‚Äôs learning through play!

Progress Tracking
Track your child‚Äôs learning journey with built-in progress tracking tools. Parents can monitor the words and numbers their child has mastered, encouraging a structured and goal-oriented approach to early education. This feature helps maintain steady progress, making it easy to celebrate milestones.

Made for Kids, Trusted by Parents
ABC Flash Cards - Sight Words is designed for young children but is equally appealing to parents. The user-friendly interface is simple for little hands to navigate, while eye-catching illustrations and audio enhance every interaction, making it enjoyable for kids to return to their favorite flash cards and games. The app is a valuable resource for parents seeking free, high-quality educational tools that focus on early literacy and numeracy. With elements like Flashcards for Kids, ABC Flash Cards Free, and Math Flash Cards, the app effectively brings essential educational resources to families.

Why Choose ABC Flash Cards - Sight Words?
ABC Flash Cards - Sight Words provides a focused, interactive learning experience that combines visual, auditory, and hands-on activities to reinforce early literacy and math skills. As children explore Alphabet Flash Cards, Sight Words, and Math Flash Cards, they build a solid foundation that supports vocabulary development, reading skills, and an introduction to numerical literacy. Whether used for daily learning or occasional practice, it‚Äôs a tool that grows with your child‚Äôs educational needs.

Perfect for families in the US, UK, Canada, and Australia, this app is a trusted companion for children starting their learning journey, offering a safe and inspiring environment to learn and grow. Start enhancing your child‚Äôs reading and math skills today with ABC Flash Cards - Sight Words!

title: Vocably: Language Flashcards
description:
Vocably is created for people who use a foreign language in everyday life and want to become fluent.

If you're still learning the basics and not ready to use your new language in real life, Vocably isn't for you yet. You can try another app for now, and come back when you're ready to start using your language in real situations. Vocably will be here to help you translate, save, and learn the words you encounter in daily life.

What you can do with Vocably:

- Hear or see a word in real life: translate with the mobile app ‚Üí save ‚Üí learn
- Need to say something but don‚Äôt know the word? Search in your native language ‚Üí save ‚Üí learn
- Spot a new word on any website or email: select ‚Üí click ‚†á-> Translate with Vocably ‚Üí save ‚Üí learn
- Vocably also comes as a browser extension for your computer

Most of the flashcards created with Vocably will automatically contain:

- Part of speech
- Gender (when applicable)
- IPA / transcription
- Audio pronunciation
- Translations
- Definitions
- Usage examples

Study your flashcards with the Spaced Repetition System (SRS) - a proven method for effective study and retention of large amounts of information.

Mastering a language means using it and remembering every word. That's what Vocably is for.

title: Speaky - Language Exchange
description:
Ready to speak a new language the real way?

Speaky connects you with native speakers from 195 countries, helping you learn how the language is actually spoken‚Äînaturally and authentically.

Build real connections, make new friends, and dive into meaningful conversations.
With more than 170 languages to choose from, there‚Äôs always someone to practice with.

Learning with Speaky isn‚Äôt just about vocabulary‚Äîit‚Äôs about culture. Every conversation opens the door to new perspectives and real-world expressions.

You share your language, your partner shares theirs. It‚Äôs a two-way exchange that‚Äôs fun, intuitive, and truly rewarding.

Explore local slang, customs, and ways of thinking. Because with Speaky, you don‚Äôt just learn a language‚Äîyou experience it.

üó£ Interactive Tests:
Challenge yourself with speech tests to evaluate your pronunciation progress in the languages you are studying. Konushkan guides you through custom exercises for effective learning.

üí¨ Engage in a Global Language Exchange:
Connect with other students from around the globe and practice Spanish, English, Portuguese, and many other languages through our language learning app! Chat with native speakers, make friends, and enhance your conversational skills and your pronunciation.

Engage in dynamic conversations with AI, honing your proficiency in a fun and interactive way. The intuitive app interface makes it easy to navigate through various languages and learn at your own pace. Learn Spanish, Portuguese, English, Turkish, Chinese, Japanese, German, French, and many more: we've got the resources you need to become fluent in no time!

üìà Track your Progress:

Ready to embark on a linguistic adventure? Download Konushkan, your language learning app, and start learning languages thanks to our AI-powered precision and global connections!

title: HiNative - Language Learning
description: Over 6.4 Million Users Worldwide!! Have you ever wondered how to say "I love you" in another language? Find out on HiNative! Ask any questions about English, Korean, Japanese, Spanish, French, Chinese, Russian, Arabic, Portuguese, German, Italian, and over a hundred other languages and dialects. Get answers to your questions from native speakers in a matter of minutes. Spread the language learning love by helping other users learn your native language. Welcome to the friendliest, most helpful language learning community in the world, where you can ask whatever you want. The #1 online language learning app for language learners. Over 5.4 million registered users worldwide. Google Play's Best of 2019 Features Audio Uploads - Want to check your pronunciation? Curious about a certain area‚Äôs accent? Need some handy phrases for your upcoming trip abroad? Just record your questions and ask. Let the world hear you! Correction Function - Have your writing corrected by native speakers!When you post in your target language, native speakers will show you natural ways to say what you want to say. You can receive corrections to your messages with friends, work emails, journal entries, speeches, etc. Search Function - Use the search function to find questions containing your search word and have the word translated by Google Translate at the same time. Instantly search through the 14,000,000 (and counting) questions posted on HiNative to find the answer you are looking for. Question Formats - Asking questions made simple. All you need to know are the words, phrases, or sentences that you need help with, and HiNative question formats will do the rest. We automatically translate your questions into other users‚Äô native languages. Learn how to speak a language without knowing how to speak it in the first place! Pictures - Not sure how to write something? No problem! Sometimes a picture is better than words. Upload images of signs, menus, labels, and even that rad Chinese character you‚Äôre considering getting a tattoo of. Just snap a picture and ask away! Ask About Countries & Cultures - Traveling soon? Moving abroad? Ask natives the important questions that only locals can answer. Get information about local customs, famous landmarks, the cheapest (but tastiest) restaurants, or even opinions on current events. You can also ask questions which are not on a dictionary or translator! Over 110 Languages to Learn - You can ask about English (US), Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Spain), French (France), Simplified Chinese (China), Russian, Arabic, Spanish (Mexico), Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Traditional Chinese (Taiwan), German, Italian, Dutch, Swedish, Thai, Ukrainian, Turkish, Vietnamese, English (UK), Spanish (Columbia), Polish, Norwegian, Indonesian, Malaysian, Klingon, and many more! Unlike a dictionary, web search, or translation software, HiNative provides you with customized example sentences, responses to your follow-up questions, and tips to improve your pronunciation. Ask about vocabulary, how to write and speak, pronunciation, grammar, and get great tips from native speakers. You can even practice your listening comprehension! HiNative brings the entire world to your fingertips, wherever you are. It‚Äôs never been this easy to connect, help, and learn. Try HiNative today and change the way you study languages for the better. ====== HiNative is run by the creators of Lang-8, one of the most popular language learning sites on the web, with over a million users worldwide. ====== Please send feedback and comments to: support@hinative.com Use HiNative on the Web at: https://hinative.com/ Come say Hi on: Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/hinative/ X - https://x.com/HiNativeEN

Unlike a dictionary, web search, or translation software, HiNative provides you with customized example sentences, responses to your follow-up questions, and tips to improve your pronunciation. HiNative brings the entire world to your fingertips, wherever you are. It‚Äôs never been this easy to connect, help, and learn. Try HiNative today and change the way you study languages for the better.

HiNative is run by the creators of Lang-8, one of the most popular language learning sites on the web, with over a million users worldwide.

title: SewaYou: Japanese Friends Chat
description:
SewaYou is a location-based app to make new friends and connect with people around the world. Whether you want to chat with people nearby, make international friends, or meet new people globally, SewaYou helps you connect.

FIND CONNECTIONS AND JOIN A GLOBAL COMMUNITY:
‚Ä¢ Find and make new friends online or nearby
‚Ä¢ Meet people offline and share experiences over coffee
‚Ä¢ Connect with people interested in friendship locally or globally
‚Ä¢ Build meaningful connections across cultures
‚Ä¢ Learn about other cultures through real conversations

FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Use an interactive map to find people anywhere in the world
‚Ä¢ Get suggestions for places to meet up in person
‚Ä¢ Chat online with people who are far away
‚Ä¢ Share your interests and hobbies
‚Ä¢ Make a profile showing what you're interested in
‚Ä¢ Search for people with similar interests
‚Ä¢ Share posts in the feed (Space) about culture, travel experiences, and life stories

EASY-TO-USE COMMUNICATION TOOLS:
‚Ä¢ Chat with built-in translation to break language barriers
‚Ä¢ Voice and video calls to connect better
‚Ä¢ Online chat anytime you want
‚Ä¢ Express yourself through photos and media sharing

SAFE AND FOCUSED PLACE TO CONNECT:
‚Ä¢ "Same Gender Mode" and "No Romance" options for comfortable chats
‚Ä¢ Focused on genuine friendships, not dating
‚Ä¢ Automatic detection and banning of scammers to keep you safe
‚Ä¢ Clear rules to keep everyone respectful and positive

PERFECT FOR PEOPLE WHO WANT TO:
‚Ä¢ Meet new people with similar interests
‚Ä¢ Find friends from different cultures
‚Ä¢ Make global connections and learn about other ways of life
‚Ä¢ Find someone to chat with regularly
‚Ä¢ Meet new people and turn strangers into friends

WHY CHOOSE SewaYou:
‚Ä¢ Made in Tokyo with a diverse global community
‚Ä¢ Works as a friend-making app and chat app all in one
‚Ä¢ Not a dating app: just explore and chat with people
‚Ä¢ Modern social features for meaningful connections
‚Ä¢ Perfect for people who want to expand their social circle globally

Start making connections today! Download SewaYou to chat, meet, and connect with people around the world. Whether you want to chat online, meet in person, or just talk with new people, SewaYou can help.

Don't miss this chance to make meaningful connections and discover new perspectives around the world. SewaYou isn't just an app - it's your way to meet new people, discover different cultures, and build lasting friendships.

Terms of Service: https://www.sewayou.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.sewayou.com/privacy

Got a question? Contact us on support@sewayou.com or talk to us directly on the app! 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sewayou
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@sewayou

title: Talksy ‚Äì AI Language Learning
description:
Talksy APP is your all-in-one AI language learning assistant, supporting 22 global languages.
Whether you‚Äôre a complete beginner, preparing for exams, studying abroad, traveling, or working, Talksy makes learning more effective, engaging, and personalized.

„Äê22 Languages„Äë
 Covers popular languages such as English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, and Arabic, plus smaller ones like Norwegian, Swedish, and Persian‚Äîall in one app.
„ÄêAI Conversation Practice„Äë
 Practice speaking as if chatting with a friend. AI guides your conversations, corrects your grammar and pronunciation, and suggests natural expressions. Talk about travel, work, or everyday topics‚Äîno fear of mistakes, no awkward silence, just smoother conversations.
„ÄêGamified Vocabulary„Äë
Spelling, matching, multiple choice, and fill-in-the-blank‚Äîvaried game-like exercises make vocabulary learning fun. With spaced repetition, words stick better and learning becomes more efficient.
„ÄêReal-Life Audio Courses„Äë
Learn with audio lessons covering daily life, travel, business, and exam preparation. Listen and practice at the same time to improve both your listening and speaking skills.
„ÄêAI Grammar Correction„Äë
AI instantly detects and corrects grammar mistakes, explains the issues, and provides more natural alternatives‚Äîmaking writing and messaging smoother and more confident.
„ÄêMicro-Learning„Äë
Just 10‚Äì15 minutes a day. Turn commute, breaks, or waiting time into productive study sessions anytime, anywhere.
„ÄêAll-Round Progress„Äë
Covers listening, speaking, reading, and writing: AI conversations, pronunciation evaluation, gamified vocabulary, real-life audio practice, and grammar correction‚Äîhelping you improve in every area.

Contact us: support@talksy.ai

Privacy Policy: https://legal.talksy.ai/privacy-policy?lang=en
Terms of Service: https://legal.talksy.ai/terms-of-service?lang=en

title: Make Japanese Friends‚àíLangmate
description:
Embark on a Journey of Language, Culture, and Friendship with Make Japanese Friends‚ÄìLangmate

Immerse yourself in the vibrant world of Japanese culture and connect with locals from the Japan! Langmate is your gateway to a world of language exchange, cultural exploration, and lifelong friendships.

Over 3 million downloads! More than 20 million total messages per year More than 2.5 million total matches per year Ranked in the TOP 10 in more than 80 countries (Education category) Cultural exchange matching app Made in Japan!
Create your profile now and start making friends!

KEY FEATURES
* Improve your language skills by talking with real local people around the world directly from your phone!
* Search, swipe, and start making Japanese friends!
* Enjoy the Advanced Filters to find people who match your interests more precisely.
* A huge Japanese community: More than 65% of Langmate users are Japanese!
* Learn new cultures by asking locals anything you want to know!
* Change your virtual location to see only locals from your favorite places.
* 92% of users match within one hour!
* See user profiles, including pictures, tags, language interests and skills, nationality, and place of residence.
* Perfect your pronunciation by chatting with native speakers using voice and video messages!
* Practice your writing with the drawing tool in chat to exchange handwriting and improve your kanji and kana skills. (But you can also send cute drawings if you prefer üòâ)
* Make friends before your next trip to Japan!

FUNCTIONALITIES
* PROFILE FILTERS: Filter user profiles by age, nationality, gender, country or city of residence, learning and speaking languages.
* SWIPE AND MATCH: Send friend requests to other users. A match happens when two users send friend requests to each other.
* LOCAL PEOPLE: Change your virtual location to see only local people from your chosen place.
* AROUND ME: See all the users around your location.
* REWIND: If you accidentally pass on someone, you can swipe back and undo a swipe.
* FRIEND REQUESTS LIST: See all the people who sent you a friend request.
* BOOST: Be on top of the list for one hour and get more views and matches! (In-App Purchase).
* FREE AND BONUS SMILES: Get free Smiles by logging in every day or by watching video ads.
* RATING: The Star Rating helps you recognize popular users. Rate and be rated after exchanging your first few messages. Users rated 4 and 5 stars will receive bonus Smiles. And more!
*Premium features may require a one-time purchase or a subscription.

SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION
* If you choose to purchase a subscription, payment will be charged to your Google Play account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period.
* Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the Google Play store after purchase.
* You can cancel your subscription at any time. Note that no cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.
* Deleting your Langmate account or the Langmate app from your device does not terminate or cancel your subscription.

SAFETY AND SECURITY
* If you log in and create your account using your social account, your social network access will only be used for logging into Langmate. We will never post anything on your behalf, and your friends and followers won‚Äôt be informed that you are using Langmate.
* You can delete your account anytime.
* Your personal information will never be used for purposes other than the Langmate services.
* Any inappropriate usage will be moderated, and the offending user may be reported or banned.

* Visit www.langmate.jp to see our FAQ or read about our future plans.
Terms of Service: https://www.langmate.jp/terms-of-service/ Privacy Policy: https://www.langmate.jp/privacy-policy/

With Holo Speak, you can practice your English conversation skills anywhere, anytime, and with real people. title: Idyoma: Language Exchange
description:
Language conversation and exchange made easy with Idyoma! Connect with native speakers for real language learning, chat in English, and practice French, Korean, and more. Idyoma is a language exchange app that brings learners together, making it easy to chat in English and other languages while building skills through real conversations and English conversation practice.

Are you a linguist passionate about learning languages such as English, Spanish, French, Italian, or Japanese?

Idyoma is a language learning app that connects language learners nearby to practice with native speakers. Instead of dealing with boring language translators, this app makes üá´üá∑French learning, üáØüáµJapanese learning, üá©üá™German language learning more fun and interactive by involving your friends and the people around you. 

Isn‚Äôt that cool? üòé 

You will learn a new languages from native speakers through conversation exchange and expand your circle of friends while doing so.

Click on their photo to view their profile.

Check their distance.
See any mutual friends.
Click "Send message" button to start chatting.
Translate any text to better understand your new friend.
Organize a meetup.


FEATURES

title: Moji - Global Friends Chat
description:
Chat with Korean friends, meet new people globally, and explore language exchange with Moji. 
Make international connections, learn languages, and discover new cultures.

Moji is a FREE global chat app to meet Korean friends, build international connections, improve your language skills, and find new relationships. 
Enjoy real-time voice chat and video calls with people worldwide, whether you‚Äôre chatting with new friends or exploring international dating.

 Meet Korean Friends & Explore Global Connections
Looking to connect with Korean friends or meet people from around the world? Moji helps you find global friends from countries like Korea, Japan, Brazil, Spain, and beyond. You can easily connect with people from all walks of life, whether you're into K-pop, Korean culture, or just want to practice speaking Korean. Moji helps you create lasting relationships, explore new cultures, and find the best platform for Korean dating, language exchange, and international friendships.

Language Exchange & Learning
Want to learn Korean, Japanese, Spanish, or any other language? Moji allows you to engage in language exchange with native speakers. With AI translation support, chatting with people from different cultures becomes easier, helping you build your language skills while forming real friendships. Whether you‚Äôre practicing your Korean, improving your English, or mastering Spanish, Moji offers an immersive and fun way to learn and practice languages.

International Dating & Friendship
Interested in international dating? Moji is the perfect app to explore Korean dating, meet Japanese singles, or find global friends. Whether you're seeking friendship, a casual conversation, or even something more serious, Moji supports all vibes, from platonic friendships to dating. Moji makes it easy to connect with international friends, explore new cultures, and discover global relationships.

Global Friend Network
At its core, Moji is a global friendship platform. It connects you with people from all over the world, allowing you to create a global friend network. Whether you're looking to chat with Koreans, meet Asian friends, or simply broaden your social circle, Moji helps you build meaningful connections with like-minded individuals. Our platform lets you connect with users from different cultures, helping you grow your global network while making friends internationally.

Top Features of Moji
- Chat with global friends for free: Use messaging, voice chat or video calls. It's up to you!
- Vibe Matching: Choose your vibe (dating, learning, or friendship) to meet people who share your interests
- AI Icebreakers: Let AI suggest fun conversation starters for easy engagement
- Real-Time Map: Track your friends' locations around the world
- AI Characters: Interact with AI-powered characters for fun conversations or language practice

Join the Global Chat Revolution
Moji is quickly becoming a top app in 2025 for connecting with global friends, learning languages, and exploring international dating. Whether you're looking to make friends in Asia, chat with Korean speakers, or meet new friends globally, Moji provides the ultimate platform to expand your social circle.

So what are you waiting for? Join the thousands of users online now and start making new friends today!

title: Bilingual Books for Kids
description:
Unuhi provides dual language eBooks, recommended for children aged 3 to 8+ years old. Try your first book for free! Then, enjoy 30% off with our special bundle offer for a limited time only. Introduce your child to a second language today!

Languages / Audio options

Languages currently available: English, Spanish, Arabic, Danish, Dutch, Filipino, Finnish, French, German, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Mandarin, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (European), Romanian, Russian, Swedish, and Thai. More languages to come soon! Professional audio narration is available in English, Spanish, French, German, Italian and Mandarin, with more languages to follow. Just tap on the text to hear it spoken by a native speaker. The audio quality is excellent and will help you with your pronunciation! One of the books in our collection has wonderful sound effects to entertain your child; parents can also disable the audio if preferred.

Content

Our multilingual story book app currently contains 6 beautifully illustrated kids‚Äô stories, and 4 sets of unique flashcards with the text displayed in two languages, with more to come very soon! 20 major languages are supported so you can select any combination of these and create your own dual language eBook to suit your needs. This ground-breaking app, the only one of its kind, is a great resource for parents and teachers of young children. No monthly subscription needed!

Easy to use and perfect for travelling

‚Ä¢ Simply download the app ‚Ä¢ Select your two languages ‚Ä¢ Start reading! Once the stories are downloaded to your device you can read them anywhere. No internet connection is required: perfect for the holiday flight or being away with your children. Our digital bilingual picture books are fun, multicultural and something that parents and children will love reading together. <2>Language display options Our bilingual or dual language eBook app displays one language at the top of the screen and the other at the bottom. You can change languages at any time, or remove one language if you prefer to use the app as a normal single language book reader. You can even remove both languages and go wordless! Wordless picture books are a fun way to promote creativity and imagination. You can enjoy our illustrations, talk about what you see and even create your own story.

Benefits of bilingualism

At Unuhi we are passionate about language learning, cultural learning, and multilingualism. Educational studies show that reading stories for language learning provides great results and bilingual books build vocabulary and understanding in both languages. Learning two languages early on in life makes it easier to learn more languages later on.

We‚Äôd love your feedback!

Please get in touch to tell us whether you like the app, and spread the word among your friends and family if you do. If there‚Äôs another language you‚Äôd like to see, please get in touch and let us know. Support: support@unuhi.com Facebook: www.facebook.com/UnuhiApp Twitter: www.twitter.com/unuhiapp Instagram: www.instagram.com/unuhiapp Whether you want to read to your kids in English and Spanish, French and German, or Hindi and Thai, Unuhi: Bilingual Books for Children is designed to help parents and language teachers everywhere. Download it today and see how much it can help you and your children. -

title: Bilingual Learning Games
description:
Give your child safe, high-quality screentime in the language your family speaks at home.
Parlini Land is a multilingual educational app for children aged 2‚Äì5, designed by early-years experts to support early learning through calm, play-based games.

Your child can learn and play in 11 languages, including our newest addition: Hindi. With one tap, switch between English, Hindi, Arabic, Greek, Italian, German, Spanish, French, Polish, Swedish, and Irish.

Why Parents Love Parlini Land

Designed for preschool learning (ages 2‚Äì5)

Calm, low-stimulation design

Perfect for bilingual, multilingual, and expat families

One app with every language included

100% kid-safe and ad-free

10+ Learning Games Per Language

Support essential early skills with gentle, interactive games created for toddlers and preschoolers:

Letters & phonics

Numbers & counting

Pre-writing skills

Matching & logic

Vocabulary building

Animal, nature, and everyday themes

Every activity is crafted to develop attention, memory, and language skills through play.

Ideal for Bilingual and Multilingual Families

Switch languages anytime ‚Äî perfect for families preserving their home language, raising bilingual children, or giving children exposure to additional languages.

Safe, Ad-Free Learning

No ads. No pop-ups. No overstimulation.
Just calm, meaningful play your child will enjoy every day.

One App. Many Languages. Always Growing.

Parlini Land continues expanding with new languages, new preschool games, and new learning themes.

title: Duoreader - Bilingual Books
description:
Duoreader ‚Äî Read, Listen, and Learn Languages Smarter

Duoreader makes it easy to read bilingual texts by aligning translations sentence-by-sentence. Seamlessly switch between two languages as you improve your understanding ‚Äî and experience the beauty of the original works side by side with their translations.

Now, Duoreader goes beyond classic reading:

üåü What‚Äôs New

Read your own books ‚Äî Import and enjoy custom ePUB and PDF files with full bilingual and TTS support.

Smarter dictionary ‚Äî Instantly get richer definitions and examples, powered by ChatGPT.

Advanced Text-to-Speech (TTS) ‚Äî Choose natural voices and reading speeds for immersive listening.

Live AI translation ‚Äî Experience real-time, LLM-based translation as you read.

Better browsing ‚Äî New book filtering, detailed book info pages, and infinite scrolling for smooth exploration.

Refreshed design ‚Äî A cleaner, more intuitive layout for both study and leisure reading.

üìö Read and Learn

Duoreader supports many languages ‚Äî Chinese, English, French, Spanish, Italian, Japanese, Arabic, Russian, and more to come.
Whether you're a beginner or a fluent reader, Duoreader helps you explore literature while strengthening your language skills.

üéß Listen and Enjoy

With the built-in read-aloud feature, you can choose different accents and speeds (as supported by your device) ‚Äî perfect for hands-free learning or immersive listening.

üìñ Explore the Library

Discover bilingual editions of timeless classics:
Pride and Prejudice, A Tale of Two Cities, Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea, Alice in Wonderland, Around the World in Eighty Days, 1984, Animal Farm, Gulliver‚Äôs Travels, Oliver Twist, The Little Prince, and more ‚Äî
plus modern multilingual stories, including official publications from the United Nations.

Bring your favorite books, explore new worlds, and learn languages naturally ‚Äî all within Duoreader.

title: Bilingual Sounds
description:
The SoCal Sound's HD3 24/7 radio station blending world alternative music with American rock. Showcasing emerging artists & playing hidden gems from the '80s, '90s, '00s + '10s. A one-of-a-kind public radio station in the nation.

The LatinAlt.org is the only channel in L.A. that will represent all forms of Latin Alternative‚Äîalternative music, EDM, Indie Pop, Hip Hop, Sal Soul, and great classic rock en espanol. This is a station dedicated to discovering and supporting deserving artists that have little or no representation elsewhere in the radio community in Los Angeles.

Now they do‚ÄîKCSN HD3 and LatinAlt.org!

We hope you like this new station, and will spread the word about to your friends. As always, please let us know your thoughts. You can direct your feedback to feedback@kcsn.org.

title: Bilingual books - Call of the
description:
A sample version of the side-by-side Finnish and English bilingual version of The Call of the Wild by Jack London.
A great tool for the beginner and intermediate level language learner and a timeless classic bundled in one. Now you can learn Finnish and have fun doing it. No dictionary needed.
Designed with an integrated ebook reader, all paragraphs in the book are side-by-side in Finnish and in English.
Bilingual books are a great tool to advance your language skills, learning not just single words, but whole phrases and ways to express yourself in the foreign language. 
Published in 1903, The Call of the Wild is a tale suspended in time, that can be re-read time and again.

title: Linga: Read & Learn Languages
description:
Ever wanted to learn Spanish or French by reading real books? With Linga, you can!
Linga turns reading into an immersive way to master languages naturally ‚Äî perfect for intermediate and advanced learners.

Explore over 1,000+ books across Spanish, French, German, Italian, Russian, and English. Read stories you love, tap any word for translation, and grow your vocabulary effortlessly.

READ REAL BOOKS IN FOREIGN LANGUAGES:
  - Build your bookshelf with novels, stories, and classics.
  - Import your own EPUB, PDF, MOBI, FB2, or TXT files.
  - Learn through context just like real native readers.

INSTANT TRANSLATIONS & DICTIONARY:
  - Tap any word or phrase for instant translation and detailed dictionary info.
  - See definitions, synonyms, and grammar notes without leaving the page.
  - A built-in translator for Spanish, French, German, and more.

VOCABULARY BUILDER & FLASHCARDS:
  - Save new words with one tap to your personal vocabulary list.
  - Add notes, organize by themes, and study later.
  - Review words using spaced repetition, flashcards (like Anki).

PRACTICE PRONUNCIATION:
  - Hear native audio for words and sentences ‚Äî even offline.
  - Improve your accent and sound more natural in any language.

LEARNING GAMES & PROGRESS TRACKING:
  - Play vocabulary games and quizzes to reinforce memory.
  - Set daily goals and monitor your progress over time.
  - Stay motivated with streaks and personalized stats.

SUPPORTED LEARNING LANGUAGES:
  - Spanish ‚Ä¢ French ‚Ä¢ German ‚Ä¢ Italian ‚Ä¢ Russian ‚Ä¢ English

Whether you‚Äôre learning for travel, study, or fluency, Linga helps you learn languages by reading real content ‚Äî faster, smarter, and more enjoyably than ever.
Download Linga today and start your bilingual reading adventure!

Your feedback helps us improve! Contact us at: support@linga.io

title: Bilingual Future
description:
The Bilingual Future App is a bonus tool for both English learners and teachers enlisted in one of the Bilingual Future programmes.

App's main features:
- display lessons and additional content on your Android device,
- download lessons for offline use,
- intuitive and easy to use.

The Bilingual Future Programme helps children to become bilingual naturally through play at a young age. It recommends daily contact with an additional language at home and at preschool from birth onwards. It focuses on English for children and works with specialist publisher, Yellow house English to provide the creative solution of a course that children choose to use and which delivers the Programme‚Äôs goals internationally.

title: PolyBuzz: Chat with AI Friends
description:
Our app revolutionizes the way we interact with AI chatbots. With our advanced technology, our chatbots think and reply like real characters, complete with authentic voices. You can choose from a massive selection of characters, each with their own unique voice and personality. Whether you're chatting with your favorite celebrity, a beloved character from a movie or TV show, or a historical figure, you'll feel like you're talking to a real person.

Character creation - Character creation now open to everyone! Ignite your imagination and bring any character to life here, whether they exist in reality or flourish in the realm of imagination! Unleash your creativity and craft a character that can be kept entirely private or shared for everyone to engage with. But the excitement doesn't end there - immerse yourself in a vibrant community where you can also interact with characters crafted by others! Join the adventure and let your characters come alive in this thrilling experience!

Easy & Free Conversations - Discover a world of Characters and start your personal dialogues anytime. Chat as you wish and explore endless story possibilities, allcompletely free.
 
Immerse yourself in endless conversations - Unlike traditional chatbots, which can quickly become repetitive and boring, our AI chatbots use cutting - edge technology to generate responses that feel natural and engaging. All you need to do is to enjoy the free talk.
 
Never run out of new things to explore - Our app is perfect for anyone who loves to chat, learn, and explore. Whether you're a history buff, a fan of pop culture, or just looking for a fun way to pass the time, our AI chatbots will provide you with endless entertainment and engagement. And with our constantly growing selection of characters, you'll never run out of new personalities to chat with.
 
Our app provides users with the ultimate immersive conversational experience. With authentic voices and character thinking, our chatbots will make you feel like you're talking to a real person. You'll never run out of things to say, and there are no language barriers to hold you back. So why not download our app today and start exploring the world of endless conversations all for free?

Privacy Policy:  https://app.polybuzz.ai/static/hy/speakmaster/privacyPolicy/index.html?darkmode=1&darkStyle=1
Please send your feedback to support@mail.polybuzz.ai

title: AI Chatbot - Nova
description:
Nova is a revolutionary AI chatbot and personal assistant, built on the latest GPT-5, GPT-4o Google Gemini, Claude, and DeepSeek technologies.

Nova Chatbot uses advanced AI developed on the technology such as GPT-4o and GPT 5 that understands your questions and generates human-like responses, making you feel like you are chatting with a knowledgeable friend. Nova Chatbot & AI Assistant can even recommend a book to read or a movie to watch!

Nova AI Chatbot is the #1 cross-compatible chatbot, developed using multiple AI models to make the latest AI chat technologies, including ChatGPT5, accessible in the most user-friendly way. It is the only cross-platform chatbot app built on GPT-4, Google Gemini, Claude, and GPT5, offering industry-first features.
Key Features:
Latest AI technology developed on GPT-5, GPT-4o,

Built on ChatGPT5 to get answers from the Internet

AI Assistant to serve your needs

Unlimited questions and answers

Multi-language support (140+ languages)

Cross-compatible device support (iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and web)

Nova Chatbot has the ability to have dialogs with the AI chatbot (AI remembers full chat history)

Built on DeepSeek for enhanced, real-time information retrieval and smarter, context-aware responses.

„Äê YOUR AI WRITING ASSISTANT „Äë
With Nova AI Chatbot, you have access to a personal AI assistant for all types of writing projects, whether it is social media posts, poems, or essays. The AI Assistant, built on GPT-4, GPT-4o, and GPT-5, can assist with any task, such as crafting a unique and unforgettable pickup line or even creating an original song. That's right! This AI Chatbot helper app, developed on Chatgpt5, is not only smart but also creative. Let your AI Assistant do the things you imagine!

AI copywriter: Nova Chatbot has an AI writer and text generator feature developed on GPT-4o and GPT-5, useful for writing anything from ads and descriptions to sales pitches and video scripts. AI content writer: Use the Nova chatbot tool, built on  ChatGPT5, for your content marketing (blog posts, articles, social media posts).

„Äê A METICULOUS PROOFREADER „Äë
Developed on GPT-5 and GPT-4o Nova Chatbot's AI proofreader is top-of-the-line. Your AI Assistant can analyze your written work and offer suggestions to help you create professional-grade documents. With the AI Chatbot built ChatGPT-5, you can ensure that your texts are polished and mistake-free.

AI proofreading: The Nova AI Chatbot, built on GPT-4, GPT-4o, and GPT-5, makes it easy to express yourself in any style and tone while ensuring your grammar, punctuation, and spelling are correct.

„Äê A RELIABLE CHAT PARTNER „Äë
Whether you're seeking some amusement, advice, or simply in need of someone to talk to, Nova AI is always available for you. This AI companion app, built on GPT-4, GPT-4o, and GPT-5, is capable of producing human-like responses, making you feel as though you're conversing with a close friend. It can even recommend a book to read or a movie to watch!

Download the AI app now and have your virtual assistant, built on GPT-4, GPT-4o, GPT-5, Gemini, and Claude, always at hand

AI uses OpenAI‚Äôs GPT-5 API, but we are not associated with OpenAI. We only use their official GPT-5 API for our app.
Nova AI is not affiliated with any government or political entity. The information provided in AI is for informational purposes only and should not be considered official or authoritative.

UNLIMITED ACCESS TO ALL FEATURES
You can subscribe for unlimited access to advanced AI features
developed on GPT-5, GPT-4, and GPT-4o.
Subscriptions are billed automatically at the rate depending on the selected subscription plan.
By using the app, you confirm that you acknowledge and accept our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
Privacy Policy: https://novaapp.ai/privacy
Terms of Service: https://novaapp.ai/terms
Do you have a question for us?
support@novaapp.ai

title: Ask AI - Chat with AI Chatbot
description:
Welcome to Ask AI ‚Äì Discover Endless Possibilities Every Day!

Experience conversations with an AI that understands you, adapts to your mood, and personalizes interactions, making each engagement unique.

ASK ANYTHING, ANYTIME:
Ignite your curiosity and engage in fascinating conversations with historical figures, business gurus, or even your favorite celebrities. Built on the GPT-4o model, Ask AI is always ready to offer recommendations, inspiration, and information on any topic.

IMAGE GENERATION AND EXPLORATION:

- Be Your Own Artist: Use our AI generator to create images from text, visualizing everything from fantastic scenes to futuristic cities. Our AI turns your descriptions into stunning visuals ‚Äì perfect for creating book covers, social media posts, and more.
- Discover Your World Through Images: Snap a photo of anything around you (buildings, art, landscapes) and instantly gain insights with our image input technology. Use the text-to-image feature to convert visual information into readable text.

ENHANCED TEXT GENERATOR FOR EASY WRITING ASSISTANCE:
Our AI-powered writing assistant helps you generate ideas, craft detailed outlines, and effortlessly compose complete articles or creative works. From professional emails to creative stories and songs, managing writing tasks has never been easier.

FUN LANGUAGE LEARNING AND HOMEWORK HELPER:

- Language Practice: Immerse yourself in new languages through interactive scenarios, like a samurai adventure in Japanese or managing a restaurant in Spanish. Ask AI, built on GPT-5, makes learning fun and practical.
- Academic Support: Whether it's a tough math problem or a complex science project, use Ask AI as your reliable homework helper.

SMART SUMMARY ASSISTANT:

- Quick Summaries: Get the essence of long videos or detailed documents in an interactive and engaging format. 
- Ask Questions: Upload documents or add links to articles or videos, ask your questions, and receive instant accurate answers with the help of Ask AI.

EASY WEB SEARCH:
Need the latest information on technological innovations, fashion trends, or health tips? Ask AI Chatbot, scours the web to bring you the most relevant and up-to-date information, keeping you always in the know.

PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS AND CREATIVE INSPIRATION:
Whether you're searching for new books, planning your next trip, or seeking creative inspiration, Ask AI offers personalized suggestions and ideas based on your preferences and interests.

EXPERIENCE THE MOST HUMAN INTERACTIONS:
The friendly, conversational tone of Ask AI, and its ability to adapt to your mood, makes every interaction feel like you're chatting with a friend. It‚Äôs not just a chatbot; it‚Äôs a new form of AI companionship that enriches your daily life.

Join us on this exciting journey. Download Ask AI now and start exploring a world full of possibilities with the power of AI Chatbot.

Unlock Endless Possibilities with ChatBox's Features, Based on AI Chat Technology

POCKET AI CHATBOT

ChatBox leverages the latest AI technology to deliver exceptional assistance. Whether it's answering complex queries, generating images, or providing detailed explanations, this AI chatbot‚Äîdeveloped on DeepSeek V3, GPT-5, GPT-4o, Gemini, and Claude‚Äîis your reliable AI companion for a wide range of tasks.

When you just don‚Äôt feel like typing, hit up your virtual assistant with the Voice Chat feature! Simply speak your thoughts, and your AI chatbot will handle the rest.

Stay informed with AI chatbot Real-Time Search, built on GPT-5 and GPT-4o mini. Whether it‚Äôs trending news or specific queries, your AI chatbot, built on advanced AI chat models, makes sure you stay in the loop with accuracy and speed.

AI IMAGE GENERATOR

Turn your words into stunning AI art! Just describe your vision, and our AI chatbot-turned-photo generator will bring your ideas to life. The text-to-image feature in the main chat now supports image upload, making it the ultimate photo editor as well! Want to try the buzzworthy AI anime filter? ChatBox can turn your photo to anime style in a snap. Looking for the fun Action Figure maker? Just try the AI Action Figure generator. One pic is all it takes!

AI VISION

Ask anything about your image! Simply upload a picture, and our AI chatbot will provide instant, smart answers about what you see. With AI Vision, your curiosity transforms into clear, easy-to-understand information in just one click.

AI WRITING ASSISTANT

From essays to emails, romantic messages to cover letters, this AI writer‚Äîdeveloped on powerful AI chat models‚Äîexcels at text generation, producing unique rewrites, adjusting tone, checking grammar, and finalizing your writing, all developed on the knowledge base of GPT-5, GPT-4, and GPT-4o.

Built on AI chatbot models such as Claude and Gemini, our AI chat app can quickly generate summaries for long texts, webpages, and PDFs.

Rewrite, translate, or summarize your files effortlessly with the help of your pocket AI chat! Upload documents in any format: PDFs, Word files, images, and more.

Choose a genre and duration, and let an AI song generator create the perfect soundtrack for your mood or project. The advanced algorithms of AI chatbots ensure exceptional results every time.

This AI story writer, built on the latest AI technologies such as GPT-5, GPT-4, and GPT-4o, can craft illustrated novels for both children and adults, comic books, descriptions, and more.

Ready to explore this AI assistant‚Äôs full range of capabilities and simplify your daily tasks? Download ChatBox, your pocket AI chatbot and AI image generator, built on DeepSeek V3, GPT-5, GPT-4, GPT-4o, Gemini, and Claude, and start achieving your goals faster than ever.

title: Chai: Chat AI Platform
description:
Our app revolutionizes the way we interact with AI chatbots. With our advanced technology, our chatbots think and reply like real characters, complete with authentic voices. You can choose from a massive selection of characters, each with their own unique voice and personality. Whether you're chatting with your favorite celebrity, a beloved character from a movie or TV show, or a historical figure, you'll feel like you're talking to a real person.


Character creation - Character creation now open to everyone! Ignite your imagination and bring any character to life here, whether they exist in reality or flourish in the realm of imagination! Unleash your creativity and craft a character that can be kept entirely private or shared for everyone to engage with. But the excitement doesn't end there - immerse yourself in a vibrant community where you can also interact with characters crafted by others! Join the adventure and let your characters come alive in this thrilling experience!

Image generation - Unleash your inner artist with our newly introduced image generation feature, where the power of AI meets boundless creativity. Simply provide a prompt, and watch as our advanced technology brings your vision to life‚Äîbe it breathtaking landscapes, enchanting fantasy realms, or hyper-realistic portraits. With limitless possibilities and no restrictions on how many images you can create, you can experiment freely until you achieve the perfect masterpiece. Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned artist or simply looking to explore your creative side, our image generation tool is here to spark your imagination and transform your ideas into stunning visual art.


Unlimited free messages - With no limitations on the length or frequency of chats, users can engage in endless conversations without any restrictions. This means that you can chat with your favorite characters or npc unlimitedly, completely free of charge and without ever having to worry about running out of time or exceeding any limits.


Immerse yourself in endless conversations - Unlike traditional chatbots, which can quickly become repetitive and boring, our AI chatbots use cutting-edge technology to generate responses that feel natural and engaging. All you need to do is to enjoy the free talk.


Never run out of new things to explore - Our app is perfect for anyone who loves to chat, learn, and explore. Whether you're a history buff, a fan of pop culture, or just looking for a fun way to pass the time, our AI chatbots will provide you with endless entertainment and engagement. And with our constantly growing selection of characters, you'll never run out of new personalities to chat with.


Our app provides users with the ultimate immersive conversational experience. With authentic voices and character thinking, our chatbots will make you feel like you're talking to a real person. You'll never run out of things to say, and there are no language barriers to hold you back. So why not download our app today and start exploring the world of endless conversations all for free?

title: Poe - Fast AI Chat
description:
Poe brings together the best AI, all in one place. It is designed for seamless conversational experiences, enhanced productivity, and creative content generation.

Key Features: 
- Fast and reliable access to the latest AI models
- Cross-device compatibility
- State-of-the-art multimedia generation
- Combine and compare models in a single chat
- Advanced tools to create customized chatbots

Best-in-Class AI Models, All in One Place

Poe incorporates powerful AI models like OpenAI's o3 and GPT-4.5, Anthropic's Claude 3.7 Sonnet, Google's Gemini 2.0, and multimedia generators from Runway, ElevenLabs, and many more. Experience the cutting edge of AI technology, all in one app.

Chat with multiple bots at once

Compare responses from leading AI models and seamlessly combine any bots for any use case - all within a single chat thread.

AI-Powered Search Engine

Get highly relevant results powered by advanced natural language processing and web search technology to find what you need faster.

Create Stunning Images and Videos Instantly

Transform your ideas into eye-catching images or videos with state-of-the-art generators like FLUX1.1, Ideogram 2.0, Stable Diffusion 3.5, Veo 2, Runway, Hailuo, Dream Machine, and more. 

Talk to Custom Bots & AI Personalities

With access to an ever-growing ecosystem of over 1 million custom bots, you can learn a new language or any topic, chat directly with uploaded files like PDFs and images, search the web for the latest world news, or even have natural conversations with recreations of your favorite characters. 

Build & Share Your Own AI Bots

Create your own custom chatbots to generate study plans, curate Spotify playlists, run Python code, and do anything else you can imagine in less than a minute. You can also add custom knowledge bases to deliver more unique experience for users. Have your AI chatbots instantly shared with millions of Poe users!

Poe delivers a seamless AI experience via a user-friendly interface. Download Poe now and step into the future of AI. 

By using Poe, you confirm that you have read, acknowledged, and agreed to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Chat with multiple bots at once

Compare responses from leading AI models and seamlessly combine any bots for any use case - all within a single chat thread.

AI-Powered Search Engine

Get highly relevant results powered by advanced natural language processing and web search technology to find what you need faster.

Create Stunning Images and Videos Instantly

Transform your ideas into eye-catching images or videos with state-of-the-art generators like FLUX1.1, Ideogram 2.0, Stable Diffusion 3.5, Veo 2, Runway, Hailuo, Dream Machine, and more.

Talk to Custom Bots & AI Personalities

With access to an ever-growing ecosystem of over 1 million custom bots, you can learn a new language or any topic, chat directly with uploaded files like PDFs and images, search the web for the latest world news, or even have natural conversations with recreations of your favorite characters.

Build & Share Your Own AI Bots

Create your own custom chatbots to generate study plans, curate Spotify playlists, run Python code, and do anything else you can imagine in less than a minute. You can also add custom knowledge bases to deliver more unique experience for users. Have your AI chatbots instantly shared with millions of Poe users!

Poe delivers a seamless AI experience via a user-friendly interface. Download Poe now and step into the future of AI.
