title: Oxford Advanced Learner's Dict
description: A one-stop dictionary reference app for learners of English! The following products are available: - Oxford Advanced Learner‚Äôs Dictionary - Oxford Collocations Dictionary - Oxford Learner‚Äôs Thesaurus The Oxford Advanced Learner‚Äôs Dictionary is the world‚Äôs bestselling advanced-level dictionary for learners of English. It has helped millions of learners to develop their English skills for work and study, and leads the way to more confident, successful communication in English. It contains over 86,000 words, 95,000 phrases, 112,000 meanings and 237,000 examples, all using clear and simple language to help non-native speakers learn more easily. The Oxford Collocations Dictionary shows you which words work together and helps you express your ideas naturally and convincingly. It is especially useful for writing essays or preparing for exams in English. For example, which adjectives can you use to describe ‚Äòscenery‚Äô? Which verbs can you use with ‚Äòchallenge‚Äô? The Oxford Learner‚Äôs Thesaurus is a dictionary of synonyms that helps you to understand the differences between similar words, and to find the right words to say exactly what you mean. For example, is there a better word than ‚Äònice‚Äô? What is the difference between ‚Äòeasy‚Äô and ‚Äòsimple‚Äô? What is a more formal synonym of ‚Äòchoice‚Äô? Check out the free sample content for each dictionary, or sign up for a short full trial. You can purchase access to individual dictionaries or get all three. With all dictionaries you can: - Access the content offline - Listen to real-voice pronunciation with both British and American accents - Easily find words with the search functionality - Browse preloaded topic word lists - Create and organize your own Favourites lists and much more!

title: SpanishDictionary.com Learning
description:
SpanishDictionary.com is the leading Spanish translator, dictionary, and conjugator trusted by more than 10 million people each month. 

"The best free Spanish dictionary available in the app store!" Featuring the highest quality Spanish-English dictionaries and a Spanish Word of the Day. Use it as a handy reference tool and translator or as a fun way to learn new words in Spanish.
 
FEATURES:
 
‚òÖ Spanish English Dictionary
 
- Full Spanish-English dictionary with examples, regional usage, and contextual information.
- Much faster than dictionary apps that require an Internet connection to lookup words.
- Words are autosuggested as you type.
- Audio pronunciations for dictionary entries available in-app (internet connection required).
 
‚òÖ Conjugations
 
- Full conjugation tables for all tenses now available for thousands of verbs. 
- Irregular verb conjugations are highlighted in red.
 
‚òÖ Translators
 
- Three separate in-app translators (internet connection required).
- Simply type the phrase that you want translated and receive three translations.
 
‚òÖ Word of the Day
 
- Learn a new Spanish word each day!
- Push notifications conveniently send you the new words.
- Easily turn off notifications in the Word of the Day settings.
 
We hope you enjoy the app. Be sure to leave a positive feedback rating and tell your friends if you like it. And as always, good luck with your Spanish!
 
¬°Hasta luego!
SpanishDictionary.com Team

- Simply type the phrase that you want translated and receive three translations.

‚òÖ Word of the Day

- Learn a new Spanish word each day!
- Push notifications conveniently send you the new words.
- Easily turn off notifications in the Word of the Day settings.

We hope you enjoy the app. Be sure to leave a positive feedback rating and tell your friends if you like it. And as always, good luck with your Spanish!

¬°Hasta luego!
SpanishDictionary.com Team
summary: Spanish learning made easy.

title: French Dictionary - Offline
description: The French dictionary explains the meaning of French words, based on French Wiktionary. This is a monolingual French dictionary: words must be entered in French. Features: ‚ô¶ More than 399000 french definitions, large number of inflected forms and conjugation of verbs ‚ô¶ Fast as it works offline, internet is used only when a word is not found in the offline dictionary ‚ô¶ You can leaf through words using your finger (swipe right and left) ‚ô¶ Easy and functional user interface, optimized also for tablets ‚ô¶ Bookmarks and search history with option to backup your bookmarks ‚ô¶ Crossword help: the symbol ? can be used in place of single unknown letter. The symbol * can be used in place of any group of letters. ‚ô¶ Random search button (shuffle), useful to learn new words ‚ô¶ Share word definition using other apps, like gmail or whatsapp ‚ô¶ Compatible with Moon+ Reader and FBReader Your settings ‚ô¶ Black and white themes with user defined text colors (press menu-->select Settings-->click on Theme) ‚ô¶ Optional Floating Action Button (FAB) supporting one of the following actions: Search, History, Favorites, Random search and Share option ‚ô¶ Persistent Search option to get automatic keyboard at startup ‚ô¶ Text to speech options ‚ô¶ Number of items in history ‚ô¶ Customisable font size and line spacing You can listen to the word pronunciation, provided that voice data have been installed in your phone (Text-to-speech engine). Question & Answers: http://goo.gl/UnU7V Information about permissions used by the application can be found here: http://goo.gl/AsqT4C Information for application developers: ‚úî This application provides Dictionary API for 3rd party developers, please read further details: http://thesaurus.altervista.org/dictionary-android Permissions: This application requires the following permissions: ‚ô¢ INTERNET - to retrieve the definition of words ‚ô¢ WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE (aka Photos/Media/Files) - to backup configuration and bookmarks
descriptionHTML:
The French dictionary explains the meaning of French words, based on French Wiktionary. This is a monolingual French dictionary: words must be entered in French.

Features:
‚ô¶ More than 399000 french definitions, large number of inflected forms and conjugation of verbs
‚ô¶ Fast as it works offline, internet is used only when a word is not found in the offline dictionary
‚ô¶ You can leaf through words using your finger (swipe right and left)
‚ô¶ Easy and functional user interface, optimized also for tablets
‚ô¶ Bookmarks and search history with option to backup your bookmarks
‚ô¶ Crossword help: the symbol ? can be used in place of single unknown letter. The symbol * can be used in place of any group of letters.
‚ô¶ Random search button (shuffle), useful to learn new words
‚ô¶ Share word definition using other apps, like gmail or whatsapp
‚ô¶ Compatible with Moon+ Reader and FBReader

Your settings
‚ô¶ Black and white themes with user defined text colors (press menu-->select Settings-->click on Theme)
‚ô¶ Optional Floating Action Button (FAB) supporting one of the following actions: Search, History, Favorites, Random search and Share option
‚ô¶ Persistent Search option to get automatic keyboard at startup
‚ô¶ Text to speech options
‚ô¶ Number of items in history
‚ô¶ Customisable font size and line spacing

You can listen to the word pronunciation, provided that voice data have been installed in your phone (Text-to-speech engine).

Question & Answers: http://goo.gl/UnU7V
Information about permissions used by the application can be found here: http://goo.gl/AsqT4C

Information for application developers:
‚úî This application provides Dictionary API for 3rd party developers, please read further details: http://thesaurus.altervista.org/dictionary-android

Permissions:
This application requires the following permissions:
‚ô¢ INTERNET - to retrieve the definition of words
‚ô¢ WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE (aka Photos/Media/Files) - to backup configuration and bookmarks
summary: The french offline dictionary is very easy to use.

title: English Dictionary : Thesaurus
description:
Looking to enhance your vocabulary and communication skills? The English Dictionary & Thesaurus is your go-to language tool, offering precise definitions, synonyms, antonyms, pronunciations, and more. Whether you‚Äôre a student, professional, writer, or language enthusiast, this offline dictionary is designed to support your daily learning needs.

Why Choose English Dictionary & Thesaurus

This app is more than just a dictionary, it‚Äôs your language learning partner. With powerful search, offline access, word of the day, and audio pronunciation, you can explore, learn, and improve your English effortlessly.

Benefits of Using English Dictionary & Thesaurus

‚ô¶Expand Your Vocabulary ‚Äì Learn new words daily and enhance your language skills effortlessly.
‚ô¶Improve Writing & Speaking ‚Äì Get precise synonyms, antonyms to express yourself better.
‚ô¶Boost Academic & Professional Success ‚Äì Perfect for students, professionals, and writers who need accurate word definitions.
‚ô¶Enhance Pronunciation ‚Äì Learn the correct American English pronunciation with audio support.
‚ô¶Available offline‚Äì You can access the app without an internet connection.
‚ô¶Organised Learning ‚Äì Explore words by topics like business, science, technology, and more for subject-specific learning.

Key Features:

üîπWord of the Day
English dictionary thesaurus app provides a new word daily, helping users expand their vocabulary. Each word comes with its definition, pronunciation, synonyms and rhymes to enhance learning.

üîπThesaurus
 Improve your writing and speech with a rich database of synonyms, antonyms, and alternative word choices in our offline dictionary.

üîπSearch Best Results 
With this feature in our app ensures you find the most accurate and relevant word meanings. You can quickly access definitions, synonyms, pronunciations, and example sentences. Get precise answers effortlessly and enhance your learning.

üîπOffline Access
No internet connection? No problem. Our English dictionary offline mode ensures you can access the full dictionary and thesaurus anytime, anywhere, even when you're off the grid.

üîπLearn
English dictionary thesaurus app is designed to help users improve their vocabulary and language skills through interactive tools. In this you can discover new words with their correct pronunciation and can share your new found knowledge effortlessly. 

üîπTopics
English dictionary thesaurus app helps users explore words based on specific themes or categories. Whether you‚Äôre learning politics, geography, science, music or business vocabulary. This feature organizes words and meaning for easier learning.

üîπAudio Pronunciation
English dictionary thesaurus app helps users learn the correct pronunciation of words with clear, high-quality audio. Simply tap the speaker icon to hear the word which helps in  improving the pronunciation and enhances your speaking skills.

üîπSynonyms
Find the perfect synonyms for any word with a simple search. Our app provides you with a wealth of synonyms, vocabulary and definition options.

üîπDefinition
English dictionary thesaurus app provides clear, accurate, and easy-to-understand meanings for every word. Each definition is accompanied by examples, synonyms and rhymes. 

üîπFree to Use
The thesaurus app is completely free, making it a must-have for anyone looking to improve their language skills.

üîπSave Words -  Easily bookmark your favorite words and revisit them anytime to reinforce learning.

üîπLight & Dark Mode ‚Äì Switch between light and dark themes for a comfortable reading experience.

üîπWord Sharing ‚Äì Share interesting words and their meanings with friends on social media and can also keep track of the words that are most important to you. 

Why settle for a basic dictionary when you can have a complete language toolkit in the palm of your hand? Start mastering new words today! Download the Free English Dictionary & Thesaurus now and enhance your language skills effortlessly.

title: Poet Assistant (English)
description:
A set of offline tools to help with writing poems (currently only English is supported):

* a rhyming dictionary, using the Carnegie Mellon University pronunciation dictionary.
* a thesaurus, using the WordNet thesaurus.
* a dictionary, using the WordNet dictionary.
* a screen where you can enter your poem text, have it read aloud back to you by the device's text-to-speech engine, and see the word/character count.

The dictionaries are built in the app.  No internet connection is required to use them.

The app is offline: your data is only stored locally on your device, unless you choose to export or share it. The Poet Assistant app doesn‚Äôt send your data to any server.

This app is open source: https://github.com/caarmen/poet-assistant

Permissions:
* Since 1.5.0, the app has the "run at startup" permission for the "Word of the day" feature.  If you enable this feature in the settings, when the device reboots, the app makes sure the "word of the day" notification is still scheduled.


Looking for other languages?

This app only contains dictionary data for English.  If you are looking for other languages, please contact the developer.

Note: This is the original Poet Assistant app. It is completely free, truly offline (no internet permission), no ads, and no in-app purchases.

Share your creations and get support on the community's discord: https://discord.gg/XqzBPMFfkW

title: Newpedia -Dictionary Creation-
description:
"Newpedia" is a dictionary creation and language learning application that allows you to create your own original dictionary.

You can record all the beautiful words, wise sayings and aphorisms that you came across in reading, memorizing English words in language study, new words and current events that you came across in the news, names and episodes of your favorite games and entertainers, and look back anytime, anywhere.


‚óèIf you use "Newpedia," for example, you can make an original dictionary like this.
„ÉªA dictionary of newly discovered words and words
„ÉªReading memo and reading dictionary
„ÉªA dictionary of characters and stage settings when writing a novel
„ÉªA dictionary of words for language study
„ÄÄ‚ÜíMake a list of words in English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Chinese (Simplified/Traditional), etc.
„ÉªA dictionary of celebrity names
„ÉªA dictionary of famous sayings, aphorisms and proverbs from anime and drama
„ÄÄ‚ÜíCharacter dictionary/Photography dictionary
„ÉªA dictionary of wise sayings, aphorisms and words of wisdom of celebrities and greats
„ÉªA Dictionary of Names of Living Things
„ÄÄ‚ÜíFishing record/Bird watching record
„ÉªMy Encyclopedia
„ÄÄ‚ÜíDiary/personal history/family episode collection/funny dictionary used by children
„ÉªA Dictionary of Humor
„ÄÄ‚ÜíInteresting dictionary/idea book
„ÉªA proverb dictionary
„ÉªA dictionary of current events
„ÉªGourmet Dictionary


‚óèbe easy to use
It's a simple app, so it's very easy to use.
Press the add word button, type in a word and its meaning, and you're done.
You can read the contents by tapping the word displayed on the top page.

‚óèCreate multiple dictionaries
You can create multiple dictionaries, so you can organize them by subject, such as one for "New Word Dictionary" and one for "Words of wisdom.".

‚óèSynchronize dictionary with other terminal (pro version)
You can use the sync function to share, view, and edit your dictionary with other devices you have. The same dictionary data can be viewed and edited by those who often use a smartphone on the go or a tablet on the sofa at home. It also works on Macs with M1 processors (*), so you can make edits more efficiently on your Mac and view them on your phone.
*: Only the minimum functions (viewing, editing, synchronizing) are checked on Mac.

‚óèUseful for learning languages in memorization mode
Memo mode hides the meaning of words. Tap the screen to see the meaning again, which is useful for learning words.

‚óèRecommended for people like this
„ÉªFor those who want to deepen their knowledge, education, and vocabulary
„ÉªA person who often reads books
„ÉªThose who are studying languages
„ÉªA person who has written a novel
„ÉªThose who want to learn the latest current terminology
„ÉªFor those who want to record and enjoy matters related to their hobbies

‚óèAvailable in 11 languages
Available in English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese, Korean and Chinese (Simplified and Traditional). "Newpedia" is loved by people all over the world.

title: English-Myanmar Dictionary
description:
English to Myanmar or Myanmar to English Offline Dictionary

Main Features
- Easy Navigation
- Work without internet access
- Auto suggest searching word
- Search word using clipboard (Check "Help" menu in app for usage)
- Synchronise with server and get new meaning of words
- Request New word
- User can add new words
- Voice Search (Need Internet Connection)
- Voice, Quiz and Service Settings
- Learn english speaking and listening (20+ categories)
- Learn spelling and vocabulary with quiz games
  # Spelling Quiz
  # Vocabulary / Word Meaning Quiz
  # Complete Word Quiz

title: VoiceTube Dictionary

The AI data analysis technology along with VoiceTube‚Äôs exclusive ‚Äúvideo example sentence‚Äù feature can help strengthen your memory. Learn the comprehensive usage of each word the fastest and easiest way!

title: LOD.lu
description:
LOD on the go ‚Äì the official app for the Luxembourgish Online Dictionary

The L√´tzebuerger Online Dictionnaire (LOD, https://lod.lu, www.lod.lu) is an official tool destined at documenting the Luxembourgish language. Its origins go back to 29 July 1999 and the R√®glement grand-ducal portant cr√©ation du Conseil permanent de la langue luxembourgeoise.
 
The LOD is considered an orthographic reference conveying the meaning of common Luxembourgish expressions by means of translation elements in four different languages: German, French, English and Portuguese. The LOD can also be used as a writing assistance or translation tool.

Alongside translations, the following information can be found in the LOD: example sentences, proverbs and figures of speech with an explanation, synonyms, information regarding pronunciation (audio file and IPA-transcription), sign language videos.

So-called info boxes include orthographic, grammatical or historical information that would be out of place in the more rigid frame of the dictionary entries.

An error-tolerant search enables the user to look up content in the five LOD languages in an easy and intuitive manner. An advanced search also makes it possible to call up lists of Luxembourgish expressions by respecting certain criteria (wild card character, part of speech, phonetics, language register, ...)

Additionally, the expressions are subdivided into categories: job descriptions, animals, insults, vehicles, fruit and vegetables, ...

The Zenter fir d‚ÄôL√´tzebuerger Sprooch ‚Äì Centre for the Luxembourgish language (http://zls.lu) was created with the law of 20 July 2018 on the promotion of the Luxembourgish language and is in charge of the maintenance and development of the LOD.
 
__________________________________________
 
 
Den LOD fir √´nnerwee ‚Äì d√©i offiziell App vum L√´tzebuerger Online Dictionnaire
 
D‚ÄôOriginne vum L√´tzebuerger Online Dictionnaire (LOD, https://lod.lu, www.lod.lu), engem offiziellen Tool fir d'Dokumentatioun vun der L√´tzebuerger Sprooch, ginn zer√©ck op de R√®glement grand-ducal vum 29. Juli 1999 portant cr√©ation du Conseil permanent de la langue luxembourgeoise.
 
Den LOD g√´llt als orthografesch Referenz a verm√´ttelt de S√´nn vun de g√§ngege l√´tzebuergesche Wierder unhand vun eendeitegen Iwwersetzungselementer a v√©ier Sproochen: D√§itsch, Frans√©isch, Englesch a Portugisesch.
Den Dictionnaire kann awer och als Schreif- an/oder als Iwwersetzungsh√´llef gebraucht ginn.
 
Niewent den Iwwersetzunge stinn √´nner anerem och nach d√´s Informatiounen am LOD: Beispillss√§tz, Spr√©chwierder a Riedewendunge mat enger Erkl√§rung, Synonymmen, Informatiounen iwwer d‚ÄôAussprooch (Audio-Datei an IPA-Transkriptioun), Geb√§erdevideoen.
 
A sougenannten Infoboxe sti wichteg orthografesch, grammatesch oder historesch Informatiounen, d√©i net an de rigide Kader vun den Dictionnaires-Artikele passen.
 
Iwwer eng feelertolerant Sich ka ganz einfach an intuitiv an de f√´nnef LOD-Sproochen no Inhalter gesicht ginn. Eng erweidert Sich erlaabt et awer och, fir sech L√´schte mat l√´tzebuergesche Wierder uweisen ze loossen, d√©i verschiddene Kritt√§ren (Jokerzeechen, Wuertaart, Phoneetik, Sproochreg√´ster, ...) entspriechen.
 
Ausserdeem sinn d‚ÄôWierder a Kategorien √´nnerdeelt: Beruffsbezeechnungen, D√©ieren, Frechheeten, Gefierer, Uebst & Gem√©is, ...
 
Den Zenter fir d'L√´tzebuerger Sprooch (http://zls.lu), deen duerch d'Gesetz vum 20. Juli 2018 iwwer d‚ÄôPromotioun vun der L√´tzebuerger Sprooch geschafe gouf, k√´mmert sech √´m d'Maintenance an √´m d'Entw√©cklung vum LOD.

title: Dictionary
description:
Dictionary is a free offline English dictionary containing over 250,000 words and definitions and precisely 0 ads. The dictionary definitions are stored locally, and because it's ad-free there's no need for a network connection. The home page contains a randomly selected word cloud which will pique your curiosity and help you improve your vocabulary, while the search box allows you to find specific words easily.
 
As you type, Dictionary homes in on the word you are looking for. Then you can follow the links in the definition page to get more word definitions. Wildcard characters can be used to help with word games like crosswords and scrabble where only some of the letters are known, or you have to find an anagram, or with spelling. Definitions include synonyms and antonyms which allows the dictionary to also serve as a thesaurus. The speech function helps provide the correct pronunciation. Use your device theme or choose dark or light theme with custom colours.

Dictionary is ideal for both native English speakers and English learners or people studying the English language, with a high-frequency words option and 'word of the day'. You can also track your favorite words and search history.

title: English Dictionary Dunno
description:
English translation, English Dictionary Dunno is your intelligent English-learning assistant!
Dunno helps you search English grammar, and English words, translate English to English, learn vocabulary and learn English effectively!

FEATURES:
Flexible lookup:
- Offline English dictionary: look up words, grammar, prepositions, sentence patterns, and images.....
- Look up English grammar in use by levels: A1, A2, B1, B2, C1, C2.
- Search autocomplete ‚Äì displays predictions as you type.
- Easy lookup words by voice and image.
- Comprehend the full meaning of words, examples, verbs, nouns, adjectives, and illustrations.
- Suggestions for Word type, synonyms, antonyms, and related words.
- Audio pronunciations: distinguish how to read British English and American English.

In particular, Dunno is able to translate English into 89 other languages accurately: 2-way translation, multi-language translation, separate English sentences
‚ñ∫Translate English to English
‚ñ∫Translate English to Spanish
‚ñ∫Translate English to French
‚ñ∫Translate English to Chinese
‚ñ∫Translate English to Japanese
‚ñ∫Translate English to Korean

Improve English pronunciation: Dunno English Dictionary ‚Äì English Translation helps you practice speaking skills and get clearly feedback.

Check grammar errors right on an English Dictionary app: detect mistakes in words, English grammar, and detailed correction suggestions

English notebook:
- English dictionary by major, word level in TOEIC, IELTS, SAT...
- Double memorization: review English vocabulary through Flashcard, quiz

More than just a free English translation, English dictionary Dunno is also a useful English learning and vocabulary mnemonic tool
- Easily add English vocabulary to Notebook and learn English grammar.
- Learn English vocabulary by flashcards
- Statistics on the number of words, sentences, and grammar learned.
- Keep track of how many words you've memorized.
- Smart English vocabulary notebook: with 3000 TOEIC words, Toefl, IELTS, SAT.
- English learning community.

Take a TOEIC Test with answers and detailed explanations.
Especially the English Q&A community is interesting.

English Dictionary ‚Äì English Translation Dunno‚Äôs data:
- 350,000 English to English words.
- 127 English grammars by levels: A1, A2, B1, B2, C1, C2.
- 418,000 illustrative examples and photos.

English Dictionary ‚Äì English Translation Dunno - Add-ons:
- Suggestions when looking up words
- Open English Dictionary
- Hot trend English words
- Search words with detailed results
- Translate and retain the history
- Notebook to save your favorite words
- Studying on the lock screen.

English Dictionary ‚Äì English Translation Dunno has helped more than 80% of users learn English better every day. Let Dunno help you!
In particular, you can use the website at: https://dunno.ai.

WE LOVE YOUR FEEDBACKS
Do not hesitate to send your suggestions to Dunno via Email: eup.mobi@gmail.com. Thanks!

title: Google Translate
description:
‚Ä¢ Text translation: Translate between 108 languages by typing
‚Ä¢ Tap to Translate: Copy text in any app and tap the Google Translate icon to translate (all languages)
‚Ä¢ Offline: Translate with no internet connection (59 languages)
‚Ä¢ Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera (94 languages)
‚Ä¢ Photos: Take or import photos for higher quality translations (90 languages)
‚Ä¢ Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly (70 languages)
‚Ä¢ Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing (96 languages)
‚Ä¢ Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference (all languages)
‚Ä¢ Cross-device syncing: Login to sync phrasebook between app and desktop
‚Ä¢ Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time (8 languages)

Translations between the following languages are supported:
Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Assamese, Aymara, Azerbaijani, Bambara, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bhojpuri, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chichewa, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Corsican, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dhivehi, Dogri, Dutch, English, Esperanto, Estonian, Ewe, Filipino, Finnish, French, Frisian, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Guarani, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hausa, Hawaiian, Hebrew, Hindi, Hmong, Hungarian, Icelandic, Igbo, Ilocano, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Korean, Krio, Kurdish (Kurmanji), Kurdish (Sorani), Kyrgyz, Lao, Latin, Latvian, Lingala, Lithuanian, Luganda, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Maithili, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Meiteilon (Manipuri), Mizo, Mongolian, Myanmar (Burmese), Nepali, Norwegian, Odia (Oriya), Oromo, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Quechua, Romanian, Russian, Samoan, Sanskrit, Scots Gaelic, Sepedi, Serbian, Sesotho, Shona, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Tigrinya, Tsonga, Turkish, Turkmen, Twi, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Xhosa, Yiddish, Yoruba, Zulu

Permissions Notice
Google Translate may ask for the following optional permissions*:
‚Ä¢ Microphone for speech translation
‚Ä¢ Camera for translating text via the camera
‚Ä¢ External storage for downloading offline translation data
‚Ä¢ Contacts for setup and management of your account

*Note: The app may be used even if optional permissions are not granted.

Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Assamese, Aymara, Azerbaijani, Bambara, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bhojpuri, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chichewa, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Corsican, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dhivehi, Dogri, Dutch, English, Esperanto, Estonian, Ewe, Filipino, Finnish, French, Frisian, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Guarani, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hausa, Hawaiian, Hebrew, Hindi, Hmong, Hungarian, Icelandic, Igbo, Ilocano, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Korean, Krio, Kurdish (Kurmanji), Kurdish (Sorani), Kyrgyz, Lao, Latin, Latvian, Lingala, Lithuanian, Luganda, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Maithili, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Meiteilon (Manipuri), Mizo, Mongolian, Myanmar (Burmese), Nepali, Norwegian, Odia (Oriya), Oromo, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Quechua, Romanian, Russian, Samoan, Sanskrit, Scots Gaelic, Sepedi, Serbian, Sesotho, Shona, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Tigrinya, Tsonga, Turkish, Turkmen, Twi, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Xhosa, Yiddish, Yoruba, Zulu

Permissions Notice
Google Translate may ask for the following optional permissions*:
‚Ä¢ Microphone for speech translation

*Note: The app may be used even if optional permissions are not granted.

title: Microsoft Translator

Microsoft Translator allows you  to translate text, speech, images, and group conversations in over 100 languages - for free. Whether you‚Äôre traveling and need help understanding a menu or navigating unfamiliar streets, or you‚Äôre trying to communicate with a colleague at work or school, Microsoft Translator has you covered. The last translation app you‚Äôll ever need

For anyone, anywhere
With instant translation, Talking Translator helps you communicate naturally in any multilingual moment‚Äîtravel, work trips, business meetings, or everyday conversations.

True communication begins with respect
Try Talking Translator‚Äôs real-time "Shared View" so both you and your conversation partner can follow along easily. People notice‚Äîand appreciate‚Äîthe extra consideration.

#realtime #instant #translation in about 1 second!
Voice recognition is ready the moment you open the app, so you can translate on the spot‚Äîeven with a weak or unstable connection. You can also revisit your past phrases anytime through your voice history.

Support for multiple languages

Not sure how to read a sentence? No problem. Talking Translator also offers handwritten text translation for signs, notes, and more.

title: DeepL Translate
description:
- Camera translation: take a picture with your camera to get instant text translation
- Photo translation: upload a photo to translate the text
- Dictation: translate what you speak out loud
- Text to speech: hear your translated text read out loud
- File translation: translate text from files
- Quick detection: translations begin as you type
- Alternative translations: explore different options for single words and short phrases
- Favorites: save words and phrases for future reference
- History: easily find, edit, and reuse past translations
- Transliteration: read translations of non-Latin languages, such as Japanese or Russian, in the Latin alphabet
- Glossary: translate key words and phrases as defined by you or your organization (available with a paid plan)
- Tone: choose a formal or informal tone (available with a paid plan)
- Handwriting: draw text characters instead of typing (available on iPad)
- DeepL Write: get intelligent writing suggestions to help you create clear, error-free, and impactful texts with ease


Feature support varies by language. Currently available: Acehnese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Arabic, Aragonese, Armenian, Assamese, Aymara, Azerbaijani, Bashkir, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bhojpuri, Bosnian, Breton, Bulgarian, Burmese, Cantonese, Catalan, Cebuano, Chinese (simplified)*, Chinese (traditional)*, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dari, Dutch, English (American)*, English (British)*, Esperanto, Estonian, Finnish, French*, Galician, Georgian, German*, Greek, Guarani, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Igbo, Indonesian, Irish, Italian*, Japanese*, Javanese, Kapampangan, Kazakh, Konkani, Korean*, Kurdish (Kurmanji), Kurdish (Sorani), Kyrgyz, Latin, Latvian, Lingala, Lithuanian, Lombard, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malay, Maithili, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Norwegian (bokm√•l), Occitan, Pangasinan, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese*, Portuguese (Brazilian)*, Quechua, Romanian, Russian, Sanskrit, Serbian, Sicilian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish*, Spanish (Latin American), Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tsonga, Tswana, Turkish, Turkmen, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa
*Also available for DeepL Write 

Free to download - access core features without cost!
- Enjoy more translation features with a DeepL account
- Log in to your organization's team account via SSO
- To unlock all features, you may need a DeepL paid plan

Like millions of others every day, get DeepL for Android to communicate effortlessly across language barriers‚Äîwherever you are.

title: iTranslate Translator
description: iTranslate Translator is a language translator app for text, voice, conversations, camera and photos. You can easily translate into over 100 languages by using this translator app anywhere you go. Use new Offline Mode to translate while traveling abroad without paying expensive roaming charges. iTranslate Translator enables travelers, students, business professionals, employers, and medical staff to read, write and speak in the desired languages and translate anywhere in the world. You can translate using your camera for photo translation, conducting offline translations, engaging in voice mode for speech translation, and more. FEATURES - Text translator: Get free translation for text in over 100 languages. - Translate text to speech: Listen to translation in male or female voices. - Switch between different dialects when you translate. - Dictionary & Thesaurus for all languages. - Transliteration, Sharing, Favorites, History, and much more. PRO FEATURES - Photo translator: With iTranslate's photo Lens Mode, you can use your camera to translate photos of menus, signs, and more instantly. - Offline translation: Translate in over 40 languages without an Internet connection. - Voice translator: Translate Voice-to-Voice conversation and speech. Just speak in your language and then play the translation aloud in another. - Verb conjugations in different tenses. - Phrasebook with hundreds of useful translated phrases. iTranslate Translator supports languages & dialects: Arabic, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), English, Filipino, French, German, Hebrew, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Turkish, Vietnamese and more. For a Complete Language Translation overview: https://itranslate.com/languages LOVED AND TRUSTED BY MILLIONS - 150 million downloads and over 250,000 reviews on our translator! - Prominently featured Translator app on the Google Play Store - Traductor espa√±ol ingl√©s, high quality Spanish translator SUPPORT Terms of Service: https://www.itranslate.com/terms-of-service Privacy Policy: https://support.bendingspoons.com/privacy?app=4971999327220582090 An internet connection is required to use the app. To use the offline mode, you need to download language packs. ‚Äî Download our app and get free translations for 100+ languages. Learn new languages through translations in a fun and easy way while traveling with the Dictionary & Conjugations feature.

title: Reverso Translate and Learn
description:
Reverso is the all-in-one tool that provides you high-quality translations and helps you improve your language skills seamlessly. It's magic, and it's free.

Teachers or translators, students or business professionals, beginners or advanced learners use Reverso to enrich their vocabulary and read, write, and speak with more accuracy and confidence.

Reverso Context relies on data collected from millions of real-life multilingual texts computed with powerful "big data" algorithms and machine learning techniques. This way, we make sure you enjoy the most accurate and relevant results as well as a learning experience customized to your needs. 

Download the Reverso app, and you'll have millions of words and expressions at your fingertips, with their translations in multiple languages. Just type or speak a word or an expression and find accurate translations, illustrated by examples of real usage. Then, you can easily memorize the ones that are relevant to you with our learning activities. 

How context helps you better translate? 

The search results (translations) for a specific word or expression are weaved within real-life sentences extracted from official documents, movie subtitles, product descriptions. The examples help you understand how translations can vary upon context and select the most suitable one to avoid embarrassing mistakes. 

Learn from your translations with fun activities 

Reverso goes far beyond a simple translation app, breaking new ground also in the language learning field. 

Our app includes flashcards, quizzes, and games generated based on your searches to help you focus on the words and expressions that matter to you. They use SRS (Spaced Repetition System) learning, enabling you to memorize new terms smoothly, without the constraints of the old-school learning methods. Forget about the tedious task of studying a standard selection of words to reach language proficiency. With the Reverso app, language learning becomes fun: you play with flashcards to regularly practice the words and expressions you've recently discovered, and memorize them along the way. At your own learning pace, in the limit of your available time. 

Although language learning is fun and flexible, the whole process gains structures through learning strategy and statistics. You can fine-tune the category of new terms you want to include in your learning activities, according to your linguistic interests and needs. In the learning statistics, you will be able to follow-up on your progress. 

The bits and bytes: 

* Translation in 14 languages: Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, German, Polish, Dutch, Arabic, Russian, Romanian, Japanese, Turkish, Hebrew,  Chinese and we are working on more.
* Search by speaking and hear back the pronunciation of the translations 
* Favorites list and search history, available even offline
* Pronunciation of complete example sentences, with a native accent
* One-click to get translations, frequency details, and conjugation when applicable.
* Suggestions: words and expressions will be suggested to you as you type.  
* Share your findings via email or social media. 
* Verbs conjugation in 10 languages including French, Spanish, Italian but also Arabic, Japanese, Hebrew or Russian 
* Synonyms to help you understand words' meanings and expand your vocabulary 
* Flashcards, quizzes, games to help you learn new vocabulary 

Reverso Context is the must-have app to translate any time and constantly improve your language skills. Download it now for free! 

We're always cooking up something to help you never get lost in translation. 
Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Reverso.net and follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.reverso.net/ReversoEN to discover new content, languages, and features. 

Visit our website: http://context.reverso.net/

Then, you can easily memorize the ones that are relevant to you with our learning activities.

How context helps you better translate?

The search results (translations) for a specific word or expression are weaved within real-life sentences extracted from official documents, movie subtitles, product descriptions. The examples help you understand how translations can vary upon context and select the most suitable one to avoid embarrassing mistakes.

Learn from your translations with fun activities

Reverso goes far beyond a simple translation app, breaking new ground also in the language learning field.

Our app includes flashcards, quizzes, and games generated based on your searches to help you focus on the words and expressions that matter to you. They use SRS (Spaced Repetition System) learning, enabling you to memorize new terms smoothly, without the constraints of the old-school learning methods. Forget about the tedious task of studying a standard selection of words to reach language proficiency. With the Reverso app, language learning becomes fun: you play with flashcards to regularly practice the words and expressions you've recently discovered, and memorize them along the way. At your own learning pace, in the limit of your available time.

Although language learning is fun and flexible, the whole process gains structures through learning strategy and statistics. You can fine-tune the category of new terms you want to include in your learning activities, according to your linguistic interests and needs. In the learning statistics, you will be able to follow-up on your progress.

The bits and bytes:

* Translation in 14 languages: Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, German, Polish, Dutch, Arabic, Russian, Romanian, Japanese, Turkish, Hebrew, Chinese and we are working on more.
* Search by speaking and hear back the pronunciation of the translations
* Favorites list and search history, available even offline
* Pronunciation of complete example sentences, with a native accent
* One-click to get translations, frequency details, and conjugation when applicable.
* Suggestions: words and expressions will be suggested to you as you type.
* Share your findings via email or social media.
* Verbs conjugation in 10 languages including French, Spanish, Italian but also Arabic, Japanese, Hebrew or Russian
* Synonyms to help you understand words' meanings and expand your vocabulary
* Flashcards, quizzes, games to help you learn new vocabulary

Reverso Context is the must-have app to translate any time and constantly improve your language skills. Download it now for free!

We're always cooking up something to help you never get lost in translation.
Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Reverso.net and follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.reverso.net/ReversoEN to discover new content, languages, and features.

Visit our website: http://context.reverso.net/
summary: Translation and dictionary app:  Spanish, French, German, Italian, Arabic

title: Naver Papago - AI Translator
description:
Whenever you need translation during your travels, business trips or while studying a language just bring Papago, a smart parrot who can translate multiple languages for you.

‚ñ∂¬†What does ‚ÄòPapago‚Äô mean? 
In Esperanto, Papago refers to a parrot, a bird with language abilities. 
Papago supports 14 languages : Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified/Traditional), Spanish, French, Vietnamese, Thai, Indonesian, Russian, German, Italian and Arabic. 

‚ñ∂ Main features
1) Text Translation
Real-time text translation for phrases and words

2) Image Translation
Automatic recognition and translation of text in the image by taking a picture and pressing the button 

3) Voice Translation
Real-time voice translation to both text and audio

4) Offline translation
Can translate even in offline

5) Conversation Translation 
Simultaneously speak in each other‚Äôs language when talking one-on-one with a foreigner

6) Handwriting Translation
Handwriting translation that finds the correct word and translation when you write using your finger

7) Website Translation 
Automatic translation for all content when you include the URL of a foreign website

8) Edu
Taking a picture of the passage you want to study will create a 
My Note that you can use to study passages and words

9) Papago Mini 
Automatic in-screen translation by Papago Mini when you copy the text in any application

10) Dictionary
Dictionary information provided to check additional meanings other than initial translation results

Be confident anytime, anywhere with your translating partner Papago!

Papago Facebook Like :  https://www.facebook.com/NaverPapago
Papago Instagram Follow : https://www.instagram.com/papago_naver/

title: Book's Parallel Translation
description:
Parallel Translation of books: your ultimate language learning companion

Embark on a seamless language learning journey with the smart app, immersing yourself in your favorite books. Learning a new language has never been easier or more enjoyable. With access to exciting books at no cost, studying English or any other language will be a breeze. Parallel Translation accompanies you at every step, making language acquisition a seamless experience. Download free books online and let us help you master your language skills effortlessly.

You can effortlessly translate any word or phrase with a tap with support for Google Translate, DeepL, Microsoft, Yandex, Reverso Context, Oxford Dictionaries, NLP Translation, Deep Translation, Papago, and even ChatGPT. Simply long-tap or double-tap on any section of text and translate it with the translation service that suits you. Say goodbye to the hassle of switching between apps or dictionaries ‚Äì the app offers a one-stop solution for all your translation needs. 

You can upload books and articles in English to the application. Add your books or find any literature in the app to read: English, French, German, Arabic, Spanish, Russian, and other foreign languages will become apparent to you!

Key Features:

Advanced Reading Experience: Enjoy reading ebooks in their original language while effortlessly accessing translations with a simple tap.
Versatile Translation Options: Choose from various translation services to suit your preferences and language learning goals.
Contextual Understanding: Explore word meanings in context; Reverso Context will show examples of sentences that use the word you tapped on. Save unfamiliar words for review, and expand your vocabulary effortlessly.
Audio Pronunciations: By tapping on the word, you can listen to the pronunciation of native speakers and improve your speaking and listening skills.
Support for different formats. The app has a fb2 and an epub reader:
The Fb2 reader will open any ebook, and you can translate and read it just as quickly. 
Epub reader - will even open picture books.
Simple interface: the application's straightforward, user-friendly interface allows you to navigate quickly. All tabs are labeled with corresponding symbols. 
Extensive Language Support: Learn languages ranging from English and Spanish to German, French, Chinese, and more. You can select the translation language in the settings.
Free Access to a Growing Library: Dive into a diverse range of free books and articles, with new titles added regularly.

Elevate your language learning experience with Parallel Translation ‚Äì the ultimate companion for enthusiasts alike. Explore, study, and grow at your own pace, all within the pages of your favorite books. Install our app today and unlock the door to a deep world of linguistic adventure.

title: Easy Translate - Voice & TXT
description:
Easy Translate is a simple and versatile language translation tool that helps users communicate efficiently and easily across different languages. Whether in daily life, traveling abroad, work communication, or language learning, Easy Translate is your reliable language assistant.

üåç Key Features

üì∏ Photo Translation
Take pictures of text like menus, signs, or documents to automatically recognize and translate without typing. Perfect for travel, reading foreign materials, or quick text recognition.

üß≠ Two-Way Split Screen Translation
See the original text and translation side by side in one interface. Ideal for real-time conversations, improving clarity and interaction‚Äîgreat for business and cross-border communication.

üåê Supports Multiple Languages
Covers major global languages like English, Spanish, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, and more to meet the needs of users worldwide.

üìö Common Phrases Handbook
Built-in phrasebook covering travel, daily chats, business, shopping, dining, and more. Easily handle common conversations‚Äîperfect for travelers and language beginners.

üìÅ Multi-Format File Translation
Translate common file types like DOCX, PPTX, XLSX, TXT, CSV without copy-pasting. Just import files to get automatic, accurate translations.

üî§ Instant Text Translation
Enter any text to get quick and accurate translations. Supports multiple languages for chatting, reading, writing, and more to boost communication.

üéôÔ∏è Real-Time Voice Translation
Speak directly for instant translation. Supports two-way voice translation, making conversations smooth whether face-to-face or remote.

üì± Screen Translation Assistant
Translate screen content from other apps quickly without switching. Understand foreign apps, web pages, chats, and more with ease.

üöÄ Why Choose Easy Translate?

* Easy to use: Simple interface for all ages.
* No complex setup: Ready to use after installation, supports offline phrase lookup.
* Wide language support: Meets global user needs.
* Seamless experience: Integrated text, voice, photo, and file translation for all scenarios.
* Safe and secure: All translations processed locally without misuse or leaks.

Our app may use the Accessibility Services API to help users retrieve text from any app and provide text translation in the user's native language. This app does not collect your personal data or invade your privacy.

Download Easy Translate now and start smooth, barrier-free communication. Let language no longer be a barrier‚Äîtalk, understand, and travel with confidence wherever you go!

title: Yandex Translate
description:
‚Ä¢ Translate between any pair of the 100 languages when you‚Äôre online. 
‚Ä¢ Translate from French, German, Italian, Russian, Spanish, or Turkish to English while offline: download these languages and enable the offline mode in Settings.
‚Ä¢ Speak words or phrases in Russian, Ukrainian, English, or Turkish to translate them into any of these languages, or have the app read the translations to you. 
‚Ä¢ Learn new words and their meanings through usage examples in the app‚Äôs dictionary (available for most of the currently supported languages). 
‚Ä¢ Take a picture of a menu, road sign, book page or choose a photo with text from your Camera Roll to view its translation right over the image (only available when you are online). Visual text recognition currently works for 45 languages: Czech, English, French, German, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Turkish, Chinese, Ukrainian and others
‚Ä¢ Translate entire sites directly in the app.
‚Ä¢ Select and translate single words or phrases in other apps on your smartphone running Android 6.0. 
‚Ä¢ Enjoy the app‚Äôs time-saving predictive typing function and automated language detection.
‚Ä¢ Save translations in Favorites and view your translation history at any time.

Currently supported languages: Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Bashkir, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Burmese, Catalan, Cebuano, Chinese, Chuvash, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Elvish (Sindarin), Emoji, English, Esperanto, Estonian, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Haitian, Hebrew, Hill Mari, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Kazakh (Latin), Khmer, Korean, Kyrgyz, Lao, Latin, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malaysian, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mari, Mongolian, Nepali, Norwegian, Papiamento, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Scottish Gaelic, Serbian, Sinhalese, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Udmurt, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Uzbek (Cyrillic), Vietnamese, Welsh, Xhosa, Yakut, Yiddish, Zulu.

title: AI Phone:Call&Voice Translator
description: AI Phone Translator is your all-in-one real-time translation app for phone calls, video calls, in-person conversations and more‚Äîacross 150+ languages and accents. Talk freely over the phone or across 20+ social apps like WhatsApp. It also supports voice, photo and text translation‚Äîideal for global professionals, travelers, immigrants, international students, multilingual families, or anyone living and working across languages. üìûLive Phone Call Translation - Call Freely across Languages ‚Ä¢ Two-Way Voice Translation: Speak in your native language and the other will hear it in theirs instantly, and vice versa. ‚Ä¢ Call Captioning: View bilingual subtitles on screen. ‚Ä¢ Type-to-Speak: Type details like names, addresses, or numbers and have them translated and spoken to the other person. ‚Ä¢ Key Point Highlighting: Auto-identify and highlight important info. ‚Ä¢ AI Call Summary: Get automatic summaries after your calls for quick review. ‚Ä¢ Full Call Transcripts: Save conversations as text for easy review and sharing. üé•Real-Time Call Translation - Work for WhatsApp & More ‚Ä¢ Voice & Video Call Translation: Translate voice & video calls in real-time with bilingual subtitles on both ends. ‚Ä¢ Wide App Support: Work for 20+ social apps like WhatsApp, Telegram, LINE and WeChat. ‚Ä¢ Easy to Use: Just share a link‚Äîno download needed for others. üó£Ô∏èReal-Time Voice Translation - Speak Naturally Like a Native ‚Ä¢ Voice to Voice Translation: Speak and hear real-time translations instantly. ‚Ä¢ Speech to Text Translation: See live subtitles while you talk. ‚Ä¢ Conversation Translation: Real-time, two-way translation for in-person conversations with Talk Mode. Ideal for travel, shopping, hospital visits, or chatting with new friends. ‚Ä¢ Listening Mode: Transcribes and translates as you listen. Perfect for classes, seminars, presentations, and meetings. ‚Ä¢ Custom Voice Output: Use your own voice or choose from natural-sounding AI voices. ‚Ä¢ Translation History: Review all your past conversations anytime. üì∑üìùCamera & Text Translation ‚Äî Understand What You See ‚Ä¢ Camera & Photo Translation: Take or upload photos to translate menus, signs, labels, posters, slides, device screens and more. ‚Ä¢ Document-Friendly: Translate pictures of documents, resumes, medical records, manuals, contracts, and forms. ‚Ä¢ Smart OCR: Scan and extracts text from images with high accuracy. ‚Ä¢ Auto Detection: Recognizes language automatically. ‚Ä¢ Text Translation: Paste or type text for quick translation. üß†Powerful AI Speech Recognition ‚Äî Accurate for 150+ Languages & Accents ‚Ä¢ Supports 150+ languages and dialects, including English, Chinese (Mandarin & Cantonese), Spanish, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, Hindi, Vietnamese, Thai, Dutch, and more. ‚Ä¢ Accurately recognizes diverse regional accents like British English, American English (Southern, Midwest, East Coast), Indian English, and African English. ‚Ä¢ Advanced AI understands slang, local dialects, mixed-language speech, homophones, and informal phrases with high accuracy. ‚Ä¢ Continuously trained on a massive multilingual dataset to keep up with real-life conversations, regional speech styles, and emerging expressions. ‚Ä¢ Combines real-time speech recognition and smart dialect detection so you can speak naturally and be fully understood‚Äîwhether at work, while traveling, or in daily life. üöÄEnhanced Features for Seamless Communication ‚Ä¢ Second Number ‚Ä¢ AI-Assisted Texting ‚Ä¢ AI Auto Reply to Texts ‚Ä¢ Quick reply templates during calls ‚Ä¢ Block contacts, set business hours, call forwarding, voicemail, and more. ‚Ä¢ Pair with TransAI earbuds for hands-free translation. Disclaimer: AI Phone is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by WhatsApp Inc. or Meta Platforms, Inc. WhatsApp¬Æ is a trademark of Meta Platforms, Inc. Privacy Policy: https://www.aiphone.ai/pp Terms of Use: https://www.aiphone.ai/tos Have questions? Contact AI Phone support team: support@aiphone.ai

‚Ä¢ Listening Mode: Transcribes and translates as you listen. Perfect for classes, seminars, presentations, and meetings.
‚Ä¢ Custom Voice Output: Use your own voice or choose from natural-sounding AI voices.

‚Ä¢ Camera & Photo Translation: Take or upload photos to translate menus, signs, labels, posters, slides, device screens and more.

üß†Powerful AI Speech Recognition ‚Äî Accurate for 150+ Languages & Accents
‚Ä¢ Supports 150+ languages and dialects, including English, Chinese (Mandarin & Cantonese), Spanish, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, Hindi, Vietnamese, Thai, Dutch, and more.
‚Ä¢ Accurately recognizes diverse regional accents like British English, American English (Southern, Midwest, East Coast), Indian English, and African English.
‚Ä¢ Advanced AI understands slang, local dialects, mixed-language speech, homophones, and informal phrases with high accuracy.
‚Ä¢ Continuously trained on a massive multilingual dataset to keep up with real-life conversations, regional speech styles, and emerging expressions.
‚Ä¢ Combines real-time speech recognition and smart dialect detection so you can speak naturally and be fully understood‚Äîwhether at work, while traveling, or in daily life.

‚Ä¢ Second Number

summary: Press and hold the operation button to translate as you wish.

title: VoiceTra(Voice Translator)
description:
VoiceTra is a speech translation app that translates your speech into different languages.
VoiceTra supports 31 languages and can be downloaded and used for free. With an easy-to-use interface, you can also check if the translation results are correct.
VoiceTra, whether to enhance your travel experience or to welcome visitors to Japan, will definitely come in handy as your personal speech translator.

‚ñ†Features:
VoiceTra utilizes high-precision speech recognition, translation, and speech synthesis technologies developed by the National Institute of Information and Communications Technology (NICT). It translates your spoken words into different languages and outputs the results in a synthesized voice.
The translation direction can be instantly switched, allowing 2 people that speak different languages to communicate using a single device.
Text input is available for languages that do not support speech input.

VoiceTra is best suited for travel-related conversations and is recommended for situations and places such as below:
„ÉªTransportation: Bus, train, rent-a-car, taxi, airport, transit
„ÉªShopping: Restaurant, shopping, payment
„ÉªHotel: Check-in, check out, cancellation
„ÉªSightseeing: Overseas travel, serving and supporting foreign customers
*VoiceTra has also been introduced as a disaster-prevention, disaster-related app.

While VoiceTra can be used as a dictionary to look up words, it is recommended to input sentences as it interprets the meaning from the context to output the translation results.

‚ñ†Supported languages:
Japanese, English, Chinese (simplified), Chinese (traditional), Korean, Thai, French, Indonesian, Vietnamese, Spanish, Myanmar, Arabic, Italian, Ukrainian, Urdu, Dutch, Khmer, Sinhala, Danish, German, Turkish, Nepali, Hungarian, Hindi, Filipino, Polish, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, Malay, Mongolian, Lao, and Russian

‚ñ†Restrictions, etc.:
Internet connection is required.
It may take a while to display the translation results depending on the network connectivity.
Languages available for text input are those that the OS keyboard supports.
The characters may not be displayed properly if the appropriate font is not installed on your device.

Please note that some of the functions or the application itself may be disabled when the server is down.

Users are responsible for the communication fees incurred to use the application. Please be aware that international data roaming charges can be expensive.

This application was developed for research purposes; targeting individuals to test it out when traveling, and uses servers that are also setup for research purposes. The data recorded on the server will be utilized to make improvements in speech translation technologies.

You may test out the app for businesses, etc., but please consider using private services that we have licensed our technology to for continuous use.

Please refer to our "Terms of Use" for further details ‚Üí https://voicetra.nict.go.jp/en/attention.html

title: Wooask | Offline translation
description:
WOOASK APP is a mobile application software that integrates real-time offline voice translation, real-time online voice translation, remote chat dialogue translation, photo translation, Bluetooth earphone translation and other functions.
As the world's leading research and development company of intelligent voice translation technology, Wooask has innovatively launched high-precision real-time offline voice dialogue translation after years of development, allowing to experience high-precision real-time offline voice dialogue translation without a network. 
At the same time, in order to improve the translation experience, the function of turning any Bluetooth earphones into a translation earphones in seconds has been introduced. People can connect their own Bluetooth earphones to the WOOASK APP, and it can become a translation earphone in one second. When translating, each person wears one earbud, which makes the translation operation more convenient and the communication more natural, which greatly improves the user's translation experience.

Core Highlights
1. Support high-precision real-time offline voice translation
Supports high-precision real-time offline voice translation in 8 languages including Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, Russian, German, French, and Spanish. You can translate even without internet, with high translation accuracy and fast translation speed.

2. There are many languages for online translation, even small languages can be translated
Supports real-time online voice translation in 127 languages (71 languages, 56 accents), with high translation accuracy and fast translation speed.

3. Can turn any bluetooth earphones into a translation earphone
Connect your own bluetooth earphone to the phone via bluetooth, open the WOOASK APP translation earphone interface, and it can become a translation earphone in one second. When translating, each person wears a earbud, which makes the translation operation more convenient and the communication more natural, which greatly improves the user's translation experience.

App Features
1. Online translation
Support real-time online voice translation in 127 languages

2. Offline translation
Support real-time offline voice translation in 8 common languages

3. Chat translation
Remote real-time conversation chat translation, distance is no longer a problem

4. Photo translation
Support photo translation in 42 languages, street signs and menus can be translated immediately

5. Translation earphone
You can connect your own Bluetooth earphone to the WOOASK APP to become a translation earphone. Your Bluetooth earphone can no longer only listen to songs, make calls, but also translate.

6. Support connection with other smart hardware of WOOASK brand


As the world's leading provider of intelligent voice translation products and solutions, WOOASK has launched WOOASK APP and voice translation-based intelligent hardware products that are deeply loved and trusted by users around the world. We are eager to hear your feedback so that we can continue to improve and optimize our products. If you have any suggestions or questions, please email us: info@wooask.com, we will give you feedback as soon as possible and solve the problem!

For more information about WOOASK, please visit our official website: www.wooask.com.

title: Care to Translate
description:
Struggling to communicate with care recipients who speak another language? Care to Translate is a trusted medical translation app that helps care professionals communicate safely across 130+ languages.

No interpreter? No Wi-Fi? No problem.

Use the app to tear down language barriers, improve patient safety, and save valuable time ‚Äì wherever care happens.

Why care professionals choose Care to Translate:‚Ä®
‚Äì Real-time voice translation
‚Äì No patient data stored
‚Äì Verified translations by medical experts
‚Äì Text, audio & image support
‚Äì Available 24/7 ‚Äì even offline
‚Äì Custom & ready-made dialogue lists for quick access
‚Äì Works in all areas of care ‚Äì from ER to home visits

Safe, reliable, verified‚Ä®
The phrase library contains medically reviewed phrases, designed to support safe, dignified communication ‚Äì even when interpreters aren‚Äôt available. Unlike generic translation apps, Care to Translate does not store any patient data. Your communication stays private, always.

Translate in real-time‚Ä®
The real-time translation feature is the perfect complement to our trusted phrase library. Communicate freely without storing any data, ensuring patient safety. This AI feature empowers you to foster open and effective communication with care recipients from diverse backgrounds.

Customize your communication‚Ä®
Build your own phrase lists, organize by workflow, and search to quickly find exactly what you need to say. Whether it‚Äôs a single phrase or a full conversation ‚Äì you‚Äôre covered.

Built for health care ‚Äì trusted worldwide‚Ä®
Used by thousands of care workers in hospitals, clinics, ambulances, elderly care, social care, municipalities, and humanitarian organizations.

‚ÄúThe app helps us to provide safe and efficient communication to all our patients, no matter what language they speak.‚Äù‚Ä®Karolinska University Hospital

‚ÄúI think it‚Äôs probably the most advanced app for the medical field, I haven‚Äôt found a better one.‚Äù‚Ä®Sea-Eye, Germany

‚ÄúCare to Translate enables effective communication at all hours of the day.‚Äù‚Ä®Molde Municipality, Norway

For organizations and nonprofits‚Ä®From large hospitals to grassroots nonprofits, Care to Translate offers tailored solutions to fit your care setting. Contact us to find out more about our enterprise solution.

Try it for free! Download now and translate with confidence.

title: Tarjimly - Refugee Translation
description:
Tarjimly is an app that lets you volunteer as a translator or interpreter for refugees and NGOs around the world. Here's how it works:

1 - Bilinguals sign up and get notified whenever a refugee needs a translator. They connect in a live session where they can send text, pictures, documents, or even get on a phone call. High performing volunteers can even become certified!

2 - Refugees and Aid Workers sign up and request a translator based on their needs (like asylum interviews, emergency medicine, navigating a new country, or any humanitarian need). Tarjimly uses machine learning to connect them the best available translator in seconds.

3 - Everyone can signup as a Community Member, so they you can donate to support refugee translations, read impact stories, and invite 10 bilingual friends to signup.

Our mission is to mobilize 1 million volunteers to improve humanitarian services forever by eliminating language barriers for refugees.

Learn more at www.tarjimly.org

title: PONS Translate & Dictionary
description:
The free translator app from PONS - reliable dictionaries and translations for photo, voice and text

Get quick and reliable translations - with over 50 PONS Dictionaries and text translation for 40 languages. This tool gives you a translation for all of your search queries.

The app includes PONS Dictionaries for Arabic, Bulgarian, Chinese, Croatian, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Icelandic, Italian, Japanese, Latin, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian,  Russian, Serbian, Slovakian, Slovenian, Spanish and Turkish. In addition to dictionaries with German you will find dictionaries for combinations such as Spanish-English, French-Polish, or Portuguese-Spanish. You have access to over 50 dictionaries. The text translation system integrated into the app covers all of the languages of the online dictionaries plus an additional 12 languages such as Hebrew or Korean.

INTELLIGENT SEARCH
Type in or say your search term and to make your search quicker and more convenient, the system provides suggestions for words and phrases. If the app can‚Äôt find a result in the PONS Dictionaries, the integrated text translation service kicks in to give you your desired result.
Search without even typing: Use the camera on your phone to translate menus, signs etc. immediately.

COMMUNICATION AID
PONS Translate recognizes your voice and translates into your desired language. Cross-language communication has never been so easy!
Listen to the correct pronunciation of your dictionary translation. Use the zoom function to magnify the translation and show it to someone else on your device. Especially handy on trips!

CONVENIENT REFERENCE
Save your frequently searched or important entries in your favourites - you can use these offline, too. In your search history you can find your most recent searches. With the copy and paste function you can use your translations in other applications.

EXAMPLE SENTENCES
Language in context and information on language usage help you to find the correct translation.

AN IDEAL COMPLEMENT
Copy your translations to the free PONS Vocabulary Trainer so that you can learn them.

EDITORIALLY REVIEWED QUALITY
Our dictionary content is editorially reviewed by our lexicographers and constantly growing.

AVAILABLE ALSO OFFLINE AND AD-FREE
Download selected dictionaries and use the app offline and online. You can choose from among various subscription periods* via in-app purchase. You will then receive your desired dictionary completely ad-free, even when you use the dictionary online. If you are interested in ad-free use, but do not wish to download a dictionary, additional subscriptions are available. PLEASE NOTE: You can use the Online Translator at all times and completely free of charge even without an in-app purchase.
Visit our website at www.pons.com for more information about the free Online-Dictionary, the PONS Vocabulary Trainer and our apps.

About PONS:
PONS Publishing looks back on 40 years of experience in developing language-learning materials in the brand‚Äôs characteristic green color. The range covers traditional dictionaries and grammars, audio and electronic language courses, and free online services.

www.pons.com

* A variety of dictionaries can be subscribed to for 1 month or 1 year. Subscriptions are automatically renewed unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription term. Your account will be debited within 24 hours of the end of the current subscription term. Payment will be billed to your Google Play account. After purchase, subscriptions can be managed or cancelled in your user account settings. Any unused part of a free trial subscription that may have been offered, will expire if the user purchases a subscription for the current release.
