title: Flitto - Translate, Learn
description: [New Feature] Check out different AI translation results at a single glance! Swift and perfect translation based on crowdsourcing and AI. Translation services with over 10 million users from 173 countries all over the world. Whenever you feel language barriers during your language study, assignments or even at work, Flitto is here for you! ‚óÜ Translation services in 25 languages Korean, English, Chinese (Simplified / Traditional), Spanish, French, Japanese, Arabic, German, Russian, Portuguese, Italian, Indonesian, Vietnamese, Hindi, Thai, Turkish, Tagalog, Dutch, Swedish, Malay, Polish, Czech, Swahili, Finnish ‚óÜ Flitto features 1.Translation ‚Ä¢ AI Translation (texts / images / voices) AI translation, built over artificial neural network, offers natural translation results compared to machine translation with a simple click. ‚Ä¢ Crowdsourced Translation (texts / images / voices) Crowdsourced translation service is available only from Flitto! This 'human translation' service, powered by over 10 million users in 173 countries all over the world, will give you translation results in just 3 minutes on average. ‚Ä¢ 1:1 Professional Translation (texts / images / voices) You are matched 1:1 with a professional translator capable of translating professional materials from business emails, CVs, theses to materials requiring special knowledge. ‚Ä¢ Youtube Subtitling Youtube is a shortcut to becoming a global creator. Communicate with viewers all around the world with multilingual Youtube subtitles. 2. Proofreading ‚Ä¢ Crowdsourced proofreading A crowdsourced proofreading service in 25 languages between Flitto users ‚Ä¢ Professional proofreading Our professional proofreaders will make your professional materials such as CVs and business documents more readable and perfect 3. Arcade 'Flitto Arcade', a playground for linguists! Learn foreign languages and earn points at the same time! Try various language quizzes such as multilingual translation, translation review, dictation and reading. ‚óÜ Are you a linguist? Take on a challenge to become a crowdsourced translator or a proofreader! Pass the level test to begin translating and proofreading and earn points. ‚óÜ Where can we use the earned points? You can use them in the store to purchase items, or exchange for cash. Should you experience any inconvenience using this app, please contact us below for our prompt assistance. Flitto Customer Center: help@flitto.com, +82-2-512-0142 Flitto is also available on PC / mobile web. https://www.flitto.com/ Break the language barrier and communicate easily anytime, anywhere with Flitto! ‚ñ∂Optional access authority (You may still use Flitto even if you do not consent to the access authority.) ‚Ä¢ Microphone: You may use voice translation. ‚Ä¢ Image: You may translate images stored in your device. ‚Ä¢ Camera: You may translate images. ‚Ä¢ Notification: You will be notified of essential information for using services such as translation notifications. ‚Ä¢ Location: You may be given more accurate translations based on user location data. Flitto¬Æ is a trademark of Flitto Inc.
descriptionHTML:
[New Feature] Check out different AI translation results at a single glance!

Swift and perfect translation based on crowdsourcing and AI.

Translation services with over 10 million users from 173 countries all over the world.

Whenever you feel language barriers during your language study, assignments or even at work, Flitto is here for you!

‚óÜ Translation services in 25 languages

Korean, English, Chinese (Simplified / Traditional), Spanish, French, Japanese, Arabic, German, Russian, Portuguese, Italian, Indonesian, Vietnamese, Hindi, Thai, Turkish, Tagalog, Dutch, Swedish, Malay, Polish, Czech, Swahili, Finnish


‚óÜ Flitto features

1.Translation

‚Ä¢ AI Translation (texts / images / voices)

AI translation, built over artificial neural network, offers natural translation results compared to machine translation with a simple click.

‚Ä¢ Crowdsourced Translation (texts / images / voices)

Crowdsourced translation service is available only from Flitto! This 'human translation' service, powered by over 10 million users in 173 countries all over the world, will give you translation results in just 3 minutes on average.

‚Ä¢ 1:1 Professional Translation (texts / images / voices)

You are matched 1:1 with a professional translator capable of translating professional materials from business emails, CVs, theses to materials requiring special knowledge.

‚Ä¢ Youtube Subtitling

Youtube is a shortcut to becoming a global creator. Communicate with viewers all around the world with multilingual Youtube subtitles.

2. Proofreading

‚Ä¢ Crowdsourced proofreading

A crowdsourced proofreading service in 25 languages between Flitto users

‚Ä¢ Professional proofreading

Our professional proofreaders will make your professional materials such as CVs and business documents more readable and perfect

3. Arcade

'Flitto Arcade', a playground for linguists! Learn foreign languages and earn points at the same time! Try various language quizzes such as multilingual translation, translation review, dictation and reading.


‚óÜ Are you a linguist? Take on a challenge to become a crowdsourced translator or a proofreader! Pass the level test to begin translating and proofreading and earn points.
‚óÜ Where can we use the earned points?

You can use them in the store to purchase items, or exchange for cash.

Should you experience any inconvenience using this app, please contact us below for our prompt assistance.

Flitto Customer Center: help@flitto.com, +82-2-512-0142

Flitto is also available on PC / mobile web.

https://www.flitto.com/

Break the language barrier and communicate easily anytime, anywhere with Flitto!

‚ñ∂Optional access authority (You may still use Flitto even if you do not consent to the access authority.)

‚Ä¢ Microphone: You may use voice translation.

‚Ä¢ Image: You may translate images stored in your device.

‚Ä¢ Camera: You may translate images.

‚Ä¢ Notification: You will be notified of essential information for using services such as translation notifications.

‚Ä¢ Location: You may be given more accurate translations based on user location data.

Flitto¬Æ is a trademark of Flitto Inc.
summary: Translations, practicing foreign languages, proofreading in 25 languages!

title: TransGull - AI Live Translate
description:
Features Overview:
1. New feature launch: Support for video translation, helping you generate AI bilingual subtitles with one click.
2. Supports real-time simultaneous interpretation.
3. Supports dialogue translation.
4. Supports image translation.
5. Supports context-aware translation.
6. Supports viewing translation history and resuming conversations.

Supported languages:
- English
- Japanese
- Traditional Chinese
- Simplified Chinese
- French
- Spanish
- Russian
- Korean
- Vietnamese
- German
- Thai
- Italian
- Portuguese
- Turkish
- Filipino
- Hindi
- Bengali
- Slovak
- Cantonese
- Indonesian
- Malay
All languages can be translated to and from each other.

Our story:
‚óÜ Why create a product like Transgull?

From horse-drawn carriages to airplanes, from letters to the internet, technology has taken us across every ocean on Earth. Yet, language barriers still impede our communication.

Existing translation software often falls short, producing incomprehensible content or inappropriate jokes, making it difficult for us to trust them fully.

In the era of AI, we may finally overcome these challenges.

Transgull aims to be your most reliable translation companion, helping you communicate with the world without fearing language barriers. Together, let's spread our wings and soar.

‚óÜ Why is it called TransGull?

A seagull is a bird that can freely fly over the ocean.

TransGull aims to be a tool that allows you to freely cross oceans and language barriers for communication.

We also included a pun: 'TransGull' sounds like 'TransGold', symbolizing that our translation service is of the highest quality, like gold!

‚óÜ What problems can TransGull help you solve?

In the current version of TransGull, we've implemented conversational translation, real-time interpretation, and video translation. This allows you to effortlessly communicate with others anytime through the TransGull app. Additionally, you can upload photos during conversations for context-based translations, making interactions even smoother.

You can use the TransGull app in various scenarios:

- Asking for directions when you're out exploring.
- Taking photos of restaurant menus to quickly translate them and smoothly communicate your order with the server.
- Translating descriptions at attractions to enhance your travel experience.
- Watching and understanding interesting foreign-language videos online.

Perhaps you're traveling abroad;
Perhaps you're using a foreign service and need to talk with their customer support;
Perhaps you're studying abroad or have moved to a completely new country;
Perhaps you're simply at home browsing YouTube and find intriguing foreign videos.

We hope TransGull becomes your go-to companion for overcoming language barriers wherever you go.
descriptionHTML:
Features Overview:
1. New feature launch: Support for video translation, helping you generate AI bilingual subtitles with one click.
2. Supports real-time simultaneous interpretation.
3. Supports dialogue translation.
4. Supports image translation.
5. Supports context-aware translation.
6. Supports viewing translation history and resuming conversations.

Supported languages:
- English
- Japanese
- Traditional Chinese
- Simplified Chinese
- French
- Spanish
- Russian
- Korean
- Vietnamese
- German
- Thai
- Italian
- Portuguese
- Turkish
- Filipino
- Hindi
- Bengali
- Slovak
- Cantonese
- Indonesian
- Malay
All languages can be translated to and from each other.

Our story:
‚óÜ Why create a product like Transgull?

From horse-drawn carriages to airplanes, from letters to the internet, technology has taken us across every ocean on Earth. Yet, language barriers still impede our communication.

Existing translation software often falls short, producing incomprehensible content or inappropriate jokes, making it difficult for us to trust them fully.

In the era of AI, we may finally overcome these challenges.

Transgull aims to be your most reliable translation companion, helping you communicate with the world without fearing language barriers. Together, let's spread our wings and soar.

‚óÜ Why is it called TransGull?

A seagull is a bird that can freely fly over the ocean.

TransGull aims to be a tool that allows you to freely cross oceans and language barriers for communication.

We also included a pun: 'TransGull' sounds like 'TransGold', symbolizing that our translation service is of the highest quality, like gold!

‚óÜ What problems can TransGull help you solve?

In the current version of TransGull, we've implemented conversational translation, real-time interpretation, and video translation. This allows you to effortlessly communicate with others anytime through the TransGull app. Additionally, you can upload photos during conversations for context-based translations, making interactions even smoother.

You can use the TransGull app in various scenarios:

- Asking for directions when you're out exploring.
- Taking photos of restaurant menus to quickly translate them and smoothly communicate your order with the server.
- Translating descriptions at attractions to enhance your travel experience.
- Watching and understanding interesting foreign-language videos online.

Perhaps you're traveling abroad;
Perhaps you're using a foreign service and need to talk with their customer support;
Perhaps you're studying abroad or have moved to a completely new country;
Perhaps you're simply at home browsing YouTube and find intriguing foreign videos.

We hope TransGull becomes your go-to companion for overcoming language barriers wherever you go.
summary: Use AI for Simultaneous Interpretation, Video Translation and Image Translation

title: iTourTranslator
description:
1. iTourTranslator is a powerful translation APP with many translation functions: (1) It supports real-time translation for making and receiving calls. (2) Users can make audio or video calls with friends on social apps such as WhatsApp, Wechat, Messenger, Line, Telegram, etc. The calls will be translated in real time. The other party does not need to download this APP. (3) It can translate online videos and online meetings in real time. (4) There are many human translators in the APP, which can provide users with phone translation and remote video translation online and in real time. (5) It has an independent cloud conference system, and the speech in the meeting will be translated in real time. (6) It also supports photo translation, listening mode translation, dialogue translation, web page translation and text translation. (7) It also has an instant messaging system and post function. On this APP, you can meet friends from all over the world. You can chat with them or post photos. Texts, calls, voices and posts will all be translated in real time.
This APP is not only dedicated to breaking the language barrier, but also provides support for the hearing impaired. The main functions are suitable for the hearing impaired.
This APP supports 119 languages and can call 200+ countries.

2. Introduction of features:
(1) Telephone translation:
When making a call, there is no need to install this APP on the receiving party's mobile phone. If the user finds that the machine translation is not accurate enough during the phone call, he can also call a human translator to help at any time in the APP.

(2) Transcribe
It will perform real-time uninterrupted translation of the sound it hears, and bilingual subtitles will appear. And it will automatically record and export subtitle scripts.
Especially suitable for: online classes for international students and classes for international students. Users can use it to translate online videos, as well as to translate Zoom meetings, Teams meetings, etc.

(3) Live translation by online translator:
     You can call an online live translator to help you translate the phone call you want to make at any time. If you encounter language difficulties abroad, you can always call a live interpreter to help you translate through remote video appearing on your mobile phone, which is equivalent to bringing a live interpreter with you.
     These translators can also help you translate documents, videos, photos and other translation services.

(4) Listening function:
This function effectively solves the problem that requires him to cooperate with you when communicating with foreign friends abroad. When you talk to a foreign friend, he can just say whatever he wants. The APP will translate at any time, so you don‚Äôt need to pass the phone around.

(5) Conference translation:
This APP contains a complete cloud conference system. You can hold a multinational conference through this APP, and the language in the conference will be translated in real time.

(6) Instant messaging and social networks:
Users can meet and communicate with friends all over the world in the APP, and can post photos. Supports various instant messaging functions such as text chat, voice chat, audio and video calls, group chats, etc. All instant messages and posts will be translated.

title: Kuli Kuli - Travel Translator
description:
Kuli Kuli: Trusted Travel Translator

Discover the world through its menus with Kuli Kuli, the ultimate AI-powered translator for global travelers. Our advanced AI technology excels at translating menus of all kinds, including handwritten ones, making your culinary adventures hassle-free and exciting. We also provide instant breakdown of pharmacy labels, receipts, fortune slips, paintings, buildings and etc.

Key Features:

- Menu Translation: Order with confidence - no more guesswork.
- Allergen Information: Get crucial allergen details for menu items to ensure safe dining.
- Visual References: See images of dishes to know exactly what you're ordering.
- Cosmetics & J-Beauty Translation: Understand product labels and ingredients for skincare and beauty items.
- Snack Decoder: Explore local snacks with confidence by translating packaging and ingredients.
- Receipt Translation: Know exactly what you paid for.
- Omikuji Translation: Uncover the mysteries of Japanese fortune-telling slips.


Kuli Kuli is perfect for:
- Travelers exploring new cuisines
- Food enthusiasts diving into authentic local dishes
- People with dietary restrictions or allergies
- Beauty aficionados discovering international products
- Anyone curious about foreign snacks and cultural experiences

Kuli Kuli transforms your travel experience by breaking down language barriers, ensuring you can fully immerse yourself in local food culture, beauty products, and traditions. Whether you're deciphering a complex restaurant menu, exploring a bustling market, or picking out the perfect souvenir, Kuli Kuli is your reliable companion.

title: Instant Translate On Screen
description: Break language barriers instantly! Instant Screen Translator translates any text on your screen without switching apps - perfect for games, social media, websites, and learning. The ultimate Game Translator and Screen Translator in one app! Why Choose Instant Translate? Translate Anywhere Get instant translations within ANY app - WhatsApp, Instagram, YouTube, games, browsers, and more. No copy-paste needed. Just drag the bubble to any text and understand! Perfect For ‚Ä¢ Gaming - Understand foreign games and in-game chat instantly ‚Ä¢ Learning - Build vocabulary with Word Mode and smart flashcards ‚Ä¢ Social - Chat with friends worldwide in any language ‚Ä¢ Reading - Enjoy manga, websites, and documents seamlessly ‚Ä¢ Travel - Navigate foreign apps with confidence Key Features Translation Methods: ‚Ä¢ Instant Translate - Drag the bubble to any text for immediate translation ‚Ä¢ Global Translate - Translate entire screen at once ‚Ä¢ Region Translate - Select specific areas to translate ‚Ä¢ Auto Translate - Real-time overlay for videos and games ‚Ä¢ Photo Translate - Camera and gallery image translation Unique Innovations: ‚Ä¢ Comic Mode - Specialized manga/comic translation with vertical text support ‚Ä¢ Word Mode - Interactive dictionary with pronunciation and learning tools ‚Ä¢ Magic Dot - Revolutionary feature! A smart dot appears in any app's input box, tap it to auto-translate text before sending. Perfect for chatting and form-filling! ‚Ä¢ Floating Ball - Quick access from anywhere ‚Ä¢ Gesture Control - Shake or wave to activate Learning Suite: ‚Ä¢ Personal wordbook with AI-powered suggestions ‚Ä¢ Interactive flashcards that adapt to your progress ‚Ä¢ Vocabulary quizzes ‚Ä¢ Translation history with smart search Three Intelligent Modes: ‚Ä¢ Simple - Clean, fast translations for quick understanding ‚Ä¢ General - Full features with AI enhancements ‚Ä¢ Word - Smart dictionary for serious language learners Smart Translation Technology: ‚Ä¢ AI-powered translation for natural, context-aware results ‚Ä¢ Lightning-fast Instant Engine for real-time results ‚Ä¢ Offline translation available - translate without internet ‚Ä¢ Fast local text recognition - all processing on your device for privacy 200+ Languages Supported Including English, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, German, French, Russian, Arabic, Portuguese, Hindi, Thai, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Turkish, and many more. Easy 3-Step Setup: 1. Grant permissions (screen capture & accessibility) 2. Enable floating ball 3. Drag bubble to any text to translate - It's that simple! Your Privacy Matters Please note that our app may use the Accessibility Service API to help users get text from any app and provide text translation for it. The app does not capture your personal data or invade your privacy. Additional Smart Features: ‚Ä¢ Batch translation with AI optimization ‚Ä¢ Intelligent language auto-detection ‚Ä¢ Quick Settings tile ‚Ä¢ Smart text extraction and copy ‚Ä¢ Dark mode support ‚Ä¢ AI-powered translation suggestions Experience Professional Translation! Our advanced translate technology and rich feature set deliver the fastest, most accurate translations available. Perfect for mobile gaming, international communication, and language learning! Download Instant Screen Translator today and understand everything on your screen! Contact: feedback@sapiens8.com

title: Chat Translator AI - LangLang
description:
LangLang's AI-Powered Translator for WhatsApp allows you to automatically translate WhatsApp chats effortlessly powered by Google Gemini.

title: Felo Translator
description:
The Felo translator app supports translating real-time speech into text in multiple languages, providing subtitles as you speak. Whether you are a student attending classes abroad, living overseas, engaging in face-to-face cross-language communication, or participating in offline meetings and seminars, Felo will make your communication smoother and eliminate language barriers. 

„ÄêKey Features„Äë

‚Ä¢ Instant translation in over 15 languages: Japanese, Chinese, English, Spanish, German, French, Italian, Russian, Korean, Thai, Czech, Indonesian, Cantonese, Indonesian, Vietnamese;

‚Ä¢ Automatically detects the languages spoken by both parties;

‚Ä¢ Automatically archives conversations and translation content;

Felo's RRT function is a world-first, utilizing the latest AI technology to achieve a dual breakthrough in fast translation and high accuracy.
